T02D1197:94b-1: shr'i sam pu ti ti la k'a n'a ma yo
T02D1197:94b-2: g'i n'i tantra r'a dza s+ya t'i k'a smri ti
T02D1197:94b-3: sam darsha n'a lo ka n'a ma /
T02D1197:94b-5: dpal kha sbyor thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor
T02D1197:94b-6: ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang
T02D1197:94b-7: dag par lta ba'i dran pa'i snang ba zhes bya
T02D1197:94b-8: ba / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma dkar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1197:94b-9: skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yi //
T02D1197:94b-10: gzugs ni ma lus pa rnams ni //
T02D1197:94b-11: gnyi ga sdang phyir thig le ni //
T02D1197:94b-12: bde chen de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1197:94b-13: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya las //
T02D1197:94b-14: rang gi spyod pa ston byed pa //
T02D1197:94b-15: stong pa snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1197:94b-16: mchog tu rtag pa de phyag 'tshal //
T02D1197:94b-17: 'dod chags me yi rgya mtsho las //
T02D1197:94b-18: pha rol du ni 'gro nus pa //
T02D1197:94b-19: bla ma'i zhabs la spyi bo yis //
T02D1197:94b-22: rgyud 'di rten dang brten pa las //
T02D1197:94b-23: mtshan ma thob nas sbyor ba ni //
T02D1197:94b-24: yang dag lta ba'i dran snang ba //
T02D1197:94b-25: bstan pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:94b-26: skal ldan sems can don phyir ro //
T02D1197:94b-27: byis ba mkhas par mngon rgyal can //
T02D1197:94b-28: rnams la bstan pa nyid mi sbyar //
T02D1197:94b-29: gal te shes rab 'chal ston byed //
T02D1197:94b-30: mkha' 'gro ma sogs nyer gtses te //
T02D1197:94b-32: mnar med la sogs par ni 'gro //
T02D1197:94b-33: de phyir bla gus ser sna med //
T02D1197:94b-34: dbang po thul zhing dbang bskur ba //
T02D1197:94b-35: brtan zhing yang dag lam smra byed //
T02D1197:94b-36: 'di ni theg pa chen po'i snod //
T02D1197:94b-37: rgyal ba'i bka' rnams rab skyong byed //
T02D1197:94b-38: yang dag sbyin la rtag chags shing //
T02D1197:94b-39: bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dag ni //
T02D1197:94b-45: dgos pa'i dgos pa sngon du 'gro ba mngon par blta ste /
T02D1197:94b-46: 'dir re zhig rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
T02D1197:94b-47: rgyas pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug las byung
T02D1197:94b-48: ba rgyud nyung du brtag pa bcu gcig gi bdag
T02D1197:94b-49: nyid can kha sbyor thig le zhes bya ba ni
T02D1197:94b-51: de las rgyu dang 'bras bu sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhung gi tshogs ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T02D1197:95a-0: @95a * // smra bya dang smra byed kyi mtshan nyid la 'bras bu nye bar brtag pa'i phyir 'brel ba'o //
T02D1197:95a-1: phyi ma las phyi ma'i dbang byin pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1197:95a-2: las kyi tshogs kyi rigs pa dang /
T02D1197:95a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo khong du chud pa dang /
T02D1197:95a-6: yan lag bcu gnyis spangs pa dang //
T02D1197:95a-7: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis kyis phyag
T02D1197:95a-8: rgya chen po thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos par
T02D1197:95a-9: bstan pa'o // 'di ni bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1197:95a-10: 'di nyid kyi bshad pa ni rgyas pa'i rgyud kyi rigs pas gsungs so //
T02D1197:95a-11: da ni brjod par bya ba brjod de gdul bya'i
T02D1197:95a-12: skye bo nges pa dang bral ba rnams kyi rang
T02D1197:95a-13: gi sems kyi bsam pa nyid kyis tshe 'di la
T02D1197:95a-14: sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba
T02D1197:95a-15: phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba'i gnas rdo rje sems
T02D1197:95a-16: dpas gsungs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D1197:95a-17: po'i sbyor bas bsgrub bya dang /
T02D1197:95a-19: sgrub pa po rab tu ston par byed pa /
T02D1197:95a-21: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pa la brten pa /
T02D1197:95a-22: mngon par byang chub pa bzhi dang /
T02D1197:95a-23: rdo rje bzhis yongs su dag pa /
T02D1197:95a-25: rigs drug la sogs pa mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa dang /
T02D1197:95a-27: de kho na nyid bcu drug dang /
T02D1197:95a-28: stong pa nyid bcu drug dang /
T02D1197:95a-30: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa nyid shu'i bdag
T02D1197:95a-31: nyid can dus lnga dang ldan pa 'di ni brjod
T02D1197:95a-33: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa /
T02D1197:95a-34: rnam pa bcu gnyis bden pa'i don //
T02D1197:95a-35: rnam pa bcu drug de nyid rig / rnam pa nyi shu mngon byang chub //
T02D1197:95a-36: rnam par sangs rgyas thams cad rig / ces pa
T02D1197:95a-37: 'dis sngags kyi theg pas 'khyud pa'i dbang por bstan
T02D1197:95a-38: to // 'di'i gzhung gi tshogs brtag pa bcu gcig
T02D1197:95a-39: gi bdag nyid ba sbyor thig le yang rjod par
T02D1197:95a-40: to // byed pa'o // de yang yang brtag pa
T02D1197:95a-41: bcu gcig gi rang bzhin 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D1197:95a-42: rje sems dpar kun du gnas te /
T02D1197:95a-43: dang po re zhig rgyud thams cad gsang ba'i rang bzhin du kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-0: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam par @95b bsgom
T02D1197:95b-1: pa'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so
T02D1197:95b-2: // rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri
T02D1197:95b-3: ba'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so
T02D1197:95b-4: // // rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-5: spyod pa'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-6: dpyid kyi thig le zhes pa'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-7: las thams cad dang bsam gtan 'byung ba zhes pa'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-8: bya ba thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-9: bya ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-10: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i rang bzhin de kun du gnas so //
T02D1197:95b-11: rtog pa thams cad kyi gleng gzhi thig le thabs
T02D1197:95b-12: sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin de kun du gnas so
T02D1197:95b-14: 'di'i ming brjod pas rjod par byed pa dang /
T02D1197:95b-15: brjod par bya ba dag gi smra bya dang /
T02D1197:95b-16: smra byed kyi mtshan nyid rab tu byed pa sum cu'i bdag nyid ni 'brel ba'o //
T02D1197:95b-18: dang po re zhig rjod par byed pa dang /
T02D1197:95b-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-21: byang chub sems la 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-22: de kho na nyid man ngag gi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-23: byang chub sems kyi dbang gi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-24: shes rab dang thabs kyi don bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-25: 'khor lo thams cad kyi rnam 'phrul gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-26: he ru ka bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-27: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-28: bdag med pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-29: ngag gi brda'i yi ge'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-30: lus srul po'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-31: l'a ma'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma dang /
T02D1197:95b-32: phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:95b-33: 'dus pa'i gnas kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-0: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi @96a * //
T02D1197:96a-2: spyod pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-3: yi ge bcu drug mtshon bya dang /
T02D1197:96a-4: mtshon byed kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-5: rtsa ba'i gnas dgod pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-7: sbyin sreg gi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-9: sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-11: 'khor lo 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-12: dril ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-14: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-15: mu stegs pa'i rnam par shes pa bsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-17: gtor ma dbul ba'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-18: bris sku dang glegs bam gtan la dbab pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-19: slob dpon gyi sgrub thabs chen po'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-20: bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1197:96a-22: bkur sti'i rang bzhin gyi dngos pos dang /
T02D1197:96a-23: sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos por de kun du gnas so /
T02D1197:96a-24: rtog pa thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i thig le rtog
T02D1197:96a-25: pa bcu gcig gi bdag nyid rab tu byed pa
T02D1197:96a-26: sum cu'i rang bzhin gyi dngos por de kun du
T02D1197:96a-27: gnas so // de yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D1197:96a-28: sems dpa' dpal he ru ka zhes pa dang 'brel
T02D1197:96a-29: gnas so // to // da ni dgos pa brjod pa brjod de /
T02D1197:96a-30: 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa ni rgyud mtha'
T02D1197:96a-31: dag yongs su rdzogs par ston par byed pa'i tshig
T02D1197:96a-32: phrad do // 'dir byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang nas /
T02D1197:96a-33: rdo rje snying po gsol ba 'debs pa pos /
T02D1197:96a-34: bcom ldan 'das nyid las bdag gis thos kyi gzhan
T02D1197:96a-35: las brgyud pa ma yin zhing su zhig las 'ongs
T02D1197:96a-36: pa dang / ma thos pa dang /
T02D1197:96a-37: dus kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig las thos pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:96a-38: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ston pa po dang /
T02D1197:96b-0: @96b bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na zhes 'brel to //
T02D1197:96b-4: 'dir re zhig 'jig rten pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D1197:96b-9: de bzhin du lhar yang skyes pa'i mtshan nyid gnas so //
T02D1197:96b-10: de ltar rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye bas lus dang ngag dang /
T02D1197:96b-11: sems kyi bdag nyid sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
T02D1197:96b-12: drod gsher las skyes pa dang mngal las skyes pa dang /
T02D1197:96b-14: de yang lus kyi dbang gis mtshungs so //
T02D1197:96b-15: slar yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
T02D1197:96b-18: dus de nyid ni 'phags pa rnams brtan zhing sems
T02D1197:96b-19: can gyi don rgyun chags pa thar pa ster bar
T02D1197:96b-20: byed pa'o // de bzhin du byis pa rnams la 'dod chags dang /
T02D1197:96b-23: phrag dog gi dbang gis ngan 'gro ster bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:96b-25: ci byis pa rnams kyi las /
T02D1197:96b-26: 'phags pa rnams kyi dus gcig mi nyams pa'i mtshan nyid gzung ba dang /
T02D1197:96b-28: smra bya dang smra byed las 'das pa chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin nyid dang /
T02D1197:96b-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1197:96b-35: byis pa rnams kyi g-yo ba'i phyir sems nyams shing sad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis /
T02D1197:96b-38: 'chi ba ster bar byed pa sdig pa'i dbang gis dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:96b-39: bsod nams kyi dbang gis mtho ris kyi 'bras bu 'thob bo //
T02D1197:96b-40: de de bzhin du yang rnam pa bzhi zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:96b-42: gsum ldan dang gnyis ldan dang ;
T02D1197:96b-44: der tshe rabs snga ma'i tshogs gnyis kyi dbang gis /
T02D1197:96b-45: sangs rgyas pa rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:96b-46: nyan thos la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1197:97a-0: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbang @97a * //
T02D1197:97a-2: de bzhin du 'chad bzhin pa las rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:97a-3: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa yang gcig
T02D1197:97a-4: gi rnam pa skad cig ma gcig la mngon par
T02D1197:97a-5: byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid dus bzhi rnams kyis yongs
T02D1197:97a-6: su shes pa smra bya dang smra byed kyi mtshan
T02D1197:97a-9: skyed byed rjes su mthun par gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:97a-10: 'di yongs su shes pas sems can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:97a-11: 'di ni dus gcig gi mtshan nyid dgongs pa'o //
T02D1197:97a-12: de nas 'dir 'di skad bdag gis thos pa nges par gzung zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:97a-13: 'on kyang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya
T02D1197:97a-14: ba la sogs pa nas kha sbyor las byung ba'i
T02D1197:97a-15: rgyud ces pa 'di'i mthar thug pa'i ngag dang pos
T02D1197:97a-17: dgos pa nye bar dgod pa ni nyan pa po rnams gzhug pa'i phyir bstan to //
T02D1197:97a-18: gzhan du gal te brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D1197:97a-20: ji ltar sems can rnams mnyan pa la yang 'jug par 'gyur /
T02D1197:97a-21: thams cad du dgos pa la 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur mod /
T02D1197:97a-22: ji srid gsum du dgos pa nges par ma bzung
T02D1197:97a-23: ba de srid du skyes bu su zhig 'jug par
T02D1197:97a-24: 'gyur / de yang skyes bu'i don gyi dgos pa
T02D1197:97a-25: la sbyor bas thabs dang bcas par gal te 'gyur
T02D1197:97a-27: de yang 'dir yod pa nyid de /
T02D1197:97a-28: 'di ltar yang 'chad bzhin pa'i rnam pa la sogs
T02D1197:97a-29: pa'i tshul gyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1197:97a-30: mtshan nyid de kho na nyid don dam pa skyes
T02D1197:97a-31: bu'i don du dgos pa de'i don du bstan par
T02D1197:97a-32: bya'o // de'i phyir 'dir brjod par bya ba ni
T02D1197:97a-33: he ru ka la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de kho
T02D1197:97a-34: bya'o // na nyid do // dgos pa yang de yongs su shes pa'o //
T02D1197:97a-35: de'i phyir de yongs su shes pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste /
T02D1197:97a-36: shin tu rab tu grub pa 'di ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1197:97a-37: gal te yang sgra'i don gyi rgyun med pa'i phyir tshad med de /
T02D1197:97a-38: de ltar na yang don la the tshom za bar yang 'gyur te /
T02D1197:97a-39: de la rtog pa dang ldan par 'jug go //
T02D1197:97a-40: dbang po rnon po 'jug ste gzhan gyi rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:97b-0: dbang po @97b rnon pos skyes bu'i don de kho na nyid la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1197:97b-1: 'di ltar yang rang gi ngo bos de kho na nyid de la brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D1197:97b-2: rjod par byed pa'i dngos po med do //
T02D1197:97b-3: der bla mas brjod pa las kyang rang gis rig pa med de /
T02D1197:97b-4: de kho na nyid ni ngag thams cad kyi tha snyad las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:97b-5: de lta mod kyi yang dag pa'i rigs pa can
T02D1197:97b-6: gyis bla ma'i ngag las des lam 'ga' zhig rnyed
T02D1197:97b-7: de phyi nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs
T02D1197:97b-8: pa yongs su spong pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lam nye
T02D1197:97b-9: bar dmigs pa'i rim gyis dad pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:97b-10: yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob ma'i bsgom pa brgyud
T02D1197:97b-11: pa las de kho na nyid des rang nyid byin
T02D1197:97b-13: rigs pas thams cad kyi shes pa ngan pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su gtang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:97b-14: de'i phyir ma lus pa'i shes pas ngan pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:97b-15: yang dag pa'i ye shes gang don dam pa de rang nyid kyis rnyed par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:97b-16: snang ba mun pa sel ba bzhin dang /
T02D1197:97b-17: nyi mas mun pa sel ba bzhin no //
T02D1197:97b-18: der 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
T02D1197:97b-19: zhes pa 'dis rdo rje snying po thos pa mang
T02D1197:97b-20: ba dang ldan par gsal bar bstan te /
T02D1197:97b-21: dus gcig gi tshe na bdag gis de kho na nyid 'di thos la /
T02D1197:97b-22: gzhan du ni de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan las kun
T02D1197:97b-23: rdzob du ma dang don dam pa'i dbye bas so
T02D1197:97b-24: // du ma'i dbye bas bcom ldan 'das gcig pu bzhugs te /
T02D1197:97b-25: brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang bud med dang /
T02D1197:97b-26: skyes pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas dang ;
T02D1197:97b-27: de bzhin du kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i dbye bas so //
T02D1197:97b-28: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kun rdzob kyi gzugs kyang
T02D1197:97b-29: yin la don dam pa'i gzugs kyang de yin no
T02D1197:97b-30: // 'dis de kho na nyid sgrib par byed pas kun rdzob bo //
T02D1197:97b-31: don yang yin la dam pa yang yin pas don dam pa'o //
T02D1197:97b-32: dam pa'i sgra ni phul du byung ba'i rnam grangs so //
T02D1197:97b-33: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gcig pu'i gzugs nyid ji
T02D1197:97b-34: ltar de so so'i dbye bas gnas par 'gyur zhes
T02D1197:97b-36: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs de ni lhan
T02D1197:98a-0: cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin dga' @98a *
T02D1197:98a-1: // ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i yid kyis rig par bya'o //
T02D1197:98a-2: 'dis ni phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:98a-4: da ni bcom ldan 'das bzhugs zhes pa'i tshig gi
T02D1197:98a-5: tshul gyis gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu
T02D1197:98a-6: la rgyur nye bar btags pas gnas phun sum tshogs
T02D1197:98a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:98a-10: rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i nye bar btags pas kun rdzob kyi bden par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:98a-11: ga b'an zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:98a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
T02D1197:98a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa yang de yin la thams cad kyang de yin te /
T02D1197:98a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ba rnams so ;
T02D1197:98a-16: /'dir sku las byung ba rnams ni dgongs bshad gzhan
T02D1197:98a-17: gyis gsungs pa 'jug pa'i tshogs drug gi rnam par
T02D1197:98a-20: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams so //
T02D1197:98a-21: de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyams su myong
T02D1197:98a-22: bas re re yang grangs med pa de rnams su
T02D1197:98a-23: snang ste / brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang yul
T02D1197:98a-24: 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang ljon shing dang
T02D1197:98a-25: snang ste / gel ba dang / lcug ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1197:98a-26: de bzhin du grong dang grong khyer dang lam dang
T02D1197:98a-27: tshong dus la sogs pa na gnas pa'i sems can
T02D1197:98a-28: sna tshogs pa rnams yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir
T02D1197:98a-29: de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid do //
T02D1197:98a-30: 'on kyang mu stegs la sogs pa ni mi shes pa'i sgrib pas g-yogs so //
T02D1197:98a-31: sangs rgyas pa snying rje can rnams ni yang dag
T02D1197:98a-32: par yongs su shes pas de la de skad ces
T02D1197:98a-33: bya'o // de bzhin du gsungs las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02D1197:98a-34: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rang bzhin ma
T02D1197:98a-35: rig pa la sogs pa'i dri mas bsgribs pa rnams
T02D1197:98a-37: 'on kyang gzhan gyi don la chags shing brtson pa'i
T02D1197:98a-38: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams skye
T02D1197:98b-0: bas sna tshogs @98b par sprul cing rang gi las
T02D1197:98b-2: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa cung zad tsam gyis bsgribs mod /
T02D1197:98b-3: rang gi dbang gis ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:98b-4: de bzhin du thugs las byung ba ni sngon gyi
T02D1197:98b-5: bag chags kyi stobs kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung
T02D1197:98b-6: ba bzhin te / de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1197:98b-7: 'on kyang rnam par rig pa tsam la chags pa'i
T02D1197:98b-8: 'tsho ba lus las skye ba dgos dang lcags sgrog
T02D1197:98b-9: bzhin 'khor bar bcings pa rnams te /
T02D1197:98b-10: brgya lam na mtshan mo'i glog bzhin dge ba'i grogs dang phrad pas grol bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:98b-11: de ltar yang rang dbang thob pa 'jig rten gyi
T02D1197:98b-12: chos brgyad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
T02D1197:98b-13: par 'gyur ro // de ltar khams gsum pa'i sems
T02D1197:98b-14: can bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D1197:98b-15: sku dang gsung dang thugs las skyes par 'gyur ro
T02D1197:98b-16: par 'gyur ro // // 'di rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes pa dang /
T02D1197:98b-17: kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba dang /
T02D1197:98b-18: dge ba'i grogs mchog mnyes pa dang /
T02D1197:98b-19: pho nya dang pho nya mo rnams kyi mchod pa
T02D1197:98b-20: la nye bar gnas pa'i nye bar spyod pa dang
T02D1197:98b-21: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi pha rol tu 'gro ba dang /
T02D1197:98b-22: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa dang bral ba dang /
T02D1197:98b-23: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dang 'dod pa'i lha mnyes pa dang /
T02D1197:98b-24: theg pa gsum gyi cho ga dang /
T02D1197:98b-25: theg pa mchog rtogs pa dang /
T02D1197:98b-26: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa dang /
T02D1197:98b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i tshul yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1197:98b-30: 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas so //
T02D1197:98b-31: 'di mtha' dag rnam par mi rtog pa dang 'brel
T02D1197:98b-32: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1197:98b-34: sku dang gsung dang thugs dbyer med par byas shing
T02D1197:98b-35: ro gcig par 'gyur ba bde ba chen po bcom
T02D1197:98b-36: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1197:98b-37: dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsum bsdus pa'i
T02D1197:98b-38: bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang he ru kar bshad do
T02D1197:98b-40: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
T02D1197:98b-42: rdo rje btsun mo ni spyan ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D1197:99a-0: de rnams kyi bha ga'i padma la bye ba @99a * //
T02D1197:99a-1: phrag brgyad cu'i 'dab ma'i bdag nyid rang gi 'khor
T02D1197:99a-2: 'dus pa dang lhan cig pa rnams la bcom ldan
T02D1197:99a-3: 'das ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo rol pa
T02D1197:99a-4: dang ldan par bzhugs zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:99a-5: padma ni mdor bsdus na lus so //
T02D1197:99a-6: rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag bcom pa'i phyir bha ga'o //
T02D1197:99a-7: bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni 'dab ma rnams so //
T02D1197:99a-8: shes bya'i mchog nyid 'di shes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ni rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D1197:99a-9: rdo rje yang yin la snying po yang yin pas na rdo rje snying po ste /
T02D1197:99a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:99a-12: rang nyid byed cing rang nyid 'phrog / rang nyid rgyal po rang nyid gtso //
T02D1197:99a-13: de ni ston pa rang nyid de //
T02D1197:99a-14: bstan bya yang ni rang nyid do //
T02D1197:99a-16: 'dis ni sdud pa po'i nges pa spang ba bstan to //
T02D1197:99a-17: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D1197:99a-18: bzhugs zhes pa ni rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi bha ga rnams la ste /
T02D1197:99a-19: rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi gsang ba'i bu ga rnams su rol pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:99a-22: rtsa 'di rnams kyi dbus su khong stong gi bdag
T02D1197:99a-23: nyid aa wa dh'u t'i'i rnam pa rang gi ngo
T02D1197:99a-24: bos 'bar ba srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams sdud
T02D1197:99a-25: pa phung po dang khams dang /
T02D1197:99a-26: skye mched rnams rang bzhin med par byed cing thig
T02D1197:99a-27: le'i gnas su son pa mi shigs pa dang 'khyud
T02D1197:99a-28: pa ro gcig pa'i dngos po byang chub kyi sems
T02D1197:99a-29: ye shes mi 'dzag pa las rang rig pa'i ye
T02D1197:99a-30: shes skye ba ni phyag rgya ste /
T02D1197:99a-32: 'on kyang srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams rnam ba gsum du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:99a-34: dbyings dang rdo rje lta bu rim pa bzhin du dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa dang /
T02D1197:99a-35: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i dbye bas gnas pa ni las so //
T02D1197:99a-36: phung po la sogs pa'i lus kyi rtsa la gnas pa ni dbyibs so //
T02D1197:99a-37: de bzhin du ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs pa ni rdo rje lta bu'o //
T02D1197:99a-38: de yongs su shes pa ni bla ma brgyud pa'i
T02D1197:99a-39: rim pas rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rgyun
T02D1197:99a-40: gyi stobs dang / sbyor ba'i yan lag drug khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:99a-41: de la yan lag drug ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1197:99a-42: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1197:99a-43: srog dang rtsol ba de bzhin gzung //
T02D1197:99a-44: rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin rnams //
T02D1197:99b-0: @99b dgongs bshad gzhan gyis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:99b-1: de yang du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1197:99b-2: stong pa'i sku mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1197:99b-3: ji srid du yan lag drug cur 'gyur gyi bar ro //
T02D1197:99b-4: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs te /
T02D1197:99b-5: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste //
T02D1197:99b-6: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
T02D1197:99b-7: shes bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag / shes bcu rnam par dag pa 'chang //
T02D1197:99b-8: rnam pa bcu po don gyi don //
T02D1197:99b-9: thub dbang khyab bdag stobs bcu'i bdag / ma lus sna tshogs don byed pa //
T02D1197:99b-10: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
T02D1197:99b-12: 'di'i don ni rgyud sna tshogs kyi dgongs pas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:99b-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa'i rgya cher 'grel las nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1197:99b-14: bdag gis kyang rgyud 'di'i don cung zad rang gi blo'i dbang gis sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1197:99b-15: 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:99b-16: kha sbyor thig le zhes pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i
T02D1197:99b-17: rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag par lta ba'i dran
T02D1197:99b-18: pa'i snang ba zhes pa las rjod byed dang /
T02D1197:99b-19: brjod bya la sogs pas rgyud la 'jug pa bstan pa ste dang po'o /
T02D1197:99b-21: // / da ni sdud pa po'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:99b-22: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor pa'i dbang
T02D1197:99b-23: phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu rnams kyi dbus su
T02D1197:99b-24: rdo rje snying po la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad
T02D1197:99b-25: do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1197:99b-26: der zhes pa ni de'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:99b-27: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi khang
T02D1197:99b-28: pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das longs spyod
T02D1197:99b-29: rdzogs pa sku'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02D1197:99b-30: 'di la bcom pa yod pas na bcom ldan no //
T02D1197:99b-31: yang na mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi bdud
T02D1197:99b-32: rtsi'i char 'bebs pa'i phyir bha ga rim las bzlog
T02D1197:99b-33: pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng bas khams gsum pa bskyed
T02D1197:99b-34: bya skyed byed 'brel pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes
T02D1197:99b-35: bstan te / yang zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:99b-36: de bzhin du b'an zhes pa ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:99b-37: der ci lhag pa dang chad pa ma brjod de brgyad cu nges par smos /
T02D1197:99b-38: 'dir gsungs pa sems can thams cad kyi dpral ba
T02D1197:99b-39: nas rkang pa'i mthe bong gi bar la rang gi
T02D1197:99b-40: lag pa'i sor brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:100a-1: tor la sor bzhi'i tshad do //
T02D1197:100a-2: de'i phyir sor re re la bye ba'i grangs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams gnas so //
T02D1197:100a-3: de ci zhe na dbugs phyir rgyu ba dang /
T02D1197:100a-4: nang du rgyu ba bcings pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:100a-5: de'i phyir 'di la rnal 'byor yod pas na /
T02D1197:100a-8: rnal 'byor ni rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid 'od gsal ba'i ye shes zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:100a-9: de'i phyir rang bzhin rnams su 'gyur te /
T02D1197:100a-11: de yang byis pa rnams la sdug bsngal ster bar byed de /
T02D1197:100a-12: rgyud dang bras bu dang bral ba'i phyir du 'bod la sogs par ltung ba'o //
T02D1197:100a-13: rgyu dang 'bras bu ci zhe na /
T02D1197:100a-14: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni rgyu'o //
T02D1197:100a-15: 'bras bu ni rang rig pa'i ye shes stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:100a-16: de ltar dag pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni bstan par bya ba'o //
T02D1197:100a-17: gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das ston pa po'o //
T02D1197:100a-18: de'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i chos //
T02D1197:100a-19: bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min //
T02D1197:100a-20: brtan dang g-yo ba sna tshogs pa //
T02D1197:100a-21: rang sems rgyu las 'byung ba yi //
T02D1197:100a-22: sgyu ma 'di ni mi shes pas //
T02D1197:100a-24: de bzhin sgyu ma gang rig pas /
T02D1197:100a-25: sangs rgyas 'gyur ro gzhan du min //
T02D1197:100a-26: de ltar rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi dbus
T02D1197:100a-27: su rdo rje snying po la gzigs te zhes pa
T02D1197:100a-28: la rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes so
T02D1197:100a-29: // snying po ni de shes pa ste /
T02D1197:100a-30: rnam par shes zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:100a-31: yul dang yul can gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni gzigs pa'o //
T02D1197:100a-32: de nyid sems can la gzigs pa'i snying rje'i dbang
T02D1197:100a-33: gis 'dzum pa mdzad pa de la de skad ces
T02D1197:100a-34: bya'o // 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu zhes pa
T02D1197:100a-35: ni 'dir chos bdag med pa la gnas pa dang
T02D1197:100a-36: ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T02D1197:100a-37: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nang du yang
T02D1197:100a-38: dag 'jog pas chos la dmigs pa mngon du byed
T02D1197:100a-39: pa ni 'dzum pa mdzad ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:100a-40: 'dir zhes pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
T02D1197:100a-41: sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir ji srid du
T02D1197:100a-42: gang zag la bdag med pa la chags par mi
T02D1197:100a-43: byed pa de srid du skyes rabs sna tshogs pa
T02D1197:100a-44: rnams la yang sprul pa'i skus 'jug par mi 'gyur
T02D1197:100b-0: ro // de'i @100b phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1197:100b-1: kyi gcig dang du ma'i lus kyi dbang gis gang
T02D1197:100b-2: zag la bdag med pa grub bo //
T02D1197:100b-3: gang gi phyir dmigs pa med pa'i snying rjes kyang
T02D1197:100b-4: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang gis chos ston
T02D1197:100b-5: pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1197:100b-6: la sna tshogs pa ni med do zhes pa'i tshig
T02D1197:100b-7: ni gsung rab kha cig las gsungs so //
T02D1197:100b-9: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1197:100b-10: byang chub sems zhes brjod pa yin //
T02D1197:100b-11: shes rab thabs dag ye shes ni //
T02D1197:100b-12: snying rje chen po zhes su gsungs //
T02D1197:100b-13: rang gi stan las langs te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:100b-14: shes rab dang thabs dag gi rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02D1197:100b-15: rgyu rdo rje 'dzin gyi drung nas sgyu ma dang gzugs brnyan bzhin nam /
T02D1197:100b-16: nam mkha' las skar ma bzhin langs pa'o //
T02D1197:100b-17: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas zhes pa
T02D1197:100b-18: la bla gos ni theg pa gsum las sngags kyi
T02D1197:100b-19: theg pa chen po gong mar gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:100b-20: de'i gzar ba ni de la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:100b-21: dran pa yang rung gzar nas zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:100b-22: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te zhes pa la /
T02D1197:100b-23: pus mo g-yas pa ni dang po lam bstan pa'i dus su'o //
T02D1197:100b-24: pus mo'i lha nga ni phyag rgya chen por 'gro ba la brtson pa'i sems so //
T02D1197:100b-25: de nyid sa la btsugs pa zhes pa ni chos thams cad kyi gzhi ma rig pa yin te /
T02D1197:100b-26: de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:100b-27: sa la btsugs pa ni des bcom pas ro gcig par byed do //
T02D1197:100b-28: thal mo sbyor ba byas pa ni dngos po thams
T02D1197:100b-29: cad ro mnyam par rtogs pa'i sems de la de
T02D1197:100b-30: skad ces bya'o // bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
T02D1197:100b-31: ces gsol to zhes pa ni 'di ltar bstan te
T02D1197:100b-32: brag ca bzhin dmigs pa'i don to //
T02D1197:100b-33: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang chen kha sbyor
T02D1197:100b-34: las 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ye shes dbang phyug la
T02D1197:100b-35: nyan par 'tshal lo zhes pa ni 'dir gsungs pa
T02D1197:100b-36: / sngon gyi las dag pa'i stobs kyis bag chags kyi dbang gis gzung ba nyid ni nyan pa'o /
T02D1197:100b-37: sems can sna tshogs pa rnams la chos bstan pa 'dzin pa ni 'tshal ba'o //
T02D1197:100b-38: ye shes kyi dbang phyug ces pa la ye shes
T02D1197:100b-39: ni mngon par shes pa drug gi mtshan nyid de
T02D1197:100b-40: / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams
T02D1197:100b-41: la mngon par shes pa 'di rnams med pa'i phyir
T02D1197:100b-42: / dbang phyug go // gang gi phyir phyogs gcig par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1197:100b-43: thams cad la khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:101a-0: @101a * // de'i phyir rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang chen
T02D1197:101a-1: kha sbyor las byung ba'i mtshan nyid bshad du gsol
T02D1197:101a-2: zhes sbyar ro // de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bstan te /
T02D1197:101a-4: rdo rje snying po brtse ba chen po legs so legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:101a-5: 'dir sems can thams cad mi shes pa gsum gyis
T02D1197:101a-6: nyes pa las dang nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal
T02D1197:101a-8: sems can de rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi
T02D1197:101a-9: smon lam gyi dbang gis brgya lam na skad cig
T02D1197:101a-10: thang cig tsam bsod nams bsags pa'i tshul gyis sems
T02D1197:101a-11: bskyed de bsod nams des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
T02D1197:101a-12: ltar 'gyur ro // de nas 'phos nas slar yang mi la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lngar skye'o //
T02D1197:101a-13: de'i phyir sngon gyi las kyi bag chags kyi stobs
T02D1197:101a-14: kyis lta ba drug rnams la 'jug par byad de
T02D1197:101a-15: / lta ba de rnams kyang dus kyi dbang gis sems can rang rang gi sems las byung ngo //
T02D1197:101a-16: de ltar lta ba po'i sems can sna tshogs pa grangs med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:101a-18: 'gro ba thams cad bdag las byung //
T02D1197:101a-19: srid pa gsum yang bdag las byung //
T02D1197:101a-20: bdag gis 'di dag thams cad khyab //
T02D1197:101a-21: bdag las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba med //
T02D1197:101a-23: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang snying
T02D1197:101a-24: rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:101a-25: dang de bzhin du sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la
T02D1197:101a-26: sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis rang
T02D1197:101a-27: gi don dang gzhan gyi don gyis mi shes pa
T02D1197:101a-29: de 'ba' zhig byed par ma zad kyis mi 'dod
T02D1197:101a-30: bzhin du sku gsum mngon du byed pa'i don to
T02D1197:101a-31: // de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ae ma ho zhes pa'i ngo mtshar dang /
T02D1197:101a-32: legs so zhes pa'i lan gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1197:101a-34: rig pa bde ba ster bar byed //
T02D1197:101a-36: yon tan gyi 'byung gnas zhes pa la /
T02D1197:101a-37: yon tan rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin pas na /
T02D1197:101a-39: yon tan ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D1197:101a-40: de la sa'i yon tan lnga grangs bzhin du sa
T02D1197:101a-41: dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i bdag
T02D1197:101a-42: nyid do // de bzhin du chu'i yon tan bzhi'o //
T02D1197:101a-43: de yang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:101b-0: de bzhin du @101b me'i khams kyi yon tan ni
T02D1197:101b-1: gsum ste me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams kyi
T02D1197:101b-2: bdag nyid do // de bzhin du rlung gi khams kyi yon tan ni gnyis te /
T02D1197:101b-3: rlung dang nam mkha'i khams kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:101b-4: de bzhin du stong pa'i khams kyi yon tan ni gcig ste /
T02D1197:101b-5: nam mkha'i khams kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:101b-6: de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams thams cad kyi
T02D1197:101b-7: bdag nyid gcig pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa snod kyi
T02D1197:101b-9: de ltar 'gro ba lnga'i mi la sogs pa'i sems
T02D1197:101b-10: can rnams rim pa bzhin lnga dang bzhi dang gsum
T02D1197:101b-11: dang gnyis dang gcig gi yon tan gyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:101b-12: du 'gyur ro // de yang gong du rdul phra rab kyi chos can brdzun par gnas so //
T02D1197:101b-13: 'on kyang ma rig pa la sogs pas bsgribs shing log pa'i chos la chags pa dang /
T02D1197:101b-14: mi dge ba'i grogs dang phrad pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:101b-15: nyes pas gos pa rnams sngon bzhin bag chags kyi
T02D1197:101b-16: dbang gis 'gro ba sna tshogs pa rnams su 'khor
T02D1197:101b-18: / de bzhin du yang ye shes kyi khams khams
T02D1197:101b-19: drug gi bdag nyid skyes bu chen po'i gang zag
T02D1197:101b-20: 'di nyid dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid chos
T02D1197:101b-21: sku'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i
T02D1197:101b-22: mtha' dang de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bdag
T02D1197:101b-23: nyid can gang la bsam pa 'di lta bu yod
T02D1197:101b-25: de nyid kyis na legs so legs so zhes pa lan gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1197:101b-26: 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i don bstan to //
T02D1197:101b-27: rgyud thams cad kyi gsang chen gang yin pa de
T02D1197:101b-28: dag thams cad nyan par 'dod pa zhes pa la
T02D1197:101b-29: / 'dod pa zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po'i byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1197:101b-30: ae ma ho zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1197:101b-31: 'on kyang 'dir sngags kyi theg pa chen por rnal
T02D1197:101b-32: 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma kha sbyor ba de ni
T02D1197:101b-34: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ces brjod do //
T02D1197:101b-35: de bzhin du rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:101b-36: da ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi dbye ba gsungs te /
T02D1197:101b-37: rgyud thams cad kyi gsang chen gang yin pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1197:101b-38: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sum cu rtsa drug gi gsang ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud do //
T02D1197:101b-39: rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug po de yang 'chad
T02D1197:101b-40: bzhin pa'i rtsa ba'i rnal 'byor ma bskyed pa rnam
T02D1197:101b-41: pa mang pos bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:102a-0: de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud @102a * //
T02D1197:102a-1: thams cad kyi gsang chen sbas pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:102a-2: de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:102a-3: gang yin pa de dag thams cad zhu ba zhes
T02D1197:102a-4: pa ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud shes
T02D1197:102a-5: rab dang thabs dang stong pa dang /
T02D1197:102a-6: snying rje dbyer med pa rnams la zhu ba ste khong du chud pa'o //
T02D1197:102a-7: sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa'i 'dod pa de ni /
T02D1197:102a-9: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:102a-10: da ni 'khor ba'i tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1197:102a-11: de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i byang
T02D1197:102a-12: chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:102a-13: pa la / de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
T02D1197:102a-14: byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes pa ni sku
T02D1197:102a-15: rdo rje la sogs pa gang dag gis dang po
T02D1197:102a-16: na yod pa de ni rdo rje snying po la
T02D1197:102a-17: sogs pa ye shes dang rnam par shes pa dag
T02D1197:102a-18: gcig tu 'dres pa'i bdag nyid ces pa'i don to
T02D1197:102a-19: // yang na sgyu ma'i sprul pa bzhin du gtso bo'o //
T02D1197:102a-20: de'i snying po ni dbyer med pa'i dngos po'i phyir rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:102a-21: der khyad par gyi bag chags kyi stobs las byung
T02D1197:102a-22: ba ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams so
T02D1197:102a-23: // de nyid kyis na rab tu dga' zhing mig
T02D1197:102a-24: gdangs pa ni ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid ces
T02D1197:102a-25: // pa'i don to // des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang sha'i spyan dang ;
T02D1197:102a-30: de'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'i mig gdangs kyi so so skye bo'i ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:102a-31: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen pos zhus zhes 'brel to //
T02D1197:102a-32: yang dang yang du phyag byas te //
T02D1197:102a-33: 'dir rang gi the tshom gyi phyir zhus zhes pa'i
T02D1197:102a-34: rigs pas ye shes dang rnam shes gcig tu 'dres
T02D1197:102a-35: pa'i bdag nyid du grub bo //
T02D1197:102a-36: 'on kyang gang gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad de
T02D1197:102a-37: dgongs bshad gzhan gyi skal pa dang ldan pa'i sems
T02D1197:102a-38: can rnams nye bar spyod par 'gyur gyis /
T02D1197:102a-39: da lta'i gdul bya rnams la ni ma yin no ;
T02D1197:102a-40: / gang gi spyir bstan bya dang ston byed dang bstan pa rnams la 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1197:102a-41: de'i tshe gdul bya dka' ba bems po'i sems can rnams 'dul bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:102a-42: rgyu des na sprul pa'i lus can dbyer med pa
T02D1197:102a-43: la nye bar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
T02D1197:102b-0: po rab tu dgyes shing @102b mig gdangs la gzugs
T02D1197:102b-1: brnyan lta bu rnams kyis yang dang yang du phyag
T02D1197:102b-2: byas nas rang gi the tshom gyi phyir kha sbyor
T02D1197:102b-3: las byung ba'i rang bzhin de'i bdag nyid zhus te
T02D1197:102b-4: / 'dir zhes pa ni tshig 'dir gsungs pa'o //
T02D1197:102b-5: rgyud rnams thams cad gang la bgyi //
T02D1197:102b-7: der ni mtshan nyid ji lta bu ;
T02D1197:102b-8: / zhes pa'i bar ni zhes zhus pa'i tshig go /
T02D1197:102b-9: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gyi tshig gsungs te /
T02D1197:102b-10: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:102b-11: sdud pa po'i nyes pa yongs su spang pa'i don du gsungs zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:102b-12: rgyud kyang de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsdu ba'i tshig go //
T02D1197:102b-13: yang thabs kyi sbra ni 'dus pa la sogs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:102b-14: sogs pa'i sgras ni bya ba dang spyod pa gzung ngo //
T02D1197:102b-15: 'dir bya ba ni de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:102b-16: de bzhin du spyod pa ni sgrol ma byung ba dang /
T02D1197:102b-18: 'di dag thams cad rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du nye bar btags pa'i mtshan nyid can du brjod de /
T02D1197:102b-20: gleng gzhi ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba la sogs pa'ang
T02D1197:102b-21: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sum cu rtsa drug gi bar
T02D1197:102b-22: dus kyi rtsa sum cu rtsa drug gi snang ba'i
T02D1197:102b-23: mtshan nyid do // de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1197:102b-24: snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba
T02D1197:102b-25: thob pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du
T02D1197:102b-27: 'od gsal brten par shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:102b-28: 'di ni sdud pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:102b-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni rim pa las bzlog pas 'od gsal ba ni rten no //
T02D1197:102b-30: brten pa ni snang ba gsum ste /
T02D1197:102b-31: sgyu 'phrul chen po 'dzin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:102b-32: de ltar yang sgyu 'phrul dra bar bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1197:102b-35: sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
T02D1197:102b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1197:102b-38: rgyud ces pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal du bying
T02D1197:102b-39: ba'i sems can rnams la skyob pas na rgyud do
T02D1197:102b-40: // de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1197:102b-41: rgyud sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi gleng gzhi yang
T02D1197:102b-42: dag par spros pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1197:102b-43: de las byung ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs sam rnal 'byor gyi tshogs so //
T02D1197:103a-0: 'di gnyis bsdus pa'i dbang gis brjod bya dang @103a * //
T02D1197:103a-1: rjod byed dang bral bar nges pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:103a-2: yang sngon du gsungs pa'i dus la sogs pa ste
T02D1197:103a-3: de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni kha sbyor du 'gyur
T02D1197:103a-4: ba'o // nges pa ni ma 'khrul ba'o //
T02D1197:103a-5: yang na kha sbyor las byung ba'i thig le sad
T02D1197:103a-6: pa la sogs pa bzhi'i rnam par gzhag pa dang
T02D1197:103a-7: bral ba lhan cig skyes pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D1197:103a-9: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
T02D1197:103a-11: nges par zhes pa ni gsungs shing bstan zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:103a-12: seng ge dang 'phrog byed ces pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:103a-13: 'dir lus la lam drug tu song ba'i rtsa drug go //
T02D1197:103a-14: de la lte ba'i steng du gsum ste /
T02D1197:103a-15: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dang aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:103a-17: bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba 'bab pa'o //
T02D1197:103a-18: 'di rnams kyi ming rnams rim pa las bzlog pas dbyig gi snying po ni bshang pa'i rtsa'o //
T02D1197:103a-19: 'dir seng ge ni khu ba'i rtsa'o //
T02D1197:103a-21: de bzhin du steng du ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan 'bab pa'o /
T02D1197:103a-22: de yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang theg
T02D1197:103a-23: pa chen po'i bdag nyid can dus kyi khyad par
T02D1197:103a-24: gyi dus kyi pho nya'am dus kyi rtsar brjod do
T02D1197:103a-25: // 'di rnams las skad cig thang cig yud tsam
T02D1197:103a-26: gyi dbye bas mig la sogs pa'i skye mched yul
T02D1197:103a-27: dang yul can gyi dbye bas rnam shes tshogs drug
T02D1197:103a-28: sems kyi 'phrul pa'i shes pa skye'o //
T02D1197:103a-29: de las skyes nas rang rang gi las kyi dbang
T02D1197:103a-30: gis sems las byung ba'i dngos pos lta ba drug
T02D1197:103a-32: de ltar lta ba rnams kyi nang du chud pa ni sems can rnams te /
T02D1197:103a-33: sems can gyi nang du chud pa yang lta ba
T02D1197:103a-34: rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ji srid grangs med
T02D1197:103a-35: pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags dang /
T02D1197:103a-36: grangs med pa'i lus kyi rtsa rnams dang /
T02D1197:103a-37: grangs med pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:103a-38: de'i phyir de rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i
T02D1197:103a-39: phyir gsang chen zhes pa'i sngags kyi theg pa chen
T02D1197:103a-40: po'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rang
T02D1197:103a-42: yang na gsang chen zhes pa ni sbas pa ste
T02D1197:103a-43: dus kyi pho nya rnams rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir
T02D1197:103a-44: khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:103a-45: gang skad cig bzhis mtshon pa yang dag pa'i lam
T02D1197:103b-0: ngag gi lam @103b las 'das pa'i spyod yul gnyis
T02D1197:103b-1: gnyis pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
T02D1197:103b-2: de'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba ni mi slob pa'i lam zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:103b-3: da ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor du byed pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:103b-4: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kha sbyor de
T02D1197:103b-5: nyid las byung ba zhes pa la kha sbyor zhes
T02D1197:103b-6: pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba dngos po
T02D1197:103b-8: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid mi phyed pa dang /
T02D1197:103b-9: stong pa dang snying rje sbyor ba dang /
T02D1197:103b-10: rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba dang /
T02D1197:103b-11: spro ba dang bsdu ba sbyor ba dang /
T02D1197:103b-12: dpal he ru ka dang bdag med ma snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T02D1197:103b-13: zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1197:103b-15: chags pa dang bral ba rnam par 'dres pa dang /
T02D1197:103b-16: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dngos po dbyer med pa dang /
T02D1197:103b-17: skyes ma dang skyes pa'i gzugs gnyis med pa dang /
T02D1197:103b-18: kun rdzob dang don dam pa mi phyed pa dang /
T02D1197:103b-19: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes dang /
T02D1197:103b-20: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid gnyis su med pa ni kha sbyor gyi don to //
T02D1197:103b-21: de ltar gzhan yang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:103b-22: dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang shes
T02D1197:103b-23: rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid ma gsungs te /
T02D1197:103b-24: gzhung rgyas pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1197:103b-25: / de'i phyir bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas thos
T02D1197:103b-26: pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i shes rab kyi
T02D1197:103b-27: stobs kyis dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa rnam par
T02D1197:103b-28: bcom pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam yang skye'o
T02D1197:103b-29: // de yang thig le zhes brjod de dpral bar thig le gzung ba bzhin no //
T02D1197:103b-30: de ltar yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
T02D1197:103b-31: dngos po med pa sgom pa'i dngos //
T02D1197:103b-32: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
T02D1197:103b-33: de ltar dngos po dngos med pas //
T02D1197:103b-34: bsgom pa dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:103b-35: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1197:103b-36: de'i phyir kha sbyor ni snyoms par 'jug pas zhes pa'i don ston pa'i tshig go //
T02D1197:103b-37: slar yang 'di'i don gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1197:103b-38: kha sbyor zhes pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi chos
T02D1197:103b-39: dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba
T02D1197:103b-40: dbyer med pa'i nye bar spyod pa la 'jug pa
T02D1197:103b-41: de la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:104a-1: pa ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:104a-2: de yang 'phags pa rnams kyi brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:104a-3: slar yang 'byung ba ni skyes pa zhes pa la
T02D1197:104a-4: mchog tu mi 'gyur bas bsgrub pa'i rang rig pa'i
T02D1197:104a-5: ye shes so // de las byung ba ni sna
T02D1197:104a-6: tshogs pa stong pa nyid kyi sku snang ba med
T02D1197:104a-8: de'i skyes pa de ni ma dang pha yang dag
T02D1197:104a-9: par sbyor bas dang sngon gyi skye po'i bag chags
T02D1197:104a-10: kyi dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i rgyur
T02D1197:104a-12: de nyid bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1197:104a-13: de yang mtshon bya dang mtshon byed kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:104a-14: 'dir de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:104a-15: de lta bu zhes pa ni 'dra ba'i don te /
T02D1197:104a-16: snga ma'i tshig gces pa'i yang phyir ro //
T02D1197:104a-17: gyur pa zhes pa ni skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:104a-18: de ci zhe na brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid ces gsungs te /
T02D1197:104a-19: brtan pa ni snod la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:104a-20: g-yo ba ni mi la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:104a-21: de rnams skyes pa de'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1197:104a-22: de yang bskyed bya dang skyed byed rjes su mthun par yang dag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:104a-23: 'dis mtshon pas na mtshan nyid des zhes pa ni bdun pa'i don la gsum pa'o //
T02D1197:104a-24: mtshon bya dang mtshon byed rnams la bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:104a-25: rdo rje 'chang gi sku bzhugs pa 'dis khong du
T02D1197:104a-26: chud par bya'o // yang na mtshon pas zhes pa
T02D1197:104a-27: ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas
T02D1197:104a-28: rnams gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par
T02D1197:104a-29: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la goms pas khams gsum
T02D1197:104a-30: pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par nye bar spyod
T02D1197:104a-31: pa'i tshul ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:104a-32: de ltar dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1197:104a-33: pa rnams kyi mtshon bya dang mtshon byed dag gis
T02D1197:104a-34: yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir skad cig ma
T02D1197:104a-35: cig la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan
T02D1197:104a-37: de'i phyir 'bras bu la rgyur nye bar btags pa'i
T02D1197:104a-38: phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni rjod
T02D1197:104a-39: par byed pa'o // de ltar gzhung nye bar btags pa'i tshig ni 'brel pa'o //
T02D1197:104a-40: da ni phyogs gzhan gyi dgos pa brjod de /
T02D1197:104a-41: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:104b-0: yang na @104b zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i lam rtogs par bya ba dang /
T02D1197:104b-1: da ltar gyi sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:104b-2: rgyud ces pa'i sgra ni skyes par brjod do //
T02D1197:104b-3: de bzhin du rgyud can gyi bud med du brjod do //
T02D1197:104b-4: thams cad ces pa ni bud med dang skyes pa dag gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1197:104b-5: de ltar bud med dang skyes pa dag ni kha sbyor gyi sgras bstan to //
T02D1197:104b-6: de'i gleng gzhi zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1197:104b-7: de yang 'byung ba chen po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1197:104b-8: rdo rje yang yin la sems dpa' yang yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:104b-9: de las byung ba ni sems can thams cad ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:104b-10: 'on kyang mi shes pa'i dri mas bsgribs par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:104b-11: gdul bya de rnams kyi don du rten cing 'brel
T02D1197:104b-12: par 'byung ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1197:104b-13: srid pa'i dang por yang dag par bzhugs so //
T02D1197:104b-14: de ltar yang dang yang las kyis ra 'jug par
T02D1197:104b-15: byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa rnams
T02D1197:104b-16: su yang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D1197:104b-17: byang chub bsgrubs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
T02D1197:104b-18: 'gyur ro // yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhugs nas slar yang 'jug par byed do //
T02D1197:104b-19: de ltar grangs med pa'i dus rnams su grangs med
T02D1197:104b-20: pa'i sems can rnams la grangs med pa'i bstan pa
T02D1197:104b-21: rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyis ston par byed do //
T02D1197:104b-22: gsang chen zhes bya ba 'dis zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:104b-23: sogs pa ni de ltar gsang ba sba bar bya
T02D1197:104b-24: ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1197:104b-25: man ngag las byung ba zhes pa ni de ltar
T02D1197:104b-26: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dang
T02D1197:104b-27: / 'brel pa dang dgos pa ma gsungs kyang bcom
T02D1197:104b-28: ldan 'das kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brangs pas khong
T02D1197:104b-30: 'di ni man ngag ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:104b-31: sngags btu ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1197:104b-32: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud //
T02D1197:104b-33: de ni bdag gis bshad kyis nyon //
T02D1197:104b-35: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ces pa ni sgyu ma'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:104b-36: de ci zhe na sgyu ma ni shes rab bo //
T02D1197:104b-37: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:104b-38: rgyud ces pa ni bstan pa'i chos so //
T02D1197:104b-39: de bdag gis zhes pa ni thams cad kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:105a-0: @105a * // bshad kyis zhes pa ni dom dam pa'i yul gyi mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T02D1197:105a-1: nyon zhes pa ni nges par zung zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:105a-2: yang na rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams pa la sbyor ba ste /
T02D1197:105a-3: skyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ston to zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:105a-4: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi
T02D1197:105a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa las gsungs
T02D1197:105a-6: pa / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang
T02D1197:105a-7: sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes bya
T02D1197:105a-8: ba la sogs pa dam pa'i chos klog pa las
T02D1197:105a-9: du chud par bya'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1197:105a-10: pa / pa'i nges pa'o // da ni slar yang
T02D1197:105a-11: de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa zhes
T02D1197:105a-12: pa nas nyon zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i yi ge'i
T02D1197:105a-13: don gyis phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'byung ba
T02D1197:105a-14: lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi lus la ming sna tshogs
T02D1197:105a-16: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1197:105a-17: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:105a-18: 'dir dang po nyid du ngag gi ming brjod do //
T02D1197:105a-19: 'dir sems can thams cad la mngal du gnas pa'i rang rig pa nas brtsams te /
T02D1197:105a-20: ji srid 'chi ba la thug pa de srid ngag gi ming ste /
T02D1197:105a-21: des spyod pa dang grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:105a-22: de'i phyir ngag gi ming gi tha snyad kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba nas 'khor bar 'khor ro //
T02D1197:105a-23: rgyu des na aa zhes pa tshig gi ming dang po nyid du bstan te /
T02D1197:105a-24: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces mtshan
T02D1197:105a-25: yang dag par brjod pa las gsungs pa'i phyir ro
T02D1197:105a-26: // de bzhin du yang aa ni nam mkha'i khams
T02D1197:105a-27: kyi na nyid srog gi rlung zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:105a-28: // // de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1197:105a-29: ta dang ra dag chu dang me'o //
T02D1197:105a-30: de la chu'i khams ni byang chub sems so //
T02D1197:105a-31: de las bskyed pa'i tshogs chen po'i rang bzhin me'o //
T02D1197:105a-32: rkan gyi bu ga'i ming ni ta'o //
T02D1197:105a-33: de bzhin du lte ba'i bu ga'i ming ni ra'o //
T02D1197:105a-35: ra me'i sa bon yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:105a-36: me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du lung nas gsungs ba'i phyir /
T02D1197:105a-37: lte ba lam gsum gyi bdag nyid ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:105a-38: 'di dag rab tu sbar ba dang 'jug pa dag
T02D1197:105a-39: gis rang rig pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro
T02D1197:105a-40: // de ni sems can thams cad rnams kyi sro yo ba'i phyir rlung ste /
T02D1197:105a-41: srog gi rlung du brjod de rtsa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:105b-0: de'i @105b phyir tha zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:105b-1: brtan pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1197:105b-2: g-yo ba dang bcas pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:105b-3: te zhes pa ni de kun sems 'byung chos rnams so //
T02D1197:105b-4: ba zhes pa ni lung dang ldan pas brjod pa'o //
T02D1197:105b-5: dzwa zhes pa ni 'dir bdag gis rang gi rol ba'o //
T02D1197:105b-6: gzhes pa ni dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'o //
T02D1197:105b-7: bha zhes pa ni de kun snang bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:105b-8: phra zhes pa ni 'gro drug rab tu dga' bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:105b-10: kha yi padmas chu yi ni //
T02D1197:105b-13: bza' dang btung la rtag chags shing //
T02D1197:105b-14: 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1197:105b-16: yid kyis chos la chags pa nyid //
T02D1197:105b-18: chos rnams thams cad 'jig dang mtshungs //
T02D1197:105b-20: khong chud nyid ni byis pa'i gtso //
T02D1197:105b-22: blo dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D1197:105b-23: rnam shes smra ba'i snying po min //
T02D1197:105b-25: theg pa chen po dran pa yis //
T02D1197:105b-28: khyod kyis 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni //
T02D1197:105b-29: rtogs par gyis shig rdo rje 'dzin /
T02D1197:105b-31: rab dga'i skad cig dbus su'o //
T02D1197:105b-33: dgod dang de bzhin spro ba'o //
T02D1197:105b-35: bdag nyid chen po mya ngan byed //
T02D1197:105b-37: de bzhin bems po gdung mi byed //
T02D1197:105b-39: mtshon byed de yi dbus su'o //
T02D1197:105b-43: bya ba phra la spyod mi byed //
T02D1197:105b-45: sangs rgyas phun tshogs spyod yul rnams //
T02D1197:105b-46: ji bzhin dus su rtogs mi byed //
T02D1197:105b-48: tha dad chos la chags pa nyid //
T02D1197:105b-50: 'dir ni bstan pa mdor byed pa'o //
T02D1197:105b-52: mu stegs thams cad phyugs rnams nyid //
T02D1197:105b-54: kyi hud su zhig la ni bstan //
T02D1197:105b-56: rang rig la dga' sangs rgyas pa /
T02D1197:105b-58: yang dag lam ni rjes 'brangs pa'o //
T02D1197:105b-60: lus med smra bar nus ma yin //
T02D1197:105b-62: mi shigs rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D1197:105b-63: lta ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni rgyal //
T02D1197:105b-64: 'byung ba zhes pa'i grangs ni lnga //
T02D1197:105b-67: nyin mtshan tshig las 'byung ba yi //
T02D1197:105b-68: rtog pa'i dra ba rab bcom pa'o //
T02D1197:106a-0: @106a * // rtag tu chos sku mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1197:106a-1: bsgoms pas spros pa rnams dang bral //
T02D1197:106a-3: chos rnams thams cad mchog gi ni //
T02D1197:106a-4: chos phyir rnam pa rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:106a-6: skye lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1197:106a-7: rigs la zhen pa spang bar bya //
T02D1197:106a-9: chos zhes pa yi phyag rgya bsten //
T02D1197:106a-11: byin za la ni 'gro ba gsum //
T02D1197:106a-13: thub pa thams cad rnams kyis ni //
T02D1197:106a-15: sgrib pa mang po bsreg par bya //
T02D1197:106a-17: da ni lus kyi ming yang gsungs pa /
T02D1197:106a-19: skye bo dam pa bsgral ba'i phyir ;
T02D1197:106a-21: sna tshogs lha ru gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:106a-23: ji srid nam mkha' khyad par du //
T02D1197:106a-24: de de sems can don rnams byed //
T02D1197:106a-26: sems can rnams la gnod byed pa //
T02D1197:106a-27: gdul dka' rnams ni skrag par byed //
T02D1197:106a-29: gzhan yang de rnams chos kyi ro ;
T02D1197:106a-30: / rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis //
T02D1197:106a-31: snying rje'i dbang gis tshim par byed //
T02D1197:106a-33: theg chen chos kyi rgya che zhing //
T02D1197:106a-34: zab pa rnams la gzhug par bya //
T02D1197:106a-36: sems dang sems kyi rang bzhin dang //
T02D1197:106a-37: shes pa can yang mkha' gzugs can //
T02D1197:106a-39: bdag dang bdag gi lta ba ni /
T02D1197:106a-40: de yi dngos pos grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:106a-42: dam pa'i don du mya ngan 'das //
T02D1197:106a-44: bden pa'i lta ba 'byung ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:106a-46: bdag gis su la'ang bshad pa med //
T02D1197:106a-48: spyod pa yang ni sems rang bzhin //
T02D1197:106a-50: snying rjes sems can la phan bya //
T02D1197:106a-52: dbang po'i gzhu bzhin bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:106a-55: srid pa'i rgya mtsho las phar sgrol //
T02D1197:106a-57: mkhas pas thams cad chos dbyings kyi //
T02D1197:106a-58: nang du chud par shes rig bya //
T02D1197:106a-60: de bzhin nyid kyi bdag la rol //
T02D1197:106a-62: bdag dang gzhan ni rig pa med //
T02D1197:106a-65: sngon gyi smon lam nyid ni dran //
T02D1197:106a-67: snying las 'od zer rnams ni gtong //
T02D1197:106a-69: snang ba gsum ni gsal ba 'byung //
T02D1197:106b-1: cung zad thos pa'i sgra tsam yang //
T02D1197:106b-2: rmi lam bzhin du sems las byung //
T02D1197:106b-4: spros pa med pa'i chos de rnams //
T02D1197:106b-6: 'dzag pa'i lam du nges par sba //
T02D1197:106b-8: de yi sangs rgyas sku la'o //
T02D1197:106b-10: the tshom med par nges pa yin //
T02D1197:106b-12: pu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D1197:106b-14: 'di dag gnyis med sgyings pa las /
T02D1197:106b-15: dge 'dun gzhan na brjod du med //
T02D1197:106b-17: 'das pa'i spyod pa rnams spangs pa //
T02D1197:106b-20: rigs dang rigs min rnams dpyad na //
T02D1197:106b-21: thams cad nam mkha' las byung ngo //
T02D1197:106b-23: sangs rgyas gang na'ang mi bzhugs te //
T02D1197:106b-24: rkyen gyi don ni 'ba' zhig go //
T02D1197:106b-26: skam la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams //
T02D1197:106b-28: sna tshogs las ni kun du smin //
T02D1197:106b-30: mi yi bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gis //
T02D1197:106b-32: dge dang mi dge mtshon par bya //
T02D1197:106b-34: skad cig bltas pa tsam gyis so //
T02D1197:106b-36: thog med dus su dbang du 'gyur //
T02D1197:106b-38: de ru de ni 'gro mtshan nyid //
T02D1197:106b-40: dus ni rnam pa gsum rnams su //
T02D1197:106b-42: 'dir ni thod pa dag tu byed //
T02D1197:106b-44: 'di ltar bdag gis dus bstan pa //
T02D1197:106b-45: rang rig bdag nyid kyis rtogs byed //
T02D1197:106b-47: srid pa'i nyes pa 'joms par byed //
T02D1197:106b-49: dri ma med pa'i sa rnams ni //
T02D1197:106b-50: de nyid du ni rig par byed //
T02D1197:106b-52: bha ni 'dir ni dga' ba ste //
T02D1197:106b-53: de bzhin ga ni mchog dga' ba ;
T02D1197:106b-54: / b'a ni lhan cig skyes par bshad //
T02D1197:106b-55: n'a ni dga' dang bral bar brjod //
T02D1197:106b-56: ha ni dga' ba thams cad de //
T02D1197:106b-57: rdo rje sems dpa'i mi shigs pa'o //
T02D1197:106b-59: da ni 'dir sems kyi ming brjod de /
T02D1197:106b-60: sa zhes pa ni kun du bzang //
T02D1197:106b-62: 'gro ba nges par gzung bar rig / tsa zhes pa ni g-yo ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:106b-64: de nas lam ni 'dris pa yin //
T02D1197:106b-66: rnam shes de yi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:106b-67: tr'a zhes pa ni 'khor ba la ni skyo ba bzhin pa //
T02D1197:106b-69: bya ba thams cad la ni spyod //
T02D1197:106b-71: kun du bzang po bdag gi gang //
T02D1197:107a-3: de ni rtag tu bskyang bar bya //
T02D1197:107a-5: khams gsum pa ni sangs rgyas bdag / sa zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:107a-6: lus las 'od ni spro bar byed //
T02D1197:107a-8: nor 'dzin bdud rtsi bde ster ba //
T02D1197:107a-12: lo sbyor rnam sbyor pa ru 'gyur //
T02D1197:107a-16: dngos po rnams ni thams cad la //
T02D1197:107a-17: sems ni slar bshad gzhan ma yin //
T02D1197:107a-19: sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul dra ba chags //
T02D1197:107a-21: sad pa la sogs bzhi rnams so //
T02D1197:107a-23: skye bo rnams ni ster ba nyid //
T02D1197:107a-25: gang du'ang rung ba'i bud med dam //
T02D1197:107a-26: de bzhin du ni skyes pa rnams //
T02D1197:107a-28: de rnams thog ma tha mar gnas //
T02D1197:107a-30: zhi gnas thob pa'i rgyu yis ni //
T02D1197:107a-32: bdag nyid chen po bzhugs pa yin //
T02D1197:107a-34: bden pa'i dngos po kun nas ster //
T02D1197:107a-36: dbang po'i sgo yi spyod yul min //
T02D1197:107a-38: 'byung ba lnga po rnams la yang //
T02D1197:107a-40: 'di yang de yi spyod yul min //
T02D1197:107a-43: dbang po med rnams kyi yang min //
T02D1197:107a-45: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yang //
T02D1197:107a-47: dba' rlabs kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems //
T02D1197:107a-49: log pa'i chos la dga' ba rnams //
T02D1197:107a-51: bde can rnams kyis 'dor bar bya //
T02D1197:107a-53: nyer spyod rnams ni don med 'gyur //
T02D1197:107a-57: lus la yon tan stong ba bzhin //
T02D1197:107a-59: pha rol po yi rdzas rnams 'phrog / ra zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:107a-60: chags pa'i bde pas rol pa'o //
T02D1197:107a-62: dor dang blang ba'i don spangs rnams //
T02D1197:107a-64: dga' la sogs pa chags pa'i bdag /nya zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:107a-65: rig pa'i chos la phyir bltas pa //
T02D1197:107a-67: zab mo'i lung dang bstan bcos rnams //
T02D1197:107a-68: bstan pa de bzhin don dam pa'o //
T02D1197:107a-70: 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D1197:107a-71: log pa'i chos ni rab ston byed //
T02D1197:107b-0: @107b dad pa'i sems can rnams la ni //
T02D1197:107b-1: 'dod can sangs rgyas pa ni brjod //
T02D1197:107b-3: gnas dang zas dang skom la sogs //
T02D1197:107b-4: mal cha bdag la shin tu dgos //
T02D1197:107b-6: gal te rigs kyi bu byed na //
T02D1197:107b-9: 'das pa'i rang bzhin mi shes par //
T02D1197:107b-10: sems can rnams la khyab byed pa //
T02D1197:107b-12: rang don gzhan don med pa rnams //
T02D1197:107b-14: rang don tsam ni 'ba' zhig pa //
T02D1197:107b-17: chos rnams mang po rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:107b-18: sems can rnams la'ang phan byed pa //
T02D1197:107b-20: srid pa'i rtse ru bzhugs nas su //
T02D1197:107b-21: rtog pa rgyas ster par byed //
T02D1197:107b-23: bya ba mang po'i yul rnams so //
T02D1197:107b-25: yid kyis brjod par song ba rnams //
T02D1197:107b-27: sangs rgyas blo yis sbas pa'o //
T02D1197:107b-29: spyod dang kun spyod spangs pa nyid //
T02D1197:107b-31: sems can rnams ni bcom pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:107b-32: rtag tu spros pa las ni spros //
T02D1197:107b-34: khyod bdag la ni dbyer mi byed //
T02D1197:107b-36: dngul chur rdzas rnams zhu ba bzhin //
T02D1197:107b-38: rta yi nang gi sgra rnams ni //
T02D1197:107b-39: rtag tu skye dang 'gog pa bzhin //
T02D1197:107b-40: de bzhin sangs rgyas pa yi lam ;
T02D1197:107b-41: / bya ba smig rgyu'i chu bzhin no //
T02D1197:107b-43: ji ltar 'ga' zhig shing rta zhon //
T02D1197:107b-44: de ltar snang ba gsum po la'ang //
T02D1197:107b-46: rtag tu 'di la yang dag gnas //
T02D1197:107b-50: thams cad gar gyi de bzhin du //
T02D1197:107b-51: srid pa gsum ni mthong ba bzhin //
T02D1197:107b-53: 'od gsal ye shes bzhi yin te /
T02D1197:107b-55: shes bya chu yi chu bur bzhin //
T02D1197:107b-56: de ltar snying rje can sems can //
T02D1197:107b-57: snang ba gsum ni ston par byed //
T02D1197:107b-59: pha rol 'gro ba'i chos rnams la //
T02D1197:107b-61: rang bzhin dngos grub dam pa la /
T02D1197:107b-62: de la bdag ni brten pa ru //
T02D1197:107b-63: brag ca bzhin du bzhugs pa yin //
T02D1197:107b-65: ma rig la sogs mun pa yis //
T02D1197:107b-66: g-yogs pa'i sems can rnams la ni /
T02D1197:107b-68: tha mar theg pa gsum ston pa //
T02D1197:107b-70: de de'i thabs ni bdag gis bstan //
T02D1197:108a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan ma dang //
T02D1197:108a-4: skye bo thams cad rnams nyid la //
T02D1197:108a-5: thun mong du ni lam bstan to //
T02D1197:108a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' snying la'o //
T02D1197:108a-11: mi shigs pa ni rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1197:108a-13: kha sbyar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1197:108a-15: sems dpas dbyibs ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1197:108a-19: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:108a-21: srog dang thur sel gang zag las //
T02D1197:108a-23: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi rnams kyis tshim //
T02D1197:108a-25: stong bzhin pa yi rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1197:108a-27: thog ma tha ma mtshon pa spangs //
T02D1197:108a-29: dngos don phun tshogs gsungs pa rnams //
T02D1197:108a-30: de ni bral ba zhes pa'i don //
T02D1197:108a-31: don rnams don ni med pa yin //
T02D1197:108a-32: de'i phyir bral bar nges par gzung //
T02D1197:108a-34: de las dngos grub 'byung bar bstan //
T02D1197:108a-35: brten pa'i don ni skyed byes shes //
T02D1197:108a-37: sems kyi gar mkhan las byung ba //
T02D1197:108a-38: bsgoms pas 'dir ni bden pa min //
T02D1197:108a-40: rnam rig tsam du smra bas ni //
T02D1197:108a-41: rnam rig lta ba bden pa yi //
T02D1197:108a-42: sangs rgyas ba de tshad ma min //
T02D1197:108a-44: glegs bam kha cig las ni gsungs //
T02D1197:108a-45: ji ltar nam mkha' la ni sprin //
T02D1197:108a-46: mdog dang dbyibs ni tha dad pa //
T02D1197:108a-47: nam mkha'i dbyings su byung nas ni //
T02D1197:108a-48: de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur //
T02D1197:108a-49: de'i phyir rnam rig tsam smras chad ma min //
T02D1197:108a-50: glegs bam mthong bas khengs pas longs spyod phyir //
T02D1197:108a-52: sems can de rnams rang sems bsams pa yis //
T02D1197:108a-53: byang chub lam gyi rjes lta bcom ldan gsungs //
T02D1197:108a-55: de lta bur gyur pa'i brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i
T02D1197:108a-56: rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid 'dis mtshon pa ni mtshan
T02D1197:108a-57: nyid ces pa 'dis ni bsdus pa'i don ston to
T02D1197:108a-58: // yang na ae zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
T02D1197:108a-59: wam zhes pa ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:108a-60: bh'u zhes pa ni bdar ba'i sbyor ba las des sa skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:108a-62: de de'i phyir bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1197:108a-63: zhu bas na chu ste khu ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:108b-0: de brtan pa'i phyir mi 'gyur @108b pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1197:108b-2: rol pa'i phyir der lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba skye ba'o //
T02D1197:108b-4: g-yo ba rlung gi khams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:108b-5: 'pho ba'i chos bstan pa'i phyir yang rtsa'o //
T02D1197:108b-6: la zhes pa ni rtag pa'i go 'phang rnyed pa'o //
T02D1197:108b-7: sva zhes pa ni rang gi sems nam mkha'i khams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:108b-8: bh'a zhes pa ni bsgom pa nyid bsgom pa min pa'o //
T02D1197:108b-9: b'a zhes pa ni yang dngos po thams cad kyi
T02D1197:108b-10: bdag nyid bsgoms pas rang nyid las byung ba'i don
T02D1197:108b-11: to // tma zhes pa ni yid kyang de mi
T02D1197:108b-12: bsam zhing bsam du med pa las kyang kun du
T02D1197:108b-13: to // spro ba'o // kam zhes pa ni ci las kun du spro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1197:108b-14: mtshon zhes pa'i yi ge gsum dang 'brel pa'i phyir
T02D1197:108b-15: gang gi phyir bla ma'i man ngag gi tshul gyis
T02D1197:108b-16: sam / tshe rabs snga ma la goms pa'i stobs
T02D1197:108b-17: kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i bsgrub bya dang
T02D1197:108b-18: sam / sgrub thabs dang / sgrub pa pos skad
T02D1197:108b-19: cig ma gcig la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1197:108b-20: pa mthong ba de ni mtshon bya gzung ba med
T02D1197:108b-21: sam / sgrub thabs dang / pa'i don to //
T02D1197:108b-22: mtshon bya med pa'i phyir de ltar bsam du med
T02D1197:108b-23: sam / sgrub thabs dang / pa'i don to //
T02D1197:108b-24: pa'i don te / 'dis zhes pa yi ge bzhi
T02D1197:108b-25: dang 'brel pa de'i phyir bsam du med pa'i don
T02D1197:108b-26: 'di las byung ba las gyur pa'i sems can thams
T02D1197:108b-27: sam / sgrub thabs dang / pa'i don to //
T02D1197:108b-28: pa'i don te / cad dang / sangs rgyas dang
T02D1197:108b-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtshan nyid ces pa ni
T02D1197:108b-30: 'dus byas pa'i gzugs nyams su myong ba dngos po
T02D1197:108b-31: re re la yang ming du mi 'jug ste /
T02D1197:108b-32: de yang skyes pa dang bud med dang /
T02D1197:108b-33: lang tshom dang nu ma dang skar dang ldan pa zhes pa la sogs pa ming du ma'o //
T02D1197:108b-34: gang gi phyir bsam du med pa la sogs pa las bsam pa'i chos 'byung ste /
T02D1197:108b-35: chu bo dang rgya mtsho bzhin du rtogs par bya'o
T02D1197:108b-36: /'on kyang chu'i zla ba bzhin du mtshon par bya
T02D1197:108b-37: bzhin pa rnams sangs rgyas rnams las mi 'byung gis
T02D1197:108b-38: sems can rnams 'ba' zhig las de 'byung ba'i phyir
T02D1197:108b-39: rang gi sems kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis sangs
T02D1197:108b-41: skad sna tshogs kyis bstan pa nyan pa dang /
T02D1197:108b-42: mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de skar ma 'phro
T02D1197:108b-43: ba bzhin gang nas byung ba de nyid du song
T02D1197:108b-44: zhes ma gsungs kyang de bzhin gshegs par blta bar
T02D1197:108b-45: bya'o // 'di ni sems kyi ming ngo //
T02D1197:109a-0: da ni sems las byung ba rnams kyi tha snyad kyi phyir ming gsungs @109a * //
T02D1197:109a-2: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:109a-3: de nas zhes pa ni sems can gyi ming gi rjes su'o //
T02D1197:109a-5: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi kha sbyor gyi sgras zhes pa /
T02D1197:109a-6: thams cad ni gang sngon du bstan pa rnams so //
T02D1197:109a-7: rgyud ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:109a-8: gleng gzhi zhes pa ni dang po ni rnal 'byor gyi lugs bstan te /
T02D1197:109a-11: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi chos stong pa dang /
T02D1197:109a-12: snying rje dbyer med cing gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1197:109a-13: sgras zhes pa ni rgyud sna tshogs pa'i lung rnams kyis de'i don tshig tu brjod pas bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:109a-14: rdo rje sems dpar brjod ces pa ni chos de
T02D1197:109a-15: nyid sems can gang dang gang gis rjes su dran
T02D1197:109a-20: de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod par 'dir som nyid med do //
T02D1197:109a-21: de yang sems las byung pa'i chos so //
T02D1197:109a-22: slar yang sku gsum du rnam par gzhag par sems can rnams la ston to //
T02D1197:109a-23: gang gi phyir yang zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:109a-24: 'on kyang thams cad ces pa ni thams cad rnams
T02D1197:109a-25: kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dus rnams
T02D1197:109a-26: so // rgyud ces pa ni chos rnam par gnas te /
T02D1197:109a-27: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung
T02D1197:109a-28: ba'i dus rnams su sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab
T02D1197:109a-29: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1197:109a-30: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa la sogs pa rnams bstan nas yang nub po //
T02D1197:109a-31: de'i gleng gzhi zhes pa ni gdod nas mi 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:109a-32: kha sbyor zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor ba mi 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1197:109a-33: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:109a-35: rdo rje zhes pa ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:109a-36: de'i nye bar spyod pa'i tshul ni sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:109a-37: yang na rdo rje zhes pa ni snying rje'o //
T02D1197:109a-38: de'i 'byung gnas ni stong pa nyid de //
T02D1197:109a-39: rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:109a-40: de'i phyir khyab par byed pas na rdo rje sems dpar brjod de /
T02D1197:109a-41: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:109a-42: yang na aa zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:109a-43: snang ba med las rnam kun 'byung //
T02D1197:109b-0: de nas chos thams cad gdod nas ma skyes pa'i phyir aa'i sgo'o zhes gsungs @109b pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:109b-1: tha zhes pa ni gnas kyi khyad par rnams su'o //
T02D1197:109b-2: sa zhes pa ni gnas dang nye bar gnas kun du'o //
T02D1197:109b-4: sems can thams cad bsgral don du'o //
T02D1197:109b-6: sems can la ni de de ster //
T02D1197:109b-7: 'dod pa'i don gyi mchog rab ster //
T02D1197:109b-9: chos kyis tshim pa ru ni 'gyur //
T02D1197:109b-11: mya ngan 'das gnas mi zad pa //
T02D1197:109b-13: bu pho dang ni bu mo rnams //
T02D1197:109b-14: ji ltar rol pa de bzhin 'dir //
T02D1197:109b-18: yang dag lam la dga' ba nyid //
T02D1197:109b-20: pu ri la sogs par gnas te //
T02D1197:109b-21: rtag tu snying rjes dga' bar bya //
T02D1197:109b-23: gnyen gyis bskor ba'i sems can rnams //
T02D1197:109b-25: bsags pa rnams la chags pa nyid //
T02D1197:109b-27: lo gcig tu ni 'khor ba yis //
T02D1197:109b-29: mi yi gzugs so sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1197:109b-30: ba zhes pa ni mthong ba la ni phyag 'tshal ba'o /
T02D1197:109b-32: nyon mongs zad pa der ni rol //
T02D1197:109b-34: yang dag pa yi bla ma yi //
T02D1197:109b-35: tva zhes pa ni khyod chos kyis //
T02D1197:109b-36: bi zhes pa ni mngon par snod //
T02D1197:109b-38: blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D1197:109b-39: ya zhes pa ni gang gi phyir //
T02D1197:109b-40: te zhes pa ni de rnams bstan pa 'di la 'grub //
T02D1197:109b-41: de'i phyir khyod kyang da ltar ni //
T02D1197:109b-43: da ni 'di'am da lta'i sems can rnams la bstan
T02D1197:109b-44: pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas lam gyi man ngag brjod
T02D1197:109b-45: de / gsang chen zhes bya 'dis ni zhes bya
T02D1197:109b-46: ba la sogs pa la gsang chen zhes pa ni
T02D1197:109b-47: de / sbas pa ste / rgyu'i rgyud de chos kyi sku dang /
T02D1197:109b-48: 'bras bu'i phyir ye shes kyi sku zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:109b-49: to zhes pa 'dis zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras
T02D1197:109b-50: bu 'dis so // man ngag can gis zhes pa
T02D1197:109b-51: ni yang dag pa'i bla mas lung rgyas pa'i tshul
T02D1197:109b-53: sngags btu ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1197:109b-54: dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid ces pa'i bar du ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:109b-55: 'di ni mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:109b-56: sogs pa'i sgras ni las tshogs la sogs pa dang sgrub thabs gzung ngo //
T02D1197:109b-57: man ngag gis zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1197:109b-58: lam sa dab dang rmi lam dang nyal ba dang
T02D1197:110a-1: 'chad bzhin pa las bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:110a-2: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid ces pa ni
T02D1197:110a-3: de ltar gsungs pa'i tshig nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1197:110a-4: bar ram / gleng gzhi ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rgyud dang stong pa dang /
T02D1197:110a-5: snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi chos so //
T02D1197:110a-6: rgyud ces pa ni thabs te /
T02D1197:110a-8: de bzhin du shes rab dang thabs sbyor ba nyid ni kha sbyor zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:110a-9: thabs kyi rgyud ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:110a-10: de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sbrul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:110a-11: de ni bdag gis bshad kyis zhes pa ni bdag
T02D1197:110a-12: sh'akya thub pas kha sbyor gyi rgyud de bshad ces
T02D1197:110a-13: pa'i don to // nyon zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D1197:110a-14: snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag
T02D1197:110a-15: gis sbrul pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ma 'ongs pa'i sems
T02D1197:110a-16: can rnams gzhug pa'i phyir nyon zhes gsungs te /
T02D1197:110a-17: tshig 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:110a-18: de ni dang po stong pa nyid bstan pa'i sgo
T02D1197:110a-19: nas sems can rnams la stong pa'i byang chub bstan
T02D1197:110a-20: pa'i phyir / dang po stong pa nyid bsams pas //
T02D1197:110a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:110a-22: 'dir sems can thams cad 'jug pa'i rnam par shes
T02D1197:110a-23: pa drug dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos pos
T02D1197:110a-25: de rnams yongs su zad pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:110a-26: dang po stong pa nyid rnam par bsams te thun
T02D1197:110a-27: mong du khyab par byed pa'i phyir chos rnams thams
T02D1197:110a-28: cad kyi rang bzhin nyid rnam pa thams cad dang
T02D1197:110a-29: ldan pa stong pa nyid snang ba med pa bstan
T02D1197:110a-30: du med pa rnam par rig pa med pa gzugs
T02D1197:110a-31: med pa chos la bdag med pa'i rang bzhin de
T02D1197:110a-32: bzhin du rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1197:110a-33: lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru //
T02D1197:110a-34: zhes pa ni lus 'byung ba dang ldan pas na lus can rnams kyi ste /
T02D1197:110a-35: stong pa nyid kyi mes mi shes pa'i dri ma
T02D1197:110a-36: bsreg cing sngon gyi skye ba brgyud pa'i bag chags
T02D1197:110a-37: kyi dri ma bkru zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:110a-38: gzugs khams zhes bya stong pa ste //
T02D1197:110a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1197:110a-40: phyed dang gnyis kyis skye mched rug kyang stong pa
T02D1197:110a-41: nyid du bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
T02D1197:110a-42: par 'gyur ro // gzugs khams zhes pa ni dang po'i don la grub pa'o //
T02D1197:110a-43: de'i phyir gzugs rnams stong pa'o //
T02D1197:110a-44: de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang re
T02D1197:110a-45: bya dang yid kyi khams rnams kyang stong par bya
T02D1197:110b-0: ba ste / @110b gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1197:110b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lan gyi tshig gi tshul gyis so //
T02D1197:110b-3: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:110b-4: ci gsol zhe na gsol ba /
T02D1197:110b-5: mig gi bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1197:110b-6: dbus su rnam shes ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D1197:110b-7: zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum
T02D1197:110b-8: gyis skye mched drug la 'jug pa'i rnam shes drug
T02D1197:110b-9: rnam par gnas pa'i don to //
T02D1197:110b-10: ji ltar 'gyur zhes pa ni rnam pa gang gis 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:110b-11: gang gi phyir phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1197:110b-12: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya
T02D1197:110b-13: dang yid rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o //
T02D1197:110b-14: 'on kyang byis pa rnams glo bur ba'i dri mas
T02D1197:110b-15: bsgribs pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:110b-16: rgyus sngon gyi skye ba'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis
T02D1197:110b-17: bum pa dang ras dang shing rta la sogs pa
T02D1197:110b-18: rnams la 'khrul pa'i shes pa skye'o //
T02D1197:110b-19: de las rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing
T02D1197:110b-20: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams las kyang ngo
T02D1197:110b-21: // de nyid kyis rmongs pa 'khor ba 'ching ngo //
T02D1197:110b-22: de nyid kyis ye shes can rnams kyi yang dag
T02D1197:110b-23: par yongs su shes pas 'khrul pa yongs su zad
T02D1197:110b-25: grol ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi mngon par shes pa drug kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:110b-26: de'i phyir gzugs med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:110b-27: tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis ni sngon gyi tshig dang
T02D1197:110b-28: rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir rdo rje snying po bdag
T02D1197:110b-29: nyid la yid ches par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:110b-30: // gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa ni gzugs
T02D1197:110b-31: med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa
T02D1197:110b-32: // / snang ba med pa rnam par mi rig pa /
