T02D1197:110b-38: dbang po med pa zhes pa la sogs pas mngon par 'dus byas pa dang bral bar blta'o //
T02D1197:110b-39: 'on kyang dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du snang ba ste /
T02D1197:110b-40: sangs rgyas rnams sgyu ma'i rnam par snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:110b-41: de nyid byis pa rnams la don med pa bskyed pa'i don to //
T02D1197:110b-42: de ltar yang 'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma zhes pa'i mdo'i rgyal po las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1197:110b-43: ji ltar gzhon nu ma yi rmi lam nang du ni //
T02D1197:110b-44: de la bu skyes nas ni shi ba yang ni mthong //
T02D1197:110b-45: skyes pas dga' zhing shi bas yid mi bde bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:111a-1: thams cad de dang 'dra bar shes par bya //
T02D1197:111a-3: de'i phyir gzugs med lta ba med /
T02D1197:111a-5: de bzhin du nyan pa med /
T02D1197:111a-8: reg med reg pa yang med /
T02D1197:111a-9: sems med sems las byung ba yang med do //
T02D1197:111a-10: de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis 'gog pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:111a-11: stong pa zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D1197:111a-12: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:111a-13: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1197:111a-15: nyan pa po'i skye bo rnams kyi rong de kho
T02D1197:111a-16: na nyid bstan pa'i phyir lan gyi tshig gsungs te
T02D1197:111a-17: / ji bzhin lam gyi de nyid nyon //
T02D1197:111a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:111a-19: nyon zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:111a-20: ci nges par gzung zhe na /
T02D1197:111a-21: sngar zhus pa drug gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis las gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:111a-22: de nyid ces pa 'chad bzhin pa'i bla ma'i man
T02D1197:111a-23: ngag bsgom pa 'dis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs
T02D1197:111a-25: ji bzhin lam zhes pa ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshul gyis te /
T02D1197:111a-26: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis la brten pa'i lam gyi ye shes lnga'o //
T02D1197:111a-27: de yang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams lnga rnams so //
T02D1197:111a-28: de'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1197:111a-32: de bzhin du aa ae aar ao aal zhes pa ni yon tan no //
T02D1197:111a-33: de bzhin du ya na'i bsgyur pa ha ya ra wa la'o //
T02D1197:111a-34: ham zhes pa ni mi shigs pa'am /
T02D1197:111a-36: 'di ni dga' ba bcu drug gi mtshan nyid kyi phyir lam ni zla ba'i ste /
T02D1197:111a-37: ji srid dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
T02D1197:111a-38: nya rdzogs pa'i mthar thug par cha bco lnga'o //
T02D1197:111a-39: mtha' ma bcu drug pa don gyi bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir char mi phod pa'o //
T02D1197:111a-40: de bzhin du yang nya dang mar ngo'i tshes gcig gi mtshams su'o //
T02D1197:111a-41: de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:111a-42: gang phyir mtshan phyed kyi dus ni //
T02D1197:111a-43: mgon pos byang chub bla med thob //
T02D1197:111a-44: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:111a-45: de ltar shes rab kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D1197:111a-46: de yang snying rje bcu drug gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:111a-47: de la dga' ba rnams brjod de /
T02D1197:111a-48: sprul pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs //
T02D1197:111a-49: ye shes gcig sdom dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:111b-0: longs spyod rdzogs sku gsung @111b dang thugs //
T02D1197:111b-1: ye shes gcig tu sdom dga' ba //
T02D1197:111b-2: dpal chos sku dang gsung dang thugs //
T02D1197:111b-3: ye shes gcig tu sdom dga' ba //
T02D1197:111b-4: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku gsung thugs //
T02D1197:111b-5: ye shes gcig tu sdom dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:111b-6: de bzhin nag po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
T02D1197:111b-7: ji srid gnam stong gi mthar thug par gug skyed
T02D1197:111b-8: ring po'i dbye bas sdud pa'i rim pas bstan to
T02D1197:111b-9: // de yang stong pa nyid bcu drug gi de kho na nyid thabs shes su brjod do //
T02D1197:111b-10: nyi ma'i 'phel ba'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:111b-13: de bzhin du a'al aoo a'a ra aee a'a /
T02D1197:111b-14: de bzhin du l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /
T02D1197:111b-16: gnam stong dang dkar po'i tshes gcig gi mtshams so //
T02D1197:111b-17: stong pa nyid bcu drug brjod pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1197:111b-20: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-21: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-22: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-23: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-25: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-26: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-27: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-28: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-29: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-30: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-31: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-32: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:111b-33: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
T02D1197:111b-34: de ltar shes rab thabs dag sbyor //
T02D1197:111b-35: stong pa snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1197:111b-36: lam ni bdun du bstan pa ni //
T02D1197:111b-37: 'di dag gnyis su gsungs pa yin //
T02D1197:111b-38: gnyis po spangs pa'i phyir na 'di //
T02D1197:111b-39: gnyis su med pa zhes su brjod //
T02D1197:111b-40: de yang mngon byang chub skad cig / de bzhin bcu drug pa ni mtshams //
T02D1197:111b-41: thob bya mi shes pa rnams ni //
T02D1197:111b-44: brtag tu med cing shes bya min //
T02D1197:111b-45: de bzhin rtog ge bas rtogs dka' //
T02D1197:111b-47: brtag tu med ces pa ni brtag pa ni dpyad pa'o //
T02D1197:111b-48: des mi rnyed pas na brtag tu med pa ste /
T02D1197:111b-49: rtog pa med ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:111b-50: shes bya min zhes pa la /
T02D1197:111b-51: shes bya ni rnam par shes pa'i 'khrul pa sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa mthong ba'o //
T02D1197:111b-52: shes par byed pa ni yid kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1197:111b-53: de lta bu dang 'dra ba med pa'i phyir don dam par yang mi snang ngo //
T02D1197:112a-0: rigs pa 'dis na shes bya ma yin pa'i don bcom ldan 'das @112a * //
T02D1197:112a-2: rtogs dka' zhes pa ni khong du chud par dka' ba'o //
T02D1197:112a-4: rang gi bsod nams las ni shes //
T02D1197:112a-5: bla ma brgyud pa nyer bsten bya //
T02D1197:112a-7: de bzhin rtog ge bas zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:112a-8: glegs bam mang po mthong bas khengs //
T02D1197:112a-10: yang na rtog ge skam po la chags pa rmongs
T02D1197:112a-11: pa mkhas par rlom pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can
T02D1197:112a-12: rnams kyis bstan par mi nus shing des 'di rtogs
T02D1197:112a-13: par mi nus zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:112a-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni //
T02D1197:112a-15: nam mkha' mnyam pa lta bu ste //
T02D1197:112a-16: zhes pa ni 'dir so so'i skye bo byis pa
T02D1197:112a-17: mi mkhas pa rnams 'ba' zhig gis mi nus par
T02D1197:112a-18: ma zad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:112a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes gsungs te /
T02D1197:112a-20: 'dir rnam par shes pa'i skad cig re re las rang bzhin sna tshogs rnams spros te /
T02D1197:112a-21: de las dbyibs sna tshogs par skyes pa'i sems can
T02D1197:112a-22: rnams kyi bsam pa dag pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas
T02D1197:112a-23: su 'byung ba ni nye bar brtags pa'i tshig go
T02D1197:112a-24: // mi shes pa de rnams kyis ni sngags kyi
T02D1197:112a-25: spyod pa gsang ba dang bral zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:112a-26: // // nam mkha' mnyan pa zhes pa ni khyab par byed pa'i phyir 'dra ba ste /
T02D1197:112a-27: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:112a-28: lta bu zhes pa ni de las bskyed pa'i rgyu dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D1197:112a-29: 'chad bzhin pa'i sgom pa'i man ngag de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:112a-30: yang na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid sngags kyi theg pa chen po'o //
T02D1197:112a-31: de yang 'bras bu la rgyu nye bar btags pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i bdag nyid 'di las 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:112a-32: de'i phyir de kho na nyid dmigs pa dang 'dra ba rtogs par dka' ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:112a-33: de ltar theg pa chen po la dga' ba sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis te /
T02D1197:112a-34: de yang gsang zhing spa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:112a-35: nyan thos rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ste /
T02D1197:112a-36: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes te /
T02D1197:112a-37: sngon gyi smon lam dang bral ba rnams kyis mi shes shing mi dran zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:112a-38: gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul lo //
T02D1197:112a-40: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni sems can rnams smon lam
T02D1197:112a-41: yongs su rdzogs shing tshogs rdzogs pas yang dag par
T02D1197:112a-42: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gzhan ni ma yin no
T02D1197:112b-0: // de'i spyod yul du @112b gyur pa ni ye shes ni gsang zhing sbas pa ste /
T02D1197:112b-1: rang rig pa'i ye shes tshig gi lam gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'o //
T02D1197:112b-2: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa pha
T02D1197:112b-3: rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa la
T02D1197:112b-4: sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
T02D1197:112b-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas pa /
T02D1197:112b-6: de bzhin du rgyun du goms pa dang ldan pa
T02D1197:112b-7: de'i yang spyod yul ma yin pa de brjod du
T02D1197:112b-8: med pa'i phyir bgrod du med pa'o //
T02D1197:112b-9: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtog par dka' ba'o //
T02D1197:112b-10: mi 'gyur ba la gnas pa'i phyir brtag par dka' ba'o //
T02D1197:112b-11: gzugs med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa'o //
T02D1197:112b-14: sgrol bar 'gyur ba'i bsam pa yis //
T02D1197:112b-15: zhes gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
T02D1197:112b-16: lus can rnams kyi dbus gnas pa //
T02D1197:112b-17: sgrol ba yi ni mtshan nyid brjod //
T02D1197:112b-19: sems can rnams kyi lus kyi dbus su rang rig pa'i ye shes gnas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:112b-20: bsgom pa zhes pa ni rab kyi mthar song ba
T02D1197:112b-21: de'i mtshan nyid bstan pa 'chad bzhin pa las gsungs
T02D1197:112b-22: te / mtshon bya mtshon byed mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1197:112b-23: rnam shes rnams ni ye shes bsam //
T02D1197:112b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:112b-25: mtshon byed ces bya ba ni /
T02D1197:112b-26: srog dang thur sel bcings ba'i sbyor bas brtan pa
T02D1197:112b-27: dang g-yo ba'i dngos po mi g-yo bar byed pa'o
T02D1197:112b-28: // 'dir brtan pa ni phung po lnga rnams so //
T02D1197:112b-29: g-yo ba ni srog la sogs pa'i rlung bcu rnams so //
T02D1197:112b-30: de la brten nas sna tshogs pa'i ming can 'jig
T02D1197:112b-31: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad
T02D1197:112b-32: kyi rnam par rtog pa glo bur ba rnams skye
T02D1197:112b-33: ba'o // de rnams kyi mtshon bya aa wa dh'u
T02D1197:112b-34: t'ir bcug cing de 'gog pas rgyu mthun pa la
T02D1197:112b-35: sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ste /
T02D1197:112b-38: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1197:112b-39: phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu yang 'thob pa 'chad bzhin pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas ston te /
T02D1197:112b-40: de ltar mtshon pa sku mthong ba khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:112b-41: mtshan nyid ces pa ni 'dir ji ltar 'ga' zhig
T02D1197:112b-42: ting nge 'dzin rnyed pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pas mtshan
T02D1197:112b-43: ma mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'dir yang mthong
T02D1197:112b-44: bas sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i dbang gis mar
T02D1197:112b-45: me'i rtse mo bzhin phyi'i chos rnams la brten te
T02D1197:113a-1: kyis sems can gyi don du sngon gyi smon lam
T02D1197:113a-2: gyi stobs kyis da ltar mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan
T02D1197:113a-3: no // rnam par shes pa ye shes bsam //
T02D1197:113a-4: zhes pa ni chos rnams thams cad kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1197:113a-5: 'di rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las byung ste
T02D1197:113a-6: / ye shes bsam zhes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:113a-7: de bzhin du yang 'dir ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:113a-8: bsam zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:113a-9: shes rab dang thabs 'di dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes rjod do //
T02D1197:113a-10: sngon du gsungs pa nye bar brtags pa de'i dbang
T02D1197:113a-11: gis rnam par shes pa zhes pa de skyed par
T02D1197:113a-12: byed do // de'i phyir mtshon bya dang mtshon byed
T02D1197:113a-13: dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:113a-14: byed do // su grub po // yang na mtshon bya ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:113a-15: mtshon byed ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:113a-16: mtshan nyid ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02D1197:113a-17: des 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir sku dang gsung
T02D1197:113a-18: dang thugs kyi bdag nyid de bstan te de bzhin
T02D1197:113a-20: da ni gang zag gi chos la gnas pa'i sems
T02D1197:113a-21: can rnams kyi ye shes dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid
T02D1197:113a-22: med par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dbye ba brjod
T02D1197:113a-23: de / ye shes kyis ni shes bya ba lta //
T02D1197:113a-24: shes bya rnams kyis 'gro ba brtag / ces pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:113a-25: ye shes kyis ni zhes pa ni mig la sogs
T02D1197:113a-26: pa'i skye mched rnams las skyes pa'i rnam par shes
T02D1197:113a-27: pa de ni yul can zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:113a-28: des gang phyi'i gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa de ni shes bya la blta ba'o //
T02D1197:113a-29: 'gro ba brtag ces pa ni dbang po'i rtog pa 'gro bas dngos po mthong ba la rtog pa'o //
T02D1197:113a-30: shes pa dang shes bya 'di dag snyoms par 'jug pa'i don to //
T02D1197:113a-31: 'gro ba zhes pa ni gzhan du 'gro ba la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:113a-33: rtog pa'i sems kyis rang dga' la sogs lam 'gror 'gyur //
T02D1197:113a-35: bsam zhes pa ni sems las byung ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:113a-36: rtog pa zhes pa ni de'i rang bzhin gyis lta ba ste /
T02D1197:113a-37: de'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1197:113a-38: rang 'dod la sogs zhes pa ni rang nyid kyi las kyi rjes su 'brangs pas so //
T02D1197:113a-39: sogs pa'i sgras ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams kyis gang byas pa'i las des 'gro ba'o //
T02D1197:113b-0: lam zhes pa ni lam der bgrod par @113b bya
T02D1197:113b-1: ba yin pas na de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1197:113b-2: // yang na ye shes kyis zhes pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pas so //
T02D1197:113b-3: shes bya ba lta zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:113b-4: gang phyi rol sngon po dang ser po la sogs
T02D1197:113b-5: pa'i rnam pa rnams la mig la sogs pas blta
T02D1197:113b-6: ba'o // shes bya rnams kyis zhes pa ni dngos po mtha' dag pa de rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:113b-7: 'gro ba zhes pa ni de rnams la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:113b-8: lta ba zhes pa ni lha'i dbang po'i sgo nas
T02D1197:113b-9: lta bas khyab par byed pa khams gsum mthong ba
T02D1197:113b-11: de yang gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gyis sems
T02D1197:113b-12: las byung ba'i dngos por brjod de bag chags mang
T02D1197:113b-14: 'gro ba ni de'i bgrod pa ste dngos po so so tha dad pa mthong ba'o //
T02D1197:113b-15: de'i phyir rang gi 'dod pas rang rang gi las
T02D1197:113b-16: dang rjes su mthun pas lam la 'jug cing lam
T02D1197:113b-17: la sogs pa la bgrod de de la brten zhes
T02D1197:113b-19: de ltar dge ba'i las can bden pa gnyis la
T02D1197:113b-20: brten pa dge ba'i grogs bzang po dang phrad pa'i
T02D1197:113b-22: sngon du gsungs pa'i nang du 'ga' zhig dge ba'i dbang gis 'grub pa'i don to //
T02D1197:113b-23: 'on kyang 'chad bzhin pa'i tshul gyis bar bar du bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:113b-24: da ni sngon du gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1197:113b-25: lus kyi rim las byang chub sems kyi sgom pa'i
T02D1197:113b-26: thabs kyi de kho na nyid brjod de /
T02D1197:113b-27: ye shes lnga zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:113b-28: 'dir ye shes lnga'i dngos po de nyid ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'am khams lnga'o //
T02D1197:113b-29: de yang srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga rnams so //
T02D1197:113b-30: de kho na nyid ces pa ni h'um ye shes kyi phung po'o //
T02D1197:113b-31: yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam ste //
T02D1197:113b-32: zhes pa ni 'dir ma gsungs kyang gtum mo'i sbyor bar brjod de /
T02D1197:113b-33: 'dir lte ba 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pas sprul pa'i 'khor lo kha dog ser po'o //
T02D1197:113b-34: de'i dbus kyi lte bar aa 'od zer lnga'i rang bzhin 'phro ba'o //
T02D1197:113b-35: snying gar 'dab ma brgyad pa chos kyi 'khor lo kha dog sngon po 'phro ba'o //
T02D1197:113b-36: de'i lte bar h'um kha dog sngon po kha 'og tu blta ba'o //
T02D1197:113b-37: de bzhin du mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor
T02D1197:113b-38: lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa kha dog dmar po
T02D1197:113b-39: 'phro ba'o // de'i dbus kyi lte bar aom mdog dmar po kha steng du bltas pa'o //
T02D1197:114a-0: spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor @114a * //
T02D1197:114a-1: lo 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kha dog dkar po 'phro ba'o //
T02D1197:114a-2: de'i dbus kyi lte bar mi shigs pa zla ba'i 'od 'phro ba kha 'og tu bltas pa'o //
T02D1197:114a-3: spyi gtsug tu nam mkha'i 'khor lo 'dab ma lnga pa ljang gu'o //
T02D1197:114a-4: de'i dbus kyi lte bar kham gi sa bon ljang sngon no //
T02D1197:114a-5: de bzhin du gsang bar ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1197:114a-6: 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kha dog sna
T02D1197:114a-7: tshogs pa'o // de'i dbus su ho dkar po dang dmar por snang ba'o //
T02D1197:114a-8: de ltar 'khor lo drug la rim pa bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1197:114a-14: de bzhin du khams kyi dbye bas spyan ma dang /
T02D1197:114a-18: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1197:114a-20: de rnams kyi dbus su rtsa gsum te /
T02D1197:114a-23: aa wa dh'u t'i rnams so //
T02D1197:114a-24: de'i phyir yungs kar zhes pa ni 'khor lo lnga'i
T02D1197:114a-25: nang du chud pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
T02D1197:114a-27: de'i nang nas kyang byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i zhes bya ste /
T02D1197:114a-28: sems kyi gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:114a-29: gang phyir chos rnams thams cad la //
T02D1197:114a-30: sems kyis khyab par byed pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:114a-32: de ltar yi ge gsum gyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:114a-34: sarsha ba zhes pa'i yi ge dbus ma phyi ba'i phyir sarba zhes 'brel to //
T02D1197:114a-35: de ltar sarba bstir zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:114a-36: sbom po zhes pa ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams la khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:114a-37: tshad tsam zhes pa ni aa tsam mo //
T02D1197:114a-38: ci phyir aa'i gug skyed tsam zhe na /
T02D1197:114a-40: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don che nyi ge dam pa ste /
T02D1197:114a-41: srog chen po ni skye ba med //
T02D1197:114a-42: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1197:114a-44: de bzhin dursha zhes pa ni chags pa chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:114a-45: harsha zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang
T02D1197:114a-46: bzhin kun rdzob kyi rnam pa zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:114a-47: // gsang ba zhes pa ni 'khor lo lnga po
T02D1197:114a-48: rnams kyi bar bar du khyab par byed pa nyid
T02D1197:114b-0: sbas pa zhes pa'i @114b don to //
T02D1197:114b-1: de'i phyir ye shes kyi 'khor lo zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:114b-2: de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam par gsungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:114b-3: de bzhin du 'dir don dam pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:114b-4: de'i dbus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D1197:114b-5: de'i zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i bde ba chen po'i dbus su gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:114b-8: snang ba med pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1197:114b-9: mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1197:114b-10: zhes pa ni de nyid ye shes chen po ste /
T02D1197:114b-11: sangs rgyas rnams kyi skad cig ma gcig la mngon
T02D1197:114b-12: par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid dbang po'i
T02D1197:114b-13: sgo rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa de'i phyir
T02D1197:114b-14: mi gsal ba'o // de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir gsal ba ste /
T02D1197:114b-15: des na de'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:114b-16: gug skyed phyed pa mchog phra ba //
T02D1197:114b-17: thig le'i gzugs can yid lta bu //
T02D1197:114b-19: 'dir kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:114b-20: gug skyed phyed pa zhes pa bsgom pa rtogs pas
T02D1197:114b-21: mthong ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi sgra zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:114b-22: to // phul du byung bas na mchog go //
T02D1197:114b-23: phra ba zhes pa ni dmigs pa dang bral bas so //
T02D1197:114b-24: thig le zhes pa ni yi ge lta bu'o //
T02D1197:114b-25: gang gi phyir mi 'dzag pa'i phyir yi ge ste
T02D1197:114b-26: rtsa'i khong stong nas steng du 'gro ba'i phyir 'dzag
T02D1197:114b-27: pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i pha rol tu son
T02D1197:114b-29: rtag tu snying gi dbus na gnas //
T02D1197:114b-30: gzi byin chen po'i 'od bzhi ldan //
T02D1197:114b-32: 'dir snying zhes pa ni snying po'i don to //
T02D1197:114b-33: 'on kyang dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i la brten pa'i sems so //
T02D1197:114b-34: de yang dbang po dang bral ba ste /
T02D1197:114b-36: de'i phyir spyi gtsug la sogs pa las 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le de'i dbus su'o //
T02D1197:114b-37: rtag tu gnas zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:114b-38: de'i gzi brjid chen po ni chos thams cad snang ba ste /
T02D1197:114b-39: ye shes dang shes bya dag gcig cing stong pa dang snying rje gnyis me dpa'o //
T02D1197:114b-40: de bzhin du 'od ldan zhes pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T02D1197:114b-41: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang
T02D1197:114b-42: snyoms kyi rang bzhin bsam gtan bzhi'i bdag nyid do
T02D1197:114b-43: // yang na snang ba bzhi'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1197:115a-0: de yang snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba thob @115a * //
T02D1197:115a-2: de ni 'od zer bzhi zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:115a-3: bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mtha' //
T02D1197:115a-4: rkang pa nas ni spyi mthar thug / ces pa
T02D1197:115a-5: ni 'dir sngon du gsungs pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang
T02D1197:115a-6: bzhin dbugs te / de yang dkyil 'khor lnga'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu rgyu pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:115a-7: 'dir g-yon dang g-yas kyis na'i bu ga dag las
T02D1197:115a-8: spro ba dang sdud pa'i dbye bas dkyil 'khor lnga
T02D1197:115a-10: g-yon nas nam mkha' la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:115a-11: de bzhin du g-yas nas sa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:115a-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor bcu rgyu ba'i rim pas srog gi rlung du brjod de /
T02D1197:115a-13: de yang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:115a-14: de ltar yang 'dus pa phyi ma las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1197:115a-15: ye shes lan gyi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02D1197:115a-16: yungs kar sngom po'i tshad tsam ste //
T02D1197:115a-17: sna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
T02D1197:115a-18: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom //
T02D1197:115a-20: de nyid 'chad bzhin pa las bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:115a-21: de bzhin du 'dir bcu gnyis mtha' zhes pa ni
T02D1197:115a-22: 'dir dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa'i sbyor ba dag
T02D1197:115a-23: las gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i srog de ni sor
T02D1197:115a-24: bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:115a-25: dgu'i mtha' zhes pa ni srog de nyid 'jug pa'i lam nas sor gsum mi tshang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:115a-26: rkang pa nas ni spyi mthar thug / ces pa
T02D1197:115a-27: ni spyi gtsug nas mthe bo'i bar du bla ma'i
T02D1197:115a-28: man gnag gi tshul gyis gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu
T02D1197:115a-29: ni gug skyed phyed pa'o zhes brjod pa'i phyir brtan
T02D1197:115a-30: pa las ni khyab par byed do //
T02D1197:115a-32: yang na mgrin pa nas dpral ba dang mgo bo'i mtshams kyi mthar thug pa ni phyi'o //
T02D1197:115a-33: nang du de tsam du srog 'gro ba'i phyir bcu gnyis kyi mtha'o //
T02D1197:115a-34: slar la de nyid smin ma'i dbus nas mgrin pa'i mthar thug par 'ong ba de ni dgu'i mtha'o //
T02D1197:115a-35: de bzhin du yang gsang ba dang lte ba dang
T02D1197:115a-36: snying ga'i 'khor lo rnams su sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D1197:115a-37: rigs pas rnal 'byor gyi lam la dga' ba'i rnal
T02D1197:115a-38: 'byor pas thun tshod kyis dus kyi khyad par gyis
T02D1197:115a-39: sam / yang na rgyun mi 'chad par goms par
T02D1197:115a-40: bcu gnyis kyi mtha' dang dgu'i mtha' nye bar mtshon
T02D1197:115b-0: sam / par bya'o // de'i phyir ji skad du gsungs pa de la de @115b skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:115b-1: 'khor lo 'di rnams kyi bsgom pa'i khyad par gsungs pa /
T02D1197:115b-2: stsal ma gcig ni yang dag 'byung //
T02D1197:115b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:115b-4: cha lnga pa yi tshad dang ldan //
T02D1197:115b-5: zhes pa ni 'dir sngon du gsung pa'i ha'i gdan au'i ming can na //
T02D1197:115b-6: 'on kyang klu dbang rnam par rab rgyas pa ;
T02D1197:115b-7: / zhes pa lte ba'i sting du khung du 'khyil
T02D1197:115b-8: pa'i rnam pa skor phyed dang bzhi'i bdag nyid de'i
T02D1197:115b-9: snal ma gcig yang dag par byung zhing spyi gtsug
T02D1197:115b-10: gi mthar thug par song ba'o //
T02D1197:115b-11: de yang gtum mo zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:115b-13: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02D1197:115b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
T02D1197:115b-15: spyan ma la sogs pa ni bsregs //
T02D1197:115b-16: bsregs pas ri bong can ham 'dzag / ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1197:115b-17: cha de yang ni phyed nas su //
T02D1197:115b-18: rdo rje dbus su nges par byung //
T02D1197:115b-20: klu dbang las byung ba snal ma gcig po de
T02D1197:115b-21: mi shigs pa rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud cing
T02D1197:115b-22: ro gcig par byas pa bum pa gang ba bzhin
T02D1197:115b-25: gang gi phyir dz'a landha ra'i sgo ru song nas /
T02D1197:115b-26: ao dyan gyi sgor yang 'ong ba'o //
T02D1197:115b-27: de'i phyir dbyer med cing gcig tu 'dres par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:115b-28: rdo rje'i dbus su zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:115b-29: de bzhin du aa wa dh'u t'i'i dbus su rtsa
T02D1197:115b-30: gnyis byung ba'i phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag
T02D1197:115b-32: de ltar aa wa dh'u t'i'i steng dang 'og tu 'bab pa gnyis so //
T02D1197:115b-33: de'i phyir rdo rje zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:115b-34: gang gi phyir sems rdo rje rdo rje der song nas rdo rje de las kyang 'ong ba'o //
T02D1197:115b-35: de bzhin du dbus su nges par byung ste /
T02D1197:115b-36: zhig nas slar yang snying rje chen po'i dbang gis rang rig pa skye'o //
T02D1197:115b-37: phyag rgya chen po bde ba'i dbang gis dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:115b-38: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i khyad par can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:115b-39: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i dus des chos thams cad 'dus pa'o //
T02D1197:115b-40: dam tshig dang chos 'di dag phyag rgya snyoms par 'jug pa de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:115b-41: 'di dag gi rab kyi mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1197:115b-42: chen po thob pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes
T02D1197:115b-44: rdo rje mi phyed ces gsungs pa /
T02D1197:116a-2: shes rab rig pa 'di yi ni //
T02D1197:116a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su brjod //
T02D1197:116a-5: sa bon skye gnas dbus su gnas //
T02D1197:116a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin du
T02D1197:116a-7: sngon du gsungs pa ni ao rgyan gyi sgo las
T02D1197:116a-8: kyang 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le skye
T02D1197:116a-9: gnas dbus su gnas pa zhes pa lte ba'i dbus
T02D1197:116a-10: su gnas pa'o // sa bon zhes pa ni ji
T02D1197:116a-11: ltar dngul chu gsad pa dang gzags pa'i rim pas
T02D1197:116a-12: gsad pa dang 'dzag pa las byed de brgya stong
T02D1197:116a-13: phrag du ma dang ji srid grangs med par 'byed
T02D1197:116a-14: su gnas pa'o // do // de bzhin du 'dir
T02D1197:116a-15: yang rdzogs pa'i rim pas sa bon gyi gzugs su
T02D1197:116a-16: gnas pa ni ye shes chen po zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:116a-17: su gnas pa'o // do // to // de chos
T02D1197:116a-18: kyi dbyings su zhu bar byas shing kun gzhi rnam
T02D1197:116a-19: par shes pa la thim par gyur zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:116a-20: su gnas pa'o // do // to // to //
T02D1197:116a-21: ma rig pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa zad par
T02D1197:116a-22: nges par gsungs pa'i tshig go //
T02D1197:116a-23: de ltar dngul chu bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes
T02D1197:116a-24: pa la sogs pa bsad cing de bzhin du phung
T02D1197:116a-25: po dang khams dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1197:116a-26: de bzhin du las kyi dbang po drug dang de'i bya ba drug kyang bsad ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:116a-27: 'dis ni rang dbang thob pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:116a-28: rang dbang thob pa de ni gang dang gang du
T02D1197:116a-29: 'gro 'dod pa de dang der 'gro bar 'gyur te
T02D1197:116a-30: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:116a-33: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas ye
T02D1197:116a-34: shes kyi dbang gis sgo dgu nas gang du 'dod
T02D1197:116a-36: de yang mig la sogs pa'i skye mched kyi sgo nas 'gro ba'i don to //
T02D1197:116a-37: 'on kyang ji ltar sgra brnyan dang sna tshogs nor bu bzhin sngon gyi dngos pos so //
T02D1197:116a-38: thams cad du zhes pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyis so //
T02D1197:116a-39: tshangs pa'i me ni 'di de bzhin //
T02D1197:116a-41: me zhes pa ni chags pa chen po'o //
T02D1197:116a-42: des ni tshangs pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D1197:116a-43: 'di zhes pa ni rang gi gnas kyi sems rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:116a-44: de bzhin zhes pa ni mchog gi go 'phang rtogs pa'i phyir tshangs pa'am /
T02D1197:116a-45: rang bzhin gyis sdud pa'i phyir me ste gtum mo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:116b-0: yang na me zhes pa ni dus me ste dbang po thams cad sreg @116b pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:116b-1: de'i phyir tshangs pa 'di ni bdag med pa'i de kho na nyid rig pa'o //
T02D1197:116b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chad bzhin pa'i sgo'i dbye ba las so //
T02D1197:116b-4: sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:116b-5: 'dir sgo dgu rnams la bu ga bcu drug nyid du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:116b-6: 'di rnams la dgu ni gsal lo //
T02D1197:116b-7: de bzhin du bdun ni mi gsal ba ste /
T02D1197:116b-8: de yang rim pa bzhin mgrin pa gnyis dang /
T02D1197:116b-9: de bzhin du dpung pa'i rtsa ba dag dang /
T02D1197:116b-12: de bzhin du khu ba'i bu ga'o //
T02D1197:116b-13: 'di rnams kyis dgag pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams brjod do //
T02D1197:116b-14: de las yi sa bon gnyis //
T02D1197:116b-15: zhes pa ni spyir la l'a'i sa bon gnyis so //
T02D1197:116b-16: de bzhin du rlung gi sa bon ya y'a'o //
T02D1197:116b-18: sogs pa'i sgras ni me'i sa bon ra r'a'o //
T02D1197:116b-25: nges pa'i tshig can gyi yi ge gsungs pa /
T02D1197:116b-26: aa ai ri au li zhes pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D1197:116b-28: aa ku ha kam tsheg drag mgrin pa can //
T02D1197:116b-29: zhes pa ni nam mkha'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:116b-30: ai tsu ya sha rkan can zhes pa ni rlung gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:116b-31: ri tu ra sha me ste spyi bo can zhes pa ni me'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:116b-32: au pu wa pa mchu can zhes pa ni chu'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:116b-33: li tu la sa so can sa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur zhes pa'i rigs pas so //
T02D1197:116b-34: de'i phyir sa la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams brjod de /
T02D1197:116b-35: li l'i ai a'i aam aa: ri r'i wa wa a'u dhri dhr''i hum h'um dum aam aa:o //
T02D1197:116b-36: yang na 'jigs ma dang gtum mo dang drag mo
T02D1197:116b-37: la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams gzhan du go sla
T02D1197:116b-38: ba nyid kyi phyir ma bris so //
T02D1197:116b-39: de ltar 'di rnams kyi sa bon rnams bsam par bya ste /
T02D1197:116b-40: rim pa bzhin nges par bzung ste /
T02D1197:116b-41: bsam zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:116b-42: de ltar sa bon de rnams la srog dang thur
T02D1197:116b-43: sel 'gog pas dbang po thams cad dang mig la
T02D1197:116b-44: sogs pa yang thim par bya'o //
T02D1197:116b-45: bdud rtsi zhes pa ni gsang ba'o //
T02D1197:116b-46: sogs pa'i sgras ni dri chen dang dri chu'i bu ga dag gzung ngo //
T02D1197:117a-1: zhes pa ni bsrub cing bsrub pa'i sbyor bas lce
T02D1197:117a-2: gnyis dang rkan gnyis kyi bdag nyid bde ba ste
T02D1197:117a-3: / 'jig rten dbang phyug ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:117a-4: mgrin par zhes pa ni lce chung gnyis so //
T02D1197:117a-5: dpung par zhes pa ni dpung pa'i bu ga'i rtsa
T02D1197:117a-6: ba nas mchan khung gi lam du song zhing glo
T02D1197:117a-7: ba'i mthar thug par song ba'o //
T02D1197:117a-8: snying ga'i phyogs su skyong ba zhes pa ni padma'i
T02D1197:117a-9: rtsa ba'i snal ma lta bu'i rtsa des mdud pas
T02D1197:117a-10: mdud pa thams cad du khyab pa ste /
T02D1197:117a-11: mgo bo dang lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs
T02D1197:117a-12: pa'i sor mo rnams su yang khyab pa'i don to
T02D1197:117a-13: // phyugs zhes pa ni 'dir gsungs pa /
T02D1197:117a-14: gang du skyes pa'i phyugs thams cad //
T02D1197:117a-15: khu ba ltung ba'i rgyu yis ni //
T02D1197:117a-16: gsang ba'i gnas su 'di gsal te //
T02D1197:117a-17: rang nyid sems ni med par 'gyur //
T02D1197:117a-18: gang gi phyir pha dang ma yang dag par sbyor bas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D1197:117a-19: lhan cig brgyal brgyal ba de'i phyir don med par byed pa de'i phyir phyugs zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:117a-20: de bzhin du khu ba dang bu ga'i gnas de
T02D1197:117a-21: dag gsad pa 'dir chags pa dang bral ba skyes
T02D1197:117a-22: pa'i don to // lte ba'i rtsa bar zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:117a-23: gsang ba dang lte ba dag tu gzur ba'i phyir
T02D1197:117a-24: gnyis gnyis dang bral ba'i sbyor ba skye bar 'gyur
T02D1197:117a-25: ro // yan lag brgyad kyi zhes pa ni sngon
T02D1197:117a-26: du gsungs pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi sa bon rnams
T02D1197:117a-27: ro // so // yan lag ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams so //
T02D1197:117a-28: de'i sa bon ni rnam par shes pa dang dbang po'o //
T02D1197:117a-29: de'i 'gog pa ni cho gas yan lag brgyad du dgod pa'o ;
T02D1197:117a-30: / de ltar sa bon dang yan lag tu gzung bas so //
T02D1197:117a-31: cho gas zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas so //
T02D1197:117a-32: slar yang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D1197:117a-33: 'brel pa'i phyir rab kyi mthar son cing nang la
T02D1197:117a-34: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phyi'i rten bstan
T02D1197:117a-35: pa'i phyir / 'gro ba kun la khyab pa po //
T02D1197:117a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:117a-37: khyab pa po zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi sems so //
T02D1197:117a-38: 'gro ba zhes pa ni khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba rnams so //
T02D1197:117a-39: kun zhes pa ni sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
T02D1197:117b-0: drod gsher las skyes pa dang @117b rdzus te skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:117b-3: ri dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi yang gzung ngo //
T02D1197:117b-4: g-yo bar bcas pa zhes pa ni rkang gnyis pa
T02D1197:117b-5: dang rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i sems can de
T02D1197:117b-6: rnams la yang khyab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:117b-7: de yi rten du gyur pa yin //
T02D1197:117b-8: zhes pa ni khyab bya dang khyab par byed pa'i
T02D1197:117b-9: shes bya la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba'i stobs
T02D1197:117b-10: bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:117b-11: yon tan dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
T02D1197:117b-12: 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yan lag bcu
T02D1197:117b-13: gnyis spong ba byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa
T02D1197:117b-14: bdun gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su rtogs
T02D1197:117b-15: bcu dang / pa / sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa /
T02D1197:117b-16: lus dang ngag dang sems gsum gyi dri ma dang bral ba bdag dang bdag gi dang /
T02D1197:117b-17: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po dang bral bar
T02D1197:117b-18: byams pa la sogs pa'i gnas rab tu skyong ba
T02D1197:117b-19: la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de'i rten
T02D1197:117b-20: du 'gyur te / de bzhin du tshangs lha dang lha min gyi yang ngo //

T02D1197:121a-3: de ltar rtsibs bcu dkyil 'khor bcu 'bab pa'i phyir yang bcu'o //
T02D1197:121a-4: de'i 'og dang steng gi dbye bas 'dab ma gnyis te /
T02D1197:121a-5: rtsa gnyis khu ba dang khrag 'bab ba'o //
T02D1197:121a-6: de ltar rtsibs bcu gnyis 'dir rim pa bzhin rtsa rnams 'dus te /
T02D1197:121a-8: sring mo ni yid bzangs ma'o //
T02D1197:121a-11: bram ze mo ni glang po che'i lce'o //
T02D1197:121a-12: rgyal rigs mo ni rgyal zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:121a-13: rje'u rigs mo ni rgyal ma'o //
T02D1197:121a-15: gar mkhan ma ni sreg ma'o //
T02D1197:121a-16: tshos mkhan ma ni dung can ma'o //
T02D1197:121a-17: 'og tu ye shes can te de ni g-yung mo'o //
T02D1197:121a-18: steng du rnam par shes pa ste /
T02D1197:121a-19: de ni gtum mor shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:121a-20: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1197:121a-21: zhes pa ni shes rab ni rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis so //
T02D1197:121a-22: de rnams kyi thabs ni srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams so //
T02D1197:121a-23: cho ga yis zhes pa ni dus kyi khyad par gyis so //
T02D1197:121a-24: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba'i dus kyis nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1197:121a-25: de nyid rig pas zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa
T02D1197:121a-26: de kho na nyid tshol zhing rig pa de ni
T02D1197:121a-28: de kho na nyid ces pa ni rang rig pa'i
T02D1197:121a-29: ye shes rab kyi gnas skabs su son pas rdo
T02D1197:121a-30: rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sa thob bo //
T02D1197:121a-31: dus 'di'i cho ga ma gsungs kyang bla ma brgyud pa las rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:121a-32: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1197:121a-33: rtsibs bcu'i dbye ba rnams la rtsibs re re rtsa
T02D1197:121a-34: re re'i bdag nyid kyis 'pho ba bcur 'gyur te
T02D1197:121a-35: / 'og dang steng gi rtsa nyid kyis dbye bas
T02D1197:121a-36: thun tshod bzhi dang lhan cig 'pho ba gnyis so
T02D1197:121a-38: phyi rol du yang lug dang srang gi 'pho ba'i dus gnyis mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:121a-39: de ltar nang du mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir rdo
T02D1197:121a-40: rje lta bur srog dang thur sel 'gog pas rtsa
T02D1197:121a-42: de ltar 'pho ba bcu gnyis nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1197:121a-43: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:121a-44: de yang 'pho ba re re la g-yon dang g-yas
T02D1197:121a-45: kyi sna'i bu ga'i dbye bas dkyil 'khor lnga lnga
T02D1197:121b-0: dkyil 'khor re re la sum brgya drug cu'i srog rnams su @121b 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:121b-1: de ltar dbyug tshod drug cu dang rtsa drug cu rnams su yang 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:121b-2: de bzhin du aa wa dh'u t'i'i ye shes kyi
T02D1197:121b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi cha la dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis su
T02D1197:121b-4: brjod de / de rnams lhan cig bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:121b-5: de rnams las rnal 'byor ma dang //
T02D1197:121b-6: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams skya ba brjod do //
T02D1197:121b-7: de la de ltar spro ba dang sdud pa dang
T02D1197:121b-8: g-yon gyi rtsa rnams la rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud drug
T02D1197:121b-9: tu 'gyur ro // de bzhin du g-yas kyi rtsa la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:121b-10: de yang g-yon rnams la 'khor lo sdom pa dang /
T02D1197:121b-12: rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa dang /
T02D1197:121b-15: he ru ka mngon par 'byung pa'o //
T02D1197:121b-16: de bzhin du g-yas rnams la 'dus pa dang /
T02D1197:121b-20: gshin rje'i dgra dang dpal mchog dang po'o //
T02D1197:121b-21: de ltar rnam pa gnyis ni kha sbyor zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:121b-22: dus kyi pho nya drug drug gi dbye bas so //
T02D1197:121b-23: de las rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dag 'byung ste /
T02D1197:121b-24: sum cu gnyis drug cur 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:121b-25: de las dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'bum phrag lnga
T02D1197:121b-26: pa zhes rtog pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag
T02D1197:121b-27: nyid do // des na rgyud nyung ngur byang chub
T02D1197:121b-28: kyi sems 'bab pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs
T02D1197:121b-29: nyid do // te / de ni sdud pa'i don to //
T02D1197:121b-30: de de ltar mi shes pa'i sems can rnams la
T02D1197:121b-31: kha sbyor thig le las byung ba'i rnal 'byor gtsor
T02D1197:121b-33: slar yang rtsa 'di dag rnams kyi rtsibs bcu gnyis
T02D1197:121b-34: rnams la rlung rnam par gzhag pa brjod de srog
T02D1197:121b-43: nor rgyal zhes pa bcu ni rtsibs bcu la'o //
T02D1197:121b-44: de bzhin du 'og dang steng du ye shes 'char ba dang /
T02D1197:121b-46: de rnams kyi 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas
T02D1197:121b-47: dkyil 'khor rgyu ba'i dbang gis dang bla ma'i man
T02D1197:121b-48: ngag gi dbang gis aa wa dh'u t'ir srog rgyu
T02D1197:121b-49: bas 'pho ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams 'gog par 'gyur ro
T02D1197:122a-1: pa'i sbyor ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis rnams 'gog par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:122a-2: des na sa bcu rnams kyi 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:122a-3: gang gi phyir ma zhes pa la sogs pa chos
T02D1197:122a-4: mkhan ma'i mthar thug par rab tu dga' ba la
T02D1197:122a-5: sogs pas sa bcu rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D1197:122a-6: yon tan don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1197:122a-7: 'di'i rgyu yang kun rdzob kyi bden pa la sogs
T02D1197:122a-8: pa'i rtsa rnam pa bcu pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D1197:122a-9: bcu ste / des rab tu thob pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1197:122a-10: kyis kun du 'od rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang
T02D1197:122a-11: ldan pa stong pa nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' ni
T02D1197:122a-13: dang ni sdud pa'i don to //
T02D1197:122a-14: de dag ni ma gsungs kyang don gyis rtogs par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:122a-15: de bzhin du snying rje'i dbang gis mos pas spyod pa'i sa ni bcu gnyis so //
T02D1197:122a-17: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor pa'i bsam gtan thams cad
T02D1197:122a-18: kyi dang por snying rje la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan
T02D1197:122a-19: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to //
T02D1197:122a-20: de yang gtum mo zhes brjod de shin tu gdug
T02D1197:122a-21: cing gtum pa'i log pa'i chos kyis nye bar bsnun
T02D1197:122a-22: pa rnams kyis blo ngan pa rnam par gzhom pa'i
T02D1197:122a-23: phyir drag po la sogs pa'i gzugs dang snying rjes
T02D1197:122a-24: brlan pa'i thugs kyis las tshogs sna tshogs pa de
T02D1197:122a-26: de'i phyir gtum mos gtum po'i las rnams gzhom pa'i phyir steng gi rtsa dgag go //
T02D1197:122a-27: de ltar srog dang thur sel gyi sbyor ba'i shes
T02D1197:122a-28: rab dang thabs kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba des rdo
T02D1197:122a-29: rje lta bu'i sems mchod par bya'o //
T02D1197:122a-30: yang na dbang gi dus su rnal 'byor ma bcu slob mas slob dpon la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1197:122a-31: g-yung mo dang gtum mo'i bu mo skye gnas ma
T02D1197:122a-32: nyams pa gnyis khrus kyi don du yang dbul lo
T02D1197:122a-33: // de rnams dang lhan cig slob dpon gyis snyoms par 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1197:122a-34: slob ma la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rgyur ro //
T02D1197:122a-35: de yang bung ba dang 'dra ba kha phye ba dang dpyang thag dang /
T02D1197:122a-37: brkyang ba la sogs pa 'byed pa'i tshogs 'dod pa'i
T02D1197:122a-38: bstan bcos su gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bya'o
T02D1197:122a-39: // de bzhin du bcu'i nang nas gcig dbang phyi ma'i don du slob ma la gtad par bya'o //
T02D1197:122b-0: gcig @122b kyang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dbang gis bcur 'gyur te /
T02D1197:122b-3: dang po nu ma la reg pa'i phyir ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:122b-4: de yang gdung ba dang bcas pas lta ba ni sring mo'o //
T02D1197:122b-5: brtse ba brtan pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel to //
T02D1197:122b-6: da ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:122b-7: de yang thams cad kyi rjes su 'brel par bya'o //
T02D1197:122b-8: de bzhin zhes pa ni ma lta bu dang sring mo lta bu'o //
T02D1197:122b-9: bu mo lta bu zhes pa ni yang dang yang du 'o bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:122b-10: de bzhin du gnyen mo ni 'khyud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:122b-11: bram ze mo ni dam pa'i don rig pa'o //
T02D1197:122b-12: rgyal rigs ma zhes pa ni shin tu chags pa'i
T02D1197:122b-13: sbyor bas res 'ga' yang yongs su mi tshim pa'o
T02D1197:122b-14: // yang na shin tu gdungs pas kyang mi tshim pa'o //
T02D1197:122b-15: yang na bram ze mo zhes pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas su shes par bya ba ste /
T02D1197:122b-16: rang gi lag pas mtshan ma bzung nas rang gi mtshan mar reg par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:122b-17: de bzhin du rje'u rigs mo zhes pa ni cha
T02D1197:122b-18: lugs sna tshogs pa'am gzugs sna tshogs pas 'dod pa'i
T02D1197:122b-19: bstan bcos kyi tshul gyis srid ces pa'am /
T02D1197:122b-21: de bzhin du dmangs rigs mo ni 'dzag pa ste /
T02D1197:122b-22: ji ltar ri'i rtse mo nas chu rgyun 'dzag pa
T02D1197:122b-23: de bzhin du padma'i lte ba nas byang chub sems
T02D1197:122b-25: de bzhin du gar mkhan ma zhes pa ni yan lag brgyad kyis bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:122b-26: de bzhin du chos mkhan ma zhes pa ni chags
T02D1197:122b-27: pa chen po'i bde bas mchod pa'i phyir sna tshogs
T02D1197:122b-28: pa'i bde bas bde ba mi 'tshor bar byed pa'o
T02D1197:122b-29: // de ltar 'dod pa'i gnas skabs bcu rgyas pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:122b-30: de nas g-yung mo zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes
T02D1197:122b-31: pa dga' ba'i dus su ye shes smra med pa
T02D1197:122b-32: dang reg tu med pa'i phyir dbang po rnams kyi
T02D1197:122b-33: spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyis ngag gi lam
T02D1197:122b-34: dang bral zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:122b-35: de nyid gtum mor shes par bya ste /
T02D1197:122b-36: rnam par rtog pa'i shing bsreg pas gtum mo'o //
T02D1197:122b-37: dga' ba dang bral ba rnams bral bar byed cing de bzhin bde bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:122b-38: de ltar phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba ni dam tshig ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:122b-39: de ni 'dus pas dam tshig tu blta'o //
T02D1197:122b-40: de nyid rig pas mchod ces pa ni gnyis te /
T02D1197:123a-0: sgyu ma lta bu dang rnam @123a * //
T02D1197:123a-2: sgyu ma lta bu'i ni sngon du gsungs pa'i 'khor
T02D1197:123a-3: lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i tshul gyis sa la brten
T02D1197:123a-4: pa'o // de'i phyir rnam par reg pa ni da
T02D1197:123a-5: lta'i sems can rnams kyis rang gi sems kyi bsam
T02D1197:123a-6: pas las kyi phyag rgya dang sbyar bas sangs rgyas
T02D1197:123a-7: nyid thob pas de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:123a-8: da ni dam tshig bsrungs pa dang nyams pa'i skyon dang yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:123a-9: ji ltar dbye ba skye med par //
T02D1197:123a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:123a-11: 'dir sngon du gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin brten pa'i
T02D1197:123a-12: dus su de yang rab tu 'bad pas brten par
T02D1197:123a-13: bya'o // rab tu 'bad pas zhes pa ni lus
T02D1197:123a-14: dang ngag dang sems kyi nyes pas rtsa rgyu ba'i
T02D1197:123a-15: dus su ji ltar sems rnam par g-yeng bar mi
T02D1197:123a-16: 'gyur ba de ltar dus 'jig par byed de skad
T02D1197:123a-17: cig ma gcig la mtshon pa zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:123a-18: bya'o // // gang gi phyir rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe nyes pa skye ste /
T02D1197:123a-19: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i sems nyams so //
T02D1197:123a-20: sems nyams pa des ji ltar dbye ba zhes pa dus kyi dbye ba skye'o //
T02D1197:123a-21: des na skal ba med par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:123a-22: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams g-yeng ba'i don to //
T02D1197:123a-23: de mthong ba'i nyes pa'i phyir dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:123a-24: yang ni dbang la sogs pa'i dus su dam tshig
T02D1197:123a-25: la spyod pa'i dbang gis gsad par mi byed ces
T02D1197:123a-26: pa ni gdul dka' ba'i sems can nyan thos la
T02D1197:123a-27: sogs pa rnams kyis de mthong bas sdug bsngal zhes
T02D1197:123a-28: pa ni mnar med pa la sogs pa'i dmyal ba
T02D1197:123a-30: rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa la tho 'tshams pa sbrul
T02D1197:123a-31: la sogs pas bsad nas sdug bsngal nyams su myong
T02D1197:123a-33: dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub 'thob //
T02D1197:123a-35: da ni rnal 'byor ma zhing skyes brgyad kyi rigs rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:123a-36: rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:123a-37: 'dir zhing dang nye ba'i zhing la gnas pa'i rnal
T02D1197:123a-38: 'byor pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba
T02D1197:123a-39: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:123a-40: gyi bdag nyid mtshon par bya ba'o //
T02D1197:123b-0: des na nye bar mtshon pas sgrub pa po rnams la @123b mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:123b-2: sems kyi rigs kyi dbang gis gcig dang du ma'i
T02D1197:123b-3: sems las byung ba'i dngos po'i phyir des na dag
T02D1197:123b-4: pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor lo las phyi rol du
T02D1197:123b-6: des na yang sgom ba tsam gyis rnam par rtog
T02D1197:123b-7: pa'i dbang gis sgrub pa po rnams kyang dus mnyam
T02D1197:123b-8: pa la skye'o // de'i phyir gcig las gcig mthong bas grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:123b-9: de ltar zhing brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams rang
T02D1197:123b-10: gi rigs dang 'khyud pas phyag rgya zhes pa phyag
T02D1197:123b-11: rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:123b-12: de yang rnam pa lnga ru gsungs te /
T02D1197:123b-13: bram ze mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:123b-14: de bzhin gshegs par 'dod ces pa ni rnam par snang mdzad 'dod ces pa'o //
T02D1197:123b-15: dpag med rdo rje zhes pa ni 'od dpag med pa'i rigs las skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:123b-16: las kyi rigs las skyes pa ni don yod par grub pa'i rigs las skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:123b-17: dmangs ma mo ni zhi ba mo la sogs pa'i rig ma'o //
T02D1197:123b-18: rnam snang mdzad ni chen por 'dod //
T02D1197:123b-19: ces pa ni nang du rang rigs pa'i gzugs lhan
T02D1197:123b-20: cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:123b-21: // rdo rje zhes pa ni mi bskyod rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:123b-22: rin chen zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs so //
T02D1197:123b-23: phyag rgya rnam pa lngar nges pa'o zhes pa ni
T02D1197:123b-24: sngon du gsungs pa'i zhing skyes kyi rnal 'byor ma
T02D1197:123b-25: rigs lnga las skyes pa rnams so //
T02D1197:123b-26: de ltar phyag rgya chen po lngar nges pa'i don to //
T02D1197:123b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs //
T02D1197:123b-28: 'di ni mdo ru bsdus par brjod //
T02D1197:123b-29: ces pa ni rigs lnga po 'di dag ni 'dod chags chen po dang /
T02D1197:123b-33: ser sna chen po'i rigs lnga'o //
T02D1197:123b-34: rigs de rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1197:123b-35: tu song ba de bzhin gshegs pas mdor bsdus te
T02D1197:123b-37: 'on kyang rigs mtha' yas pas phyag rgya yang mtha' yas te /
T02D1197:123b-38: gcig la gcig 'khyud pa'i dbang gis rang gi rigs
T02D1197:123b-39: la mngon par 'grod pas de rnams dang lhan cig
T02D1197:123b-40: 'grub pa la 'dir som nyi med do //
T02D1197:124a-0: de bzhin nyid du song nas zhes bya ba @124a * //
T02D1197:124a-2: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang rnam
T02D1197:124a-3: pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa stong pa nyid
T02D1197:124a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis med
T02D1197:124a-5: pa'i 'od gsal ba grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid
T02D1197:124a-6: dngos po rnams dang ro gcig par byed pa'i phyag
T02D1197:124a-7: rgya ni phyag rgya chen po zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:124a-8: der song ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i dngos po gnyis so //
T02D1197:124a-10: dpal zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:124a-11: ldan zhes pa ni de la rig pa'i sems de'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:124a-12: de bzhin du slar 'ongs pa zhes pa ni de
T02D1197:124a-13: las yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa bzhin du
T02D1197:124a-14: de nyid las 'ongs pas sprul pa'i sku bzung nas
T02D1197:124a-15: sems can gyi don byed cing slar yang de nyid
T02D1197:124a-16: du song nas sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i chos
T02D1197:124a-17: rjes su dran pa sku bzhi thob pa'o //
T02D1197:124a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa slar yang byon //
T02D1197:124a-21: shes rab 'di'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:124a-22: rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir sngar
T02D1197:124a-23: gsungs pa'i rigs lnga po de'i khyad par nyid brjod
T02D1197:124a-24: pa'o // mtha' yas zhes pa ni rang bzhin rnams
T02D1197:124a-25: mtha' yas pa des na mtha' yas pa'i rigs so
T02D1197:124a-26: pa'o // // brgya zhes pa ni rang bzhin de re re las rigs brgyar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:124a-27: dbyug pa dang yud tsam gyi dbye bas so //
T02D1197:124a-28: de yang stong phrag tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:124a-29: de ltar rigs mtha' yas pa ni sems so //
T02D1197:124a-30: de bzhin du rigs brgya ni lus so //
T02D1197:124a-32: phyis zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye bas zhes pa ste /
T02D1197:124a-33: nye bar bsdu ba'i don te //
T02D1197:124a-34: slar yang tshigs su bcad pa phyed phyed dkrugs te gsungs pa /
T02D1197:124a-35: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02D1197:124a-38: rdo rje zhes pa ni mi bskyod rdo rje ste /
T02D1197:124a-39: mi phyed pa'i ye shes de 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:124a-40: des sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par shes pa'i phung po bskyed pa ni nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D1197:124a-41: rin chen zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
T02D1197:124a-42: yang dag pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:124a-43: des sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshor ba'i phung po bskyed de /
T02D1197:124a-44: rigs pa'i ye shes zer ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:124b-0: @124b padma zhes pa ni 'od dpag med de padma'i
T02D1197:124b-1: rtsa ba'i snal ma lta bu'i rtsa rkang pa nas
T02D1197:124b-2: spyi bor 'dzin pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa
T02D1197:124b-3: des sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'du shes kyi phung po
T02D1197:124b-4: bskyed de / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:124b-5: nor bu zhes pa ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1197:124b-6: ci'i phyir nor bu yin zhe na /
T02D1197:124b-7: aindra n'i la lta bu'i ral gri 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:124b-8: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sna tshogs pa'am /
T02D1197:124b-9: 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam pa lnga 'joms pa'i
T02D1197:124b-10: phyir des sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed kyi phung po
T02D1197:124b-12: 'khor lo zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad de
T02D1197:124b-13: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa'i rlung chen po de
T02D1197:124b-14: 'gog pa'i phyir des sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs kyi
T02D1197:124b-16: de bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung
T02D1197:124b-17: gi khams rnams rim pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o
T02D1197:124b-18: // de'i phyir dkrugs pas sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:124b-19: 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:124b-20: 'dir gang gi phyir ye shes lnga rnam par gzung
T02D1197:124b-21: ba'i phyir de'i dus su rigs gcig nas brtsams te
T02D1197:124b-22: / ji srid grangs med pa'i rigs rnams bskyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:124b-25: phung po lnga'i zhes pa ni srog lnga la sogs pa'i rlung rnams so //
T02D1197:124b-26: de ltar 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin de ni brten pa'o //
T02D1197:124b-27: de rnams kyi rten ni phung po lnga'o //
T02D1197:124b-28: de'i rang bzhin khams rnams so //
T02D1197:124b-29: khams rnams las rigs rnams 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:124b-30: de'i rigs rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur te /
T02D1197:124b-31: bya ba byed pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:124b-32: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs pa las gsungs te /
T02D1197:124b-33: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02D1197:124b-34: chu skyar las ni chu yin te //
T02D1197:124b-35: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02D1197:124b-36: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
T02D1197:124b-38: de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1197:124b-39: skyes zhes pa ni phung po lnga dang khams lnga
T02D1197:124b-40: po de'i rang bzhin du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:124b-41: de'i phyir rigs zhes pa ni sems can sna tshogs pa'i khams rnams su bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:125a-6: ser sna dang nga rgyal gyi dri mas bsgribs pa
T02D1197:125a-7: 'gro ba drug tu sdug bsngal nyams su myongs ba
T02D1197:125a-8: ma yin nam / ci'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs rnams su skyes /
T02D1197:125a-9: gang gi phyir gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba tsam
T02D1197:125a-10: gyis kyang ngan 'gror mi 'gro na gzhan lta ci
T02D1197:125a-11: smos / gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba //
T02D1197:125a-13: mi yi lus ni spangs nas su //
T02D1197:125a-14: de yis lha yi lus ni rnyed //
T02D1197:125a-15: de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bas kyang ngo //
T02D1197:125a-16: khyad par dus bcu'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D1197:125a-17: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs rnams su skyes pa'i
T02D1197:125a-18: sems can thams cad kyi khams rnams dmyal ba la
T02D1197:125a-19: sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur snyam
T02D1197:125a-20: pa'i dogs pa 'ga' zhig la yod de /
T02D1197:125a-21: de'i phyir 'dir lan gsum gsungs pa /
T02D1197:125a-22: bden mod 'on kyang mi shes pa'i dri mas bsgribs
T02D1197:125a-23: pas mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i byis pa rnams
T02D1197:125a-24: log pa'i chos la chags pa mi dge ba'i grogs
T02D1197:125a-25: kyi dbang gis phyin ci log gi chos rnams la
T02D1197:125a-27: de'i phyir de rnams kyi lta ba ngan pa rnams
T02D1197:125a-28: rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir de bzhin gshags pas chos
T02D1197:125a-29: sna tshogs ston par mdzad do //
T02D1197:125a-30: gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin bar bar du chad pas ji srid du /
T02D1197:125a-31: sems rab kyi mthar thug par ma gyur pa de'i phyir /
T02D1197:125a-32: de kho na nyid kyi le'u tshul gyis de kho
T02D1197:125a-33: na nyid bsgom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan te
T02D1197:125a-34: / gang dmigs pas sems rtse gcig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:125a-36: sgom pa po med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1197:125a-37: sgom pa po med bsgom bya med //
T02D1197:125a-38: ces pa ni 'dir sems can rnams kyi gzung ba
T02D1197:125a-39: dang 'dzin pa'i dngos pos dbang po'i sgo nas phyi'i
T02D1197:125a-40: dngos po rnams la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:125a-41: de'i phyir phung po lnga'i nga rgyal las slar yang dge ba dang /
T02D1197:125a-42: mi dge ba'i bag chags kyi dbang gis ma dang /
T02D1197:125a-43: pha yang dag par sbyor bas phung po dang khams la sogs pa la brten pa 'dzin to //
T02D1197:125b-0: sems kyi rtog pa'i dngos po las @125b so ;
T02D1197:125b-1: / sems kyang mi bden pa te /
T02D1197:125b-2: mi bden pa la brten par yongs su brtags pa des 'khor bar 'ching bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:125b-6: der bstan pa ci gang dang gang bstan pas sems
T02D1197:125b-7: ca thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams zad par
T02D1197:125b-8: byed do // de yang rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:125b-9: sdud par byed pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos sna
T02D1197:125b-10: tshogs pa'i glegs bam gyi tshul gyis de rnams su
T02D1197:125b-11: ngag gi rnam par rtog pas dngos po'i dpe brjod
T02D1197:125b-12: pa'i phyir ro // de 'dir brjod de /
T02D1197:125b-13: 'dir sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1197:125b-14: bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dang
T02D1197:125b-15: / nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyi lam bskyed do //
T02D1197:125b-16: gang gi phyir dgra bcom pa rnams kyi ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1197:125b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni lhag ma med
T02D1197:125b-18: pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'gyur ro
T02D1197:125b-19: // de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rnam
T02D1197:125b-20: par mi rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems rang bzhin
T02D1197:125b-21: dang bral ba chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid do
T02D1197:125b-22: // // 'on kyang kun rdzob kyi rgyus sems ming tsam du brjod do //
T02D1197:125b-23: de ltar yang rgyal ba'i yum las gsungs te /
T02D1197:125b-24: rab 'byor sems gang sems de ni sems med par
T02D1197:125b-25: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
T02D1197:125b-26: shes pa'i sems de ni sems med pa'o //
T02D1197:125b-28: yod pa ma yin med pa min //
T02D1197:125b-29: yod dang med pa gnyis ka min //
T02D1197:125b-30: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid med pa'ang min //
T02D1197:125b-31: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba //
T02D1197:125b-32: de nyid dbu ma pa yis shes //
T02D1197:125b-33: de phyir sgom pa po med de //
T02D1197:125b-34: sems med ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:125b-35: de med pa'i phyir phung po lnga'i nga rgyal yang med de /
T02D1197:125b-36: phung po lnga med pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams kyang med do //
T02D1197:125b-37: skye mched rnams med pas 'dzin pa yang med do //
T02D1197:125b-38: 'dzin pa med pas gzung ba'i dngos po yang med do //
T02D1197:125b-40: gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:125b-41: khams rnams kyi gong bu rdul phra rab tu son
T02D1197:125b-42: cing rdul phra rab kyang cha drug tu phye zhing
T02D1197:125b-43: phyogs cha drug gi dbye bas cha med pa nyid
T02D1197:126a-0: du 'gyur ba'o // de ltar phung po lnga dang skye @126a * //
T02D1197:126a-1: mched rnams bden par med do //
T02D1197:126a-2: de'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i chos //
T02D1197:126a-3: bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min //
T02D1197:126a-4: sgyu ma'i dpe ni bcu gnyis kyis //
T02D1197:126a-6: sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang //
T02D1197:126a-7: dri za yi ni grong khyer dang //
T02D1197:126a-8: mdun gyi chu yi zla ba dang //
T02D1197:126a-9: me long gi ni gzugs brnyan dang //
T02D1197:126a-10: de bzhin rmi lam dpa' bo'i gzhu //
T02D1197:126a-11: sprin gyi grib ma gsal snang dang /
T02D1197:126a-12: chu yi chu bur mig 'phrul dang //
T02D1197:126a-13: mun pa yi ni rab rib po //
T02D1197:126a-14: dam pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa gsungs pa ni
T02D1197:126a-15: sna tshogs kyi don 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa
T02D1197:126a-16: ni nges pa'o // rigs pa 'dis dngos po med
T02D1197:126a-17: ces pa ni rnal 'byor gyi sred pa bsal ba'o
T02D1197:126a-18: ni nges pa'o // // yang na bsgom par bya
T02D1197:126a-19: ba dang bsgom pa dang sgom pa po bsgom par
T02D1197:126a-20: bya ba'i rnal 'byor la goms bas cung zad nyams
T02D1197:126a-21: su myong ba dang bcas pa'i sems kyi lam mthong
T02D1197:126a-23: ltar bsgom par bya ba mi phyed pa'i sbyor ba
T02D1197:126a-24: ni nges pa'o // // ngo // blta'o // rtsa
T02D1197:126a-25: rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis 'khor los srog dang thur
T02D1197:126a-26: sel 'gog pa yang phan tshun phyi dang nang 'khyud
T02D1197:126a-27: ni nges pa'o // // ngo // blta'o // pa'o
T02D1197:126a-28: // de ltar bsgom pa yang de dag gi sgyu
T02D1197:126a-29: ma lta bu gsal ba tsam nyid kyis te /
T02D1197:126a-30: gzhan du de kho na nyid 'di mos par bya ba ma yin no zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:126a-31: da ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i lta ba bstan
T02D1197:126a-32: pa'i phyir sngags med ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:126a-33: gsungs te / 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sngags zhes pa la /
T02D1197:126a-34: sngags ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D1197:126a-35: de'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1197:126a-36: dbyibs dang byang chub sems dang rlung ngo //
T02D1197:126a-37: de la dbyibs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1197:126a-38: sngags dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:126a-39: de yang yid skyob pa'i don gyis de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:126a-40: de bzhin du byang chub sems kyi dbye ba gnyis te /
T02D1197:126a-41: gcig ni lus la dbyibs kyi rtsa'o //
T02D1197:126a-42: de bzhin du byang chub sems rgyu ba'i dus su gang rnal mar brjod pa de'o //
T02D1197:126a-43: de bzhin du rlung yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1197:126a-44: gcig ni don dam pa'i srog go //
T02D1197:126a-45: de bzhin du gnyis pa ni de rgyu ba'i phyir snal ma dang snal ma med pa ste /
T02D1197:126a-46: sbas pa nyid kyi yan lag drug gi sbyor bas shes pa'o //
T02D1197:126a-48: bsgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis so zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:126a-49: lha yang med ces pa ni don dam par rang
T02D1197:126b-0: rig pa'i ye @126b shes kyi lha de yang med
T02D1197:126b-4: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:126b-5: de ltar ma yin na der ci zhig rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D1197:126b-6: spros pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:126b-7: 'dir spros pa med pa las bzlog pa bsgom par kun du 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1197:126b-8: de bzhin du 'khrul pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma
T02D1197:126b-9: yin pa chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin du yang
T02D1197:126b-10: bzhi pa las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi khams so
T02D1197:126b-11: // de dag gnyis med pa ni spros pa med
T02D1197:126b-12: pa dmigs pa yang dag pa'i ye she bde ba
T02D1197:126b-13: chen po'i rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i rgyu thams cad chub
T02D1197:126b-14: bas na spros pa med pa'o //
T02D1197:126b-15: yang dag pa'i ye shes de nyid kyis kun nas
T02D1197:126b-16: nyon mongs pa'i sa bon thams cad zad pa'i phyir
T02D1197:126b-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sa bcu gsum pa
T02D1197:126b-18: zag pa med pas spros pa med pa 'od gsal
T02D1197:126b-19: ba'i ye shes zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:126b-20: de nyid sngags dang lha de'i bdag nyid du bzhugs zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:126b-21: sngags rnams las byung ba'i lha nyid sngags kyi lha ste /
T02D1197:126b-22: yan lag drug gi sbyor bas 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1197:126b-23: gang gi phyir sna tshogs pa de'i rang bzhin de'i bdag nyid ces pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:126b-24: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1197:126b-25: 'od gsal rang bzhin sna tshogs pa /
T02D1197:126b-27: de nyid 'od gsal bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:126b-29: 'on kyang sgyu ma ltar sangs rgyas //
T02D1197:126b-30: sems can rnams kyi lus su 'byung //
T02D1197:126b-31: snang ba yi ni rang bzhin chos //
T02D1197:126b-32: bstan nas de nyid du thim 'gyur //
T02D1197:126b-33: de ltar yid ces tshogs pa rnams //
T02D1197:126b-34: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa ni //
T02D1197:126b-35: yid ches pa ni 'ba' zhig tsam //
T02D1197:126b-36: sems can rnams ni bsgral ba'i rgyur //
T02D1197:126b-37: gang dang gang gi las kyis ni //
T02D1197:126b-38: sems can rnams ni bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:126b-39: de dang de yi lam nyid ni //
T02D1197:126b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan //
T02D1197:126b-41: lta ba drug la gnas pa ni //
T02D1197:126b-42: sems can de nyid 'dod gang dag / de rnams rang gi sems dbang gis //
T02D1197:126b-43: bstan pa de nyid ces su brjod //
T02D1197:126b-44: da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khyab bya dang
T02D1197:126b-45: khyab byed kyis de kho na nyid bstan pa brjod
T02D1197:126b-46: de 'dir dang po nyid du sangs rgyas pa rnams
T02D1197:126b-47: de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi gzugs kyis de'i rang
T02D1197:127a-0: bzhin @127a * // gyi bdag nyid rnams la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:127a-1: rnam snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:127a-2: rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa //
T02D1197:127a-3: rin chen dpag med sems dpa' rnams //
T02D1197:127a-4: zhes pa la dang gis ni don yod grub pa bzung ngo //
T02D1197:127a-5: sems dpa' zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:127a-6: de dang po brjod par 'dod pas gsungs pa /
T02D1197:127a-7: 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pur 'grub pa rtog
T02D1197:127a-8: pa thams cad kyi cho ga dang gzhan rnams su
T02D1197:127a-9: bar bar du ji ltar 'dod pa nges par sbyor
T02D1197:127a-10: ba'i phyir ro // de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las gsungs pa /
T02D1197:127a-11: sna tshogs cho ga 'dod rnams kyis //
T02D1197:127a-12: sna tshogs cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:127a-13: sems can rnams ni 'dul don du //
T02D1197:127a-14: bde ba thams cad rab grub phyir //
T02D1197:127a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1197:127a-16: de nyid rnam par snang mdzad shin tu stong pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:127a-17: des sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir der 'gog
T02D1197:127a-18: pa'i chos nyid la 'gog cing yongs su mya ngan
T02D1197:127a-19: las 'das pa de rnams ji srid rnam mkha'i mthar
T02D1197:127a-20: thug par gzhug par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
T02D1197:127a-21: pas bskul lo // de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa /
T02D1197:127a-22: de nyid bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba //
T02D1197:127a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1197:127a-24: rnam thar thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02D1197:127a-26: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
T02D1197:127a-27: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1197:127a-28: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba //
T02D1197:127a-29: snying rje thabs kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:127a-30: de phyir snying rje bcas pa'i thabs //
T02D1197:127a-31: shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal //
T02D1197:127a-32: rnam par mi rtog lhag mos pas //
T02D1197:127a-33: rtog pa thams cad brtag par bya //
T02D1197:127a-34: rnam par mi rtog chos rnams la /
T02D1197:127a-35: sems can don ni yongs su brtags //
T02D1197:127a-36: brag ca sgra ni lta bu ru //
T02D1197:127a-37: chos kyi gsungs ni blta bar bya //
T02D1197:127a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1197:127a-39: de ltar 'gro ba'i don bsgrub pa mchog mnyam pa
T02D1197:127a-40: med pa rtag tu snang bar byed pa brtse ba
T02D1197:127a-41: chen po'i bdag nyid snying rje mi 'dor ba 'dis
T02D1197:127a-43: de nyid mi bskyod rdo rjer kun du 'byung ste /
T02D1197:127a-44: shin tu gdug cing gtum la drag pa'i sems can
