T02D1197:127b-9: srid pa gsum ni rlog par byed //
T02D1197:127b-10: legs pa rnams ni zad byed cing /
T02D1197:127b-11: lha la sogs pas skyo bar byed //
T02D1197:127b-12: bstan pa rnams ni 'joms par byed //
T02D1197:127b-13: de'i phyir dbang bo dang bcas pa //
T02D1197:127b-14: tshangs pa la sogs pa la brten //
T02D1197:127b-15: de rnams kyi skyabs la nye bar brten to ;
T02D1197:127b-16: / tshangs pa la sogs pa de rnams kyang rdo rje 'dzin la skyabs su 'gro'o //
T02D1197:127b-17: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1197:127b-18: de'i phyir dbang por bcas pa'i lha //
T02D1197:127b-19: tshangs pa la ni nye bar brten //
T02D1197:127b-20: tshangs pa dbang por bcas pa'i lha //
T02D1197:127b-21: khyab 'jug la ni skyabs su song //
T02D1197:127b-22: tshangs pa dang ni khyab 'jug lha //
T02D1197:127b-23: lha chen po la nye bar brten //
T02D1197:127b-24: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che //
T02D1197:127b-25: rdo rje can la skyabs su song //
T02D1197:127b-27: de'i phyir mi bskyod rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
T02D1197:127b-28: dpal he ru ka la sogs pa drag po'i gzugs snying rje chen po can mngon du mdzad do //
T02D1197:127b-29: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i
T02D1197:127b-30: sbyor ba shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1197:127b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad dang khro bo la sogs pa
T02D1197:127b-32: 'dus par bya'o // de rnams kyang rdo rje 'chang
T02D1197:127b-33: gi bka' tsam gyis 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'dus pas
T02D1197:127b-34: khams gsum yang nges par bsreg go //
T02D1197:127b-35: gang phyir sangs rgyas kun byon na //
T02D1197:127b-36: gzhan dag smos lta ci zhig dgos //
T02D1197:127b-37: shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la //
T02D1197:127b-38: zhi ba nyid ni nyer mi sbyar //
T02D1197:127b-39: sangs rgyas kun nam ci yang rung //
T02D1197:127b-40: khams gsum pa ni khyad par nyid //
T02D1197:127b-41: de nas sna yi rtse mo ru //
T02D1197:127b-42: yid kyis brtan por gzung bar bya //
T02D1197:127b-43: sna yi dbugs ni spro bsdus pas //
T02D1197:127b-44: phyag rgya'i sbyor bas rgyal ba ni //
T02D1197:127b-45: he ru ka sogs spro bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:127b-46: de ltar yang glegs bam la lar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1197:127b-47: de nyid bcom ldan 'das sbyor bas //
T02D1197:127b-48: rdo rje khro bo rnam par spro //
T02D1197:127b-49: he ru ka dpal drag chen po //
T02D1197:128a-4: dur khrod kyi ni me lta bu //
T02D1197:128a-6: thod pa dag ni cod phan bcings //
T02D1197:128a-7: 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag / dur khrod lta bur 'jigs shing gtum //
T02D1197:128a-8: drag po la sogs nyams sbyor bas //
T02D1197:128a-9: sna tshogs zhal ni rnam par 'khor //
T02D1197:128a-10: de ni rnam 'khor smin ma gnyer //
T02D1197:128a-11: mar me 'od ltar gar byed pas //
T02D1197:128a-12: drag po'i dbang po nye dbang po //
T02D1197:128a-13: zla ba nyi ma gshin rjer bcas //
T02D1197:128a-14: srid pa gsum ni nye bar 'bar //
T02D1197:128a-16: rdo rje ra bcas shing kha tv'am bcas //
T02D1197:128a-17: dril bu ra sil sil sgra sgrogs pas //
T02D1197:128a-18: yang dag phab nas slar thams cad //
T02D1197:128a-19: thal bar song ba de yang 'tshe //
T02D1197:128a-21: grib ma mchog tu rno ba'o //
T02D1197:128a-22: bdud la sogs pa ma lus spro //
T02D1197:128a-23: bdud kyi khrag ni gsol bar spyod //
T02D1197:128a-24: de rnams lhan cig rgyal po ni //
T02D1197:128a-25: dur khrod du ni thal bar byed //
T02D1197:128a-26: thams cad rdo rje mnyam par sbyor //
T02D1197:128a-28: shin tu gdug cing drag po gtum //
T02D1197:128a-29: sems can khams ni rnam dag nyid //
T02D1197:128a-30: sangs rgyas zhing ni dag rnams su //
T02D1197:128a-31: sangs rgyas byang chub la ni bzhugs //
T02D1197:128a-32: rdo rje can 'dod khro sogs kyis //
T02D1197:128a-33: rtog pa thams cad bla med pas //
T02D1197:128a-34: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par //
T02D1197:128a-35: sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs //
T02D1197:128a-36: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:128a-37: de nyid ni rin chen po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1197:128a-38: 'dir shin tu gdug cing brkam pa nges sems can
T02D1197:128a-39: thams cad 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro
T02D1197:128a-40: // shin tu ser sna che ba des kyang sems can rnams dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:128a-41: der yang shin sa yang dbul ches par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:128a-42: de'i phyir ltogs pa dang skoms pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:128a-43: nyes pa rnams kyi pha rol gyi rdzas 'phrog pa
T02D1197:128a-44: de rnams 'dul ba'i don du de ltar bcom ldan
T02D1197:128a-46: de nyid bcom ldan 'das sbyor bas //
T02D1197:128a-47: don dam pa ni nor chen po //
T02D1197:128a-48: shin tu gdug pa dag don //
T02D1197:128a-50: nam mkha'i snying po kun gyi bdag / bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed //
T02D1197:128b-0: @128b mkha' las btsun mo sogs rin chen //
T02D1197:128b-1: rin chen thams cad sgyur byed pa //
T02D1197:128b-2: shin tu gdug cing gtum rnams la //
T02D1197:128b-3: zhi ba nyid ni nyer sbyin min //
T02D1197:128b-4: shes rab thabs dngos nyi mas ni //
T02D1197:128b-5: sgrub po thams cad gdung bar byed //
T02D1197:128b-6: byed pa dang ni gzung ba dang //
T02D1197:128b-7: 'phrog po yi ni khyad par nyid //
T02D1197:128b-8: 'di don thams cad rnam par bsam //
T02D1197:128b-10: khams gsum rnam par rgyal sogs kyi //
T02D1197:128b-11: rtog pa kun gyi bla med pas //
T02D1197:128b-12: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par //
T02D1197:128b-13: sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs //
T02D1197:128b-14: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:128b-15: de nyid 'jig rten mgon po ste //
T02D1197:128b-16: de bzhin du padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1197:128b-17: log pa'i lta ba la chags pa dang /
T02D1197:128b-18: de bzhin du mu stegs pa la sogs pa gzhan yang ngo //
T02D1197:128b-19: des sems can thams cad bskyed de /
T02D1197:128b-20: de yis kyang shin tu gdug cing mi bzad pas
T02D1197:128b-21: du 'bod chen po rnams su ltung bar 'gyur ro
T02D1197:128b-22: // de rnams kyi yang rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1197:128b-23: de nyid bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba //
T02D1197:128b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam dag phyir //
T02D1197:128b-25: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin sbyor //
T02D1197:128b-26: rdo rje chos ni rab tu gnas //
T02D1197:128b-28: 'dod chags dri mas mi gos te //
T02D1197:128b-29: de bzhin bag chags skyon rnams ni //
T02D1197:128b-30: sna tshogs kyis dag khams gsum pa //
T02D1197:128b-31: de la kun du ba ltas pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:128b-32: dbang phyug dag gi rgyal bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:128b-33: dpal ldan kun du gzigs dbang phyug / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1197:128b-34: 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02D1197:128b-35: bcom ldan mchog ni ster ba'i mchog / sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs dang ni //
T02D1197:128b-36: sna tshogs 'dul ba'i spro ba yi //
T02D1197:128b-37: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po //
T02D1197:128b-40: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1197:128b-41: dpal ldan gar gyi dbang sogs kyis /
T02D1197:128b-42: rtog pa kun ni bla med pas //
T02D1197:128b-43: nam mkha'i khams ni mthar thug par //
T02D1197:128b-44: sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs //
T02D1197:128b-46: de bzhin du de nyid dang gi rta mchog tu bzung ste /
T02D1197:128b-47: shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa'i phyir de las sems can thams cad bskyed par 'gyur te //
T02D1197:129a-1: brtson 'grus dman pa de sa mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:129a-2: de rnams kyis brtson 'grus thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1197:129a-3: rta mgrin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i tshig brjod de /
T02D1197:129a-4: de nyid bcom ldan sbyor ba ste //
T02D1197:129a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1197:129a-6: dpal ldan rta yi sbyor cho gas //
T02D1197:129a-8: thams cad dag par mos pa yis //
T02D1197:129a-10: thams cad gnon pa nyid kyis ni //
T02D1197:129a-11: 'jig rten thams cad rab gzir bya //
T02D1197:129a-12: sems can khams ni sna tshogs par //
T02D1197:129a-13: shin tu gdug cing mi bzad gtum //
T02D1197:129a-14: byi byed chom po gsod byed pa //
T02D1197:129a-15: thams cad de ltar rnam sbyang bya //
T02D1197:129a-16: dor thabs dang ni rgyud nyid kyis //
T02D1197:129a-17: rab bsgrubs stobs dang ldan de bzhin //
T02D1197:129a-18: mtshon cha lnga dang nye mtshon ldas //
T02D1197:129a-19: 'jig rten kun las rgyal de tshe //
T02D1197:129a-20: 'gro ba brtan dang g-yo ba ni //
T02D1197:129a-21: ma lus sna tshogs pa ni 'grub //
T02D1197:129a-22: sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs rnams kyis //
T02D1197:129a-23: rgyal srid chags pa rjes su bskyang //
T02D1197:129a-25: drag po rnams la drag por 'gyur //
T02D1197:129a-26: zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:129a-27: gzhi rnams kyang ni rnam par gnon //
T02D1197:129a-28: dbang phyug dam pa gnas par bya //
T02D1197:129a-30: 'jigs pa'i lha mo bkug nas ni //
T02D1197:129a-31: rang nyid nye ba'i longs sbyor spyod //
T02D1197:129a-32: khyab 'jug yang dag par mnan par //
T02D1197:129a-33: rab bsgrubs stobs kyis de mi 'gro //
T02D1197:129a-34: dpa' mo yang dag bkug nas ni //
T02D1197:129a-35: rang gi nye ba'i longs spyod //
T02D1197:129a-36: skye dgu'i bdag po yang dag gnas //
T02D1197:129a-38: rab zhi lha mo yang dag mnan //
T02D1197:129a-39: rang ni nye ba'i longs spyod spyod //
T02D1197:129a-40: 'dod pa'i lha ni yang dag mnan //
T02D1197:129a-41: rab bsgrubs stobs kyis de mi 'gro //
T02D1197:129a-42: dga' ma brtse brtan dbang phyug ma //
T02D1197:129a-43: yang dag bkug nas nyer longs spyod //
T02D1197:129a-44: de sogs mtha' med dang po ni //
T02D1197:129a-45: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02D1197:129a-46: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par //
T02D1197:129a-47: rdo rje bu mo mchog ni gnod //
T02D1197:129a-48: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02D1197:129a-49: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bzhugs //
T02D1197:129a-50: bsgrubs pa'i rta yi sbyor ba yi //
T02D1197:129b-0: skyes bu @129b gzhon nu'i sgrub thabs kyis //
T02D1197:129b-1: ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal po //
T02D1197:129b-2: rdo rje 'dzin bcas yang dag thob //
T02D1197:129b-3: byang chub sems ni mtha' med brtse //
T02D1197:129b-4: btsan thabs sbyor bas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1197:129b-5: thams cad bdag la mos pa yis //
T02D1197:129b-6: bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de mi 'gro //
T02D1197:129b-7: pha rol stobs ni mnan pa yis //
T02D1197:129b-8: sangs rgyas kyang chub rab brnyes byas //
T02D1197:129b-9: bdud med dka' spyod kyis bsgrub cing //
T02D1197:129b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po //
T02D1197:129b-11: de yi sbyor ba'i bdag nyid thob //
T02D1197:129b-13: sems can khams ni sna tshogs pa //
T02D1197:129b-14: ma lus pa ni mngon du bya //
T02D1197:129b-15: bdud med dka' spyod byang chub pa //
T02D1197:129b-16: sems can rnams la gnas brtan ster //
T02D1197:129b-17: ma lus lus pa med pa yi //
T02D1197:129b-18: rtog pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur //
T02D1197:129b-19: rta yi mchog gi rnam 'phrul gyis //
T02D1197:129b-20: sems can don ni thams cad byed //
T02D1197:129b-21: de phyir dpal ldan rta sogs kyis //
T02D1197:129b-22: rtog pa kun ni bla med pas //
T02D1197:129b-23: nam mkha'i khams ni mthar thug par //
T02D1197:129b-24: sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs //
T02D1197:129b-25: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:129b-26: de sogs mtha' med dang po ni //
T02D1197:129b-27: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'o //
T02D1197:129b-28: chos kyi ye shes rang byung ba //
T02D1197:129b-29: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02D1197:129b-30: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bzhugs //
T02D1197:129b-31: thams cad bag nyid rab tu 'jug / dngos grub dbang phyug rab tu ster //
T02D1197:129b-32: de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba
T02D1197:129b-33: drug gi tshul gyis chos ston pa ni de bzhin
T02D1197:129b-36: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad la //
T02D1197:129b-37: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog //
T02D1197:129b-39: shes dang shes bya bdag po mchog / ces sgyu
T02D1197:129b-40: 'phrul dra bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i tshig
T02D1197:129b-41: gis so // yang na don dam pa'i bden pa
T02D1197:129b-42: 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid de nyid rnam par snang
T02D1197:129b-43: gis so // mdzad de / snang ba tsam nyid
T02D1197:129b-44: kyis snang ba gsum mthong ba'i phyir snang ba tsam
T02D1197:129b-45: de bstan pa'i phyir snang ba med pa'i gzugs su
T02D1197:129b-46: gis so // mdzad de / 'gyur ro // de nyid mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1197:129b-47: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:129b-48: de nyid don yod grub pa ste /
T02D1197:129b-49: don sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:129b-50: de nyid rin po che ste /
T02D1197:130a-1: rgyas thams cad kyi chos rnams rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:130a-2: de nyid ni 'od dpag med de /
T02D1197:130a-3: de rnams kyis bdag yang dag par yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:130a-4: de ltar ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1197:130a-6: ye shes nam mkha' lta bu mi g-yo ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:130a-7: da ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i chos kyis tshangs
T02D1197:130a-8: pa la sogs pa'i longs spyod la brten pa'i sems
T02D1197:130a-9: can rnams 'dul ba bstan ba'i phyir /
T02D1197:130a-10: tshangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:130a-11: 'dir sngon du gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la sogs pa ni brten pa'o //
T02D1197:130a-12: de yang tshangs pa la sogs pa rten du gyur
T02D1197:130a-13: pa nyid kyis na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i don
T02D1197:130a-15: tshangs sogs lha dang lha dang lha ma yin //
T02D1197:130a-16: de la brten par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1197:130a-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:130a-18: de ltar tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha ba lnga rim pa bzhin rtogs par bya ba'o //
T02D1197:130a-19: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1197:130a-20: tshangs ba zhes pa ni tshangs pa'i lta ba'o //
T02D1197:130a-21: de bzhin du khyab 'jug gi lta ba dang zhi byed kyi lta ba'o //
T02D1197:130a-22: kun zhes pa ni gcer bu'i lta ba'o //
T02D1197:130a-23: rnam rtog ces pa ni 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i lta ba'o //
T02D1197:130a-24: gang dag lta ba de rnams la gnas pa de dag ni de'i lta bar 'gyur te ;
T02D1197:130a-25: de thams cad kyang de kho na nyid 'dod pa'o //
T02D1197:130a-26: 'on kyang mi dge ba'i grogs kyi dbang gis dmyal
T02D1197:130a-27: ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo
T02D1197:130a-28: // 'dir de bzhin du de rnams kyang sngon log pa'i chos la sems kyis rtog go //
T02D1197:130a-29: de las sems can rnams byung ba'i phyir lta ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
T02D1197:130a-30: de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1197:130a-31: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lus rnams su 'khrung bar
T02D1197:130a-32: 'gyur ro // des na sems can sngon gyi las
T02D1197:130a-33: kyi rjes su 'brangs pa rnams la chos ston to
T02D1197:130a-34: 'gyur ro // // de rnams kyang gcig la gcig gis rjes su 'brang ngo //
T02D1197:130a-35: de ltar thams cad kyis de kho na nyid ces brjod do //
T02D1197:130a-37: de kho na nyid brjod ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:130a-38: ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brten
T02D1197:130a-39: par mi byed pa de srid du 'gro ba rigs
T02D1197:130a-41: gang gi phyir de 'dir gsungs pa //
T02D1197:130a-42: tshangs pa mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas //
T02D1197:130b-0: zhes pa ni @130b sems can gang dag tshangs pa'i
T02D1197:130b-1: ye shes 'dod pa de rnams kyi mya ngan las
T02D1197:130b-2: 'das pa zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D1197:130b-3: lam bstan pa'o // de yang sangs rgyas zhes pa
T02D1197:130b-4: ni shin tu rnam par dag pa rtogs pa'i rang
T02D1197:130b-5: bzhin gyi phyir 'di ni sangs rgyas te de kho
T02D1197:130b-6: na nyid de bzhin du bram ze mchog gi lam
T02D1197:130b-8: ci rigs byed la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:130b-9: mngon sum du spyod pa ma yin nam /
T02D1197:130b-10: gsungs pa de ni bden mod /
T02D1197:130b-11: 'on kyang gdul dka' ba la sogs pa'i sems can
T02D1197:130b-12: rnams gdul ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas thabs
T02D1197:130b-13: kyi sgo nas sprul pa sprul te bya ba byed
T02D1197:130b-15: sems can gang dang gang gi ni //
T02D1197:130b-16: sems ni dngos po la reg pas //
T02D1197:130b-17: sems can de dang de yi ni //
T02D1197:130b-18: gzugs dang mthun la brten pa yin //
T02D1197:130b-19: las dang rigs dang bya de bzhin //
T02D1197:130b-21: 'dir las ni bzo sna tshogs kyi las dang /
T02D1197:130b-22: bzo ma yin pa'i las so //
T02D1197:130b-23: rigs ni rigs drug cu rtsa drug gi khyad par
T02D1197:130b-24: te tshong pa dang phreng rgyud ma la sogs pa
T02D1197:130b-25: rnams so // de bzhin bram ze la sogs pa rigs bzhi'am rus so //
T02D1197:130b-26: bya ba zhes pa ni sems can 'di rnams kyi
T02D1197:130b-27: rang rang gi las dang rjes su mthun pas bya
T02D1197:130b-28: ba sna tshogs pa chos dang chos ma yin pa
T02D1197:130b-30: de ltar las la sogs pa gsum la brten te
T02D1197:130b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa rten par mdzad pa'i gzugs kyi
T02D1197:130b-32: thabs gdul bya'i don du mdzad de /
T02D1197:130b-33: rgyal po la sogs pa'i chad pas ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:130b-34: de'i phyir rig byed la sogs pa'i mu stegs kyi
T02D1197:130b-35: chos kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pas skabs su
T02D1197:130b-36: bstan su bstan pa la nyes pa ci yod /
T02D1197:130b-37: gang phyir sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs //
T02D1197:130b-38: gzugs byas nas ni de nyid du //
T02D1197:130b-39: snying rje'i ro la dmigs nas su //
T02D1197:130b-40: de bzhin gshegs pas de nyid gsungs //
T02D1197:130b-43: ces pa ni mngon du gsungs pa'i sems can rnams
T02D1197:130b-44: de'i bdag nyid kyis rang rang gi chos la 'jug
T02D1197:130b-45: pa'i phyir dang / phyis zab pa'i chos bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:130b-46: bi sha'i skad dbyings la bi sha pra be sha ste /
T02D1197:130b-48: zhi byed rtag tu dge ba yin //
T02D1197:130b-49: zhes pa ni de ltar zhi byed nyid kyis dus
T02D1197:130b-50: thams cad du dge ba ster bar byed pa ni
T02D1197:130b-51: thar ba ster zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:131a-2: kun ni thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs //
T02D1197:131a-3: zhes pa ni de ltar gcer bu ba'i rigs drug
T02D1197:131a-4: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i chos rnams la gnas
T02D1197:131a-5: shing de rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi chos de ston
T02D1197:131a-6: par byed pa la gnas te /
T02D1197:131a-7: de'i lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'jug cing rig par byed pa nyid la gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:131a-8: de bzhin du bde ba dam pas de kho na
T02D1197:131a-9: chub pas rnams par rtog par bzhed ces pas ni
T02D1197:131a-10: 'jig rten rgyang pan gyi gzhung lugs rnams la de'i
T02D1197:131a-11: gzugs la brten te des bstan pas rnam par rtog
T02D1197:131a-14: bde ba dam pa zhes pa ni stong pa dang
T02D1197:131a-15: snying rje dbyer med pa nyid kyis ni de kho
T02D1197:131a-16: na nyid de / de rtogs par 'dod pa ni
T02D1197:131a-17: gzhan rnams la ston par byed pas lam la 'dzud
T02D1197:131a-19: 'on kyang da ltar gyi mu stegs la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:131a-20: sems can rnams kyi mu stegs pa'i ye shes gsal
T02D1197:131a-21: ba'i don du rtog pa brgyad pa'i rab tu byed
T02D1197:131a-22: pa gnyis par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02D1197:131a-23: bdag gis kyang de nyid du cung zad bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:131a-24: de ltar lta ba drug bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:131a-25: yang na phyi dang nang du rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1197:131a-26: la sogs pa 'khor lo drug gi dbye bas rnam
T02D1197:131a-28: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad ni lte ba'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo ste /
T02D1197:131a-30: mi bskyod pa ni snying ga'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo ste /
T02D1197:131a-32: de bzhin du 'od dpag med ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo ste /
T02D1197:131a-34: don yod grub pa ni dpral ba'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo ste /
T02D1197:131a-36: rin chen 'byung ldan ni gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i gtso bo ste /
T02D1197:131a-38: sems dpa' can ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo ste /
T02D1197:131a-40: de rnams kyang grangs bzhin du tshangs pa ni lte bar ro //
T02D1197:131a-42: zhi byed ni mgrin par ro //
T02D1197:131a-43: thams cad ni dpral bar ro //
T02D1197:131a-44: rnam par rtog ni gtsug tor du'o //
T02D1197:131a-45: de nyid ni gsang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:131a-46: kun rdzob tu dri chen la sogs pa thams cad
T02D1197:131a-47: 'og tu 'bab pas khams drug zad par rtogs par
T02D1197:131a-48: bya'o // don dam par ni yang thams cad steng du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:131b-0: tshangs pa mya ngan 'das @131b sangs rgyas //
T02D1197:131b-2: dri chen gyi khams mi 'dzag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:131b-3: 'jug pas khyab 'jug ces pa ni dri chu'i khams 'dzag pa 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:131b-4: brjod ces pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:131b-5: de bzhin du zhi byed ces pa ni khu ba 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:131b-6: de yang rtag tu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i dge ba byed pas sangs rgyas zhes pa ste /
T02D1197:131b-7: gzhan ni ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:131b-8: thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs zhes pa ni don yod grub pa ste srog gi rlung ngo //
T02D1197:131b-9: de yang rtsa rnams thams cad kyi bdag nyid khams
T02D1197:131b-10: sum cu drug po de rnams la khyab par byed
T02D1197:131b-11: pa'i rlung ste de mi zad pa'i phyir 'du byed
T02D1197:131b-12: med pa'o // de yang thams cad kyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:131b-13: ye shes dang rnam par shes pa ro gcig par
T02D1197:131b-14: gyur pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:131b-15: chub pas rnam par rtog par bzhed //
T02D1197:131b-16: ces pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
T02D1197:131b-17: khrag gi khams de 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir sdug bsngal med pa'o //
T02D1197:131b-18: de med pa'i phyir bde ba dang sdug bsngal mthar
T02D1197:131b-19: byed pa de rtogs pa'i phyir lha'i mig la sogs
T02D1197:131b-20: pas gzhan gyi sems shes pa la khyab pa'i phyir
T02D1197:131b-21: rnam par rtog pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:131b-23: bde ba dam pas de kho na nyid ces pa
T02D1197:131b-24: ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba dmigs pa
T02D1197:131b-25: med pa zad pa med pa stong pa nyid mtshan
T02D1197:131b-26: ma med pa smon pa med pa mngon par 'du
T02D1197:131b-27: ma byas pa / rnam par thar pa bzhi gcig
T02D1197:131b-28: pa'i bzhin snying rje la sogs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:131b-29: can dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs
T02D1197:131b-30: pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas
T02D1197:131b-31: ma byas pa / zhes brjod de // de ltar
T02D1197:131b-32: gang ye shes kyis dmigs pas sems dang sems las
T02D1197:131b-33: byung ba gnyis su med pa ni de kho na
T02D1197:131b-35: de gang la yod pa'i lha de ni de kho na nyid ces brjod do //
T02D1197:131b-37: lus las byung ba nyid kyi phyir //
T02D1197:131b-38: lha zhes bya bar brjod pa yin //
T02D1197:131b-39: zhes pa ni 'dir sngon du gsungs pa'i lha'i 'khor
T02D1197:131b-40: lo drug gi tshul gyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi
T02D1197:131b-41: lus las mi 'dzag pa'i phyir rdo rje lus so
T02D1197:131b-42: // de las byung pa ni gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1197:131b-43: ye shes stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med
T02D1197:131b-44: pa'i bdag nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems shes rab
T02D1197:131b-45: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid bdag med pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:131b-46: rdo rje 'chang gi sku de nyid blta'o //
T02D1197:132a-1: phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pas brjod ces pa ni
T02D1197:132a-2: dmigs pa de'i rang bzhin du bya zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:132a-3: to // yang 'chang bzhin pa'i pho nya mo bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid du sangs rgyas 'khrungs te /
T02D1197:132a-4: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i yang dag par sbyor
T02D1197:132a-5: bas ma'i lto bar sngon gyi lus 'ongs pa de'i
T02D1197:132a-6: phyir kun rdzob kyi bden par dgongs so //
T02D1197:132a-7: 'di la skal pa yod pa zhes pa ni dmigs
T02D1197:132a-8: pa sngon du 'gro ba de gang la yod pa
T02D1197:132a-9: de ni sangs rgyas kyi skal pa rig pa nyid
T02D1197:132a-10: de kun rdzob dang don dam pa de'i skal pa
T02D1197:132a-11: dang ldan pa de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1197:132a-12: phyir ro // gsungs zhes pa ni shes par bya //
T02D1197:132a-14: dbang phyug la sogs yon tan ni //
T02D1197:132a-15: skal ba rnam pa drug du bshad //
T02D1197:132a-16: ces pa ni 'dir skal pa'i sgra ni rnam pa drug ste /
T02D1197:132a-17: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
T02D1197:132a-18: dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang //
T02D1197:132a-19: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //
T02D1197:132a-20: drug po de la ldan zhes brjod //
T02D1197:132a-21: de ltar yon tan gyi khyad par gyis ji lta
T02D1197:132a-22: ba'i dus kyis 'khor lo drug rnams su ji lta
T02D1197:132a-23: ba'i rim pas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:132a-24: yang na nyon mongs la sogs bcom //
T02D1197:132a-25: zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i tshangs pa la
T02D1197:132a-26: sogs pa'i lta ba la gnas pa 'dod chags dang
T02D1197:132a-27: zhes dang dang gti mug la sogs pas spags pa'i
T02D1197:132a-28: sems can de rnams kyi bag chags 'joms pa'i phyir
T02D1197:132a-30: yang na bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad sbangs pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:132a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrar brjod do //
T02D1197:132a-32: da ni 'khor lo drug rnams su spro ba dang
T02D1197:132a-33: bsdu ba'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis
T02D1197:132a-34: rnams kyi bskyed bya dang skyed byed kyi dbang gis
T02D1197:132a-35: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa las bskyed
T02D1197:132a-36: pa'i rim pas bskyed pa brjod de /
T02D1197:132a-37: 'gro ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:132a-38: 'dir bskyed ma zhes pa ni ma'o //
T02D1197:132a-39: shes rab ces pa ni sngon gyi lte ba'i bu
T02D1197:132a-40: ga nas yod pa dang med pa nye bar mtshon
T02D1197:132a-41: pa'i phyir blo'o // phra bzhes pa ni rab kyi
T02D1197:132a-42: mthar thug pa song ba nyid kyis ni shes rab
T02D1197:132a-43: pa'i phyir blo'o // bo // de'i dzny'a zhes pa ni shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:132a-44: gang gi phyir dzny'a khong du chud par skad kyi dbyings nas brjod do //
T02D1197:132a-45: de la cung zad chags pa de'i sems de'i rang bzhin skyes pa ni yan lag ma ste /
T02D1197:132b-1: / gang gi phyir 'gro ba bskyed pas ma //
T02D1197:132b-2: zhes pa la gang gi phyir zhes pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:132b-3: sems can thams cad rnams kyi skyed par byed pa
T02D1197:132b-4: ni pha las 'ongs pa'i khu bar brjod do //
T02D1197:132b-5: de'i yang bskyed pa ni shes rab kyi rdul gyi khams so //
T02D1197:132b-8: las kyi sa byin gyis brlabs pa'i dri za'i sems can no //
T02D1197:132b-9: 'on kyang 'phags pa rnams kyis ni las bzang pos byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1197:132b-10: de bzhin du so so'i skye bo ni las ngan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1197:132b-11: de yang 'chi ba'i mthar rdzus te /
T02D1197:132b-12: skyes pa'i yan lag kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1197:132b-13: de yang 'dir 'gro ba zhes pa'i sgras brjod do //
T02D1197:132b-14: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum
T02D1197:132b-15: pa 'di dag ni sems tsam mo zhes gsungs pa'i
T02D1197:132b-16: phyir ro // de'i phyir 'gro ba'i sgra nyid ni 'gro ba bskyed pas shes pa'i rigs pas so //
T02D1197:132b-17: de ltar shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid ni rdul dang khu ba'i khams so //
T02D1197:132b-18: shes rab de nyid la sring mo zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:132b-19: cha shas du ma ston pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:132b-20: zhes pa ni khrag gi ba spu dang pags pa
T02D1197:132b-21: la sogs pa'i khams rnams 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid do
T02D1197:132b-22: // de bzhin du khu ba'i rtsa dang rkang la
T02D1197:132b-23: sogs pa'i khams rnams kyi cha shas 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D1197:132b-24: // ro // de ltar yang gsungs pa /
T02D1197:132b-25: ma las 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum //
T02D1197:132b-26: de bzhin pha las gyur pa gsum //
T02D1197:132b-27: drug gi sbubs can gong bu 'di //
T02D1197:132b-28: lus kyi khams su brtags pa yin //
T02D1197:132b-29: shes rab de nyid yon tan 'jo ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:132b-30: zhes pa la yon tan ni lnga ste /
T02D1197:132b-31: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul de rnams la
T02D1197:132b-32: de rnams 'jo ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:132b-34: yang na sngon du gsungs pa'i khu ba dang khrag
T02D1197:132b-35: las byung ba'i khams rnams thams cad padma'i rtsa ba'i
T02D1197:132b-36: snal ma bzhin ro mnyam par byed pa'i phyir de
T02D1197:132b-38: shes rab de la bu mo zhes brjod de nyon
T02D1197:132b-39: mongs pa'i phung po 'joms par byed cing lha'i phung
T02D1197:132b-40: po skyed pa'i ngang tshul can zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:132b-41: // khams de rnams thams cad kyi dbang po'i sgo nas skyed pa ni bu mo'o //
T02D1197:132b-42: de la re zhig dbang po drug dang /
T02D1197:132b-43: gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched drug go //
T02D1197:132b-44: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga gzung ba'i phyir sha'i spyan dang /
T02D1197:133a-4: de bzhin du sgra ni lnga ste /
T02D1197:133a-10: de bzhin du dri lnga ni sha la sogs pa'i dri dang /
T02D1197:133a-12: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba rang rig pa bde ba'i dri dang /
T02D1197:133a-15: de bzhin du rdo lnga ni sems can thams cad
T02D1197:133a-16: kyi ched du snying rje la sogs pa'i ro dang
T02D1197:133a-17: / dam pa'i chos kyi ro myang ba'i ro dang /
T02D1197:133a-18: bla ma'i man ngag gi dbang gis brtags pa'i bde ba'i ro dang /
T02D1197:133a-19: mchog gi bdun rtsis tshim pa'i ro dang ;
T02D1197:133a-21: de bzhin du reg bya la yang rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D1197:133a-22: dang po nyid du ma dang pha'i dbang gis kun du sbyor ba'i reg bya'o //
T02D1197:133a-23: da yang mngal du zhugs pa nas skyes pa la thug par myang ba'i reg bya'o //
T02D1197:133a-24: de bzhin du snying rjes phan pa'i sems can la
T02D1197:133a-25: dbang po'i shes pa la kun lta ba'i reg bya'o
T02D1197:133a-26: // phung po lnga la sogs pa nas khams sum
T02D1197:133a-27: cu rtsa drug 'jug pa'i mthar thug pas de rnams
T02D1197:133a-28: kyi so so tha dad par byang chub kyi phyogs
T02D1197:133a-29: kyi chos bskyed pa'i tshul gyis gnas dang nye ba'i
T02D1197:133a-30: gnas su rgyu ba des na 'chad bzhin pa'i rab
T02D1197:133a-31: tu byed pa gnyis par lta ba'i bde bskyed pa'i
T02D1197:133a-32: // reg bya'o // mya ngan las 'das pa'i reg bya ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1197:133a-34: 'di'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin gzugs drug pa dang /
T02D1197:133a-39: de dag thams cad drug pa chos kyi dbyings gnyis
T02D1197:133a-40: su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid de bzhin
T02D1197:133a-43: shes rab tshos mkhan ma zhes brjod //
T02D1197:133a-44: ces pa ni mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung bas tshos mkhan ma ste /
T02D1197:133a-45: de'i lus thams cad ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bsogs pa de nyid mthong ba ste /
T02D1197:133a-46: sems can thams cad 'tshed pas zhes pa dbang po
T02D1197:133a-47: la sogs pa'i lha dang mi la sogs pa rnams
T02D1197:133a-48: snying rjes chags pas 'tshed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:133a-49: tshos mkhan ma ni de bzhin brjod //
T02D1197:133a-50: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i'o //
T02D1197:133a-51: brjod pa ni nye bar mtshon par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1197:133a-52: brtse ba chen po g-yo bas na //
T02D1197:133a-53: shes rab gar mkhan ma zhes brjod //
T02D1197:133a-54: ces pa ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrungs pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:133b-0: gar @133b mkhan ma zhes pa ni chos ston pa'i
T02D1197:133b-1: sgo nas sems can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub
T02D1197:133b-2: kyi lam du gshegs rnas byang chub sgrubs te bdud
T02D1197:133b-3: bcom par mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol mo
T02D1197:133b-4: ni gar ro // de'i phyir shes rab de ni gar mkhan ma ste /
T02D1197:133b-5: sngon gyi byang chub kyi ro'i gar byed pa'i phyir
T02D1197:133b-6: rab kyi mthar song bas g-yo ba ni rtog pa
T02D1197:133b-7: spangs pa'i don du gnas med pa ni sbyor bas
T02D1197:133b-8: sems de nyid gnas med pa nyid de /
T02D1197:133b-9: ting nge 'dzin phul du song ba nyid kyis sems nyid sems med pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:133b-10: brtse ba chen po zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po la 'bod pa'o //
T02D1197:133b-11: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rdo rje snying
T02D1197:133b-12: po ste dbyer med pa'i ye shes las de bzhin
T02D1197:133b-14: dbyer med pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings kyi de ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:133b-15: de las mar me'i rtse mo lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje'i dbang gis byon pa'o //
T02D1197:133b-16: de'i phyir brtse ba chen po zhes pa bdag nyid la byed pa yin gyi /
T02D1197:133b-17: gzhan la ni ma yin zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:133b-18: de bzhin du shes rab de ni g-yung mo ste /
T02D1197:133b-19: gang gi phyir bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas bde ba sna tshogs pa'i 'gyur ba 'byung ste /
T02D1197:133b-21: de yang brjod du med pa'i phyir reg tu med pa'o //
T02D1197:133b-22: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rab tu bstan pa'i phyir yang g-yung mo'o //
T02D1197:133b-23: dim ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes pa 'dir skad kyi dbyings las brjod do //
T02D1197:133b-26: shes rab ma de nam mkhar 'gro ba'i don to //
T02D1197:133b-27: de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nam mkhar bstan
T02D1197:133b-28: pa gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das la de'i bdag
T02D1197:133b-29: nyid kyi blo gang la yod pa de la de
T02D1197:133b-30: skad ces bya'o // de bzhin du lte bar ma'o //
T02D1197:133b-34: gtsug tor du gar mkhan can ma'o //
T02D1197:133b-35: de bzhin du gsang bar g-yung mo'o //
T02D1197:133b-36: 'dir sdud pa las phyi ru spro ba'i rim pas bskyed pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:133b-37: de bzhin du ma gsungs kyang dgongs bshad gzhan gyi
T02D1197:133b-38: man ngag gis gnyen mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor
T02D1197:133b-39: ma drug rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1197:133b-40: / bzlas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:133b-41: 'dir bzlas pa'i yul gnyen mo shes rab ma'o //
T02D1197:133b-42: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi yul la bram ze mo shes rab ma'o //
T02D1197:134a-1: bya ba rnams la rgyal rigs ma'o //
T02D1197:134a-2: de bzhin du blang ba dang dor ba'i bya ba la rje'u rigs ma'i shes rab ma'o //
T02D1197:134a-3: de bzhin du bde ba'i las ni dmangs rigs ma'i shes rab ma'o //
T02D1197:134a-4: de bzhin du 'chi ba'i gnas skabs 'joms pa ni
T02D1197:134a-5: gtum mo'i shes rab ma zhes ba de nges pa'o
T02D1197:134a-6: // de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzlas pa zlos
T02D1197:134a-7: par bshad pa zhes pa ni gang dag gis brjod
T02D1197:134a-8: cing zlos pa de ni bzlas pa brjod de /
T02D1197:134a-9: dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi tshogs so //
T02D1197:134a-10: yang na srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor bas bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:134a-11: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:134a-12: rkang pas 'dri 'gyur zhes pa ni la la n'a
T02D1197:134a-13: dang ras n'i rtsa gnyis kyi srog mnan pa ni
T02D1197:134a-14: rkang pa'o // aa wa dh'u t'ir 'jug pa ni 'dri ba ste /
T02D1197:134a-16: 'gyur zhes pa ni nges par zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:134a-17: nyed phyir dkyil 'khor zhes byar brjod //
T02D1197:134a-18: ces pa la nyed pa ni rdul chags chen po
T02D1197:134a-19: rang rig pa'i ye shes mchog tu bde ba ste
T02D1197:134a-20: / des sna tshogs rgyas btab pa 'dis na dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1197:134a-21: rang dang gzhan kun rdzob pa dag cig pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:134a-22: de bzhin lag pa brkyang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:134a-23: lag pa ni sna tshogs 'dul ba'i 'od zer rnams te /
T02D1197:134a-24: de rnams kyi brkyang ba pa ni gsal bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:134a-25: phyag rgya zhes pa ni khams gsum sa rnams bdud
T02D1197:134a-26: rtsi'i ro rnams kyis tshim par byed pa'i phyir phyag
T02D1197:134a-27: rgya ste / sems can rnams kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid ces dgongs so //
T02D1197:134a-28: sor mo bskum pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1197:134a-29: zhes pa ni chos kyi bdud rtsi'i 'od zer rnams kyi bskum pa ni bskum pa ste /
T02D1197:134a-30: sems can thams cad rang gi ye shes kyis de rnams dang ro mnyam par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:134a-31: gang zhig bsam pa de bsam gtan zhes pa ni
T02D1197:134a-32: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi rim gyis
T02D1197:134a-33: rnam par gzhag par bya ste /
T02D1197:134a-34: gang zhig bsam pa de bsam gtan du gzung bar
T02D1197:134a-35: bya ba rnal 'byor ba'i sems kyis gzhan gyi sems
T02D1197:134a-37: gang phyir rnam bsam bsam gtan no //
T02D1197:134a-38: zhes pa ni gang gi phyir bsam du med pa
T02D1197:134a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med
T02D1197:134a-40: pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i lam zhes pa'i
T02D1197:134a-41: don to // 'on kyang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis
T02D1197:134a-42: gang bsam pa pha las thob pa'i bde ba gang
T02D1197:134b-0: zhas pa ni lnga pa'i don @134b la bdun pa'o
T02D1197:134b-1: don to // // pha las thob pa'i 'chi ba'i
T02D1197:134b-2: mthar bskyed pa'i bdag nyid bde ba 'dzag pa'i gnas
T02D1197:134b-3: skabs su myong ba'i bde ba de nyid lo bcu
T02D1197:134b-4: drug gi mthar skyas pa rang nyid kyis spyod do
T02D1197:134b-5: don to // // // bud med kyis kyang lo bcu gnyis mthar rang nyid kyis spyod do //
T02D1197:134b-6: gang gi phyir bde ba gang gi 'dir mi 'chi
T02D1197:134b-7: zhes pa ni 'dir 'khor ba pa rnams ni skad
T02D1197:134b-8: cig tsam gyi bde bas 'khor ba nas 'khor bar
T02D1197:134b-9: 'khor ro // blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni
T02D1197:134b-10: gang gi tshe bde ba nyid bstan par 'gyur ba
T02D1197:134b-11: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bsam gtan du
T02D1197:134b-12: 'khor ro // brjod do // gang gi phyir /
T02D1197:134b-13: bcom ldan bde ba'i rnam pa ste //
T02D1197:134b-14: bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid //
T02D1197:134b-15: 'dir ni bde las bde gzhan gyi //
T02D1197:134b-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes pa ni
T02D1197:134b-18: rgyud 'di'i brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:134b-19: ste go sla'o // sogs pa'i sgras ni bstan pa dang //
T02D1197:134b-20: ston pa la 'brel pa la sogs pa rnams ni sngon du gsungs so //
T02D1197:134b-21: de kho na nyid kyi rab tu byed ba zhes
T02D1197:134b-22: pa ni rtog pa bcu gcig gi mdor bsdus pa
T02D1197:134b-23: ste / de rnams la khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:134b-24: de kho na nyid ni dam pa'i don la 'jug pa'i don to //
T02D1197:134b-25: de ni rtog pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'byed pa'o //
T02D1197:134b-26: de yang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster bar
T02D1197:134b-27: byed pa rab kyi mthar 'gro ba'i phyir rab tu
T02D1197:134b-28: 'byed pa'o // de nyid dang po ste /
T02D1197:134b-29: dang po'i ming yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:134b-30: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:134b-31: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rab tu byed pa
T02D1197:134b-32: dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa yang dag par lta
T02D1197:134b-33: ba'i dran pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzhung mdor
T02D1197:134b-36: // / da ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
T02D1197:134b-37: sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam par 'grel ba bcom
T02D1197:134b-38: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:134b-39: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:134b-40: de nas zhes pa ni kho na nyid kyi rab
T02D1197:134b-41: tu byed pa'i rjes thogs su rab tu byed pa
T02D1197:134b-42: gnyis pa bshad ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:134b-43: yang na de nas zhes pa ni gcig gi tshig gi rigs te /
T02D1197:134b-44: rab tu byed pa dang po de'i don sna tshogs
T02D1197:134b-45: 'byed cing rtogs par byed pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya
T02D1197:134b-46: ba zhes pa'i tshad ma'i dag ces pa'i don to
T02D1197:134b-47: // 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sum
T02D1197:134b-48: cu rtsa bdun zhes pa ni 'dir byang chub kyi
T02D1197:134b-49: chos rnams ni phung po lnga dang /
T02D1197:135a-3: de la drug pa ye shes kyi phung po dang /
T02D1197:135a-5: ye shes kyi dbang po dang /
T02D1197:135a-7: de bzhin du ye shes kyi las kyi dbang po dang /
T02D1197:135a-9: de rnams la khyab par byed pa ni sum cu rtsa bdun pa ste /
T02D1197:135a-10: de yang chos can ye shes kyi khams zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:135a-11: de ltar chos rnams sum cu rtsa bdun te /
T02D1197:135a-12: chos de rnams kyi phyogs so //
T02D1197:135a-13: phyogs zhes pa ni yan lag ces brjod do //
T02D1197:135a-14: de'i yan lag la ga ni rnam gsum mam rnam pa mang por 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:135a-15: de thams cad bshad par bye zhes pa ni 'chad bzhin pa des rgyas par gsungs te /
T02D1197:135a-16: nang gi lus zhes pa la lus zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
T02D1197:135a-17: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1197:135a-18: de ni lus kyis nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1197:135a-20: gang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gtum mo'i tshogs pa
T02D1197:135a-21: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srog gi
T02D1197:135a-22: rlung gzung ba'i gnas der lus kyi rjes su lta
T02D1197:135a-23: ba zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes rang
T02D1197:135a-24: gi sems dang gnyis su med pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1197:135a-25: de yang sems can rnams la rab tu bstan pa ste /
T02D1197:135a-26: rang dbang thob pa'i sems can rnams 'khor lo can thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D1197:135a-27: rnam par spyod ces pa ni spros pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:135a-28: des na shes bzhin zhes pa dang gi sgra ni sdud pa'i don to //
T02D1197:135a-29: des shes bzhin ni yang dag par rab tu shes pa ste /
T02D1197:135a-30: lha'i dbang pos sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las shes pa'o //
T02D1197:135a-31: des na dran pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D1197:135a-32: rnam par gsal te zhes pa ni sngon du mngon
T02D1197:135a-33: shes thob pas rang las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D1197:135a-34: gdul bya de rnams des dran pa de'i bdag nyid
T02D1197:135a-35: kyis dran zhing rtogs pa'i don to //
T02D1197:135a-36: gang gi phyir rang gi bdag nyid las byung ba'i
T02D1197:135a-37: sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de
T02D1197:135a-38: rnams kyi ci zhig rnam par gsal zhes brjod de
T02D1197:135a-39: sa bon gyi khyad par las 'bras bu'i khyad par
T02D1197:135a-40: skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T02D1197:135a-41: ji ltar 'bras kyi myu gu las 'bras kyi 'bras bu 'byung gi khre ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:135a-42: 'di ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems kyi sa bon dang /
T02D1197:135a-43: las khyad par can las 'bras bu khyad par can
T02D1197:135a-44: skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'ga' zhig som nyi za
T02D1197:135a-45: bar 'gyur na / de la brjod pa de ni ma yin te /
T02D1197:135b-0: ma rig pa dang yid @135b mi bde ba zhes gsungs te /
T02D1197:135b-1: 'dir sngon nas 'khor bar skye par byed pa ni ma rig pa'o //
T02D1197:135b-2: des na sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog
T02D1197:135b-3: pa'i bag chags kyi nyes pa rnams kyis 'ching bar
T02D1197:135b-4: 'gyur ro // rtogs pa rnams kyis ni de rnam
T02D1197:135b-5: par bcom pa'i phyir bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur
T02D1197:135b-6: 'gyur ro // ro // 'on kyang sngon gyi las
T02D1197:135b-7: kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis ji srid du sangs
T02D1197:135b-8: rgyas su mi 'gyur ba de srid du 'khor ba'i
T02D1197:135b-9: bcings pa las grol bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D1197:135b-10: rang gi phung po la sogs pa'i sgrib pa rnams zad pa'i phyir grol bar brjod do //
T02D1197:135b-11: de ltar phan tshun zo chu'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin sems can gyi rigs grangs med pa dang /
T02D1197:135b-12: sangs rgyas kyi rigs grangs med pa rnams nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1197:135b-13: 'o na 'di ltar pha las bu skye bar 'gyur
T02D1197:135b-14: mod pa ni mkhas pa chen pa bya ba chos
T02D1197:135b-15: dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan
T02D1197:135b-16: la / de'i bu ni las ngan pa la dga'
T02D1197:135b-17: ba rmongs pa chos mi byed pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:135b-18: nyes pas gos pa dang ldan no //
T02D1197:135b-19: des na 'dir ma rig pa dang yid mi bde
T02D1197:135b-20: bas sems khyad par can rnams skyed par byed do
T02D1197:135b-21: // phyi'i lus la brten pa de thams cad nyes pas gos par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:135b-22: ji ltar me long gsal ba nyid la dngos po
T02D1197:135b-23: sna tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir de la gzugs brnyan
T02D1197:135b-24: snang bas gsal ba yang sngar gyi gzugs spangs nas
T02D1197:135b-26: 'on kyang 'dir lus dang ngag dang sems gsal ba rnams mi gsal bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:135b-27: des na skye bo la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos
T02D1197:135b-28: po sna tshogs pa mthong bas gsal ba'i sngon gyi
T02D1197:135b-29: gzugs spangs nas rmongs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:135b-30: de rnams btul ba'i rgyus de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes bzhin no //
T02D1197:135b-31: de rnams 'dul ba'i dus su yang de bzhin gshegs
T02D1197:135b-32: pa mthong ba'i phyir sems dran pa dang ldan par
T02D1197:135b-33: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du dus gsum rim pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:135b-34: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1197:135b-35: nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1197:135b-36: de yang sngon du gsungs so //
T02D1197:135b-37: de nas phyi'i lus rgyan gyi bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1197:135b-38: de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i lus ni 'jig rten gyi bsam pa byang chub sems dpa'i rigs so //
T02D1197:136a-0: de yang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i @136a * //
T02D1197:136a-2: de ltar gzugs kyi phung po rnams par snang mdzad
T02D1197:136a-3: kyi rigs sku gsum du rnam par gzhag pa'am yang
T02D1197:136a-4: na chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i
T02D1197:136a-5: sku'o zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:136a-6: da ni de bzhin du tshor ba rnam pa gsum bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:136a-7: nang gi tshor ba zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:136a-8: 'dir tshor ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
T02D1197:136a-9: de'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid kyi tshor ba ni rnam ba gsum mo //
T02D1197:136a-10: 'dir rin chen 'byung ldan ni rdul gyi khams so //
T02D1197:136a-11: de las byung ba ni tshor ba ste /
T02D1197:136a-12: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dag go //
T02D1197:136a-13: de la gang tshor ba bde ba ni nang gi bdag nyid do /
T02D1197:136a-14: des bde ba'i rnam pa'i bcom ldan 'das rang rig pa'i lus kyi bdag nyid ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:136a-15: des gang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje ste /
T02D1197:136a-16: ngag gi brjod pas chos mang po ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:136a-17: gang tshor ba bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba de ni sems can gyi rigs can gyi ste /
T02D1197:136a-18: dngos po'i tshogs pas gzhan gyis sems khong du chud pa de'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:136a-19: des na yang tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhes pa
T02D1197:136a-20: ni sems can de rnams la yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1197:136a-21: pa'i byang chub kyi lam rjes su ston pa'i tshor
T02D1197:136a-22: ba don mthun pa nyid kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po
T02D1197:136a-24: shes bzhin dang rnam par spyod ces pa la dang
T02D1197:136a-25: gi spyod ni sems can de rnams kyis yang dag
T02D1197:136a-26: pa'i lam shes nas spyod pa ste /
T02D1197:136a-27: kun rdzob dang dam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ji srid
T02D1197:136a-28: nam mkha'i mthar thug par sems can gyi don byed
T02D1197:136a-29: pa'o // ma rig pa dang yid mi bde ba
T02D1197:136a-30: zhes pa ni de ltar tshor ba rnam pa gsum
T02D1197:136a-32: tshor ba zhes pa gang zhe na /
T02D1197:136a-33: ma rig pa'i dbang gis tshor ba'o //
T02D1197:136a-34: de sad pa ni tshor ba bde ba'o //
T02D1197:136a-35: dran pa dang ldan ba ni rig pa bzang po skyed par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:136a-36: de ltar lus bzhi'i bdag nyid tshor ba ni tshor ba'i phung po'o //
T02D1197:136a-37: de'i yang dag par dran pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyis pa'o //
T02D1197:136a-38: de bzhin du chos rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:136a-39: nang gi chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:136a-40: 'dir lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid chos
T02D1197:136a-41: rnams kyi tshig gi lam gyis nges par gsungs shing
T02D1197:136b-0: bcom @136b ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to //
T02D1197:136b-1: de yang stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1197:136b-3: smon pa med pa'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1197:136b-4: de dag ni lung gzhan rnams las rgyas par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:136b-5: bdag gis ni gzhung rgyas pas 'jigs bas ma brjod do //
T02D1197:136b-6: 'on kyang man ngag gis brjod de /
T02D1197:136b-7: nang gi chos rnams zhes pa ni rtsa stong phrag
T02D1197:136b-8: bdun cu rtsa gnyis padma'i skud rtsa lta bu rnams
T02D1197:136b-9: la gang brten pa'i sems te /
T02D1197:136b-10: de yang chos can zhes brjod de rang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:136b-11: de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin gyis yul dang yul can
T02D1197:136b-12: rnams la lta ba'i chos ni nang gi chos rnams
T02D1197:136b-13: so // phyi'i chos rnams zhes pa ni de lta
T02D1197:136b-14: bu'i chos rnams la bltas pas dngos po sna tshogs
T02D1197:136b-16: de'i rang gi las kyi dbang gis dge ba 'am mi dge ba 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:136b-17: des dngos po sna tshogs pa bskyed de 'byung ba chen po'i bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
T02D1197:136b-18: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams dang byang chub
T02D1197:136b-19: sems dpa' rnams kyi tshor bas snga ma'i bag chags
T02D1197:136b-20: kyi dbang gis dge ba'i las kyis dam pa'i chos
T02D1197:136b-21: sna tshogs pa'i dngos po rnams la sems bskyed do
T02D1197:136b-22: // las des phyi ru bug ca bzhin chos ston to //
T02D1197:136b-24: ston pa dang klog pa dang /
T02D1197:136b-25: rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston to //
T02D1197:136b-26: de bzhin du dam pa'i chos sna tshogs ston pa'i glegs bam rnams sdud par byed pa dang /
T02D1197:136b-27: 'dzin par byed pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi
T02D1197:136b-28: pha rol tu phyin par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1197:136b-29: gsungs pa'i bka' thams cad byed do //
T02D1197:136b-30: de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la zhes
T02D1197:136b-31: pa ni 'dir chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje gang
T02D1197:136b-32: dag sna tshogs par sprul pa'i sems can de rnams
T02D1197:136b-33: kyi blo ngan pa'i nyes pa gzhom pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:136b-34: chos rnams la rjes su lta ba zhes pa ni
T02D1197:136b-35: rnam pa kun gyis mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa
T02D1197:136b-36: nyid kyi lam gyi rjes su lta ba'o //
T02D1197:136b-37: des na rgyas par yang chos ston pa'o //
T02D1197:136b-38: rnam par dpyod pa dang shes bzhin zhes pa ni
T02D1197:136b-39: de ltar sems can de rnams kyi bag chags tsam
T02D1197:136b-40: spang ba'i phyir btul zhes pa ni sngon bzhin du
T02D1197:136b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis
T02D1197:136b-43: ma rig pa dang yid mi bde ba zhes pa
T02D1197:136b-44: ni bdag tu 'dzin pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T02D1197:136b-45: la dmigs pa'i phyir ma rig pa'o //
T02D1197:137a-0: des na yid mi bde ba zhes @137a * //
T02D1197:137a-1: pa cung zad 'dod chags kyis g-yogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:137a-2: dran pa dang ldan pa zhes pa ni de'i phyir
T02D1197:137a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas sngon gyi gzugs spangs
T02D1197:137a-4: te / rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi rjes su dran pa'o //
T02D1197:137a-5: ji ltar nyi ma 'char bas padma kha bye ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:137a-6: de bzhin du ma rig pas g-yogs pas kyang sangs
T02D1197:137a-7: rgyas kyi nyi ma 'char ba mthong bas kha bye
T02D1197:137a-8: bar 'gyur ro // de ltar de rnams kyis yang
T02D1197:137a-9: dag pa'i lam rab tu she pas na shes bzhin
T02D1197:137a-10: bar 'gyur ro // no // 'jig rten gyi btul
T02D1197:137a-11: te zhes pa ni des las byung ba'i phyir ro
T02D1197:137a-12: bar 'gyur ro // no // // 'jig rten de las chos ston par byed do //
T02D1197:137a-13: des bag chags spangs pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas rang dang mnyam par byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:137a-14: de bzhin du rnams par spyod pa ni thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar ro //
T02D1197:137a-15: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thog mar dge
T02D1197:137a-16: ba bar du dge ba zhe bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:137a-17: pa gsungs pas dus gsum du dge ba la rnam
T02D1197:137a-18: par spyod do // de yang 'du shes kyi phung
T02D1197:137a-19: po 'dod dpag tu med pa'i chos de'i yan lag
T02D1197:137a-20: ni phyogs de yang byang chub de ni sgrub thabs
T02D1197:137a-21: ki phyir dran pa nyid bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o
T02D1197:137a-22: par spyod do // // bzhi pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
T02D1197:137a-23: nang gi sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:137a-24: 'dir sems ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1197:137a-25: de la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni nang gi sems so //
T02D1197:137a-26: phyi'i sems zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
T02D1197:137a-27: nang dang phyi'i sems zhes pa ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1197:137a-28: rnam par shes pa de rnams bkag pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:137a-29: gang nang gi sems de ni snang ba med pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1197:137a-30: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sngon du bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:137a-31: gang phyi'i sems de ni brdzun te /
T02D1197:137a-32: gang gi phyir sems las byung ba'i dngos po sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T02D1197:137a-33: de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi skul rnam par rig pa 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:137a-34: de'i phyir gang nang gi sems pa'i phyi'i sems sgrib
T02D1197:137a-35: pa med pa de ni dmigs pa med pa'i snying
T02D1197:137a-36: rje ste / sngon du rnam par shes pa 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:137a-37: ma rig pa dang yid mi bde ba zhes pa
T02D1197:137a-38: ni gang gi phyir sngon du 'gog pas dmigs pa
T02D1197:137a-40: de'i tshe nye ba'i nyon mongs pa cung zad 'dzag
T02D1197:137a-41: pa de ni ma rig pa'i chags pa rnam par
T02D1197:137a-42: bcom pa'i phyir sems kyi rjes su lta ba'o //
T02D1197:137b-0: sems can nad @137b rnams kyi sems gang sems med
T02D1197:137b-1: par bstan pa snying rje gsum las snying rje chen
T02D1197:137b-3: chos kyi dbyings gnyis med pa stong pa nyid yang
T02D1197:137b-4: dag pa'i mtha' don dam pa 'od gsal ba de
T02D1197:137b-5: kho na nyid ces pa rnam grangs te /
T02D1197:137b-6: de'i rjes su lta zhing bcom ldan 'das rnam par spyod ces sbyar ro //
T02D1197:137b-7: ci la rnam par spyod ce na gsungs pa /
T02D1197:137b-8: shes bzhin dang zhes pa ni de ltar sems can
T02D1197:137b-9: gyi ris la yang dag par shes bzhin pa la
T02D1197:137b-10: ma ston pa des nye bar mtshon pa dran pa
T02D1197:137b-11: dang ldan pa zhes pa rdo rje 'chang gi sku'o
T02D1197:137b-12: // 'jig rten gyi btul de zhes pa ni de nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i chos te /
T02D1197:137b-13: rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyis 'dod chags zad
T02D1197:137b-14: pa'i sku kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag dbyer
T02D1197:137b-15: med pa la rnam par spyod ces dgongs so //
T02D1197:137b-16: de ltar 'du byed kyi phung po ni don yod par grub pa'i chos so //
T02D1197:137b-17: de'i yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs dran pa nye
T02D1197:137b-18: bar gzhag pa bzhi pa sems su bshad pa des
T02D1197:137b-19: ni rnam par spyod ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:137b-20: kyi nges pa'o // bzhi po zhes pa ni grangs tsam mo //
T02D1197:137b-21: de rnams zhes pa'i de ltar sngon du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1197:137b-22: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes pa ni 'khor rnams la bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:137b-23: da ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnams brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:137b-24: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:137b-25: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par dag
T02D1197:137b-26: pa rnams su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1197:137b-28: de'i dus 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:137b-29: de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te de la rdzus te skyes pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams so //
T02D1197:137b-30: de rnams kyi las ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1197:137b-31: des na gzugs med par gnas so //
T02D1197:137b-32: de la gtsug tor nas dpral pa'i 'khor lo'i mthar
T02D1197:137b-33: thug par sor bzhi rnams su gzhan bzhi dang ldan
T02D1197:137b-35: de rnams kyi bag chags kyi nyes pa bzlog pa'i phyir sgrol ma rlung gi khams bsam ste /
T02D1197:137b-36: de yang dag par spong pa'o //
T02D1197:137b-37: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
T02D1197:137b-38: zhes pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams 'gog pa'i ting
T02D1197:137b-39: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa 'di rnams kyi
T02D1197:137b-40: ting nge 'dzin gyis ji srid du de rnams kyi
T02D1197:138a-2: sngon gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis shi nas sdig
T02D1197:138a-3: pa mid ge ba'i chos rnams la blo 'jug ste
T02D1197:138a-4: / des sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa nyams su myongs bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:138a-5: de'i phyir de rnams kyi mi bskyed par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni sdig pa'i blo dang /
T02D1197:138a-7: chos ma yin pa'i blo dang ji srid du skye
T02D1197:138a-8: bar mi 'gyur ba de srid du bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:138a-9: kyis bstan to // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'dun
T02D1197:138a-10: pa skyed do phyir 'dun pa skyed do zhes pa
T02D1197:138a-11: ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par byed pa'o
T02D1197:138a-12: kyis bstan to // // 'dun pa dang rim pa
T02D1197:138a-13: dang 'dra ba'i tshig gam sngon gyi chos dang las
T02D1197:138a-14: de dang 'dra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs
T02D1197:138a-16: des ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:138a-17: de ni lus rnam par dpen pa shes so //
T02D1197:138a-18: lus rnam par dben pas lus kyi ting nge 'dzin la rten par byed do //
T02D1197:138a-19: de yang spros pa dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1197:138a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dmigs pa'o //
T02D1197:138a-21: des na dben no zhes pa ni de rnams la
T02D1197:138a-22: slar de la sogs ston cing 'dzin par byed cing
T02D1197:138a-23: slar yang mi skye ba 'dzin par byed do //
T02D1197:138a-24: de'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes pa ni bla
T02D1197:138a-25: ma dang dge ba'i gshegs gnyen rnams mnyes par byed
T02D1197:138a-26: do // brtson 'grus kyi spro bas sbyin pa dang
T02D1197:138a-27: shin tu sbyin pa dang sbyin pa chen po ster
T02D1197:138a-28: do // ro / des na theg pa gsum la sogs pa'i chos rnams nyan to //
T02D1197:138a-29: de'i phyir bla ma'i man ngag la dmigs so //
T02D1197:138a-30: des kyang nyon mongs pa'i phyung po rnams yongs su
T02D1197:138a-31: spong bar byed cing dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur
T02D1197:138a-32: ro // da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1197:138a-33: brtson 'grus spro ba'i rang bzhin chos //
T02D1197:138a-34: sgrub pa po ni pha rol 'gro //
T02D1197:138a-35: brtson 'grus dang ni bral na ni //
T02D1197:138a-36: sgrub pos dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02D1197:138a-37: de ltar brtson 'grus brten pa yis //
T02D1197:138a-39: ji srid mi ru ma skyes par //
T02D1197:138a-40: brtson 'grus nyid ni bya ba yin //
T02D1197:138a-41: chos ni mang po mnyan pa dang bsgom pa rnams ni sgrub par byed //
T02D1197:138a-42: sems can rgyu ru bdag bsgrub par //
T02D1197:138a-43: smon lam yang ni 'debs par byed //
T02D1197:138a-44: de bzhin du sems rab tu 'dzin to zhes pa
T02D1197:138a-45: ni stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su spangs te
T02D1197:138a-46: / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D1197:138a-47: pa drug ston cing des yang dag pa'i smon lam
T02D1197:138b-1: smon no zhes pa ni sems can thams cad rnams
T02D1197:138b-2: la yang dag pa'i lam ster zhes pa ste nges
T02D1197:138b-3: pa'o // de bzhin du gzugs kyi rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:138b-4: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:138b-5: 'dir gzugs kyi khams pa'i lha ni gtsor me'i khams kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:138b-6: de rnams kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bdag nyid chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:138b-7: 'on kyang dge ba'i grogs mchog dang bral ba'o //
T02D1197:138b-8: des na dge ba'i chos rnams la sems bskyed par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1197:138b-9: gang dang gang yang dag par spong bskyed pa'i dge
T02D1197:138b-10: ba'i chos des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D1197:138b-12: gang 'dun pa skyed ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon bzhin du rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1197:138b-13: gang gi phyir dpral ba nas mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'i
T02D1197:138b-14: mthar thug par sor bcu drug nas der skye ste
T02D1197:138b-15: / gzugs na spyod pa bcu drug gi lha rnams
T02D1197:138b-16: kyi gnas bcu drug po de rnams su skye bar

T02D1197:138b-18: de bzhin du me'i khams gos dkar mo'o //

T02D1197:138b-20: gang du bsgom par bya ba yang der skyes pa'i
T02D1197:138b-21: sems can rnams sdig pa mid ge ba'i chos rnams

T02D1197:138b-24: des na 'dun pa skyed do zhes pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos ston pa nyan to //
T02D1197:138b-25: des na 'dun pa dang ldan par gyur to //
T02D1197:138b-26: bcom ldan 'das mthong bas sor phreng bzhin rgyal bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:138b-28: de yang 'bad do zhes pa nyi de ltar bcom
T02D1197:138b-29: ldan 'das kyi bka' dran pa'am 'dzin par byed do
T02D1197:138b-30: // sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'dor zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:138b-31: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:138b-32: brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon bzhin te //
T02D1197:138b-33: yang dag par spong ba gnyis pa'o //
T02D1197:138b-34: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba gsum pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
T02D1197:138b-35: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams zhes bya ba
T02D1197:138b-36: la sogs pa ni 'dir 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha
T02D1197:138b-37: rnams ni gcor chu'i khams kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:138b-38: lhag ma ni de'i nang du 'dus so //
T02D1197:138b-39: de la mgrin pa nas snying ga'i 'khor lo'i bar
T02D1197:138b-40: sor mo bcu gnyis po de rnams las de sor
T02D1197:139a-0: gnyis gnyis po de las gnas drug @139a * //
T02D1197:139a-1: rnams su 'dod pa'i khams drug po rnams 'byung bar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:139a-2: sngon du gsungs pa'i yon tan gnyis dang /
T02D1197:139a-3: phyi ma dang yon tan gsum las 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:139a-4: lha ma yin yang de'i nang du 'dus te /
T02D1197:139a-5: de yang snying ga'i 'og tu sor gnyis las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:139a-6: de bzhin de m'a ma k'i ni chu'i khams so //
T02D1197:139a-7: de rnams kyang bsod rnams kyi bdag po chen por
T02D1197:139a-8: bstan pas sbyin pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T02D1197:139a-9: ye shes kyi snang ba spangs ba dge ba'i grongs
T02D1197:139a-10: dang bral ba shin tu 'dod pa la chags pa'o
T02D1197:139a-11: // de rnams kyi spongs ba ni yang dag par spong ba'o //
T02D1197:139a-12: 'on kyang 'dod pa la sred pa de gang gi phyir mi bskyod pa sems te /
T02D1197:139a-13: de yang zhu ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:139a-14: des na m'a ma k'i chu'i khams so //
T02D1197:139a-15: des na 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems kyi 'dod pas skyes ma rnams dang snyoms par 'jug go //
T02D1197:139a-16: de'i phyir lha rnams 'dod pa la sred pa'o //
T02D1197:139a-17: des na dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir 'dun bskyed ces pa la /
T02D1197:139a-18: 'dun pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnyed pa ste /
T02D1197:139a-19: chos kyi dbyings lta bur shes par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:139a-20: 'bad do zhes pa ni de yang dag par 'bad pa'o //
T02D1197:139a-21: des na brtson 'grus zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngon bzhin rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:139a-22: de bzhin du yang dag par spangs ba bzhi pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:139a-23: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos skye pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:139a-24: de bzhin zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i yang
T02D1197:139a-25: dag par spong ba gsum po rnams nye bar bsdu
T02D1197:139a-26: ba'i don to // de rnams thams cad grangs bzhin du //
T02D1197:139a-27: bzhi dang de bzhin bcu drug dang //
T02D1197:139a-28: gnas bdun du ni gang bshad pa //
T02D1197:139a-29: gsum po rdzus te skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:139a-30: de bzhin du yang mngal nas skyes pa ni rkang gnyis pa mi la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:139a-31: de rnams kyi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas
T02D1197:139a-32: par bya zhes pa ni de ltar rdzus te skyes
T02D1197:139a-33: pa srid pa gsum gyis lha rnams mngal nas 'byung
T02D1197:139a-34: bar skyed pa'i phyir sngon gyi mi'i dngos 'dzin to
T02D1197:139a-35: // des na mi de rnams kyang dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis gnas te /
T02D1197:139a-36: de rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02D1197:139a-37: yang dag pa'i lam sbyin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i skur 'gyur te /
T02D1197:139a-39: kha ton mar me me long sogs //
T02D1197:139b-1: / ji ltar kha ton las kha ton dang mar me las mar me dang /
T02D1197:139b-2: me long las gzugs brnyan no //
T02D1197:139b-3: de de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sprul pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:139b-4: lus de sems can rnam kyis bsgom par bya ba'i
T02D1197:139b-5: thabs tshad med pa zhes pa ni 'dir de bzhin
T02D1197:139b-6: gshegs pas rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs
T02D1197:139b-7: pa'i rgyud rnams su thabs sna tshogs pa'i sgom pa
T02D1197:139b-8: sna tshogs pa la brten te /
T02D1197:139b-9: sems can rnams la zhi ba dang drag po dang shin tu drag po'i thabs kyis te /
T02D1197:139b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi skus man ngag sna tshogs pas bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:139b-11: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la //
T02D1197:139b-12: zhes pa ni lnga pa'i don la bdun pa'o //
T02D1197:139b-13: sems can gang dang gang gi rang gi sems chos
T02D1197:139b-14: de rnams kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1197:139b-15: ro // slar yongs su rdzogs par bya ba zhes
T02D1197:139b-16: pa ni slar gyis sgras mir 'jig rten du 'jug
T02D1197:139b-17: pas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang mi'am ci
T02D1197:139b-18: la sogs pa rnams chos kyi sku bdud rtsis yongs
T02D1197:139b-20: byol song dang dmyal ba de rnams yongs su rdzogs
T02D1197:139b-21: par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du skyes nas
T02D1197:139b-23: sgom pa 'phel ba dang rgyas pa'i phyir zhes pa
T02D1197:139b-24: ni de yang sgong las skyes pa dang drod gsher
T02D1197:139b-25: las skyes pa'i sems can byol song rnams dang /
T02D1197:139b-26: sgong las skyes pa rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa
T02D1197:139b-27: yang mi'i skye ba thob pas sgom pa sna tshogs
T02D1197:139b-28: pa rgya chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:139b-29: sgom pa des sangs rgyas su 'gyur te ye shes 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:139b-30: 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:139b-31: 'on kyang mi de rnams ni gtsor sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:139b-32: lhag ma ni de'i nang du 'dus pa'o //
T02D1197:139b-33: yang na khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid do //

T02D1197:139b-36: 'gyur te / gang gi phyir spyan ma sa'i khams
T02D1197:139b-37: te de'i rten lte ba'i 'khor lo yin pa'i phyir
T02D1197:139b-38: 'gyur te / ro // de ltar khams bzhi'i rang
T02D1197:139b-39: bzhin yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnams ni bcom
T02D1197:139b-41: da ni mi rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
T02D1197:139b-42: bzhi sgom pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par
T02D1197:139b-44: 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:140a-0: 'dir 'dun pa zhes pa nas rkang pa zhes pa'i @140a * //
T02D1197:140a-1: mthar thug pa ni mdong bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:140a-2: 'di'i bshad pa ni dben pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:140a-3: dben pa zhes pa ni lus rnams par dben pa ste /
T02D1197:140a-4: de'i dbang po'i sgo nas phung po dang khams rnams
T02D1197:140a-5: dang skye mched la sogs pa nye bar mtshon par
T02D1197:140a-6: bya ba'o // de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du
T02D1197:140a-7: ma rnams su bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par gsungs
T02D1197:140a-8: shing chos mngon pa la sogs pa rnams su yang
T02D1197:140a-9: bya ba'o // gsungs so // des na bdag gis ma bstan te /
T02D1197:140a-10: gzhung rgyas pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:140a-11: yang na de rnams kyi phung po dang /
T02D1197:140a-12: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnams kyi bdag
T02D1197:140a-13: nyid kyis sems can thog ma med pa nas tha
T02D1197:140a-14: mal pa'i nga rgyal gyis rnams par gnas pa rnams
T02D1197:140a-15: de'i rang bzhin gyis phyir 'dun pa'o //
T02D1197:140a-16: de'i spong ba ni sgom pa dben pa ste /
T02D1197:140a-17: des na ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i nga rgyal lo //
T02D1197:140a-18: da yang lhag par mos pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D1197:140a-19: des na 'jig rten pa'i gang zag tu lta ba'o //
T02D1197:140a-20: brten pa zhes pa ni lta ba la brten pa'i sems so //
T02D1197:140a-21: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes pa ni de'i 'dod
T02D1197:140a-22: chags dang bral ba ni man ngag rnam par dpen
T02D1197:140a-23: pa ste / des rab tu zhi ba'o //
T02D1197:140a-24: de yang rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis rlung gi
T02D1197:140a-25: sbyor ba nyid sna'i rtse mor sgom pa'i rim pas
T02D1197:140a-27: des ni sems brten par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:140a-28: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs te /
T02D1197:140a-29: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02D1197:140a-30: nyungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam du //
T02D1197:140a-31: sna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
T02D1197:140a-32: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom //
T02D1197:140a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud sna tshogs las rgyas par gsungs so //
T02D1197:140a-34: de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor med par slar rnam par rtog pa'i sems su 'gyur te /
T02D1197:140a-36: rten zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa la dmigs pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:140a-38: de'i 'gog pa zhes pa ni sems rnam par dben pa'o //
T02D1197:140a-39: de yang sems dang sems las byung ba'i gnas skabs
T02D1197:140a-40: kyi rang bzhin gyi chos rnams lung rnam pa mang
T02D1197:140a-41: po'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1197:140a-42: 'on kyang de'i ji srid du sgyu ma lta bu'i
T02D1197:140a-43: ting nge 'dzin sngon du ma byas pa de srid
T02D1197:140b-0: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs sna tshogs pa bstan @140b mod ;
T02D1197:140b-1: / rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes so //
T02D1197:140b-2: brten pa zhes pa ni de la yang brten to //
T02D1197:140b-3: 'o na gang las shes she na /
T02D1197:140b-4: 'ga' zhig sgyu ma rnam pa dang bcas pa goms
T02D1197:140b-5: pa med par dmigs pa'i phyir bstan pa'i rgyun nyid
T02D1197:140b-6: do // rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba zhes pa ni nyes pa dang yon tan no //
T02D1197:140b-7: de yang rnam pa dang bcas pa'i bden pa 'am
T02D1197:140b-8: rnam pa me dpa'i sgyu ma lta bu de'i nyes
T02D1197:140b-9: pa rnams yongs su thim pa'i sems nyid ye shes
T02D1197:140b-10: te / de brjod du med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ye shes zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:140b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i lha'i
T02D1197:140b-12: nga rgyal tsam gyis lus dang ngag dang sems dri
T02D1197:140b-13: ma med pas sems can thams cad grol bar gyur
T02D1197:140b-15: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pa la nye
T02D1197:140b-16: bar spyod pas sems gong nas gong la brten par
T02D1197:140b-18: de ci'i phyir zhes na thog ma med pa'i bag
T02D1197:140b-19: chags kyis rnam par rtog pa la nye bar spyod
T02D1197:140b-20: pa'i phyir ro // gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:140b-21: bdag gi mdun du zhum par ma gyur zhes pa
T02D1197:140b-22: ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnam par
T02D1197:140b-23: rtog pa tsam bzhes de smon lam gyi dbang gis
T02D1197:140b-24: so // rigs pa des na sngon gyis rnam par
T02D1197:140b-25: rtog pa ngan pa'i bag chags kyi dbang gis smon
T02D1197:140b-26: lam sngon du songs ba'i rnam par rtog pa bzang
T02D1197:140b-28: gzhang kyi don dag sgrub par byed kyi rang gi
T02D1197:140b-29: don gyis rnam par rtog pa tsam 'dzin pa ni
T02D1197:140b-30: ma yin no // des na 'dir smon lam 'de bas so //
T02D1197:140b-31: 'dun pa zhes pa ni cung zad rdo rje 'chang
T02D1197:140b-32: la sogs pa'i gzugs su sbrul pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1197:140b-33: de'i yang dmigs pa rang bdag nyid de dang 'dra
T02D1197:140b-35: shin tu zhum par ma gyur cing sgyu ma'i sems
T02D1197:140b-36: de yang shin tu ches zhum par ma gyur cig
T02D1197:140b-37: ces pa ni smon lam mo //
T02D1197:140b-38: shin tu 'dzin par ma gyur zhes pa ni res
T02D1197:140b-39: 'ga' cung zad gnas pa der yang gnas par mi
T02D1197:140b-41: 'o zhes pa ni de de bzhin //
T02D1197:140b-43: de la rdzu 'phrul gya rkang pa yang ci zhe na /
T02D1197:140b-44: sngon du gsungs pa'i phung po bzhi po der lnga
T02D1197:140b-45: pa rnam par shes pa'i ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul
T02D1197:140b-46: gyi rkang pa'o // de yang mi bskyod pa'i chos te /
T02D1197:140b-47: de'i 'gog pa nges par gsungs pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
T02D1197:141a-0: @141a * // de ltar ldan pa zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa
T02D1197:141a-1: rnams kyi gnyis med pa'i rgyun du rnal 'byor dang
T02D1197:141a-2: ldan pa'i sems de yang bsam du med pa'i 'du
T02D1197:141a-3: byed nyid kyis 'dun pa de 'gog pa la gnas
T02D1197:141a-4: pa'am mi gnas zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:141a-5: de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:141a-6: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:141a-7: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes pa nas /
T02D1197:141a-8: rkang pa zhes pa'i bar gyi mdor bstan pa'i tshig go //
T02D1197:141a-9: de'i bshad pa dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:141a-10: 'on kyang sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang yin pa ni rags pa'o //
T02D1197:141a-11: 'dir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gnyis pa ni de nyid kyi phra ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:141a-12: de'i phyir phra ba ni lus rnam par dben pa'o //
T02D1197:141a-13: de bzhin du ngag dang sems kyang ngo //
T02D1197:141a-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yang ci zhe na /
T02D1197:141a-15: sngon du khams bzhi gsungs pa de'i lnga pa ni nam mkha'i khams te /
T02D1197:141a-16: de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa padma 'bar ba'i chos de'i 'gog pa la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:141a-17: de bzhin du spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:141a-18: 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni shin tu phra ba ste /
T02D1197:141a-19: de yang dben pa zhes pa ni sngon bzhin rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:141a-20: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yang ci zhe na /
T02D1197:141a-21: dbang po rnams la dbang po drug pa ni chos
T02D1197:141a-22: kyi dbyings te de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
T02D1197:141a-23: ste / kun du bzang po'i chos de'i 'gog pa'o //
T02D1197:141a-24: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1197:141a-25: de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
T02D1197:141a-26: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon bzhin te /
T02D1197:141a-28: de'i dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1197:141a-29: 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci zhe na /
T02D1197:141a-30: de'i yul chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D1197:141a-31: de yang sems las byung ba bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i chos de 'gog pa'o //
T02D1197:141a-32: yang na gzugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1197:141a-33: sgra rdo rje dang dri rdo rje dang /
T02D1197:141a-34: ro rdo rje'i rang bzhin can rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de'i chos rnams de'i 'gog pa'o //
T02D1197:141a-35: de rnams 'gog pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'gog pa'o //
T02D1197:141a-36: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1197:141a-37: 'di ni slob dpon rnams kyi lugs so //
T02D1197:141a-38: de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang /
T02D1197:141b-0: shin tu @141b dpyad pa dang shin tu yon tan
T02D1197:141b-1: gyi tshul gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgom par
T02D1197:141b-2: bya'o // da ni dbang po lnga rnams brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:141b-3: de 'dod pa na spyod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:141b-4: de ltar sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
T02D1197:141b-5: pa bzhi mi la sogs pa'i rang dbang du 'gyur
T02D1197:141b-6: ro // des na 'dod pa na spyod pa zhes
T02D1197:141b-7: pa ni 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pa'i sems can
T02D1197:141b-8: de rnams kyang las kyi sar skyes nas byang chub
T02D1197:141b-10: las des 'jig rten pa zhes pa ni rang gi
T02D1197:141b-11: phyir khams gsum gyi sems can rnams mi'i gzugs rnams
T02D1197:141b-12: su 'jug pa de'i cho yang dag pa'i lta ba
T02D1197:141b-13: phun sum tshogs pa la dad par byed ces dgongs
T02D1197:141b-14: so // rang gi las zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:141b-15: pa ni sems can de rnams kyang chung du dang
T02D1197:141b-17: kha cig ni rang gi dge ba'i las kyi rnam
T02D1197:141b-18: par smin pa'i dbang gis mtho ris la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:141b-20: kha cig ni las mi dge bas byol song dang
T02D1197:141b-21: yi dags dang dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur
T02D1197:141b-22: ro // kha cig ni shin tu dge ba'i las
T02D1197:141b-23: kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam
T02D1197:141b-25: de ltar de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis bstan par bya'o //
T02D1197:141b-26: de rnams la bstan ba tsam gyis nyon mongs pa
T02D1197:141b-27: zad par byas nas thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur
T02D1197:141b-28: ro // de ltar rang gi las zhes pa nas /
T02D1197:141b-29: so sor myong bar 'gyur zhes pa'i mthar thug pa ni smon lam nyid de /
T02D1197:141b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:141b-31: de srog gi phyir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:141b-32: 'dir sems can gang dag gi bdag 'tsho ba'i don du srog gcod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1197:141b-33: tshong sna tshogs pa 'tshong bar byed do //
T02D1197:141b-34: yang gi sgras 'chad pa dang rtsod pa dang chom pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
T02D1197:141b-35: des na sdig pa'i las rnams bdag nyid mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o //
T02D1197:141b-36: gal te byed pa na des ni dmyal ba la
T02D1197:141b-37: sogs par sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur
T02D1197:141b-39: 'di ni dad pa'i dbang por brjod //
T02D1197:141b-40: ces pa ni 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi chos rnams kyi dang po ni dad pa'o //
T02D1197:141b-41: gang gi phyir chos rnams thams cad kyi dang por bskyed pa ni dad pa'o //
T02D1197:141b-42: de'i tshe chos gang dag ces pa ni nyan thos dang /
T02D1197:142a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos rnams ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin byed pa ste /
T02D1197:142a-4: gzhan 'jig rten pa'i chos la ni ma yin no zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:142a-5: de ltar de rnams ni mig gi dbang po'i yul lo //
T02D1197:142a-6: de yang gzugs rdo rje ma'i chos te /
T02D1197:142a-7: de'i bya ba la nye bar spyod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:142a-8: de bzhin du rna ba'i yul sgra rdo rje ma'i chos brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1197:142a-9: de bzhin du sna'i yul dri rdo rje ma'i chos dran pa'i dbang po'o //
T02D1197:142a-10: de bzhin du lce'i yul ro rdo rje ma'i chos ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
T02D1197:142a-11: de bzhin du lus kyi yul reg bya rdo rje ma'i chos shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1197:142a-12: de bzhin du chos de rnams brtson 'grus gang gis
T02D1197:142a-13: shes pa nas de dag ni stobs lnga zhes pa'i
T02D1197:142a-14: mthar thug pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:142a-15: 'on kyang yul can lngas sa snying la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:142a-16: byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de rnams stobs lnga'o
T02D1197:142a-17: // de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:142a-18: de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:142a-19: de la zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzu
T02D1197:142a-20: 'phrul gyi rkang pa la sogs pa'i gnas rnams la'o
T02D1197:142a-21: // ji lta bu zhe na zhes pa ni tshad
T02D1197:142a-22: ci zhes rdo rje snying pos gsol ba btab pa'o
T02D1197:142a-23: // // 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:142a-24: pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig go
T02D1197:142a-25: // // // 'on kyang dran pa yang dag byang
T02D1197:142a-26: chub kyi yan lag ni kun gzhi rnam par shes
T02D1197:142a-27: // // // pa'i khams te / de yang 'jam dpal gyi chos so //
T02D1197:142a-29: chos rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa rnams ni
T02D1197:142a-30: lus rnam par dben pa la sogs pa rnams la
T02D1197:142a-32: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes pa la sogs
T02D1197:142a-33: pa'i sgra ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po
T02D1197:142a-34: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gnas rnams la bsgom zhes
T02D1197:142a-35: pa ste / de bzhin gshegs pa dam bca' ba'o //
T02D1197:142a-37: chos rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa drug po
T02D1197:142a-38: 'di rnams kyis chos rnams rnam par gzhag pa gsungs
T02D1197:142a-39: te / de rnams thams cad rim pa bzhin du gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02D1197:142a-40: shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed dang /
T02D1197:142a-43: las kyi dbang po lnga'i dngos po'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:142b-0: de bzhin du las kyi dbang po rnams las @142b
T02D1197:142b-1: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni
T02D1197:142b-2: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i chos so //
T02D1197:142b-4: de ltar drug par brjod do //
T02D1197:142b-5: lhag ma las kyi dbang po'i bya ba rnams 'chad bzhin pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:142b-6: da ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:142b-7: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:142b-8: ji lta bu zhes pa ni byang chub kyi yan
T02D1197:142b-9: lag gi gnas rnams su ji lta ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:142b-10: rnams bsgom par bya zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:142b-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta ba gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:142b-13: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni las kyi dbang po'i
T02D1197:142b-14: bya bas mi g-yo ba'i chos rkang pa'i chos rkang
T02D1197:142b-15: pa'i bya ba'o // de bzhin du yang dag pa'i
T02D1197:142b-16: rtog pa ni nye bar gnas pa mjug ma'i bya
T02D1197:142b-17: ba dbyug sngon can gyi chos so //
T02D1197:142b-18: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i ngag ni tshig gi bya ba 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i chos so //
T02D1197:142b-20: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni lag pa'i bya ba ste /
T02D1197:142b-22: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni khu
T02D1197:142b-23: ba 'dzag pa drug pa ye shes kyi phung po
T02D1197:142b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i chos so //
T02D1197:142b-25: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni nam
