T02D1197:142b-26: mkha' mthar thug pa aa wa ddh'u t'ir rang rig
T02D1197:142b-27: pa 'dzin pa'i phyir drug pa ye shes kyi khams
T02D1197:142b-28: te / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje ma'i chos so //
T02D1197:142b-29: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa ni rdo
T02D1197:142b-30: rje'i lam nas chags pa chen po chags pa'i khams
T02D1197:142b-31: steng du 'gro ba'i phyir drug pa ye shes las
T02D1197:142b-33: de yang bdag med pa'i chos so //
T02D1197:142b-34: de 'dzin pa'i phyir drug pa ye shes las kyi dbang po'i bya ba'i snying rje'i chos so //
T02D1197:142b-35: 'di rnams kyi chod pa nan bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1197:142b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang chos te de
T02D1197:142b-37: ltar chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D1197:142b-38: bdag nyid yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos
T02D1197:142b-39: can bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka dpa' bo'i
T02D1197:142b-40: chos so // chos sum cu rtsa bdun po de
T02D1197:142b-41: rnams rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams la brten te mdor
T02D1197:142b-43: de'i phyogs ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams te /
T02D1197:142b-44: de yang mdor bsdus te gsungs so //
T02D1197:142b-45: rgyas par yang gzhung sna tshogs pa'i lung rnams las rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:142b-47: da ltar de dag yang dag bshad //
T02D1197:143a-2: zhes pa ni de dag ces pa sngon du gsungs
T02D1197:143a-3: pa'i byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams
T02D1197:143a-4: so // de ltar zhes pa de rnams thams cad do //
T02D1197:143a-5: yang dag bshad ces pa ni 'gro ba'i don gyi
T02D1197:143a-6: rgyur bdag gis yang dag bshad ces pa'i don to
T02D1197:143a-7: // rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa //
T02D1197:143a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgras ni rim pa bzhin sa bcu gnyis rnams gzung ngo //
T02D1197:143a-9: nyid ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:143a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas zhes pa ni
T02D1197:143a-11: sa de rnams thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1197:143a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dbang po la sogs
T02D1197:143a-14: pa rang bzhin can zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgra
T02D1197:143a-15: ni yul dang yul can las kyi dbang po dang
T02D1197:143a-16: de'i bya ba'o // de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yang dag pa'i lam rjes su rtogs pa'o //
T02D1197:143a-17: byang chub bsgrub pa'i tshul yod pa'i sems can ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:143a-18: de rnams kyi gnas ni byang chub sgrub pa'i rten rang gi lus zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:143a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad rnams kyi gnas pa zhes pa
T02D1197:143a-20: ni de bzhin du sngon du gsungs pa'i sa bcu
T02D1197:143a-21: gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi gnas te /
T02D1197:143a-22: de rnams bsdus pa'i lus ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgrar bstan to //
T02D1197:143a-23: so sor phye na rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sum cu
T02D1197:143a-24: rtsa drug rnams su brjod de bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
T02D1197:143a-25: phyir ro // rten de'i brten pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud sum cu rtsa drug tu brjod de /
T02D1197:143a-26: de rnams kyang lus kyi rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
T02D1197:143a-27: 'chad bzhin pa'i rim pas ston to //
T02D1197:143a-28: de rnams 'dus pa'i bdag nyid rtsa gsum mo //
T02D1197:143a-29: tha mal pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i de rnams 'dus
T02D1197:143a-30: ba'i rtsa gcig ni ye shes kyi aa wa dh'u
T02D1197:143a-31: t'i'o // de ltar rtsa sum cu rtsa drug po de yang gnas te /
T02D1197:143a-32: sangs rgyas thams cad rnams dang /
T02D1197:143a-33: rang rig pa'i ye shes sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:143a-34: phung po la sogs khyad par nyid //
T02D1197:143a-35: ces pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams 'ba' zhig gi gnas ma yin te /
T02D1197:143a-36: phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi yang gnas so //
T02D1197:143a-37: sogs pa'i sgras khams dang skye mched rnams kyi yang ngo //
T02D1197:143a-38: 'on kyang de rnams la khyad par yod de /
T02D1197:143a-39: gzhan gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang /
T02D1197:143b-2: gzhan las kyi dbang po rnams dang /
T02D1197:143b-3: gzhan de'i bya ba rnams so //
T02D1197:143b-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
T02D1197:143b-6: sum cu rtsa bdun gyi tshul gyi chos kyi dbyings
T02D1197:143b-7: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur
T02D1197:143b-8: ba'o // de'i ye shes kyi snang ba mthong bar bya ba'i phyir de rnams kyang /
T02D1197:143b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis //
T02D1197:143b-10: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'byung ba'i mchog //
T02D1197:143b-11: ces pa ni 'dir shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1197:143b-12: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus
T02D1197:143b-13: las byung ba de'i bdag nyid rnams ji srid dngos
T02D1197:143b-14: su rdo rje 'chang gis la brten par mi byed
T02D1197:143b-15: pa de srid du de rnams ma rig pa'i dbang
T02D1197:143b-16: gis brgya la cung zad lam ma rdzogs pa'i dbang
T02D1197:143b-19: sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ba'i rtsa'i mchog / ces phul du byung ba gzung ba dang /
T02D1197:143b-20: 'dzin pa dang bral ba sngon gyi rim pas rab tu dag pa'o //
T02D1197:143b-21: 'on kyang sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa ni tha
T02D1197:143b-22: mal pa'i gnas skabs su yang slob bzhin pa nyid
T02D1197:143b-23: kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1197:143b-24: bar 'os pa shin tu bsdus pa 'dod pa'i phyir
T02D1197:143b-25: byang chub bsgrub pa la brtson pa'o //
T02D1197:143b-26: gang gi phyir rtsod pa'i dus su nga rgyal can
T02D1197:143b-27: tshe thung ba sgyu can las ngan pa la dga'
T02D1197:143b-28: ba 'byung ngo // des na bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1197:143b-29: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rim pa rnams su rdzogs
T02D1197:143b-30: pa'i rim pa rnams su rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan
T02D1197:143b-31: pa des na rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to
T02D1197:143b-32: ba 'byung ngo // // de rnams kyi ming 'chang
T02D1197:143b-33: bzhin pas brjod pa'i phyir rgyu ba rtogs par bya'o
T02D1197:143b-34: ba 'byung ngo // // // byang chub sems rnams sum cu gnyis //
T02D1197:143b-35: gang tshe zhes pa ni de ltar yang rtsa de
T02D1197:143b-36: rnams la dus thams cad du byang chub sems rgyu
T02D1197:143b-37: bas tha mal pa'i gnas skabs su yang bla ma'i
T02D1197:143b-38: man ngag gis bsgom pa'i dus su gang ba zhes
T02D1197:143b-39: pa ni dus thams cad du byang chub kyi sems
T02D1197:143b-41: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1197:143b-42: ba de'i tshe 'chad bzhin pa'i dus su 'khor lo
T02D1197:143b-43: bzhi'i dbye ba rnams las bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:143b-44: dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsa
T02D1197:143b-45: rnams 'ba' zhig byang chub sems kyis gang bar ma
T02D1197:143b-46: zad kyi dbang po rnams dang 'byung ba rnams dang
T02D1197:143b-47: phung po la sogs pa rnams kyang gang ba ste
T02D1197:144a-0: / 'chad bzhin pa'i dus su rang rig @144a * //
T02D1197:144a-1: pa'i ye shes nyams su myong zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:144a-2: de ltar rnal 'byor gyis nyams su myong bas 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ngo //
T02D1197:144a-3: de nas kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa
T02D1197:144a-4: dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa zung
T02D1197:144a-5: du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid dngos po dang dngos po
T02D1197:144a-6: med par ro mnyam pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1197:144a-8: de rjes sangs rgyas nyid ces pa ni sgrib pa
T02D1197:144a-9: med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:144a-10: dang bral ba mchog tu mi 'dzag pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:144a-11: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid de bzhin
T02D1197:144a-12: nyid bgrod du med pa rgyud med pa dang po'i
T02D1197:144a-13: dang po thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje
T02D1197:144a-14: 'dzin gyi sa'o // mi phyed pa'i phyir do rje ste /
T02D1197:144a-15: dus gsum du rgyud nyams pa med pa rtog ge
T02D1197:144a-16: pa rnams kyis bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa
T02D1197:144a-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul brjod du med pa'o //
T02D1197:144a-18: gang phyir rtogs pas sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1197:144a-19: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te //
T02D1197:144a-20: sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan pa min //
T02D1197:144a-21: rang rig pa yi mchog ni rnyed //
T02D1197:144a-22: ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:144a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dmigs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1197:144a-24: sku gsum rnam par bsgom pa dang /
T02D1197:144a-25: de bzhin du sku gzugs dang /
T02D1197:144a-26: mchod rten dang dam pa'i chos rnams 'dus bya ba la nye bar spyod pa dang /
T02D1197:144a-27: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba dang /
T02D1197:144a-28: sbyin pa pa'i lci ba zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:144a-29: pa ni mandala gyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa'i
T02D1197:144a-30: phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug thob ste /
T02D1197:144a-31: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du'o //
T02D1197:144a-32: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T02D1197:144a-33: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshogs 'di gnyis ka la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:144a-34: de ltar tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te /
T02D1197:144a-35: de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas pa nyid du gsungs pa ma yin nam /
T02D1197:144a-36: de ji ltar sems rang rig pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste /
T02D1197:144a-37: gzhan du bstan pa min zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:144a-38: sems nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:144a-39: de yang chos kyi sku'o zhes gal te 'ga' zhig sems par gyur na de'i phyir gsungs pa //
T02D1197:144a-40: rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bzhugs //
T02D1197:144a-41: gzhan du gang na'ang sangs rgyas med //
T02D1197:144b-0: ces bya ba @144b la sogs pa de rnams bzlog pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1197:144b-1: 'dir gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa
T02D1197:144b-2: la brten pas rig pa'i ye shes ma rtogs pa
T02D1197:144b-3: rang gi ngon par 'dod pa de ni ma yin
T02D1197:144b-6: 'dir dang po re zhig sems can rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:144b-7: chung du dang 'bring dang chen pos sangs rgyas kyang rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D1197:144b-8: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi chos can gyis theg pa gsum ste /
T02D1197:144b-9: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thag pa chen po'o //
T02D1197:144b-10: de la gang dag dbang po rtul po'i sems can
T02D1197:144b-11: de dag la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul gyis bstan
T02D1197:144b-12: to // gang dag dbang po cung zad rno ba'i
T02D1197:144b-13: sems can de dag la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rdzogs
T02D1197:144b-15: de rnams kyang slob bzhin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:144b-16: gang dag dbang po rnon po'i sems can de dag la rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02D1197:144b-17: de bzhin du gang dag dbang po rnon po'i sems
T02D1197:144b-18: can de dag la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1197:144b-19: pa bstan to // 'on kyang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D1197:144b-20: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul gyis phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:144b-21: de la bskal pa bzang po'i dus su rnam par
T02D1197:144b-22: gzigs nas 'od srungs kyi mthar thug pa'i de bzhin
T02D1197:144b-23: gshegs pa rnams kyis theg pa gsum bstan to //
T02D1197:144b-24: rdzogs ldan gyi dus su yang dbang po rnon po'i
T02D1197:144b-25: sems can rnams kyis theg pa gsum gyi nang du
T02D1197:144b-26: rdo rje theg pa 'dus par shes te /
T02D1197:144b-27: des na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la
T02D1197:144b-28: sogs pa rnams kyis glegs bam la sogs pa ma
T02D1197:144b-29: bstan zhing dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod kyang ma mdzad
T02D1197:144b-30: do // 'khor thams cad kyis rig cing rang gi bdag nyid kyis yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:144b-31: de'i phyir 'dir rtsod pa'i dus su sh'akya thub pas rdo rje theg pa yang dag par bstan to //
T02D1197:144b-32: sdud pa po rnams kyis kyang dngos su thos shing
T02D1197:144b-33: sdud pa pos glegs bam rnams bris pa'am gzung ba'i
T02D1197:144b-34: don to // des na gzhan dang gzhan las brgyud
T02D1197:144b-35: de 'ongs pa gang dag yang sngon nas dbang po
T02D1197:144b-36: rnon po slob bzhin pa de rnams thams cad pha
T02D1197:144b-37: rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa rnams kyis grub ste
T02D1197:144b-38: don to // / rdo rje theg pa nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:144b-39: rdo rje theg pa yang lus kyi rim pa lus
T02D1197:144b-40: la brten pa'i sems des lus su song zhing 'jug
T02D1197:145a-1: nyid rang rig pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:145a-2: des na nyams su myong bas rab kyi mthar thug
T02D1197:145a-3: pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyis
T02D1197:145a-5: gang gi tshe de'i rjes su sangs rgyas nyid dam
T02D1197:145a-6: rdo rje 'chang ba nyid sgrib pa dang bral ba
T02D1197:145a-7: spros pa med pa'i ye shes thob ces pa'i don
T02D1197:145a-8: to // des na rang gi lus la zhes pa
T02D1197:145a-9: ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku la'o
T02D1197:145a-10: to // // rdo rje'i sku ni dbyer med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:145a-11: des na sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1197:145a-12: de'i phyir gzhan brjod du med pa'i bde ba la gnas pa ste /
T02D1197:145a-13: bde ba'i mthar thug ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:145a-14: gzhan du zhes pa ni rang gi lus ma gtogs par zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:145a-15: gang na'ang med ces pa ni rang rig pa'i mtha'
T02D1197:145a-16: de dang yang bral ba gang na yang med pa
T02D1197:145a-17: ste bstan bcos brjod pa la yang gnas pa ma
T02D1197:145a-19: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir lus la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02D1197:145a-20: rang gi lus spangs nas gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid
T02D1197:145a-21: ces pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang theg
T02D1197:145a-22: pa chen po rnams la yang med do //
T02D1197:145a-24: mi shes pa yis bsgribs par 'dod //
T02D1197:145a-25: ces pa la rdo rje theg pa dang bral ba
T02D1197:145a-26: de rnams kyi 'dod pa ni rang gi sems kyi
T02D1197:145a-27: bsam pa'o // byis pa rnams kyi phyogs gcig pa'i
T02D1197:145a-28: phyir des sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro
T02D1197:145a-29: bsam pa'o // // rang lus ye shes chen po'i gnas //
T02D1197:145a-30: zhes pa ni mchog gi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
T02D1197:145a-31: chags pa chen po 'bras bu chen po 'byung ba'i
T02D1197:145a-32: phyir ro // de nyid kyis na /
T02D1197:145a-33: kun rtog thams cad spangs pa nyid //
T02D1197:145a-35: bdag dang bdag gi dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T02D1197:145a-36: dang bral ba ma bcos pa skad cig ma'i bde
T02D1197:145a-37: ba spangs pa'o // de yang chos kyi sku'i mtshan
T02D1197:145a-38: nyid thams cad mkhyen pa bgrod bya ma yin pa'o
T02D1197:145a-39: ba spangs pa'o // // dngos po kun la khyab byed pa //
T02D1197:145a-40: zhes pa ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs
T02D1197:145a-41: pa'i dngos po rnams la khyab par byed pa'i chos
T02D1197:145a-42: kyi sku rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa
T02D1197:145a-43: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:145a-44: de yang lus la gnas kyang zhes pa ni sprul
T02D1197:145a-45: pa'i sku'i lus shes pa'i phyir skyes bu chen po'i
T02D1197:145a-46: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid dpe byad
T02D1197:145a-47: brgyad cus brgyan pa'i lus de yang sngon gyi gzugs
T02D1197:145b-0: @145b brnyan gyi phyir bde ba'i rang bzhin de yang
T02D1197:145b-1: sgyu ma lta bu'i lta ba las byung ba'o //
T02D1197:145b-3: yang dag par lta ba nyid kyi phyir te /
T02D1197:145b-4: gang gi phyir gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bdag
T02D1197:145b-5: gi lta ba kun las mi ldang ba zhes bya
T02D1197:145b-7: lus ma skyes pas ni brjod du med pa'i phyir
T02D1197:145b-8: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag gcig
T02D1197:145b-9: pa nyid kyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:145b-10: des na ye shes dang shes bya gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1197:145b-11: de'i phyir lus dang sems dag kyang mi phyed pa'i phyir lus las ma skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:145b-12: gang gi phyir sems ma rtogs par shes par mi nus pa de'i phyir brjod du med pa'o //
T02D1197:145b-15: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes can gyis grub pa'i phyir
T02D1197:145b-16: dang pos dmigs pa dang bral ba des na lus
T02D1197:145b-17: kyis nges par gzung ba'i dngos po med do //
T02D1197:145b-18: de'i phyir rang rig pa las dam pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:145b-19: de nyid byang chub dang byang chub chen po de
T02D1197:145b-20: nyid sangs rgyas te rang nyid kyis rab tu rtogs
T02D1197:145b-21: pa'i chos kyi dbyings nyid go 'phang dam pa mi
T02D1197:145b-22: zad pa nyid kyis na sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D1197:145b-23: de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul //
T02D1197:145b-24: zhes pa phung po lnga rnams dang dbang po lnga
T02D1197:145b-25: rnams dang khams lnga rnams kyi yul nyams su myong
T02D1197:145b-26: ba'i phyir rang rig pa'i spyod yul de'i mthar thug
T02D1197:145b-27: thug pa de rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa
T02D1197:145b-28: dbang po dang phung po dang khams tha mal pa
T02D1197:145b-29: rnams sbangs pa brjod du med pa zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:145b-30: to // de'i phyir rtsod pa'i dus kyi sems can
T02D1197:145b-31: rnams rdo rje theg pa med par dngos su dngos
T02D1197:145b-33: gang gi phyir tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas nyid
T02D1197:145b-34: dam rdo rje 'chang ba nyid du 'gyur zhes bcom
T02D1197:145b-35: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:145b-36: de ltar sems nyid ni shes ra kyi pha rol
T02D1197:145b-37: tu phyin pa'i rnag bzhin no zhes pa ni bden
T02D1197:145b-38: mod // 'on kyang dbang po rtul po rnams la dngos grub med do //
T02D1197:145b-40: sngon blo rnon po ma yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:145b-41: de ltar yi ge don mtha' dag gsungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:145b-42: slar yang de nyid kyi don man ngag nyid kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1197:145b-43: 'dir dkar po'i phyogs dang nag po'i phyogs kyi dbye
T02D1197:145b-44: bas rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi gnas skabs
T02D1197:145b-45: brjod do // de la dkar po'i phyogs la spro ba'i rim pas zla ba'i cha bco lnga'o //
T02D1197:146a-0: de bzhin du nag po'i phyogs la @146a * //
T02D1197:146a-1: sdud pa'i rim pas nyi ma'i cha bco lnga'o //
T02D1197:146a-2: de bzhin du nya'i mthar cha gcig go //
T02D1197:146a-3: de bzhin du gnam stong gi mthar yang cha gcig go //
T02D1197:146a-4: des na spro ba'i rim pas dbang po zhes pa ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i tshes lnga'o //
T02D1197:146a-5: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas tshes lnga'i mthar thug pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1197:146a-6: dga' ba dang bzang po dang /
T02D1197:146a-7: rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1197:146a-8: de bzhin du phung po zhes pa ni lnga ste
T02D1197:146a-9: drug pa nas bcu pa'i mthar thug pa dga' ba
T02D1197:146a-11: de bzhin du 'byung ba zhes pa ni lnga ste /
T02D1197:146a-12: bcu gcig la sogs pa'i nya'i mthar thug pa sngon bzhin du tshes lnga'o //
T02D1197:146a-13: 'di rnams kyi cha aa la sogs pa thung du yon tan dang ya na'i rkyen bsgyur ba'o //
T02D1197:146a-14: de bzhin du nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa
T02D1197:146a-15: sdud pa nyid 'byung ba dang phung po dang de
T02D1197:146a-16: bzhin du dbang po rnams te /
T02D1197:146a-17: lnga dang lnga dang de bzhin lnga nas stong gi
T02D1197:146a-18: mthar thug pa'i cha bco lnga ya na'i rkyen bsgyur
T02D1197:146a-19: ba la sogs pa ring po rnams so //
T02D1197:146a-20: de bzhin du rjes dbyangs dang tsheg drag gi cha dag bcu drug pa mtha' ma nyid do //
T02D1197:146a-21: de ltar rtsa'i rgyu ba rnams kyis srog dang thur
T02D1197:146a-22: sel phrad pas aa wa d'u t'ir 'jug pa rtogs
T02D1197:146a-23: par bya'o // de la re zhig rtsa ni rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:146a-24: dang po khong stong rgyus pa'i dbyibs kyi rtsa'o //
T02D1197:146a-25: gnyis pa ni byang chub sems kyi rtsa'o //
T02D1197:146a-26: de bzhin du byang chub sems skyed par byed par rlung gi rtsa'o //
T02D1197:146a-27: gang gi tshe rtsa de rnams gnam stong dang nya
T02D1197:146a-28: dag gi mthar gang bar 'gyur zhing mtha' ma dag
T02D1197:146a-29: gi cha gnyis 'dus pa de'i tshe byang chub sems
T02D1197:146a-31: de mi rgyu ba'i phyir rtsa rnams kyi rgyu par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:146a-32: de mi rgyu ba'i phyir rtsa rnams dang byang chub sems ro mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:146a-33: der ro mnyam pa'i phyir sha'i khams 'jug bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:146a-34: de zhu ba'i phyir rus pa'i khams 'jug bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:146a-35: de yang zhu ba'i phyir pags pa'i khams zhu bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:146a-36: de dag yongs su zad pa'i phyir lus la sogs pa'i khams gsum yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:146a-37: des na dbang po dang phung po dang 'byung ba'i khams rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:146a-38: des na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnams mi dmigs so //
T02D1197:146a-39: de ltar cha gnyis gnyis med pa'i dngos po srog
T02D1197:146a-40: dang bde ba dag ro gcig pa'i dngos po'i srog
T02D1197:146a-41: gi brda ni tsheg drag ste /
T02D1197:146b-0: de yang dngos po'i @146b dbye bas thabs so //
T02D1197:146b-1: dngos po rnams mthar byed pas na shes rab bo //
T02D1197:146b-2: de bzhin du bde ba ni rjes dbyangs te /
T02D1197:146b-3: de yang dngos po'i dbye bas shes rab dang thabs nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:146b-4: de ltar khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba brtan pa dang
T02D1197:146b-5: g-yo ba la sogs pa thams cad shes rab dang
T02D1197:146b-7: de rjes sangs rgyas nyid ces pa ni shes rab
T02D1197:146b-8: dang thabs kyi sbyor ba dag gi rjes su sangs
T02D1197:146b-9: rgyas kyi spyan gyis gang mthong ba'i dngos po de
T02D1197:146b-10: thams cad ni gzhon nu ma'i chags pa bzhin no
T02D1197:146b-11: // de yang bdag gis bla ma brgyud pa'i man
T02D1197:146b-12: ngag las shes mdo kyi 'on kyang gzhung 'dir ma
T02D1197:146b-13: // brjod de / brjod du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:146b-14: de yang bla ma dang lung dang bdag nyid la
T02D1197:146b-15: yid ches pas brgyud pa las bdag nyid kyis rtogs
T02D1197:146b-16: pa'i phyir ro // yang na bla ma dang dpa'
T02D1197:146b-17: bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i bka' drin gyi rtogs pa'i
T02D1197:146b-18: pa'i phyir ro // don to // de la rang
T02D1197:146b-19: gi lus la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs
T02D1197:146b-20: su bcad pa gnyis kyi don bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1197:146b-21: dgongs bshad gzhan gyis gdan bzhir gsungs te /
T02D1197:146b-22: de bzhin du tshigs bcad dang po phyed kyis bdag gi gdan no //
T02D1197:146b-23: gnyis pa ni tshigs bcad phye kyis gzhan gyi gdan no //
T02D1197:146b-24: gsum pa'i tshigs bcad phyed kyi sbyor ba'i gdan no //
T02D1197:146b-25: bzhi pa'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis gsang ba'i gdan bstan te mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D1197:146b-26: de la rang gi lus la spyod pa ni sangs
T02D1197:146b-27: rgyas nyid de 'dir bdag gi gdan gyi rkang pa
T02D1197:146b-28: nas gtsug tor gyi bar gyi rtsa stong phrag bdun
T02D1197:146b-29: cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor lo de rnams la khyab
T02D1197:146b-30: par byed pa'i srog gi rlung ngo //
T02D1197:146b-31: da yang bdag gi gdan te /
T02D1197:146b-32: gang gi phyir bdag srog la brten pa'o //
T02D1197:146b-33: de yang rang gi lus sngon du gsungs pa'i phung
T02D1197:146b-34: po dang khams la sogs pa rnams zad pa'i phyir
T02D1197:146b-36: de yang bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:146b-37: de nyid du sangs rgyas bzhugs te /
T02D1197:146b-38: bdag nyid kyis bde ba rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:146b-39: gzhan gang na yang med ces pa ni khyad par gyi don to //
T02D1197:146b-40: 'on kyang bdag nyid sangs rgyas te bdag nyid rtogs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:146b-42: lus las gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1197:146b-43: ces pa ni lus ni sngon du gsungs pa'i srog
T02D1197:146b-44: gam chag nyis po shes rab dang thabs dag go
T02D1197:146b-45: // lus las zhes pa ni de las gzhan pa
T02D1197:146b-46: ni gzhan gyi gdan zhes pa'i ming can 'od sal
T02D1197:147a-2: de yang sangs rgyas nyid de lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:147a-3: mi shes pa yis bsgribs par 'dod //
T02D1197:147a-5: sangs rgyas med gnyis med pa med //
T02D1197:147a-6: khon nyid med ye shes med //
T02D1197:147a-7: ces pa la sogs pa'i rnam grangs du mas bstan te /
T02D1197:147a-8: de thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:147a-9: mi shes pa yis bsgribs par 'dod //
T02D1197:147a-10: ces de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
T02D1197:147a-11: de ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob med par dngos grub med do //
T02D1197:147a-12: de yang mchog tu zab pa'i phyir don dam pa'o //
T02D1197:147a-13: de'i phyir kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag dbyer med pa'i phyir sbyor ba'i gdan gsungs te /
T02D1197:147a-14: rang lus ye shes chen po'i gnas //
T02D1197:147a-15: zhes pa ni 'dir 'chad bzhin pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i
T02D1197:147a-16: tshul gyis 'khor lo bzhi rab tu phye bas sngon
T02D1197:147a-17: du gsungs pa'i byang chub sems zhu ba'am /
T02D1197:147a-18: rgyu ba la sogs pas gang lus la byang chub
T02D1197:147a-19: sems kyi rang bzhin gyi lha dang lha mo bsgoms
T02D1197:147a-20: pa las lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kun rdzob
T02D1197:147a-21: nyid bskyed pa de ni rang gi lus la gnas
T02D1197:147a-22: pa'i byang chub sems kyi rnam pa rtsa'i ye shes
T02D1197:147a-24: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa nyid //
T02D1197:147a-25: ces pa ni de ltar gsungs pa'i ye shes chen
T02D1197:147a-26: po rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis re re'i
T02D1197:147a-27: bde ba sna tshogs pa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa
T02D1197:147a-28: las / bdag dang bdag gi rtog pa spangs pa
T02D1197:147a-29: ye shes dang shes bya dag dbyer med pa ni
T02D1197:147a-31: de bzhin du gsang ba'i gdan gsungs pa /
T02D1197:147a-32: dngos po kun la khyab byed pa //
T02D1197:147a-33: zhes pa ni 'dir rang rig pa'i ye shes 'byung
T02D1197:147a-34: ba chen po lnga'i bdag nyid de ni rnal 'byor
T02D1197:147a-35: pa rnams kyi sgom pa'i dus su yang sems rang
T02D1197:147a-36: rig pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i bde ba nye
T02D1197:147a-38: des na nye bar dmigs pas bsam du med pa yang bsam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:147a-39: de ni gsang ba'i gdan no //
T02D1197:147a-40: gang gi phyir gsang bar bya bas na gsang ba'am
T02D1197:147a-41: dpag par dka' ba cung zad kyang snang ba med
T02D1197:147a-42: pa gang gis kyang mi dmigs pa sus kyang mi
T02D1197:147a-43: mthong pa'o // de bzhin du rang rig pa'i sems
T02D1197:147a-44: dang sems las byung ba'i chos 'byung ba dang 'byung
T02D1197:147a-45: ba las gyur pa de yang snod la sogs pa
T02D1197:147a-46: bcud dang bcas pa brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos
T02D1197:147a-47: mthong pa'o // po'o // de la sogs pa dngos
T02D1197:147b-0: po'i mtha' yas pa rnams kyis brjod @147b pa'i dngos
T02D1197:147b-1: po de thams cad la khyab par byed pa de
T02D1197:147b-2: nyid kyis na rang rig pa'i ye she kyi rang
T02D1197:147b-4: de yang lus la gnas kyang lus ma skyes zhes
T02D1197:147b-5: pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi lus te sku'o
T02D1197:147b-6: // de rnams kyi lus la gnas pa ni rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:147b-7: de yang lus las phyir byung ba'o //
T02D1197:147b-8: de'i phyir lus la gnas kyang de lus las ma skyes te gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:147b-9: rgya che ba'i phyir lus dang khams rnams la brtags bzhin pa na gang las kyang ma skyes te /
T02D1197:147b-11: de'i phyir 'di ni gsang ba'i gdan no //
T02D1197:147b-12: de ltar gdan bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ni lnga pa de kho na nyid kyi gdan te /
T02D1197:147b-13: de yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:147b-14: da ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:147b-15: rdo rje snying pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:147b-16: gsol to zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'i tshig go //
T02D1197:147b-17: lus la rtsa ni du zhig mchis //
T02D1197:147b-18: zhes pa ni rdo rje snying pos gsol pa'o //
T02D1197:147b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D1197:147b-20: zhes pa ni bstan pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:147b-21: bcu phrag gnyis lhag brgya phrag gcig //
T02D1197:147b-23: ces pa ni mdor bsdus pa'i tshig go //
T02D1197:147b-24: de la lte bar padma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1197:147b-25: de bzhin du snying gar 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D1197:147b-26: mgrin par 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
T02D1197:147b-27: spyi bor 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1197:147b-28: de ltar sku dang thugs dang /
T02D1197:147b-30: ye shes kyi 'khor lo rnams rim pa bzhin drug cu rtsa bzhi dang brgyad dang /
T02D1197:147b-32: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang tu dbye ba nyid de mdor bsdus na /
T02D1197:147b-33: brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu'o //
T02D1197:147b-34: 'on kyang rgyas par ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu ste /
T02D1197:147b-35: rang bzhin gyi chos rnams kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1197:147b-36: gzhan 'jig rten du grags pa ni bye ba brag
T02D1197:147b-37: phyed dang bzhi ste ba spu dang skra'i chos nyid
T02D1197:147b-38: do // de ltar 'khor lo bzhi'i rab tu dbye
T02D1197:147b-39: ba'i rtsa lha'i rang bzhin rnams ni gdan bzhi la
T02D1197:147b-40: sogs pa rnams su shes par bya ste /
T02D1197:147b-41: des na 'dir ni rgyas par ma gsungs so //
T02D1197:147b-42: 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag gis bla ma brgyud pa'i
T02D1197:147b-43: man ngag gis 'di rnams kyi bshad pa cung zad
T02D1197:147b-44: tsam brjod do // de la re zhig / rang bzhin 'khor lor mi rtog pa //
T02D1197:147b-45: byang chub sems ni bde chen po //
T02D1197:148a-2: lte ba'i rtsa yi padmar 'jug / dbus rtsar btsan thabs sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:148a-3: lag pas rkang pa gnyis bzung nas //
T02D1197:148a-4: ltag pa nas ni sker gzung zhing //
T02D1197:148a-5: gru mo gnyis kyis sna ni gzir //
T02D1197:148a-6: de tshe rlung ni bzung bar byed //
T02D1197:148a-7: dbugs stang 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:148a-8: sems ni padmar gzhug par bya //
T02D1197:148a-9: chos rnams thams cad stong rang bzhin //
T02D1197:148a-10: phung po khams ni brgyad po gzhom //
T02D1197:148a-11: rtsa bcings pa yis rlung la zhugs //
T02D1197:148a-12: rlung gnyis dbyer ni med zhugs pas //
T02D1197:148a-13: padma'i mdud pa dbye bar bya //
T02D1197:148a-14: mgrin par brgyad gnyis kyi ni rtsa //
T02D1197:148a-15: dbu ma yi ni mdud par 'bar //
T02D1197:148a-16: sngon gyi byed pa'i bcings pas 'dor //
T02D1197:148a-17: bde ba chen po'i padmar 'jug / sum cu gnyis su zhugs pa yis //
T02D1197:148a-19: mthe bong nas ni rlung bkug cing //
T02D1197:148a-20: gtsug tor bar du 'dzag par bya //
T02D1197:148a-21: de nas bla ma'i bka' drin ni //
T02D1197:148a-22: rnal 'byor ma yis sde yi chos //
T02D1197:148a-23: 'di ni su la'ang bstan mi bya //
T02D1197:148a-25: rtsa'i 'khor lo gzung ba'i man ngag 'dis dngos grub
T02D1197:148a-26: thob cing dus su 'chi ba yang slu na dus
T02D1197:148a-27: ma yin par 'chi ba lta ci smos /
T02D1197:148a-28: 'dis rgyun mi 'chad par bslabs pa'i sbyor bas sangs
T02D1197:148a-29: rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang ba nyid kyang 'thob
T02D1197:148a-30: bo // slar yang gang gi che rnal 'byor pa
T02D1197:148a-31: rnams man ngag bsgom pa'i dus su rtsa sum cu
T02D1197:148a-32: rtsa gnyis khong stong de rnams kyi nang rnams su
T02D1197:148a-33: byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid kyi rgyun de rnams
T02D1197:148a-34: 'byung ba de rnams bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:148a-35: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:148a-36: 'dir byang chub sems ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1197:148a-37: de la gcig ni rgyun 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:148a-38: gnyis pa ni yi ge'i don nyid do //
T02D1197:148a-39: de dag la rgyun 'dzag pa de ni kun rdzob
T02D1197:148a-40: kyi bden pas rnal 'byor pa rnams la bde ba
T02D1197:148a-42: de bzhin du gang yi ge'i don de ni don dam pa'i bde ba ster bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:148a-43: de yang rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi ming
T02D1197:148a-44: gi dbye bas ji srid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba
T02D1197:148a-45: de srid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mtshan rnams thob
T02D1197:148a-46: pa'o // de bzhin du mchog tu 'dod ces pa
T02D1197:148a-47: ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba 'dod ces
T02D1197:148a-48: pa'o // pa'i don to // de yang 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:148b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba tshig 'bras @148b bu
T02D1197:148b-1: la nye bar sbyor dpa'i phyir zhes sbyar te de
T02D1197:148b-2: nyid kyi las ni mi phyed ma zhes bya ba
T02D1197:148b-6: thog ma par dang mtha' ma ru //
T02D1197:148b-8: rkang pa nas ni mgo rung bya //
T02D1197:148b-9: dy'a bdud rtsi yis ni dga' bzhin pa //
T02D1197:148b-11: khong stong thams cad du ni 'gro //
T02D1197:148b-13: de nyid du ni 'dzin par byed //
T02D1197:148b-15: bde ba zhes pa brten pa yin //
T02D1197:148b-17: don dam pa yi sems ni nyid //
T02D1197:148b-19: dpyad pa yis ni byang chub mchog / di /
T02D1197:148b-20: nyin mo'i dus su rtsa ni grang //
T02D1197:148b-22: mgo yi spyi gtsug bar du khyab //
T02D1197:148b-24: tshig ni lce dbang padma ru //
T02D1197:148b-26: ma du lung ga'i mgo bo ru //
T02D1197:148b-28: bzhi pa rdo rje'i rtse mo'i rtsar //
T02D1197:148b-30: g-yon tu khu pa'i bu ga ru //
T02D1197:148b-32: nor bu gnas su song ba tsam //
T02D1197:148b-34: byang chub sems su thim pa'o //
T02D1197:148b-36: dbang po thams cad la ni khros //
T02D1197:148b-38: dbu ma'i rtsa ru rtogs pa yi //
T02D1197:148b-40: gtum mo yi ni gzugs kyis 'dzag / bha /
T02D1197:148b-41: dngos dang dngos med zad byed ma //
T02D1197:148b-43: sgrub po rnams kyis mchog gi gzugs //
T02D1197:148b-45: grags dang bde bas sgeg pa mo //
T02D1197:148b-47: mchog de kho na nyid ni brten //
T02D1197:148b-51: du ba'i lam ni snying nyid do //
T02D1197:148b-52: yang na 'og lta'i bzang mo'i gzugs can ma //
T02D1197:148b-54: tshar gcad rjes su bzung byed ma //
T02D1197:148b-56: dben pa'i bdag nyid skyed byed ma //
T02D1197:148b-58: khams ni bco brgyad 'bab pa mo //
T02D1197:148b-60: lus rnams thams cad du ni rgyu //
T02D1197:148b-62: mgrin pa dang ni rkang du mdar //
T02D1197:148b-64: myur 'gro'i mchog ni lte ba ru //
T02D1197:148b-68: rgyu dang mi rgyu snying 'khor lor //
T02D1197:148b-70: rkang rnams bcing bar byor byed ma //
T02D1197:148b-72: khu ba thams cad du ni 'phangs //
T02D1197:148b-74: bar gyi mtshams ni tshol 'gro ma //
T02D1197:148b-76: shing gi gzugs su 'ang de shes bya //
T02D1197:148b-78: byang chub kyi ni sems nyid gzung //
T02D1197:148b-80: au yi yi ge yi ni gzugs //
T02D1197:148b-84: thams cad spyod par song ba ni //
T02D1197:148b-85: la la n'a bcings sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:148b-86: ra sa n'a ni rkan gyi lam //
T02D1197:148b-88: rtsa gnyis aa wa dh'u t'ir ma //
T02D1197:148b-90: lte ba yi ni bu gar zhugs //
T02D1197:148b-92: nga rgyal can rnams rtogs byed ma //
T02D1197:148b-94: sna bug gnyis ka las ni steng //
T02D1197:148b-96: dbang po thams cad dgug par bya //
T02D1197:148b-98: dro ba'i sgor ni song ba'i rtsa //
T02D1197:148b-100: yur ba yi ni ngo mtshar byed //
T02D1197:148b-101: kha dog sna tshogs spangs pa nyid //
T02D1197:149a-3: bu ga snying po las 'bar ma //
T02D1197:149a-5: der ni bdag nyid mchod par byed //
T02D1197:149a-7: gang zhig snang ba gsum spangs pa //
T02D1197:149a-9: de yi rgyu ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1197:149a-11: bzhi pa'i dbang gis rtsa ni gang //
T02D1197:149a-13: blo ldan mkha' bzhin rtag tu bsam //
T02D1197:149a-15: gang dag gi ni khams thams cad //
T02D1197:149a-17: lus can gyi ni rtsa mang po //
T02D1197:149a-19: de nyid du ni ngal ni bsos //
T02D1197:149a-23: der ni shin tu brje dbang gis //
T02D1197:149a-25: rgyu ba dag gi rtsa 'dra ba //
T02D1197:149a-27: de nyid du ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1197:149a-29: gnad gcod sred pa mthar byed ma //
T02D1197:149a-31: khug rna du ba la sogs kyis //
T02D1197:149a-33: phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'dod can ma //
T02D1197:149a-35: rtsibs bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lor bshad //
T02D1197:149a-37: rgyu ba'i srog ni mdzes pa'o //
T02D1197:149a-38: b'a me yis rab tu gang bar bya //
T02D1197:149a-40: nyon mongs pa ni slu zhing gsad //
T02D1197:149a-42: sgra yi rnam pa lta bu'i rtsa //
T02D1197:149a-44: yid bzangs steng du rab rgyu ma //
T02D1197:149a-46: yid srub steng du song ba nyid //
T02D1197:149a-48: mi yi sna ni 'phyang bas na //
T02D1197:149a-50: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsang //
T02D1197:149a-52: de yi gnas ni steng bu ga / tri /
T02D1197:149a-53: rtsa gsum zla nyi sgra gcan te //
T02D1197:149a-55: dus me zhes pa'i bya ba'ang bcings //
T02D1197:149a-57: skar ma rnams dang mig sman mkha' //
T02D1197:149a-59: thams cad kyi ni kha ni 'byed //
T02D1197:149a-60: mi dbang pos mchog ni rtogs pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:149a-62: rtsa gang dag ni mdud pa med //
T02D1197:149a-64: glu yi sgra ni rjes 'gro ma //
T02D1197:149a-66: h'a zhes pa las 'char ba nyid //
T02D1197:149a-68: gtum mo yi ni gnas su 'ongs //
T02D1197:149a-72: gti mug la sogs smos cing gos //
T02D1197:149a-74: 'byung ba thams cad rnams kyi gzhi //
T02D1197:149a-76: de nyid du ni dga' bar bya //
T02D1197:149a-78: byang chub lam la sems dpas gzung //
T02D1197:149a-80: dgra bo rnams ni zad byed ma //
T02D1197:149a-82: 'dod pa'i mchog ni kun du sba //
T02D1197:149a-83: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po kun rdzob dang don
T02D1197:149a-84: dam pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid brgyud pa'i rim pa
T02D1197:149a-85: bla ma dang dge pa'i grogs mchog de nyid kyi
T02D1197:149a-86: kha nas khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1197:149a-87: rtsa 'di rnams zhes pa ni slar yang rdo rje snying pos zhus pa'o //
T02D1197:149a-88: de rnams ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1197:149a-89: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das la dris ba'o //
T02D1197:149a-90: ji lta bu zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:149a-91: rang bzhin ji lta bu zhes pa ste /
T02D1197:149a-92: 'dir gang gi phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pas rnal
T02D1197:149b-0: 'byor ma'i @149b rgyud rnams la dmigs pa de rnams
T02D1197:149b-1: thams cad ni rtsa rnams te /
T02D1197:149b-2: de yang ci bsgom pa'i gnas ma yin nam lus rang grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:149b-3: yang na lus kyi nang rnams su padma'i rtsa ba
T02D1197:149b-4: lta bu tha dad pa'i 'khor lo yod dam de
T02D1197:149b-5: ji lta bur 'gyur zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:149b-6: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan gsung te /
T02D1197:149b-7: 'dir dgongs bshad gzhan gyis lus la sku dang gsung
T02D1197:149b-8: dang thugs kyi 'khor lo ni srid pa gsum du
T02D1197:149b-9: gsungs te / de yang gcig tu 'dus pa ni lus te /
T02D1197:149b-10: de'i yongs su gyur pa zhes pa ni lus thams
T02D1197:149b-11: cad kyi ba spu'i bu ga la sogs pa dang
T02D1197:149b-12: tshigs de rnams thams cad du rtsa sum cu rtsa
T02D1197:149b-13: gnyis nang du 'dus par 'gyur ba ni khu ba'i
T02D1197:149b-15: de'i phyir thams cad gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1197:149b-16: gal te re zhig byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:149b-17: gzhan rgyus pa dang rtsa khong stong rnams ji lta
T02D1197:149b-18: bu zhe na / ji ltar bu ram shing gi
T02D1197:149b-19: sdong bu'i khams sna tshogs pa ni bems po'i bdag
T02D1197:149b-20: bu zhe na / nyid do // ro ni thams cad la khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:149b-21: de bzhin du lus kyi rgyus pa sna tshogs pa dang rtsa rnams kyang bems por gyur pa ste /
T02D1197:149b-22: de rnams la byang chub sems ni ro gcig tu thams cad la khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:149b-23: 'on kyang de ni gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis su skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:149b-24: de la re zhig mi phyed pa ni spyi bor ro //
T02D1197:149b-25: phra gzugs ma ni spyi gtsug tu //
T02D1197:149b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rjer gsungs pa'i tshig las shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:149b-27: ji ltar 'dir bu ram shing sdong bu gcig nyid
T02D1197:149b-28: la mdud pa sna tshogs pa yod pa de bzhin
T02D1197:149b-29: du lus la yang mdud pa sna tshogs pa yod
T02D1197:149b-30: pa'o // des na gzang ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa'i don to //
T02D1197:149b-31: ji lta bu ram shing gi sdong du 'khrul 'khor
T02D1197:149b-32: gyis ro drangs te dngos po logs su byas pa
T02D1197:149b-33: de yang gang du 'dod pa der khyer te chang
T02D1197:149b-34: la sogs pa bsing ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:149b-35: de bzhin du lus la lte ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyis
T02D1197:149b-36: te dbus steng dang 'og tu 'gro bas byang chub
T02D1197:149b-37: sems kyi bcud drangs pa logs su byas pa'i dngos
T02D1197:149b-38: po ni khams rnams las tha dad pa nyid de
T02D1197:149b-39: / byang chub sems kyi bcud de yang gang du
T02D1197:149b-40: 'dod pa der khyer te rtsa sna tshogs par rgyu
T02D1197:149b-41: ba'i phyir ro zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:150a-0: byang chub sems de la yon tan med ba med de dri ma med ba'i phyir @150a * //
T02D1197:150a-2: de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:150a-3: gal te re zhig dbang po gnyis yang dag par
T02D1197:150a-4: spyor ba las byung ba'i byang chub sems lag pa'am
T02D1197:150a-5: nya phyis la sogs pas blangs pa de'i tshe de
T02D1197:150a-6: la cung zad kyang srog gi gzugs med de bems
T02D1197:150a-7: bo de nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:150a-8: 'on te gal te srog med na de las ji ltar 'jig rten rnams skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1197:150a-9: de gsungs pa ma dang pha yang dag par sbyor ba las 'gyur te /
T02D1197:150a-10: pha med par ma 'ba' zhig las mi skye'o //
T02D1197:150a-11: de bzhin du ma med par pha 'ba' zhig las kyang mi skye'o //
T02D1197:150a-12: de'i phyir bde btsam 'ba' zhig gi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:150a-13: ji ltar bu ram shing gi ro mang ra ba'i
T02D1197:150a-14: rang bzhin de la srog yod pa ni ma yin
T02D1197:150a-16: de ltar dngos po'i sbyor bas bems po ma yin pa'i dngos po rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:150a-17: ji ltar sa la sa bon sna tshogs pa btab
T02D1197:150a-18: pas 'bras bu sna tshogs pa skye bar 'gyur zhes
T02D1197:150a-19: pa la sogs pa ni bden pa'am mi bden par
T02D1197:150a-21: 'o zhes pa ni de ltar zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:150a-23: khams la sogs pa'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang /
T02D1197:150a-24: de bzhin rtsa ba'i bdag gnyid rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud do //
T02D1197:150a-25: des na kun rdzob dang don dam pa kha sbyor
T02D1197:150a-26: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor
T02D1197:150a-27: 'dis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes skye ba
T02D1197:150a-28: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:150a-29: de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D1197:150a-30: 'on kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang
T02D1197:150a-31: yang dag par spong ba zhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi
T02D1197:150a-32: rkang ba bzhin ni dbang po lnga la sogs pa
T02D1197:150a-33: bzhis bshad de / des na bstan pa dang bshad pa nges pa'o //
T02D1197:150a-34: byang chub sems zhes pa ni 'dir 'jig rten las
T02D1197:150a-35: 'das pa don dam pa de la 'jug pa'i ming
T02D1197:150a-36: gang la yod pa ni byang chub kyi sems la
T02D1197:150a-37: 'jug pa zhes pa'i rab tu byed pa'o //
T02D1197:150a-38: de yang las gang gis bskyed pa de byed pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa'o //
T02D1197:150a-39: dang po la ltos pas na gnyis pa'o //
T02D1197:150a-40: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa
T02D1197:150a-41: dang po'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i rgya cher
T02D1197:150a-42: 'grel pa yang dag par lta ba'i dran pa'i snang
T02D1197:150a-43: ba zhes pa'i gzhung bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D1197:150b-0: // / da ni de kho na nyid dmigs pa'i rab tu byed ba gsum pa bstan pa'i @150b phyir /
T02D1197:150b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:150b-2: de nas zhes pa ni byang chub sems la 'jug
T02D1197:150b-3: pa'i rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i rjes thogs su'o
T02D1197:150b-4: // bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni ye shes dang shes bya dag ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:150b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod de zhes
T02D1197:150b-6: pa ni sgyu ma'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid do
T02D1197:150b-7: // de rnams kyis mchod par bya zhes pa ni
T02D1197:150b-8: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid la yid ches
T02D1197:150b-9: // pas so // phyag btsal ni zhes pa ni
T02D1197:150b-10: de rnams kyis yang dang yang du phyag 'chal ba'o
T02D1197:150b-11: // pas so // // de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs par byed do //
T02D1197:150b-12: gsang chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snying
T02D1197:150b-13: po zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye
T02D1197:150b-15: gsang chen zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang spyod yul ma yin pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:150b-16: bla na med ces pa ni khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug la sogs pa dang /
T02D1197:150b-17: nyan thos la sogs pa las bla na med pa
T02D1197:150b-18: ste de rnams kyi gong ma phul du phyung ba
T02D1197:150b-19: yang dag pa'i ye shes thams cad mkhyen pa'i bgrod
T02D1197:150b-20: bya'o // de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gyi tshig gsungs so //
T02D1197:150b-21: de nas zhes pa ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes
T02D1197:150b-22: thogs su bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje la dmigs
T02D1197:150b-23: te / rmi lam bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:150b-24: rgyud thams cad ces pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D1197:150b-25: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang
T02D1197:150b-27: snying po zhes pa ni de rnams kyi snying po zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:150b-28: de ci zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1197:150b-29: ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la /
T02D1197:150b-30: ye shes zhes pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad
T02D1197:150b-31: lag mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du des yongs
T02D1197:150b-33: yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mar me bzhin du rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:150b-34: rdo rje zhes pa ni dngos po dang dngos po
T02D1197:150b-35: med pa ye shes kyi snang ba de'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:150b-36: nyid ces pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la de skad
T02D1197:150b-37: ces bya'o // de'i phyir rgyud thams cad ces pa ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud do //
T02D1197:150b-38: de gsang chen zhes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir gsang chen zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:150b-39: de yang gsungs pa zhes pa ni brag ca'i sgra
T02D1197:150b-40: ltar nyan pa po rnams gzhug pa'i phyir der de
T02D1197:151a-1: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir lus la bu ga bcu drug tu 'gyur te /
T02D1197:151a-2: de rnams kyang yi ge bcu drug gi ming rnams kyis mtshon to //
T02D1197:151a-3: gang dag bu ga zhes pa de dag ni mtshams rnams te /
T02D1197:151a-4: 'di ltar ra gsum ni lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa'i mtshams rnams su'o //
T02D1197:151a-5: de bzhin du ha ni spyi bo'i mtshams su'o //
T02D1197:151a-6: lhag ma yi ge bcu gnyis ni rim pa bzhin
T02D1197:151a-7: lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams
T02D1197:151a-8: su'o // de ltar ra gsum dang ha ni aawa dh'u t'i la yang dag par sbyar ba'o //
T02D1197:151a-9: de bzhin du yi ge bcu gnyis ni la la
T02D1197:151a-10: n'a dang ra sa n'a la drug drug yang dag
T02D1197:151a-11: par sbyor ba'o // gzhan sgo dgu rnams kyi bu
T02D1197:151a-12: ga dgu ni rab tu byed pa dang por gsungs
T02D1197:151a-13: par sbyor ba'o // so // de ltar bu ga nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus so //
T02D1197:151a-14: gang snying ga'i bu ga de ni gtsug tor gyi bu ga'o //
T02D1197:151a-15: de bzhin du sngon du gsungs pa'i lte ba dang
T02D1197:151a-16: snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bor yi ge
T02D1197:151a-17: rnams te / de nyid der rim gyis 'og dang steng du 'bab pa'o //
T02D1197:151a-18: de'i phyir dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:151a-19: de yang sangs rgyas kun dngos po //
T02D1197:151a-20: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga ste
T02D1197:151a-21: lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i
T02D1197:151a-22: don to // sems dpa' zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings la sems dpa' zhes brjod de /
T02D1197:151a-24: yang na rtag pa'i rang bzhin nyid de sems can
T02D1197:151a-25: thams cad rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa nges
T02D1197:151a-26: na chos kyi sku'i rgyun gyi sbyor bas phul du
T02D1197:151a-28: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyang yin la /
T02D1197:151a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin te /
T02D1197:151a-30: des na ma skyes shing mi 'gag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1197:151a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni de bzhin du rdo rje'i sgras ni chos kyi sku gzung ngo //
T02D1197:151a-32: mi phyed pas na rdo rje'am //
T02D1197:151a-33: dus thams cad du mi 'jigs pa'i chos ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:151a-34: khyab par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:151a-35: 'di dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:151a-36: yang na rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams te sangs rgyas te /
T02D1197:151a-37: de rnams kyi rang bzhin gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:151a-40: bde ba zhes pa ni bde ba yang bya ba tsam zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:151b-0: @151b bde ba'i mchog ces pa ni lhun gyis grub
T02D1197:151b-1: pa'i bde ba dpes rtogs par byed pa bzang mo
T02D1197:151b-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang lhan cig nyid med
T02D1197:151b-3: par gyur pa thog ma med pa nas grub pa
T02D1197:151b-4: de nyid ma grub pa bsgrub bya med cing sgrub
T02D1197:151b-5: pa po yang med pa sgrub pa yang cung zad
T02D1197:151b-6: med pa / dngos po thams cad rgyud med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:151b-7: de bzhin du grub pa'i ye shes 'di la dpyad pa'i yon tan gsungs te /
T02D1197:151b-8: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:151b-10: ni zhes pa ni gang gi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:151b-11: bcom ldan rnal 'byor zhes pa ni rnal 'byor de
T02D1197:151b-12: ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs
T02D1197:151b-15: de'i bcom ldan ni rnal 'byor gyi khyad par ro //
T02D1197:151b-16: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa dang /
T02D1197:151b-18: de ni bcom ldan zhes pa'i sgra'o //
T02D1197:151b-19: brtan zhes pa ni de ltar gong na med pa'i
T02D1197:151b-20: rnal 'byor chen po rtag pa dang chad pa dang
T02D1197:151b-21: bral ba'o // de yang sku bzhi med par mi skye zhing mi 'gag pa'o //
T02D1197:151b-23: sku bzhi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gong nas gong du 'jug pa ste /
T02D1197:151b-24: tshogs kyi yon tan rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:151b-25: de nas 'dir de yang 'dra ba'i ye shes brtan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:151b-27: de'i phyir mchog tu rtags pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:151b-28: 'on kyang yid srubs zhes pa ni 'dod pa'o //
T02D1197:151b-29: de yang da ltar byung ba zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
T02D1197:151b-30: des ming sna tshogs pa'i blos sangs rgyas rdo rje
T02D1197:151b-31: 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams 'dod pa'o
T02D1197:151b-32: // rtag tu zhes pa ni dus bzhi gang gi
T02D1197:151b-33: dang po dang bar ma dang tha ma rnams su
T02D1197:151b-34: byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid rnam
T02D1197:151b-35: par rtog pa mi 'dor bas 'gro ba'i don byed
T02D1197:151b-36: // pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du /
T02D1197:151b-37: rang bzhin gyis ni 'da' dka' ba //
T02D1197:151b-38: zhes pa ni dka' spyod 'dor bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:151b-40: 'dir sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs pa
T02D1197:151b-41: mdzes par 'dod pa de rnams sna tshogs pa'i las
T02D1197:151b-42: kyi sbyor ba'i rjes su 'brangs te /
T02D1197:151b-43: 'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:151b-45: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs pas //
T02D1197:152a-0: zhes pa ni 'dir gal te re zhig rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis las @152a * //
T02D1197:152a-2: las des sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1197:152a-3: nyid thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe mdzad ces pas
T02D1197:152a-4: sangs rgyas la sogs pa yang mdzad par 'gyur ro
T02D1197:152a-5: // mdzad pa la yang skyon yod de /
T02D1197:152a-7: 'o na sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de rnams kyang rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:152a-9: dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
T02D1197:152a-11: de'i phyir 'dul ba med pa ma byas pa las
T02D1197:152a-12: med pa yin na ji ltar las sna tshogs par
T02D1197:152a-13: 'grub ce na / de nyid bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:152a-14: 'dir brtan pa dang g-yo ba zhes pa'i snod dang
T02D1197:152a-15: bcud la sogs pa'i dngos po sna tshogs pa'i khams
T02D1197:152a-16: gsum pa'o // sangs rgyas kun zhes pa ni de
T02D1197:152a-17: yang mchog tu bde ba dmigs pa med pa stong
T02D1197:152a-18: pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:152a-19: sogs pa'i sgras 'od gsal las 'byung bar 'gyur ba gzung ngo //
T02D1197:152a-22: zhes pa ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po
T02D1197:152a-23: de rnams kyi rang bzhin mi zad pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:152a-25: de rnams kyang rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi
T02D1197:152a-26: rang bzhin du can rgyu dang 'bras bu'i phyir ro
T02D1197:152a-27: // yang na sangs rgyas kun ni nyan thos dang
T02D1197:152a-28: rang sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po dang yang
T02D1197:152a-29: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D1197:152a-30: sogs pa'i sgra ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa bzung ste /
T02D1197:152a-31: de rnams kyi dngos po ni chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:152a-33: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1197:152a-34: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D1197:152a-35: la sogs pa dngos su sangs rgyas su byed pa'o
T02D1197:152a-36: // mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1197:152a-37: zhes pa la mkha' 'gro ma ni sprul pas nam mkhar 'gro zhing rgyu bas khyab pa'o //
T02D1197:152a-38: ki ni aa ka'i skad dbyings las //
T02D1197:152a-40: n'i ni 'od zer phra ba'i gzugs can de byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid kyi rtsa'i tshogs so //
T02D1197:152a-41: sdom pa zhes pa ni 'di dag gi sdom pa
T02D1197:152a-42: chos kyi dbyings dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:152a-43: las byung zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:152a-44: 'dis zhes pa ni gsungs pa'i rigs pa 'dis sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:152a-45: des na sgyu ma'i rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul chen mo skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:152b-0: thams cad du sna tshogs mchog ces @152b pa ni
T02D1197:152b-1: thams cad kyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid ye shes chen
T02D1197:152b-2: po de yang bsam du med pa'i zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:152b-3: to // sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub //
T02D1197:152b-4: ces pa ni las khyad par can sna tshogs la
T02D1197:152b-5: sogs pa bstan pas sangs rgyas dang rdo rje sems
T02D1197:152b-6: dpa' la sogs pa byas par 'grub po //
T02D1197:152b-7: de 'ba' zhig grub par ma zad de /
T02D1197:152b-8: sems can kun don bla na med //
T02D1197:152b-9: ces pa des kyang bya ba'i phyir bla na med ces pa ni yang dang yang byed pa'o //
T02D1197:152b-10: bud med kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D1197:152b-11: bud med kun zhes pa ni lha mo thams cad
T02D1197:152b-12: de / de rnams nyid sgyu ma'i lha mo zhing skyes dang /
T02D1197:152b-13: sngags skyes dang lhan cig skyes pa gnas dang nye
T02D1197:152b-14: ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams so
T02D1197:152b-15: // rnal 'byor de rnams dang sgyu mas grub pa'o //
T02D1197:152b-16: de bzhin du sangs rgyas de thams cad dang rnal
T02D1197:152b-17: 'byor ma rnams gang du grub pa 'dir gsungs pa
T02D1197:152b-18: / 'dir dam pa'i las kyis sngon gyi gzugs spangs
T02D1197:152b-19: te phung po rnams 'dor bar 'gyur ba'i tshe khams
T02D1197:152b-20: gsum pa rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs kyi sangs rgyas par
T02D1197:152b-21: / 'gyur ro // da bzhin du rang gi gzugs
T02D1197:152b-22: yongs su brjes pa zhes pa slar bdag gi gzugs
T02D1197:152b-24: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni nye bar btags pa'i tshig go //
T02D1197:152b-25: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang rnal 'byor ma rnams su shes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:152b-26: de'i phyir grub ces pa ni bsam du med pa'i
T02D1197:152b-27: ye shes kyi rang bzhin no zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:152b-28: // de bzhin du bsam du med pa dang /
T02D1197:152b-29: shin tu bsam du med pa dang /
T02D1197:152b-30: tshes bsam du med pa dang /
T02D1197:152b-31: tshes pas kyang ches bsam du med pa de nyid kyang bsam du med pa'o //
T02D1197:152b-32: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de
T02D1197:152b-33: ltar lnga po che ba'i che ba'i ye shes bsam
T02D1197:152b-34: du med pa de nyi kyang bsam du med pa
T02D1197:152b-35: sna tshogs pa de nyid bsam pa des na sgyu
T02D1197:152b-36: ma dang shin tu sgyu ma dang sgyu ma chen
T02D1197:152b-37: po sgyu ma'i phyag rgya de yang chen po'i chen
T02D1197:152b-39: de yang 'dir mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa dgongs bshad gzhan gyis bstan te /
T02D1197:152b-40: de ltar dee ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes pa la sogs pa skad dbyings las brjod de /
T02D1197:152b-41: dee nam mkha' 'gro ba ni stong pa'i bdag nyid du byed pa'o //
T02D1197:153a-0: 'di rnams kyis don chen po'i dngos 'grub bstan pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig gsungs @153a * //
T02D1197:153a-2: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:153a-3: 'dir sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa
T02D1197:153a-4: dang brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dngos
T02D1197:153a-5: po thams cad kyi go skabs ster ba zhes pa
T02D1197:153a-6: ye shes kyi nam mkha' shin tu zab pa'i chos
T02D1197:153a-7: kyi dbyings kyi yul snang ba med pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-8: snang ba med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-10: stong pa med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-11: brdzun pa med pa dang brdzun pa med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-13: dngos po med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-15: sa bon med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-17: mi 'gyur ba med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-19: skabs med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-21: brjod du med pa ma yi pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-22: brjod kyis mi lang ba dang brjod kyis mi lang ba ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-24: gnyis med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-26: 'od med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-28: gzugs med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-30: bems po med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-32: bstan du med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-34: bdag med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1197:153a-36: bsam du med pa ma yin pa de la sogs
T02D1197:153a-37: pa'i yon tan rgya chen pos nam mkha' gang ba
T02D1197:153a-38: 'di spyod pa de thams cad ni nam mkha' la
T02D1197:153a-40: dpag tu med pa de dang lhan cig spyod pa
T02D1197:153a-41: zhes pa phung po drug dang khams dang skye mched
T02D1197:153a-42: la sogs pa thams cad sgrib pa med pa de
T02D1197:153a-44: mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa ni gcig gi tshig can gyi rigs te /
T02D1197:153a-45: dngos po 'di dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis
T02D1197:153a-46: bdag nyid bdag med pa de bsgrubs pas na de
T02D1197:153a-47: mi bzad pa'i gnas so zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D1197:153a-48: dang gzhan gyi don rab tu sgrub ces dgongs so
T02D1197:153a-49: // yang na dngos po thams cad kyi go skabs
T02D1197:153a-50: 'byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad
T02D1197:153a-52: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba drug go //
T02D1197:153a-53: de dag lhan cig spyod pa zhes pa de ni
T02D1197:153a-54: de bzhin du skyes pa nyid kyis gcig gis tshig
T02D1197:153a-55: can te / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:153a-56: de dag gis ni dngos grub de nyid rdzogs pas
T02D1197:153b-0: khyab pa rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang @153b ldan
T02D1197:153b-1: pa stong pa nyid kyi tshul gang yan pa de
T02D1197:153b-3: bsam du med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:153b-4: de ltar rab tu grub pa ste /
T02D1197:153b-5: de ltar byung ba la des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:153b-6: des na zhing skyes la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1197:153b-7: thabs kyi bdag nyid can 'grub ces pa ni tshul
T02D1197:153b-8: lo // kun du zhes pa ni phyogs bcur ro //
T02D1197:153b-9: sna tshogs ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:153b-10: rgyas 'debs pa ni kun du sna tshogs phyag rgya ste lha mo'o //
T02D1197:153b-11: de yang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs par de bzhin
T02D1197:153b-12: du blta ba dang 'khor los sgyur ba drug tu
T02D1197:153b-13: blta bar bya'o // dang gi sgra ni khyad par
T02D1197:153b-14: te tha mal pa'i bud med kyi gzugs nyid lha
T02D1197:153b-15: mo'i gzugs can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:153b-16: yang na kun du sna tshogs phyag rgya ni khams
T02D1197:153b-17: gsum gyi sems can thams cad yang dag pa'i ye
T02D1197:153b-19: kun du zhes pa ni sems can de rnams des rgyas gdab pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:153b-20: sdom pa de nyid gsungs pa zhes shes pa ni don 'di'o //
T02D1197:153b-21: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang
T02D1197:153b-22: dag pa'i ye shes kyang rigs lnga'i dbye bas lnga'i
T02D1197:153b-23: rang bzhin te / de yang rdo rje dang padma dang /
T02D1197:153b-25: ma gsungs kyang 'khor lo dang ral gri yang gzung ngo //
T02D1197:153b-26: de'i phyir sems can bsgom pa la mos pas de
T02D1197:153b-27: rnams khyad par can gyi rigs lnga rnams su 'gyur
T02D1197:153b-29: rdo rje 'dzin gyi rigs dang de bzhin du padma 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1197:153b-31: 'khor lo dang ral gri 'dzin pa'i rigs rnams so //
T02D1197:153b-32: dang zhes pa ni ma gsungs pa'i rigs kyang rtogs par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1197:153b-33: sems can de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas rdo
T02D1197:153b-34: rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi rigs
T02D1197:153b-35: can te / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs so //
T02D1197:153b-36: de ltar thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye
T02D1197:153b-37: shes kyi bdag nyid de kho na nyid do zhes
T02D1197:153b-38: pa ste / bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:153b-39: da ni da ltar byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi lta ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:153b-40: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:153b-41: de nas zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs su
T02D1197:153b-42: skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bsgom pa'i ye
T02D1197:153b-43: shes bstan pa'i phyir de rnams thams cad da bzhin
T02D1197:153b-44: gshegs pa'o // de rnams zil gyis gnon pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so /
T02D1197:154a-0: @154a * // des na rdul dang bral ba zhes pa ni snying rje'i rdo rje btul te /
T02D1197:154a-1: rjes su chags pa dngos po'i lta ba de dang bral ba'o //
T02D1197:154a-2: gnas zhes pa ni zung du 'jug pa zhes pa des snying rje mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D1197:154a-3: de'i phyir don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs te /
T02D1197:154a-4: stong pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1197:154a-5: de nas chos kyi gsung 'di byung //
T02D1197:154a-6: zhes pa'i mthar thug pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:154a-7: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs nas /
T02D1197:154a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:154a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:154a-10: theg pa che las zhes pa ni pha rol tu
T02D1197:154a-11: phyin pa'i tshul zab mo'i theg pa chen po rnams
T02D1197:154a-12: las so // dbyung zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba'o //
T02D1197:154a-13: yon tan rab rgyas zhes pa ni sngags kyi theg
T02D1197:154a-14: pa dang dbu ma chen po las kyang sangs rgyas
T02D1197:154a-15: 'byung ba'o // dus gsum du thams cad kyis bstod
T02D1197:154a-16: pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'chad bzhin pa des ji lta
T02D1197:154a-19: da ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1197:154a-20: mnyam par zhag pa'i phyir de kho na nyid brjod
T02D1197:154a-21: de / yang mchod cing zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:154a-22: pa bshad du gsol zhes pa ni de kho na
T02D1197:154a-23: nyid bshad du gsol zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:154a-24: snying po zhes pa ni de kho na nyid do /
T02D1197:154a-25: chos kun gcig pa'i sku zhes pa la /
T02D1197:154a-26: chos kun ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1197:154a-27: de rnams kyi sku ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:154a-28: de yang ma rig pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten pas yongs su brtags pa'i sems so //
T02D1197:154a-29: de'i phyir rdo rje snying pos gsol ba btab pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1197:154a-31: dbang po gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:154a-32: 'dir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas yul rnams la dmigs te /
T02D1197:154a-33: de yang thams cad 'khrul pas rnam par shes par yongs su rtog go //
T02D1197:154a-34: de thams cad sgyu ma nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1197:154a-35: de dang de'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni bsam gyis
T02D1197:154a-36: mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du yongs
T02D1197:154a-38: des na mnyam par ma gzhag pa 'khor ba'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1197:154a-39: 'on kyang de la mos pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:154a-40: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:154b-0: dngos kun bdag nyid ces pa ni gnyis med pa'i ye shes @154b so //
T02D1197:154b-1: de ni rmongs pa 'gas kyang zhes pa ni rnam
T02D1197:154b-2: par rig pa'i ye shes kyis mi shes zhes pa'i
T02D1197:154b-3: don to // de rnams tha shal zhes pa ni byis pa'i rigs rnams so //
T02D1197:154b-4: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ni
T02D1197:154b-5: rten zhes pa ni gzung ba la sogs pa la
T02D1197:154b-6: mngon par shes par byed do //
T02D1197:154b-7: de nyid kyis na 'khor bar 'ching bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:154b-8: sbubs byed pa'i srin bu bzhin no //
T02D1197:154b-9: des na de rnams kyis rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:154b-10: sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:154b-11: de bzhin sems su rnam par rtog pa dang sems med par rtog pa la /
T02D1197:154b-12: gal te re zhig rang gi mtshan nyid kyis sems
T02D1197:154b-13: med de med pa'i phyir sems med pa'i dngos po
T02D1197:154b-14: yang med de / gang gi phyir pha las bu skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:154b-15: de'i phyir pha med na bu su las skye bar 'gyur /
T02D1197:154b-16: sa bon med par myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:154b-17: de bzhin du myu gu med par 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:154b-18: de'i phyir sems dang sems med par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:154b-19: sems dngos med ces pa ni sngon po dang ser
T02D1197:154b-20: po la sogs pa so sor snang ba de rnams
T02D1197:154b-21: 'khrul pa'i shes bas dmigs pa ni brdzun pa'o //
T02D1197:154b-22: de ltar rnam par shes pa rnam pa gsum bden par ni med do //
T02D1197:154b-23: 'khrul pa des ni 'khor bar 'khor zhing sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:154b-24: 'dir gsungs pa sems can gyi khams mngon sum gyi
T02D1197:154b-25: tshad ma la snang ba des na rnam par shes
T02D1197:154b-26: pa yod do // de las ni sems can gyi khams 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:154b-27: des na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:154b-28: gang gi phyir sems can nyid sangs rgyas te /
T02D1197:154b-29: sems can gcig kyang sangs rgyas ma yin pa med ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:154b-30: gzhan yang kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum pa
T02D1197:154b-31: 'di dag ni sems tsam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:154b-32: kyis gsungs so // des na kun rdzob kyi bden
T02D1197:154b-33: pa la brten zhing don dam pa'i bden pa de
T02D1197:154b-34: kyis gsungs so // la brten te / de ltar
T02D1197:154b-35: bden pa gnyis rnam par 'chad pa'i rgyun gyis sku
T02D1197:154b-36: bzhis sems can gyi don byed pas sangs rgyas skyes
T02D1197:154b-37: rabs sna tshogs pa len par mdzad pa ma yin
T02D1197:154b-38: kyis gsungs so // la brten te / nam /
T02D1197:154b-39: ji ltar sems dang sems med pa sems kyi dngos
T02D1197:154b-41: de med pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sun dbyung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:155a-1: mnar med pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:155a-2: des kyang sangs rgyas pa'i sems can rnams kyi log
T02D1197:155a-3: pa'i lta ba'i dbang gis mu stegs pa'i lugs brjod
T02D1197:155a-4: de bsod nams dang sdig pa la sogs pa med
T02D1197:155a-5: ces gsungs pa'i phyir des kyang dmyal ba la sogs
T02D1197:155a-6: par 'gro bar 'gyur zhes 'ga' zhig dogs pa skye
T02D1197:155a-7: bar 'gyur na de'i phyir brjod de /
T02D1197:155a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung bstan pa /
T02D1197:155a-9: rnam shes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1197:155a-10: 'dir de thams cad ni bden mod //
T02D1197:155a-11: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rnam par
T02D1197:155a-12: shes pa dang ye shes de la yang dgongs pa
T02D1197:155a-13: yod do // 'bras bu zhes pa la /
T02D1197:155a-14: 'dir 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:155a-15: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi yang ngo //
T02D1197:155a-16: 'di rnams ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyud mnyam pa ste /
T02D1197:155a-17: de rnams kyi grog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi
T02D1197:155a-18: rgyun gyi dbang gis bskyed bya dang skyed byed du
T02D1197:155a-20: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes pa ni rnam
T02D1197:155a-21: par shes pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1197:155a-22: bstan pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:155a-23: de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bstan te /
T02D1197:155a-24: des na bla na med pa'i man ngag gis bsgom pa la sogs pa la dmigs so //
T02D1197:155a-25: des ni ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:155a-26: de ltar rnams par shes pa dang ye shes kyi rnal 'byor pa'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:155a-27: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam la 'jug pa'i 'bras bu de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:155a-28: de bzhin du chos ni rang bzhin gyis 'gyur ba'i chos rnams so //
T02D1197:155a-29: chos can zhes pa ni gnyis med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:155a-30: de sgom pa ni rnam par shes pa dang ye shes ma rtogs par byed do //
T02D1197:155a-31: des na gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:155a-32: 'dir sems kyi rang bzhin rnam pa mang po des
T02D1197:155a-33: na sems kyi chos sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D1197:155a-34: pa nyid las rnam par rtog pa 'byung ste /
T02D1197:155a-35: de rnams kyang rgyun mi 'chad par chu bo'i rgyun bzhin rgyun bzhin 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:155a-36: des na rgya mtsho zhes pa ni 'dus par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:155a-37: ji ltar rgya mtshor chu 'dus pa bzhin no //
T02D1197:155a-38: des na thog ma med pa'i rgyud kyi dbang gis
T02D1197:155a-39: sems can sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i rigs su 'gyur
T02D1197:155b-0: te / @155b de rnams kyi chos rnams kyis thar
T02D1197:155b-1: bar zhes pa ni thar ba gcig kho na ste
T02D1197:155b-2: te / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D1197:155b-3: kyi ye shes su 'gyur zhes pa ste des pa'o
T02D1197:155b-4: te / / // de'i phyir du ma nyid du
T02D1197:155b-5: dmigs pa med cing zhes pa ni sgyu ma lta
T02D1197:155b-6: bu'i chos la brten pa'i rang byin gyis brlabs pas
T02D1197:155b-7: rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa la sogs par dmigs
T02D1197:155b-8: pa'i yul gyi chos de rnams kyang rang gi sems
T02D1197:155b-9: nyid las byung ba sgyu ma'i rnam pa de ni
T02D1197:155b-10: khyad par gyis rtog par bstan to //
T02D1197:155b-11: des na sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'byung ba de dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:155b-12: de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa ni rnam par mi
T02D1197:155b-13: rtog pa ste sgyu ma mi bden pa'i phyir ro
T02D1197:155b-14: // de ltar dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang dmigs
T02D1197:155b-15: pa med pa'i sems gsal ba gnyis med pa'i gnyis
T02D1197:155b-17: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1197:155b-18: zhes pa ni de yang dbang phyi ma'i dus su
T02D1197:155b-19: bla mas bstan pa'i dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1197:155b-21: ji ltar nang du rnam gnas pa //
T02D1197:155b-22: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i nor bu lhan cig skyes
T02D1197:155b-23: pa'i dga' ba bde ba'i gzugs su gnas pa de
T02D1197:155b-24: nyid bla ma'o // des na kun rdzob des gang
T02D1197:155b-25: gi tshe rang rig par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bla
T02D1197:155b-27: ci'i phyir bla ma zhe na /
T02D1197:155b-28: ji srid skyes pa nas 'chi ba'i mthar thug par
T02D1197:155b-29: de yang nang gi bde pa nyid rnam par gnas
T02D1197:155b-30: pa de'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:155b-31: bde ba nyams su myong ba'i mthar thug par dpes
T02D1197:155b-32: rtogs pa spros pa med pa'i bde ba brjod du
T02D1197:155b-33: med pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:155b-34: de yang 'chad bzhin pas bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:155b-35: de ltar bla ma ni rgyud thams cad du dgongs bshad gzhan gyis bstan pa ste /
T02D1197:155b-37: de kho na nyid bstan pa zhes pa ni de
T02D1197:155b-38: kho na nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes yongs su
T02D1197:155b-39: brtags pa 'chad bzhin pas bshad pa des nyams su
T02D1197:155b-40: myong ba 'di bstan pa de'i rab tu byed pa
T02D1197:155b-41: des yang dag par byed pa de la de skad
T02D1197:155b-42: ces bya'o // kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi gyal
T02D1197:155b-43: po'i rtog pa dang po'i rab tu byed pa gsum
T02D1197:155b-44: pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag par lta ba'i
T02D1197:155b-45: dran pa'i snang bzhes pa'i gzhung bstan pa ste bzhi
T02D1197:155b-47: / da ni sems can sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa
T02D1197:155b-48: sna tshogs pas rang gi las dge bas sangs rgyas
T02D1197:156a-0: su 'gyur ro // des na man ngag sna tshogs pa'i don du bsam @156a * //
T02D1197:156a-1: pa sna tshogs pa ston pa'i bsdus don de byed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:156a-2: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:156a-3: de nas zhes pa ni rab tu byed pa gsum gyi mthar te /
T02D1197:156a-4: rab tu byed pa gsum bstan pa de'i rjes thogs su'o //
T02D1197:156a-5: de'i phyir rab tu byed pa de gsum bshad pa'o //
T02D1197:156a-6: de yang yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D1197:156a-7: zhes pa ni yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya ba ste /
T02D1197:156a-8: rgyas par bshad par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:156a-9: gang gi phyir sems can thams cad kyis rtogs par
T02D1197:156a-10: 'gyur ba des kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol
T02D1197:156a-13: rgyud rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:156a-14: gsungs te rgyud kun gyi shes rab dang thabs te
T02D1197:156a-15: / de rnams kyi gtan la dbab pa ni yang
T02D1197:156a-16: dag par rnam par gzhag pa rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1197:156a-17: / pa'o // sbyor ba yang bsam pa sna tshogs
T02D1197:156a-18: pa rnam pa mang po kun rdzob dang don dam
T02D1197:156a-19: pa'i dbye bas thun mong du nges pa'i rgyud thams
T02D1197:156a-20: cad kyi sgra zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:156a-21: de bzhin du nges pa yang bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:156a-22: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:156a-23: 'dir sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi sbyor ba de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D1197:156a-25: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:156a-26: yang na rnam par shes pa gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:156a-27: de nas rgya che ba'i gzugs zhes pa ni rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1197:156a-28: de yang yul dang de bzhin du yul can de
T02D1197:156a-29: rnams kyi rang bzhin de'i bdag nyid chos kyi sku'o
T02D1197:156a-30: // gang dag yul yin pa de dag ni gzugs dang /
T02D1197:156a-34: reg bya rnams te rnam par shes pa can no //
T02D1197:156a-35: yul yang rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
T02D1197:156a-36: de rnams las kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni sems so //
T02D1197:156a-37: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni sems med pa'o //
T02D1197:156a-38: de bzhin du 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni sems kyi gzugs so //
T02D1197:156a-39: de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gru gsum rgya che ba dor te /
T02D1197:156a-40: dngos por gzung ba'i phyir na sgyu ma'i gzugs can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:156a-41: de ltar chos kyi sku gcig dang du ma nyid
T02D1197:156a-42: de rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sems kyi don du'o
T02D1197:156a-43: // de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pas rnam par shes pa rnams skye bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:156a-44: de bstan pa'i phyir gnas su skye zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:156b-0: 'dir sems @156b can rnams la gtsor 'dod pa'i khams
T02D1197:156b-1: la brten pa de rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:156b-3: tshangs sogs lha dar lha min zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:156b-4: sogs pa'i sgras ni gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med
T02D1197:156b-5: pa'i khams dang lha ma yin dang mi la sogs
T02D1197:156b-6: pa rnams so // de ltar dngos po thams cad ni khyab bya'o //
T02D1197:156b-7: de rnams la khyab par byed pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:156b-8: dngos po rnams kun du sbyor bas na rnam par shes pa tsam mo //
T02D1197:156b-9: dngos po de rnams ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:156b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rgyus changs pa la
T02D1197:156b-11: sogs pa bdag nyid chen po'i lha dang /
T02D1197:156b-12: gzhan yang chos dang ldan pa'i mi la sogs pa 'thob bo //
T02D1197:156b-13: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bsod nams kyis tshogs kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:156b-14: de nyid ces pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D1197:156b-15: lnga po de rnams nyid la shes rab kyi pha
T02D1197:156b-16: rol tu phyin pa khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:156b-17: de'i phyir kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs can zhes pa
T02D1197:156b-18: ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la khyab pa
T02D1197:156b-19: can yongs su shes pa'i tshul can stong pa nyid
T02D1197:156b-20: kyi gzugs can rnam pa kun gyi rang gi ngo
T02D1197:156b-21: bo can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:156b-22: de nyid yul las 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:156b-23: da ni sems can 'khor bar 'ching bar gsungs te /
T02D1197:156b-24: gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:156b-25: de rnams grol ba'i rgyur de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis thabs gsungs pa /
T02D1197:156b-26: des na sangs rgyas dbang po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:156b-27: 'dir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams su ltung ba'i sems can de rnams 'byung ba'o //
T02D1197:156b-28: des na zhes pa ni de'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:156b-29: dpa' bo sangs rgyas zhes pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas
T02D1197:156b-30: sa ma thog ma med pa'i sangs rgyas 'od gsal
T02D1197:156b-31: ba las bzhengs pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis so //
T02D1197:156b-32: de nyid kyis na nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal can la gzigs pa'o //
T02D1197:156b-33: de rnams kyis nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rkyen du
T02D1197:156b-34: sprul te rigs pas zhes pa ni shes rab dang
T02D1197:156b-35: thabs la sogs pa rgyur bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:156b-36: de yang dang po las kyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas
T02D1197:156b-37: 'dod chags kyi bdag gnyid can rnams la bstan te
T02D1197:156b-38: / de rnams kyi rkyen ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1197:156b-39: de nas sprul ba'i rgyud shes pa ni de'i phyir
T02D1197:156b-40: rigs pas nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba bstan
T02D1197:157a-1: 'chad bzhin pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las so //
T02D1197:157a-2: 'bras bu zhes pa ni de'i phyir shes rab dang thabs dag gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1197:157a-3: mtshon zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes te
T02D1197:157a-4: des 'bras bu mtshon du med pa zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:157a-6: khams gsum rnams su dri med snang //
T02D1197:157a-7: zhes pa ni snang ba gsum spangs pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ye shes te /
T02D1197:157a-8: des na gang dang gang gis zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:157a-9: sogs pas ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su
T02D1197:157a-10: sprul te / des na skyes rabs sna tshogs pa
T02D1197:157a-11: rnams su sprul nas sems can rnams la chos ston
T02D1197:157a-12: sprul te / to // shing dang me yi tshul bzhin du ;
T02D1197:157a-13: / zhes pa ni 'dir ji ltar shing gnyis bsrubs pa las me 'byung ste /
T02D1197:157a-14: me de nyid kyis shing de gnyis bsregs so //
T02D1197:157a-15: de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes
T02D1197:157a-16: pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang bzhin rnams su
T02D1197:157a-18: de sgyu ma sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:157a-19: de bzhin du cung zad rang gi ngo bo yongs
T02D1197:157a-20: su shes pa'i dbang gis gdul bya'i sems can ma
T02D1197:157a-23: de rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni me bzhin te /
T02D1197:157a-24: dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi mes nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams bsregs te /
T02D1197:157a-25: rang gi rig pa las byung ba'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:157a-26: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi rol mo dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:157a-27: bzang po zhes pa ni rang gi ngo bo las
T02D1197:157a-28: byung ba'i byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs pa rnal
T02D1197:157a-29: 'byor pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar skyed par byed pa
T02D1197:157a-30: dang / phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba ster bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:157a-31: phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji
T02D1197:157a-32: skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du bya zhes pa'i
T02D1197:157a-33: don to // gti mug ces bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:157a-34: pa ni 'dir tha ma la pa'i gti mug la
T02D1197:157a-35: sogs pa rnams gti mug chen po la sogs pas
T02D1197:157a-36: don to // sbyang bar bya'o // de ltar rnam
T02D1197:157a-37: par dag pa lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1197:157a-38: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D1197:157a-39: de rnams thams cad sbyong zhes pa ni de rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa' de'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:157a-40: nyon mongs pa lnga rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:157a-41: de dag rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:157b-0: da ni sems can gang dag gis @157b bla na
T02D1197:157b-1: med par sngags kyi theg pa chen po mi rnyed
T02D1197:157b-2: pa des na de rnams kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:157b-3: sh'akya thub pa 'byung bar brjod do //
T02D1197:157b-4: gang dag bla ma la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:157b-5: sngags dang phyag rgya rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1197:157b-6: zhes pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya mi shes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:157b-7: 'ang gi don ni phyag rgya chen po yang mi shes pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:157b-8: 'dzam bu'i gling du zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:157b-9: ni 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas nas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1197:157b-11: 'dir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du bdag / ces pa
T02D1197:157b-12: ni sh'akya thub pa sangs rgyas bdag dga' ldan gyi
T02D1197:157b-13: gnas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
