T02D1197:157b-14: rdo rje'i rgyan gyi bdag nyid kyi gzhal yas khang
T02D1197:157b-15: rnams su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las sprul pa'i
T02D1197:157b-16: sku 'byung ba ni thun mong gi tshig go //
T02D1197:157b-17: nges par gsungs pa'i tshig ni btsun mo zhes pa
T02D1197:157b-18: ni rdo rje'i btsun mo spyan ma la sogs pa
T02D1197:157b-19: dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:157b-20: yang na tha mal pa'i bud med rnams so //
T02D1197:157b-21: de rnams kyi bha ga gru gsum ni sa bcu
T02D1197:157b-22: gcig rnam par dag pa'i phyir gong nas gong du
T02D1197:157b-23: spangs pa'o // sa bcu'i dbus khong stong gis bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D1197:157b-25: rang gi ngo bo ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bha ga ste /
T02D1197:157b-26: sna tshogs sdud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:157b-27: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid lus dang ngag dang sems gsum gru gsum mo //
T02D1197:157b-28: dag pa zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1197:157b-29: de nyid gang la yod pa de la dag pa
T02D1197:157b-31: de ji ltar dga' ba de bstan pa'i phyir ae'i
T02D1197:157b-32: cha byad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1197:157b-33: / 'dir ae'i rnam pa aa wa dh'u t'i la'o //
T02D1197:157b-34: dbus su wam ni blta bar bya //
T02D1197:157b-35: zhes pa'i sgra ni bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:157b-36: de ltar ae wam zhes pa shes rab dang thabs kyi mdor sbyor ba sdus pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:157b-37: ji lta ba zhes pa ni rags pa'o //
T02D1197:157b-38: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gru gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:157b-39: 'dir rdzogs pa'i rim pa las skye bar 'gyur ba
T02D1197:157b-40: de yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgoms pa las bstan
T02D1197:157b-41: pa des na dag pa ste /
T02D1197:157b-42: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid sbyor ba'o //
T02D1197:157b-43: de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i rim par brjod do //
T02D1197:157b-44: gru gsum zhes pa ni la la n'a dang ra
T02D1197:157b-45: sa n'a dag gi dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i'o
T02D1197:157b-46: // de yi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar //
T02D1197:158a-1: chos kyi dbyings yon tan rgyas pa thams cad 'byung
T02D1197:158a-2: ba thams cad kyi gnas de nyid bla ma'i man
T02D1197:158a-3: ngag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa
T02D1197:158a-4: yong su zad pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:158a-5: nyams 'dag ba la me tog dang 'bras bu sna
T02D1197:158a-6: tshogs gtams pa'o // me tog ni ting nge 'dzin
T02D1197:158a-7: sna tshogs pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D1197:158a-9: 'bras bu ni rgyu mthun pa dang rnam par smin
T02D1197:158a-10: pa dang skyes bu byed pa dang dri ma med
T02D1197:158a-11: pa rnams te / de la sogs pa thob pa'i
T02D1197:158a-12: gnas su rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgom pa rtogs
T02D1197:158a-13: pa rnams te / pa'i phyir / rdo rje rol ba yang dag 'byung //
T02D1197:158a-14: zhes pa ni 'dir aa wa dh'u t'ir bsam gyis
T02D1197:158a-15: mi khyab pa'i sems kyis yongs su rtogs pa'i srog
T02D1197:158a-16: dang thur sel 'jug pas byang chub sems dgug pa'o
T02D1197:158a-17: // ji ltar de dgug ce na dbu rgyan gyi
T02D1197:158a-18: bu gnas lte bar 'ong ba de la brten pa'i
T02D1197:158a-19: bde ba de nyid kyi sbyor ba goms pa las
T02D1197:158a-20: bsam du med pa yang steng du 'gro ste /
T02D1197:158a-22: des na de las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams skye'o //
T02D1197:158a-23: de'i phyir chos kyi 'byung gnas shes pa'i sgrar 'jig rten du grags so //
T02D1197:158a-24: de yang btsun mo'i bha ga zhes bya ba ni spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:158a-25: dang gi sras ni tha mal pa'i bud med gzung ba'i don to //
T02D1197:158a-26: de bzhin du de'i zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i bha ga'o //
T02D1197:158a-27: padma zhes pa ni rtsa brgyad reg bya'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1197:158a-28: ge sar bcas zhes pa ni de'i mdud pa'i bu ga'am /
T02D1197:158a-30: de rnams kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir a'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:158a-31: de bzhin du rtsa brgyad rnams la /
T02D1197:158a-32: a'a li k'a li mnyam 'dres pa'i sde tshan brgyad
T02D1197:158a-33: ces pa ni 'dir aa li ni aa la sogs
T02D1197:158a-34: pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug go //
T02D1197:158a-35: de bzhin du k'a li ni ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
T02D1197:158a-37: 'on kyang rtsa rnams la srog mnyam par 'dres pa de ni k'a li'i gzugs so //
T02D1197:158a-38: de bzhin du a'a li'i gzugs ni thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
T02D1197:158a-39: de dag mnyam du 'dres pa ni der thim pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:158a-40: des na sde tshan brgyad rnam par gnas te brdas
T02D1197:158a-41: bstan pa brjod du med pa zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:158a-42: // des na phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D1197:158a-43: rnams 'gog cing ming tsam yang med 'gog ces pa
T02D1197:158a-44: // ste nges pa'o // yang na a'a li k'a
T02D1197:158a-45: li zhes pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma ste
T02D1197:158b-0: de dag 'dres @158b pa ni sgra gcan te /
T02D1197:158b-1: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ming can no //
T02D1197:158b-2: de yang dbus su gnas pa'i ge sar gang gi mjug ma de ni du ba mjug rings te /
T02D1197:158b-3: de'i rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rtsa brgyad de
T02D1197:158b-4: rnams kyi dbus su rnam par shes pa brgyad 'dab
T02D1197:158b-5: ma brgyad bzhin du rtsa brgyad la gnas te de
T02D1197:158b-6: la shar gyi 'dab ma la nyon mongs pa can
T02D1197:158b-8: de bzhin du nub kyi 'dab ma la kun gzhi
T02D1197:158b-9: rnam par shes pa sgra gcan gyi ming can no
T02D1197:158b-10: // de bzhin du lho'i 'dab ma gsum la shar
T02D1197:158b-11: la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du sna'i rnam par
T02D1197:158b-12: // shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D1197:158b-13: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1197:158b-14: de rnams dang spen pa dang phur bu dang mig dmar gyi ming can no //
T02D1197:158b-15: de bzhin du byang gi 'dab ma gsum la /
T02D1197:158b-16: shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du dmigs gi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D1197:158b-17: lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D1197:158b-18: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1197:158b-19: de rnams kyang gza' lag pa dang zla ba dang pa ba sangs kyi ming can no //
T02D1197:158b-20: de ltar gza' brgyad kyi res brgyad dam thun brgyad
T02D1197:158b-21: de sgra gcan gyi longs spyod kyi dbang gis so
T02D1197:158b-22: // rtsa brgyad po de rnams kyang sgo brgyad rnams su song ba'i don to //
T02D1197:158b-23: lus can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:158b-24: sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi ming gi
T02D1197:158b-25: dang po'i yi ges zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D1197:158b-26: rnams byed do // gang gi phyir rang gi lus
T02D1197:158b-27: su bsgrubs pa'i sngags sde tshan brgyad rang bzhin gyis
T02D1197:158b-28: rnams byed do // grub pa'o // de rnams kyang
T02D1197:158b-29: spros na yi ge lnga bcu'i brdas dbye ba rnams
T02D1197:158b-30: zhes pa ni 'dir lus la gdan lnga bcu'i gnas
T02D1197:158b-31: rnams su mdud pa lnga bcur 'gyur te /
T02D1197:158b-32: de rnams la khung bu lnga bcu'am ko ra lnga bcur 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:158b-33: de rnams la smeg rgyu 'khyugs pa lta bu ga la yod de /
T02D1197:158b-34: de rnams kyi gnas rnams su yi ge rnams grangs
T02D1197:158b-35: bzhin du aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i
T02D1197:158b-36: li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam aa:/
T02D1197:158b-43: sha sha sa ha ksha: zhes pa yang dag par gnas so //
T02D1197:158b-44: de ltar yi ge lnga bcu po rnams kyi dbyibs
T02D1197:158b-45: ni shar phyogs la sogs pa'i yi ge bzhin du
T02D1197:158b-46: gnas so // de rnams nyid kyi gnas gsungs pa
T02D1197:158b-47: de ltar rim pa bzhin spyi bo dang spyi gtsug
T02D1197:158b-48: gnas so // dang / rna ba g-yas pa dang rgyab kyi cha dang /
T02D1197:159a-9: bshad ba'i rtsa dang skra mtshams kyi bu ga dang /
T02D1197:159a-17: lhag ma ni lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo nyi shu'i bu ga rnams so //
T02D1197:159a-18: de ltar rang bzhin brjod do //
T02D1197:159a-19: gnas de rnams su sngags gzhan rnams mgrin pa dang /
T02D1197:159a-20: rkan dang mchu la sogs pas yi ge nyis brtsegs
T02D1197:159a-21: dang sum brtsegs la sogs pa sna tshogs par sbyor
T02D1197:159a-22: ba'i rang bzhin can brjod do //
T02D1197:159a-23: de ltar rgyud rnams dang gzhan yang phyi'i bstan bcos rnams te /
T02D1197:159a-24: sgra'i bstan bcos la sogs pa rnams 'byung ste /
T02D1197:159a-25: de'i rang bzhin nyid yi phyir ro //
T02D1197:159a-26: de ltar 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:159a-27: rdo rje snying po'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni rdo rje ni rang rig pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:159a-28: de'i snying po ni ming gi yi ge rnam par shes pa tsam nyid do //
T02D1197:159a-29: gzhan ni min zhes pa ni de ltar rang rig
T02D1197:159a-30: pa'i ye shes kyi yi ge rnams ni gzhan tha
T02D1197:159a-31: mal pa 'ga' zhig gi lus las 'byung ba ni
T02D1197:159a-32: ma yin no // de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1197:159a-33: kyis rtag pa rgyun du yang dag pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1197:159a-34: bslab ces pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:159a-35: de ltar sde tshan de rnams la //
T02D1197:159a-36: aa ni mgrin pa dang khar ro //
T02D1197:159a-37: de bzhin du ka ni rna ba g-yas par ro //
T02D1197:159a-38: tsa ni mig g-yon par ro //
T02D1197:159a-39: ta ni mig g-yas par ro //
T02D1197:159a-40: de bzhin du ta ni rna ba g-yon pa la'o //
T02D1197:159a-41: pa ni sna'i bu ga g-yon par ro //
T02D1197:159a-42: de bzhin du ya ni bu ga g-yas par ro ;
T02D1197:159a-43: / de bzhin du sha ni bshang ba'i bu gar ro //
T02D1197:159a-44: sde tshan lnga bcu po rnams ni srog gi bu
T02D1197:159a-45: gar ro zhes brjod pa ni dbugs nang du chud
T02D1197:159a-46: pa ste / sngon du gsungs pa'i btsan thabs kyi sbyor bas so //
T02D1197:159a-47: slar yang byang chub sems dang lhan cig rdo rje rol pa ni aa wadh'u t'i'i bde bar ro //
T02D1197:159a-48: mnyam par gyur pa 'ong te padma bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1197:159a-49: padma de yang aa wa dh'u t'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa bems po dang bral ba'o //
T02D1197:159a-50: de yang so so zhes pa ni rang gi ngo
T02D1197:159a-51: bo lta bu'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D1197:159a-52: rnams rig pa ste lha'i dbang po dang lha'i rnam
T02D1197:159a-53: par shes pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i
T02D1197:159b-0: don to // de rnams dbus kyi zhes @159b bya
T02D1197:159b-1: ba la sogs pa ni lha'i rnam par shes pa
T02D1197:159b-2: brgyad po de rnams dbus su'o //
T02D1197:159b-3: lte ba zhes pa ni der bskyed pa rang rig
T02D1197:159b-4: pa'i ye shes gtso bo nyid kyi phyir lte ba'o
T02D1197:159b-5: // nyams su myong ba'i phyir te de rnams kyi dbus su gnas pa nyid do //
T02D1197:159b-6: de'i phyir mchog gi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02D1197:159b-7: mchog ni ye shes dam pa rnam par shes pa
T02D1197:159b-8: rnams dang bral ba de'i rang bzhin tsam nyid do
T02D1197:159b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rnams rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1197:159b-11: des na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1197:159b-12: don 'dod pa rnams la dngos grub ster bar byed
T02D1197:159b-13: pa'o // des na sde tshan brgyad kyis yang dag par bskor ba'o //
T02D1197:159b-15: mchog tu mi 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02D1197:159b-17: de yang aa ste yi ge thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:159b-18: don chen zhes pa ni rang gi ngo bos shes
T02D1197:159b-19: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no
T02D1197:159b-21: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so ;
T02D1197:159b-22: / de bzhin du sde tshan rnams kyi gtso zhes
T02D1197:159b-23: pa ni chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i
T02D1197:159b-24: phyir chos kyi sku rtag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:159b-25: de nyid las zhes pa ni gnas 'di rnams las
T02D1197:159b-26: byung ba lus can rnams sngags thams cad rnams ni
T02D1197:159b-27: 'chad bzhin pa de nyid kyis ston to //
T02D1197:159b-28: gang ral gri mig sman zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:159b-29: pa dngos grub kyi las thams cad ni go sla'o
T02D1197:159b-30: // 'on kyang de thams cad 'chad bzhin pa la
T02D1197:159b-31: sogs kyi rab tu byed pa las bshad par bya'o
T02D1197:159b-32: // // da ni sngags 'di rnams kyi gnas kyi
T02D1197:159b-33: dbang gi yon tan gyi rang bzhin brjod pa'i phyir
T02D1197:159b-34: // // / sgra ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:159b-35: 'dir sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rtsa aa
T02D1197:159b-36: wa dh'u t'i nang du rang rig pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:159b-37: de ni sgra'o // de yang aa'i yi ge'i ming can bde bas khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:159b-38: de'i phyir sngags shes su gsungs par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:159b-39: sngags rnams brjod pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:159b-40: de yang bde ba sna tshogs pa nyid kyi phyogs dpe'i yul ma yin pa'o //
T02D1197:159b-41: de nyid kyi dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
T02D1197:159b-42: sna tshogs mdud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:159b-43: 'dir lus la sna tshogs mdud pa ni rnam pa gnyis te phyi dang nang ngo //
T02D1197:159b-44: phyi de ni rdo rje nor bu'i lte ba'o //
T02D1197:159b-45: nang ni lte ba'i lte ba'o //
T02D1197:160a-0: de'i gnas chen las zhes pa @160a * //
T02D1197:160a-1: ni 'dir phyag rgya bzhi'i dbye bas dang po goms
T02D1197:160a-2: pa'i sbyor bas lte ba la sogs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1197:160a-3: bzhi la rim pa bzhin las dang chos dang dam
T02D1197:160a-4: tshig dang phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1197:160a-5: da rnams kyang 'chad bzhin pas gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:160a-6: de yang dpal ba nas lte ba'i mthar thug par
T02D1197:160a-7: bzlog pa de las kyi phyag rgya la sogs par
T02D1197:160a-8: shes par bya'o // de'i phyir lte ba'i gnas nas /
T02D1197:160a-9: chos kyi rol ba yang dag 'byung //
T02D1197:160a-10: zhes pa ni 'dir sngon gyi bde ba chen po'i
T02D1197:160a-11: 'khor lo las rdo rje rol pa ni ao dyan
T02D1197:160a-12: gyi sgo nas byang chub sems rang rig pa'i ye
T02D1197:160a-13: shes ro mnyam pa'i gzugs lte bar 'ongs pa'o //
T02D1197:160a-14: des na sna tshogs mdud pa'i gnas chen las chos
T02D1197:160a-15: zhes pa slar yang dz'a landha ra'i sgo nas steng
T02D1197:160a-16: du song ba'i chos kyi 'khor lor 'jug pa ni
T02D1197:160a-18: 'on kyang dgongs bshad gzhan gyis chos kyis sgra ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D1197:160a-19: de yang thams cad la khyad par byed ba'o //
T02D1197:160a-20: rol pa zhes pa ni dpe'i bde ba sbangs pa'o //
T02D1197:160a-21: yang dag 'byung zhes pa ni gang gi phyir lte
T02D1197:160a-22: ba'i steng du bde ba 'gro ba'i phyir bsam gyis
T02D1197:160a-23: mi khyab pa'i bde ba de sems can thams cad
T02D1197:160a-24: la sangs rgyas nyid ster bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:160a-25: de'i tshe ci yang med ces bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:160a-26: pa ni de ltar ci yang med pa ni kha
T02D1197:160a-27: cig tu 'ga' zhig gis nges pa 'di las ci
T02D1197:160a-28: yang med de / rtag tu lte ba la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa ni sngags te /
T02D1197:160a-29: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ye
T02D1197:160a-30: shes kyi gnas phyogs gcig pa gnas pa med par
T02D1197:160a-31: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes shing mi 'gag pa'i dngos
T02D1197:160a-32: po rnam su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir zhes dgongs
T02D1197:160a-33: so // dngos grub ces pa ni de'i phyir sngon nas grub pa'o //
T02D1197:160a-34: des na dngos grub ni bstan pa'i sgo nas bshad pa'o //
T02D1197:160a-35: rdzu 'phrul zhes pa ni mchog tu mi zad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:160a-36: de'i phyir rnam gnas zhes pa ni rtag pa rgyun
T02D1197:160a-37: du gnas pa rtag tu dngos po med pa'i mtshan
T02D1197:160a-38: nyid do // de yang de dag la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:160a-39: yon tan gyi rnam grangs shes par bya ste ming
T02D1197:160a-41: des na de bzhin du bstan to //
T02D1197:160a-42: de yang ma skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
T02D1197:160a-43: de ltar sngags dang dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi sde tshan thams cad sgra'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas so //
T02D1197:160b-0: gang gi phyir @160b sangs rgyas dang sgra la rten cing de las byung ba'o //
T02D1197:160b-1: de de'i phyir sngags la sogs pa thams cad sangs
T02D1197:160b-2: rgyas kyi gung gi sgo nas bstan pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1197:160b-4: da ni sngon du dngos por zhen pa dgag pa'i
T02D1197:160b-5: phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i
T02D1197:160b-6: dbye bas rdo rje 'chang gi chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1197:160b-7: kyi nang gi gzhal yas khang du shes rab dang
T02D1197:160b-8: thabs kyi bdag nyid bzhugs pa mchog tu zab pa'i
T02D1197:160b-9: gnas ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbye bas brjod
T02D1197:160b-10: pa'i phyir ro // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:160b-11: de nas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1197:160b-12: kyi lus rnam par dag pa'i rjes thogs su rnal
T02D1197:160b-14: des na gzhan zhes pa ni mchog tu zab pa las zab pa'i gnas so //
T02D1197:160b-16: kha sbyor las byung mtshan nyid de //
T02D1197:160b-17: zhes pa ni 'dir thun mong du stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med cing gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:160b-18: khyad par du mngon par 'dod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying rje dang stong pa ste /
T02D1197:160b-20: des na dbyer med cing bsam du med pa shes
T02D1197:160b-21: rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid zab pa las kyang
T02D1197:160b-22: zab pa gnyis med pa de gang las byung ba
T02D1197:160b-23: yod pa de ni kha sbyor las byung ba ste
T02D1197:160b-24: / de'i mtshan nyid rab tu bshad par bya zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:160b-25: de yang ae zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1197:160b-26: de bzhin du ae ni ye shes kyis kyi aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:160b-27: sa zhes pa ni sa chen por shes par byas te /
T02D1197:160b-28: bstan pa'i sgo nas shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:160b-30: las kyi phyag rgya nyid dang spyan //
T02D1197:160b-32: de nyid kyi sga ni nges par gzung ba'o /
T02D1197:160b-34: de ltar 'khor lo bzhi'i rab tu dbye bas gzhal
T02D1197:160b-35: yas khang bstan pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
T02D1197:160b-36: can te / de yang rin po che sna bdun
T02D1197:160b-37: gyi rang bzhin sngon nas dag pa'i khams rnams so
T02D1197:160b-38: can te / // des na mi zad pa'i phyir rin po che'o //
T02D1197:160b-45: khu ba'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i nye bar spyod pa de rnams kyis spras pa'am sprul pa'o //
T02D1197:160b-46: de ltar gnas de'i nang du shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:160b-47: ae ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:161a-0: ae zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dngos por ro mnyam par @161a * //
T02D1197:161a-2: des na chos kyi dbyings bsam du med pa'i shes
T02D1197:161a-3: rab dmigs pa med pa ye shes kyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:161a-4: ae'i cha byad bzang po chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi
T02D1197:161a-5: gnas so // de'i dngos po nyid kyis sna tshogs su sprul pa'i mtshan nyid ni thabs te /
T02D1197:161a-6: de bzhin du wam ni bsam du med pa'i snying
T02D1197:161a-7: rje'i bdag nyid rang rig pa bsam du med pa'i
T02D1197:161a-8: thams lus dang ngag dang sems kyi chos kyi sgyu
T02D1197:161a-9: ma lta bu gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:161a-10: de nyid shes rab kyi bdag nyid dpyad pa'i spyod
T02D1197:161a-11: yul ma yin pa'i ae la wam gyis brgyan te
T02D1197:161a-12: / ae'i cha byad kyi shes rab po //
T02D1197:161a-13: ae de nyid kyis kyang wam brgyan pa'o //
T02D1197:161a-15: gdon mi za bar zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:161a-16: 'og dang steng 'di dag phan tshun du snyoms par
T02D1197:161a-17: 'jug pa ni shes rab bdag thams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:161a-18: gyis rnal 'byor bsam du med pa /
T02D1197:161a-19: ae dang wam nyid ces kyang gsungs pa'i tshig gis gnyis med cing gnyis med par gsungs so //
T02D1197:161a-20: des na ae wam zhes bya ba //
T02D1197:161a-21: zhes pa ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams
T02D1197:161a-22: su 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:161a-23: bstan pa'o // tshig phrad ces pa ni 'di skad
T02D1197:161a-24: bdag gi la sogs pa dgongs bshad gzhan gyi tshig
T02D1197:161a-26: ji ltar 'og dang steng du zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:161a-28: steng snying ga'i gnas su wam mo //
T02D1197:161a-29: 'di gnyis ka sbyor ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1197:161a-30: des na gnyis med ba las byung ba'i dngos po'i
T02D1197:161a-31: mtshan nyid de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal
T02D1197:161a-32: stong phrag brgya du mas kyang bstan par mi nus
T02D1197:161a-33: na / bdag cag mi rnams kyi lces brjod pa lta ci smos /
T02D1197:161a-34: de'i phyir 'di yang rgyud 'dir rdo rje'i tshig 'dis
T02D1197:161a-35: 'di skad ces pa nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar
T02D1197:161a-36: thug pa'i rgyud bsdus te stong par byed pa ni
T02D1197:161a-38: de bzhin du bsam du med pa gnyis med pa
T02D1197:161a-39: rtog pa bcu gcig gi bdag nyid rgyud 'di rgyud
T02D1197:161a-40: 'di bsdus pas bsam du med pa gnyis med pa
T02D1197:161a-41: ston to / de las byung ba'i phyir de ltar
T02D1197:161a-42: rgyud thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin du dgongs so
T02D1197:161a-43: ston to / // bde ba de yang ae dang
T02D1197:161a-44: wam la rab tu gnas pa ste de ltar yang
T02D1197:161a-45: ston to / // gsungs pa / ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
T02D1197:161a-46: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1197:161a-47: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
T02D1197:161b-0: sangs rgyas rin chen @161b za ma tog /
T02D1197:161b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:161b-3: da ni sems can rnams kyis bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D1197:161b-4: pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyid par bya ba'i phyir bstan
T02D1197:161b-5: bya ba dang stong pa'o dag gi 'brel pa brjod
T02D1197:161b-6: do // bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:161b-7: ni 'dir rgyud thams cad kyi bla ma'i rgyud kha

T02D1197:164b-13: gang gis thos zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02D1197:164b-14: de yang dag gi sgo nas nges par gzung ba
T02D1197:164b-15: ming sngon du 'gro bas na yig ge de yang
T02D1197:164b-16: chos kyi thos sogs rtag tu bzhugs zhes pa ni
T02D1197:164b-17: theg pa gsum la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi
T02D1197:164b-18: glegs bam la'o // sogs pa'i sgras ni snyan dang gas kyi bstan bcos dang /
T02D1197:164b-19: sgra'i bstan bcos la sogs pa dang /
T02D1197:164b-20: gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i tshig brjod pa la yang ngo //
T02D1197:164b-21: rtag tu bzhugs zhes pa ni brjod pa'i ngang tshul zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:164b-22: 'on kyang dag pa zhes pa ni 'dir yi ge
T02D1197:164b-23: dag pa de rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:164b-24: yin pas de nyid kyi nang du thim mo //
T02D1197:164b-25: des na brjod du med pas dag pa'o //
T02D1197:164b-26: gang gi phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma bya ba
T02D1197:164b-27: shing gdod nas ma skyes pa nyid dngos po med
T02D1197:164b-28: pa'i mtshan nyid mi bden pa brdzun pa'o //
T02D1197:164b-29: de'i phyir brjod du med ces dgongs so //
T02D1197:164b-30: de ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyi de
T02D1197:164b-31: bzhin du dngos grub de rnams kyang skyed par byed
T02D1197:164b-32: pa'o // brjod du med ces pa ni 'dir gal
T02D1197:164b-33: te yang chos rnams thams cad ro gcig pa nyid
T02D1197:164b-34: kyi byang chub de'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas te rdzogs
T02D1197:164b-36: de rnams kyi chos ni rten med pa chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:164b-37: des na yi ge dang yi ge ma yin pa'i cha brjod du med pa'o //
T02D1197:164b-38: des na yi ge brjod pa'i ming gi mtha' nub pa'o //
T02D1197:164b-39: de yang snying rjes bsgrub pa dag gis zhes pa
T02D1197:164b-40: ni sh'akya thub pa sprul pa'i sku bzung nas 'gro
T02D1197:164b-41: ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa'i dus su sngags
T02D1197:164b-42: kyi theg pa chen po'i chos rnams phyag na rdo
T02D1197:164b-43: rje la yi ge thams cad kyi gzugs kyis so
T02D1197:164b-44: // bstan zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1197:164b-45: bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba'i tshig gi sgo nas bstan
T02D1197:165a-1: phyir yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te /
T02D1197:165a-2: yi ge 'di rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyis mnyan par bya ba dang /
T02D1197:165a-6: dam pa'i chos sna tshogs pa'i dgongs pa bla ma'i man ngag gis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1197:165a-7: des na sems can rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:165a-8: mtshon bya ba zhes ni mngon du bsgom pa la
T02D1197:165a-9: rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yi ge'i ming can gyis
T02D1197:165a-10: rang rig pa la sogs pa'i mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1197:165a-11: de yang sngon du zhes pa ni yang dag par
T02D1197:165a-12: der thim pa'i sems kyis ji sring mtshon pa med
T02D1197:165a-13: pa'i bar du zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:165a-14: cho 'di nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:165a-15: de ltar bsdus pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:165a-16: dngos grub kyi mchog ces gsungs te /
T02D1197:165a-17: gnyis med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnyis med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub ste /
T02D1197:165a-18: 'jig rten ba dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dngos
T02D1197:165a-19: grub rnams kyi mchog 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:165a-20: kyi dngos grub thob ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:165a-21: rgyud thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1197:165a-22: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thabs dang shes
T02D1197:165a-23: rab kyi bdag nyid rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:165a-24: de dag gi gleng gzhi zhes pa ni de'i nges pa'i tshig yang dag par bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:165a-25: gsang chen zhes pa ni stong pa dang snying rje
T02D1197:165a-26: gnyis su med pa'i phyir de dag sbas pa nyid
T02D1197:165a-27: do // dpal kha sbyor gyi thig le las byung
T02D1197:165a-28: ba zhes pa ni de bzhin du dpal ni gnyis
T02D1197:165a-29: med pa'i ye she bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnyis
T02D1197:165a-30: su med pa las byung ba'o //
T02D1197:165a-31: rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes pas na de ltar rtog
T02D1197:165a-32: pa thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gtso bor gyur pa
T02D1197:165a-33: brjod pa le'u'am dum bu'am rim par phye ba'o //
T02D1197:165a-34: de nyid don dam pa byang chub sems las mchog go //
T02D1197:165a-35: de nyid don gyi sgras bstan te /
T02D1197:165a-36: gang gis rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad mdzes shing 'bar bas na rgyal pa'o //
T02D1197:165a-37: de de las byung ba ste sgra brnyan lta bu dang de yang dang po'o //
T02D1197:165a-38: thog ma dang tha ma don mthun pa nyid kyis na rtsogs pa zhes pas ni thob pa'o //
T02D1197:165a-39: de ltar sdud par byed pas yi ge'i rnam pas
T02D1197:165a-40: glegs bam la sogs pa rnams su bris pa ni
T02D1197:165a-41: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i phyir zhes 'brel to //
T02D1197:165a-42: kha sbyor gyi thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i bcom
T02D1197:165a-43: ldan 'das gsang chen thams cad kyi rang bzhin la
T02D1197:165b-0: 'jug @165b pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel
T02D1197:165b-1: pa yang dag par lta pa'i dran pa'i sang ba
T02D1197:165b-2: zhes pa gzhung las rtog pa dang po bstan pa
T02D1197:165b-3: ste lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1197:165b-4: rtog pa dang po'i rgya cher 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D1197:165b-6: // / da ni rtog pa gnyis pa'i byang chub sems
T02D1197:165b-7: kyi dbang gi rab tu byed pa nas brtsams te
T02D1197:165b-8: / sems can gyi don du de'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1197:165b-9: cho ga bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba
T02D1197:165b-11: de nas zhes pa ni rgyud thams cad kyi gleng
T02D1197:165b-12: gzhi gsang chen gyi rjes su ste de bstan pa'i
T02D1197:165b-13: mthar ro // yang dag bshad bya zhes pa ni
T02D1197:165b-14: yang dag pa'i chos bstan pa bshad par bya zhes
T02D1197:165b-15: mthar ro // pa'i don to // sgrub pa po
T02D1197:165b-16: rnams la zhes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i sems
T02D1197:165b-17: can rnams la zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:165b-18: phan pa'i phyir zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
T02D1197:165b-19: bdag nyid kyi chos te gzhan mi stegs pa la
T02D1197:165b-20: sogs pa'i chos rnams dang mtshungs pa ni ma yin
T02D1197:165b-21: no // des na 'di ni gang gi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:165b-22: slob ma dbang bskur ba'i shes pa ni 'dir dbang ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1197:165b-23: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D1197:165b-24: de la 'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba ste /
T02D1197:165b-26: gang 'jig rten las 'das pa de ni rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba ste /
T02D1197:165b-27: gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang gong ma'o //
T02D1197:165b-28: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung bas ni bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D1197:165b-29: dam pa'i chos kyi snod du byed pa'o //
T02D1197:165b-30: de bzhin du rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung bas
T02D1197:165b-31: ni ye she kyi tshogs kyi dbang gis sangs rgyas
T02D1197:165b-33: de ltar phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'chad bzhin pa de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i phyir te /
T02D1197:165b-34: gang gis zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas so //
T02D1197:165b-35: cho ga de yang zhes pa la yang gi sgras ni dbang gi cho ga gzung ngo //
T02D1197:165b-36: bstan par bya zhes pa ni bshad par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:165b-37: dang por lha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1197:165b-38: 'dir slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i rjes su ste
T02D1197:165b-39: / de ltar dang po nyid du bla ma dang
T02D1197:165b-40: slob ma dag phan tshun legs par brtags pa bdag
T02D1197:165b-41: la ltos pa med pa rang dang gzhan gyi don
T02D1197:165b-42: bsgrub pa la brtson pa de la sogs pa'i yon
T02D1197:165b-43: tan dang ldan pa'i slob ma la /
T02D1197:165b-44: bla mas kyang snying rje mngon du bya'o //
T02D1197:166a-0: de nas yo byang thams cad @166a * //
T02D1197:166a-1: thob pa de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi sar slob dpon
T02D1197:166a-2: song nas dri zhim pa'i me tog la sogs pa
T02D1197:166a-3: rnams kyis yang dag par mchod des la bsang gtor
T02D1197:166a-4: bya'o // slar yang bla mas rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i sbyor ba mngon du bya ste /
T02D1197:166a-5: de'i tshe bum pa la sogs pa dgod cing sa
T02D1197:166a-6: bon dgod pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1197:166a-7: sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1197:166a-8: de nyid la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1197:166a-9: me tog la sogs pa phul la bzod pa gsol te /
T02D1197:166a-10: blos nam mkhar gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1197:166a-11: de nas pus nub tsam brko bar bya'o //
T02D1197:166a-12: rus bu la sogs pa'i zug rdu bsal nas mtho gang tsam brkos te chus bkang la brtag ste /
T02D1197:166a-13: gom pa brgya brgyar song la slar log nas blta'o //
T02D1197:166a-14: gal te cung zad par ma gyur na de'i tshes gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1197:166a-15: gal te cung zad na de'i tshe dor ro //
T02D1197:166a-17: nyes pa du mar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:166a-18: slar la yang gang gi tshe nyes pa 'di rnams
T02D1197:166a-19: med pa de'i tshe ri nyid kyis sa dgang par
T02D1197:166a-20: bya'o // gal te sa lhag na de'i tshe sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub po //
T02D1197:166a-21: gal te nyung na de'i tshe dngos grub med do //
T02D1197:166a-22: gal te yang mnyam na de'i tshe zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:166a-23: de bzhin du bla mas ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par byas nas /
T02D1197:166a-24: sngags bzlas pa la sogs pa dang mchod pa yang bya ste /
T02D1197:166a-25: bum pa la sogs pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1197:166a-26: de nas sa'i lha mo spyan drangs te /
T02D1197:166a-27: de nyid la mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1197:166a-28: h'um las rdo rje 'bar byas pas //
T02D1197:166a-29: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de'i gnas su sa'i lha mo de thim par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1197:166a-30: de'i tshe h'um yongs su gyur ba las sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:166a-31: des na de'i rang bzhin du bya zhes dgongs so ;
T02D1197:166a-32: / de'i tshe der phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma rgya chen po sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1197:166a-33: slar yang bla mas ting 'dzin gsum gyi tshul gyis
T02D1197:166a-34: srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa nye bar dgod
T02D1197:166a-35: par bya'o // de'i rjes su sgrub pa po gal
T02D1197:166a-36: te rgya ji tsam 'dod pa de tsam gyi dkyil
T02D1197:166a-38: de nyid kyi gnas gsungs pa skyed mos tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:166a-39: stong pa zhes pa ni dur khrod du zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:166a-40: slar la yang nyes pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1197:166a-41: 'dir chos rnams thams cad kyi gzhi ni ma rig pa'o //
T02D1197:166a-42: des ni phung po lnga rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:166a-43: des na sna tshogs pa nyid do //
T02D1197:166b-0: de'i phyir rnal 'byor @166b pa rang gi lus sbyang bar bya ste /
T02D1197:166b-1: las dang po pas rnam pa dang bcas pa'i lha'i bdag nyid bsgom pa'o //
T02D1197:166b-2: des na sems rtse gcig pa h'um gi brdas bstan
T02D1197:166b-3: pa sems rdo rje can dbyer med pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:166b-5: de'i tshe g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna'i bu ga dag
T02D1197:166b-6: gi srog la sogs pa bcu'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga
T02D1197:166b-7: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni slob pa'i lam mo
T02D1197:166b-8: // phyis bsgom par lam gsungs te /
T02D1197:166b-9: skyed mos tshal zhes pa nas lding khang gi bar ro //
T02D1197:166b-10: de yang rim pa bzhin sa la sogs pa nam
T02D1197:166b-11: mkha'i mthar thug pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga sna bug g-yas
T02D1197:166b-12: par sdud pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1197:166b-13: de bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1197:166b-14: lnga sna bug g-yon par spro ba'i rim pas so
T02D1197:166b-15: // de ltar dkyil 'khor mchog ces pa ni gnas 'di rnams su bsam par bya'o //
T02D1197:166b-16: de yang rang bzhin gyis dag pa de bzhin nyid
T02D1197:166b-17: kyi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro
T02D1197:166b-18: // 'on kyang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bya ba'i phyir 'chad bzhin pa las bstan par bya'o //
T02D1197:166b-19: de bzhin du yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:166b-20: rdul tshon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:166b-21: dur khrod kyi sol ba dang so phag dang mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang /
T02D1197:166b-22: mi rus kyi phye ma ldong ros kyis bsgyur ba'i rdul tshon dang /
T02D1197:166b-23: de bzhin rdul tshon ljang gu'o //
T02D1197:166b-25: rin chen lnga'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni padma r'a
T02D1197:166b-26: ga dang aindra n'i la dang kar ke ta ka
T02D1197:166b-27: dang beed'ur+ya dang markata rnams so //
T02D1197:166b-28: yang na gser dang dngul dang byu ru dang /
T02D1197:166b-29: mu tig dang mu men rnams so //
T02D1197:166b-31: de rnams kyang ma rnyed na 'bras la sogs ba ste /
T02D1197:166b-32: 'bras btags pa'i rang bzhin ldong ros la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:166b-33: tshon sna lngas kha bsgyur ba'i phye ma rnams kyis
T02D1197:166b-34: bya zhes pa ni drang ba'i don to //
T02D1197:166b-35: de bzhin du nges pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir rdul tshon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:166b-36: mchog ces pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1197:166b-37: re re me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye
T02D1197:166b-39: yang na de nyid kyi aa wa dh'u t'ir bdud rtsi lnga rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:166b-40: des na 'bras la sogs pa'i 'dru ma zos pas nad med par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1197:166b-41: skra dkar dang gnyer ma spangs pa'i lus kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:167a-0: da ni slob ma'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad @167a * //
T02D1197:167a-2: khru gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:167a-3: de la khru gsum nas brtsams te khru bzhi la sogs pa'am khru stong gi mthar thug par ro //
T02D1197:167a-4: de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas 'di nyid du slob ma dang /
T02D1197:167a-5: slob dpon lha gang la mos pa dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha gnas su dgod de /
T02D1197:167a-6: ji lta ba'i cho gas mchod pa byas nas gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1197:167a-7: 'on kyang dbang bcu ma gsungs mod de bzhin du
T02D1197:167a-8: 'dir go rims ji lta ba bzhin rgyas bar bya'o
T02D1197:167a-9: // gzhan du dam tshig nyams bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:167a-11: de ni slar la yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1197:167a-12: dbang gi don 'dod pa skal pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1197:167a-13: slob ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i dbang bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1197:167a-14: / rig ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:167a-15: 'dir spyir rigs lnga las byung ba'o zhes pa ni bram zel sogs pa'i rigs bas byung ba'o //
T02D1197:167a-16: de bzhin du sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:167a-17: la sngags kyi lam la kla klo'i lam gyis bstan
T02D1197:167a-18: pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1197:167a-19: gcig ni bla ma'i nus pa ste /
T02D1197:167a-20: des na khams gsum pa gang su yang rung ba'i bu mo sngags kyi nus pas 'gugs pa'o //
T02D1197:167a-21: gnyis pa ni sngags kyi theg pa chen por rnal
T02D1197:167a-22: 'byor la spyod pas rnam par rtog pa mi bya
T02D1197:167a-23: ste / sngags kyi lam la brten pas bud med
T02D1197:167a-24: rnams la rigs can rigs can ma yin par mi
T02D1197:167a-26: blo ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:167a-27: yo byad ces pa ni ches myur bar rnal 'byor 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:167a-29: skal bzangs ma zhes pa ni padma can te /
T02D1197:167a-31: rus sbal rgyab dang glang po'i dbung //
T02D1197:167a-32: padma'i kha dang legs zlum pa //
T02D1197:167a-33: spu ni med cing kha rgyas pa //
T02D1197:167a-34: drug po de dag skal bzangs brjod //
T02D1197:167a-35: bu mo 'di dag ges ni zhes pa ni rig ma brgyad kyis so //
T02D1197:167a-36: rigs kyi rim pa bzhin zhes pa ni goo r'i la sogs pa'i rigs las byung ba'o //
T02D1197:167a-37: yang na gang dang gang du skyes pa'i bu mo de dang de nyid bzung ste /
T02D1197:167a-38: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang dbang bskur ba
T02D1197:167a-39: sngon du 'gro bas dam pa'i chos sna tshogs pa
T02D1197:167a-40: mnyan par bya'o // gzhan yang kar na sna tshogs
T02D1197:167a-41: pa'i rim pa zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i bstan bcos
T02D1197:167a-42: dang rjes su mthun par legs par bslab pa brjod
T02D1197:167b-0: mnyan par bya'o // de / 'khyogs @167b dang bskums dang brkyangs pa dang //
T02D1197:167b-1: brla gdengs legs par brkyangs pa zhes pa la sogs
T02D1197:167b-2: pa byed pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar la legs
T02D1197:167b-3: par bslabs shing byang bar bya'o //
T02D1197:167b-4: de ltar sgrub pa po rnams la gdung ba'i phyag
T02D1197:167b-5: rgya rna cha la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis
T02D1197:167b-7: dngos grub mchog ster zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:167b-8: 'di lta bu'i phyag rgya gang dag sngon du gsungs
T02D1197:167b-9: pa'i tshul gyis sbyangs pa de dag gis ni ji
T02D1197:167b-11: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:167b-12: rig pa 'dzin pa'i grogs la sogs pa dang bcas
T02D1197:167b-13: pa zhes pa ni 'dir rnal 'byor gyi nus pas
T02D1197:167b-14: slob dpon gyi dngos grub chen po brgyad thob pa
T02D1197:167b-15: de'i dngos grub 'dzin pas na rig pa 'dzin pa'o
T02D1197:167b-16: // dngos grub de rnams kyang dgug par bya'o //
T02D1197:167b-17: gang gi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub
T02D1197:167b-18: thob pa de'i tshe 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub gzhan
T02D1197:167b-19: bsgrub pa ni grogs su gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:167b-20: de'i phyir de thams cad slob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:167b-21: sogs pa'i sgras lha dang mi la sogs pa rnams bsdu'o //
T02D1197:167b-22: me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:167b-23: pa ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i
T02D1197:167b-24: slob dpon la phyag rgyas dbul zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:167b-25: gzhan thams cad ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:167b-26: da ni slob mas slob dpon la gsol ba btab pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:167b-27: slob ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob ma'i bya ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:167b-28: 'dud ces bya ba la sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir bstod pa'o //
T02D1197:167b-29: de yang mi bskyod pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D1197:167b-30: kun mkhyen ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas so //
T02D1197:167b-31: 'gro ba mi shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgo nas so //
T02D1197:167b-32: sangs rgyas zhas bya ba la sogs pas ni 'dod dpag med kyi sgo nas so //
T02D1197:167b-33: de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:167b-34: sogs pa ni don yod par grub pa'i sgo nas
T02D1197:167b-35: so // 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas so //
T02D1197:167b-36: de ltar mdor bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
T02D1197:167b-37: gyi rang bzhin gyis slob dpon gyi yon tan yang
T02D1197:167b-38: dag par gyur pa slob mas brjod par 'gyur ro
T02D1197:167b-39: // de nyid bla na med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D1197:168a-0: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni bum pa'i dbang gi rjes su gsang @168a * //
T02D1197:168a-2: gsang chen zhes pa la sogs pa ni shes rab
T02D1197:168a-3: ye shes kyi dbang gi rjes thogs su dbang bla
T02D1197:168a-4: ma la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D1197:168a-5: de ltar dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:168a-6: bla mas kyang ji skad gsungs pa brjod pa de
T02D1197:168a-8: 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga zhes pa ni gzugs dang
T02D1197:168a-9: sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams te
T02D1197:168a-10: / rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams kyis brgyan
T02D1197:168a-11: pa'i gnas rnams su slob ma dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D1197:168a-12: / // 'gro ba'i gtso bo zhes pa ni ma
T02D1197:168a-13: gsungs kyang de bzhin du rgyas pa'i dbang rnam pa
T02D1197:168a-14: / // bcu ston to // nyid ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:168a-15: 'on kyang me tog bskyur nas dam tshig sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1197:168a-16: des na rang bzhin zhes pa ni lus sbyang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:168a-17: de yang khrag chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:168a-18: khrag chen po zhes pa ni rang 'byung gi me tog go //
T02D1197:168a-19: ga pur bcas zhes pa ni yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i byang chub sems so //
T02D1197:168a-20: des na de dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:168a-21: de bzhin du mi'i khrag dang /
T02D1197:168a-22: tsandan yang dag par sbyar zhes pa ni bshad pa dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1197:168a-23: de bzhin sems las 'byung bar bshad //
T02D1197:168a-24: ces pa ni yang sngon du gsungs pa'i padma'i snod la gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:168a-25: de dag thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1197:168a-26: de ltar dam tshig gsungs so //
T02D1197:168a-27: gzhan yang srog chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngom pa'o //
T02D1197:168a-28: de bzhin du sngon du gsungs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1197:168a-29: des ni ngag dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:168a-30: de bzhin du de nyid du zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:168a-31: sogs pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo
T02D1197:168a-32: // des ni sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:168a-33: de bzhin du bdag dang gzhan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dbang bla ma'o //
T02D1197:168a-34: des ni ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:168a-35: de bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya
T02D1197:168a-36: ba la sogs pa ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin
T02D1197:168a-37: pa'o // de ltar slob ma la chos bstan pa smra bar bya'o //
T02D1197:168a-38: de bzhin du chos bstan pa thos nas rangs pa'i slob mas 'di brjod do //
T02D1197:168a-39: de ring zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:168a-40: de bzhin du gang dang gang zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:168a-41: sogs pa ni bla ma la yon dang bcas pa
T02D1197:168a-42: sbyin pa'o // gzhan de thams cad la gang cung
T02D1197:168a-43: zad ma bstan pa de thams cad ni go sla'o
T02D1197:168b-0: sbyin pa'o // // 'on kyang don de de @168b bzhin 'chad bzhin pas bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:168b-1: des na kha cig tu don gsal bar khong du chud par bya zhes pa ste /
T02D1197:168b-3: da ni 'di nyid kyis bsdus pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:168b-4: khru gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:168b-5: 'dir lus la rkang ba nas ji srid du mgrin
T02D1197:168b-6: pa'i mthar thug par khru gsum dang sor bcu gnyis
T02D1197:168b-8: des ni dbyibs kyi rlung bstan pa'i don to //
T02D1197:168b-9: bzhi zhes pa ni kosko nas sna'i bar la sor bzhi'o //
T02D1197:168b-10: 'dis ni las kyi rlung bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:168b-11: ci'i phyir bstan zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1197:168b-12: rig ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rig
T02D1197:168b-13: ma ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo lnga dkyil
T02D1197:168b-14: 'khor lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin can
T02D1197:168b-15: no // de yang sngags kyi lam gyis te /
T02D1197:168b-16: yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis rdo rje bzlas
T02D1197:168b-17: pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad nang du thim
T02D1197:168b-18: par bya ba'o // gang gis sems dbang bskur bar
T02D1197:168b-19: 'gyur bas skad cig thams cad du bde ba la
T02D1197:168b-21: de bzhin du mngon sum du phung po thams cad kyi ste /
T02D1197:168b-22: de ltar yang ji ltar chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi
T02D1197:168b-23: nang du byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor phung po
T02D1197:168b-24: dang khams dang skye mched thams cad kyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:168b-26: de ltar sems bde ba nyid du yongs su brtags to /
T02D1197:168b-27: de las byung ba'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:168b-28: de'i phyir ji ltar sems dbang bskur bar 'gyur pa de bzhin du /
T02D1197:168b-29: 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas zhes pa ni lus
T02D1197:168b-30: dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid rtsa stong phrag
T02D1197:168b-31: bdun cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa de thams cad
T02D1197:168b-33: 'dis ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdag nyid 'thob po //
T02D1197:168b-34: des ni khams gsum pa sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin bskyed do //
T02D1197:168b-35: des kyang 'gro ba'i don byed de rnal 'byor pa
T02D1197:168b-36: rnams kyi dam tshig chen po bsrungs pa'i phyir 'grub
T02D1197:168b-37: po // de bzhin du sngags kyi lam gyis don
T02D1197:168b-38: dam ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur rdo rje
T02D1197:168b-40: de'i tshe rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de
T02D1197:168b-41: bzhin gshegs pa drug rnams skyed par 'gyur ba ni
T02D1197:168b-42: don dam pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D1197:168b-43: 'di don thams cad ni dbang gi don te rgyal
T02D1197:168b-44: ba'i bdag nyid gang gis yang dag par thob po
T02D1197:169a-1: na thams cad la khyab par byed pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:169a-2: gyi rdo rje slob dpon bcom ldan 'das sh'a kya
T02D1197:169a-3: thub pa yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bzhin zhes so
T02D1197:169a-4: // des na ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma
T02D1197:169a-5: bzhi rim pas bzlog pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D1197:169a-6: la sogs pas sgrub par byed do //
T02D1197:169a-7: yang na phyag rgya gcig bsam gtan gyi khyad par
T02D1197:169a-8: gyis ji ltar thob pa deng nga lhan cig bya
T02D1197:169a-9: zhes dgongs so // gang de ltar mi 'gyur ba
T02D1197:169a-10: de'i tshe gzhan rig ma brgyad ba zhes pa bram
T02D1197:169a-12: de rnams kyi yang yi ge'i don brjod de rnal
T02D1197:169a-13: 'byor pa'i rgyud rgyas pa rnams las ji lta ba
T02D1197:169a-17: rgod ma yi ni me ni 'bar //
T02D1197:169a-21: 'dod chags la sogs lnga zad pas //
T02D1197:169a-23: dregs pa 'bab pa'i rtsa ni gang //
T02D1197:169a-25: nu ma'i dbus su rnam par gzung //
T02D1197:169a-27: bag chags dam pa shes par bya //
T02D1197:169a-29: 'dod chags phul dbyung byed pa yin //
T02D1197:169a-33: skra yi mtshams su song ba'i rtsa //
T02D1197:169a-35: ma mchu'i bdud rtsi bza' ba'o //
T02D1197:169a-41: bdud rtsi'i ro ni myang ba'o //
T02D1197:169a-43: tshangs sgo zhes pa tshol 'gro ba ;
T02D1197:169a-45: der ni mi shigs pa la 'khyud //
T02D1197:169a-47: dus dang dus min gnyis dus min //
T02D1197:169a-49: sbrul bzhin du ne shugs 'gro ma //
T02D1197:169a-51: sa bon gzugs ni bdud rtsir song //
T02D1197:169a-53: nor bu'i bu ga gnyis las g-yas //
T02D1197:169a-55: de 'gro bar ni sems can sprul //
T02D1197:169a-57: rigs dang rus ni rab tu skyes ;
T02D1197:169a-59: dbang ni thams cad thob pa yin //
T02D1197:169a-61: sprul pa po ni rtag tu 'byung //
T02D1197:169a-63: 'byung ba thams cad rnams ni gnas //
T02D1197:169a-65: brtan pa la sogs g-yo dang bcas //
T02D1197:169a-67: aa wa dh'u t'i'i steng du 'gro //
T02D1197:169a-71: rtag tu bdag ni shes rnam pa //
T02D1197:169a-73: shes pa med cing shes bya med //
T02D1197:169a-75: sgrub thabs thams cad dran bzhin te //
T02D1197:169a-79: rgyal po dgra yis 'jigs thams cad //
T02D1197:169a-81: mdun nas dal ba nyid du song //
T02D1197:169a-83: sems can gang dag spro chung ba //
T02D1197:169a-85: 'di lta bu yi mchog ni byed //
T02D1197:169b-0: yid can gyis ni @169b yod med byed //
T02D1197:169b-2: srog ni rdo rje lta bur brtan //
T02D1197:169b-4: bag chags bde ba tsam ni nyid //
T02D1197:169b-5: rdo rje rlung bu bstan pa yin //
T02D1197:169b-6: 'di ni sbyor ba'i lam yin no //
T02D1197:169b-7: de nas mthong ba'i lam gsungs pa //
T02D1197:169b-8: ri dgas mig la sogs pa yi //
T02D1197:169b-9: 'dir ri dags bzhin du rnal 'byor mig / bsgom pa rtog pa yi ni sems //
T02D1197:169b-10: rgya che bar ni lta ba'i lus //
T02D1197:169b-11: dbu ma phra ma spangs pa'o //
T02D1197:169b-12: bde dang sdug pa ro smad nyid //
T02D1197:169b-13: chos kyi dbyings ni rgya che'i phyir //
T02D1197:169b-14: nu ma mthon po zhes pa 'dir //
T02D1197:169b-15: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa nyid //
T02D1197:169b-16: lta ba'i sdong po spangs pa nyid //
T02D1197:169b-17: de dag gnyis med mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D1197:169b-18: skal bzangs zhes pa 'di ni gsungs //
T02D1197:169b-20: / bder gshegs 'ching ba dang ni bral //
T02D1197:169b-22: rang gi bag chags kyis ni 'khor //
T02D1197:169b-24: sems can rnams kyi rigs ni gzung //
T02D1197:169b-25: de yang bsam med gnyis su med //
T02D1197:169b-26: sgyu ma nyid de sgyu ma'i sgyu //
T02D1197:169b-27: 'khrul bas smig rgyu'i tshogs la ni //
T02D1197:169b-28: chu yi rnam pa nyid du mthong //
T02D1197:169b-29: 'khrul pa'i phyir na chu ni med //
T02D1197:169b-30: de ltar thams cad du ni dor //
T02D1197:169b-31: zab mo'i chos kyi dbyings ni nyid //
T02D1197:169b-32: bcom pa'i gzungs la 'das pa'i sgra //
T02D1197:169b-33: bskal pa'i dang por rtag tu gnas //
T02D1197:169b-34: dam tshig ces pa dus mi 'gyur //
T02D1197:169b-35: spyad pas gnyis med rab tu 'thob //
T02D1197:169b-36: de ltar shin tu gus gnas su //
T02D1197:169b-37: de nyid brjod med mchog mdun du //
T02D1197:169b-38: sngags dang rgyud sogs thams cad ni //
T02D1197:169b-39: smig rgyu bzhin du rtag shes bya //
T02D1197:169b-40: 'di dag gnyis med bu mo yang //
T02D1197:169b-41: gnyis med chos nyid du ni gsungs //
T02D1197:169b-42: lus dang gsum gyi srid gsum du //
T02D1197:169b-43: rin thang med pa bsgom pa'i bdag /'di nyid kyis ni sems can kun //
T02D1197:169b-44: dbang bskur nyid bdag de yi dngos //
T02D1197:169b-45: de ltar bdag nyid dngos grub ni //
T02D1197:169b-46: chos rnams kyis ni rig rim gyis //
T02D1197:169b-47: yang na ji lta phyag rgya ni //
T02D1197:169b-48: zab mo'i chos kyi nges pas so //
T02D1197:169b-49: da ni rgyu ba gsung pa ste //
T02D1197:169b-50: lo ni bcu drug ma la sogs //
T02D1197:169b-51: lo ni bcu drug ma zhes pa //
T02D1197:169b-52: 'di ni dgongs bshad gzhan nyid kyis //
T02D1197:169b-53: 'pho ba bcu drug tu ni brjod //
T02D1197:169b-55: gnas ni bcu drug gnas su'o //
T02D1197:169b-56: 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug tu //
T02D1197:169b-57: thams cad du ni srog rnams rgyu //
T02D1197:169b-58: de bzhin 'khor lo'i don ni gsungs //
T02D1197:169b-59: thig le lnga pa lnga nyid de //
T02D1197:169b-60: phreng ba bzhin du yongs su grags //
T02D1197:169b-61: zur bzhi'i thig le rnams dang ni //
T02D1197:170a-2: thams cad du ni dor bya ste //
T02D1197:170a-3: cha ni bcu drug brgyu ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:170a-4: thun mtshams bzhi'i thig le bzhi //
T02D1197:170a-5: stong pa'i thig le rnams su brtag / gnas lnga'i bu ga rnams su ni //
T02D1197:170a-6: thig le'i gnas sogs sngon 'gro ba //
T02D1197:170a-7: mchog gi de nyid shes par bya //
T02D1197:170a-8: lnga gsum gcig la rgyu ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:170a-9: de yang pad 'dab bzhin zhes bya //
T02D1197:170a-10: dang po thig le gtsug tor ming can las //
T02D1197:170a-11: nyi ma'i cha ni byung nas su //
T02D1197:170a-12: gnyis pa yi ni dang por 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-13: yang ni gsum pa'i gnyis par 'ong //
T02D1197:170a-14: bzhi pa yi ni dang por song //
T02D1197:170a-15: lnga pa yi ni gnyis par 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-16: de bzhin bzhi ba'i gsum par 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-17: yang ni lnga pa'i bzhi par 'ong //
T02D1197:170a-18: bzhi pa yi ni lnga par 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-19: de nas gsum pa'i bzhi par ro //
T02D1197:170a-20: gnyis pa yi ni lnga par 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-21: de nas dang po'i bzhi par ro //
T02D1197:170a-22: gnyis pa yi ni gsum par 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-23: dang po'i thig le'i gnyis par 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-24: rtag tu g-yas nas bskor ba ru //
T02D1197:170a-25: yang dag par ni byed par 'dod //
T02D1197:170a-26: de bzhin rim pa bzhin shes bya //
T02D1197:170a-27: rkang pa'i mthe bong g-yon pa nas //
T02D1197:170a-28: phrag pa g-yon pa'i mtshams su 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-29: bdud rtsi yin ni gnas su 'ong //
T02D1197:170a-30: lag pa'i mthe bong tshigs su 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-31: yang ni lce yi rtse mor 'ong //
T02D1197:170a-32: rkang pa g-yas pa ru ni 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-33: phrag pa yi ni mtshams su 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-35: de las rtsa ba'i bu gar ro //
T02D1197:170a-36: mgrin pa nas ni rkan du 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-38: sna yi bu ga dag tu 'gro //
T02D1197:170a-39: de ltar 'pho ba bcu gnyis ni //
T02D1197:170a-41: phyogs bzhi ru ni thig le bzhi //
T02D1197:170a-42: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab mar gnas //
T02D1197:170a-43: 'char ba dang ni nub pa'i rgyus //
T02D1197:170a-44: phun sum tshogs pa'i rim shes bya //
T02D1197:170a-46: de bzhin sgra gcan thig le yang //
T02D1197:170a-48: de rnams gnas ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1197:170a-49: dngos grub rgyu ru bstan par bya //
T02D1197:170a-50: la la n'a yi khong stong gnas //
T02D1197:170a-51: dang po rtag tu shes par bya //
T02D1197:170a-52: gnyis par sa n'a dbus nyid //
T02D1197:170a-53: gsum pa aa wa dh'u t'i'i gnas //
T02D1197:170a-54: bzhi pa mgo bo yi ni mtshams //
T02D1197:170a-55: 'di ni mchog gi de nyid de //
T02D1197:170a-56: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rgyu phyir //
T02D1197:170a-57: rab tu 'bad de shes par bya //
T02D1197:170a-58: dus dang dus tshod nyer mtshon pa //
T02D1197:170b-0: de yang @170b grangs ni bcu drug la //
T02D1197:170b-1: srog dang rtsol ba nyer brtag phyir //
T02D1197:170b-2: dkyil 'khor de nyid rlung gis ni //
T02D1197:170b-3: rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bgrang ba //
T02D1197:170b-4: bdugs ni drug brgya lhag pa yi //
T02D1197:170b-5: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis //
T02D1197:170b-6: cha ni rim par rnam shes pas //
T02D1197:170b-7: rgyu ba de nyid rgya yis gdab //
T02D1197:170b-8: de dag bcu drug lha chen mo //
T02D1197:170b-9: de yi dbus du grangs med pa //
T02D1197:170b-10: rang bzhin dang ni skyes bur shes //
T02D1197:170b-11: sems kyi gzugs ni mthong ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:170b-12: de yang nag mo gcig la sogs //
T02D1197:170b-13: gdan bzhi pa las shes par bya //
T02D1197:170b-14: de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ru //
T02D1197:170b-15: dus kyis rnal 'byor mas shes bya //
T02D1197:170b-16: ye shes ro mnyam gyur pa yi //
T02D1197:170b-19: gnas bcu drug tu 'dzag phyir ro //
T02D1197:170b-20: de bzhin aa wa dh'u t'i'i cha //
T02D1197:170b-21: gzhon nu la sogs legs byed phyir //
T02D1197:170b-22: de yi cha ni de tshe shes //
T02D1197:170b-23: dus kyi rtsa ni brtags pa yin //
T02D1197:170b-24: de nyid kyis ni dang por 'gyur //
T02D1197:170b-25: lang tsho nad med 'phel ba'i phyir ;
T02D1197:170b-26: / de ltar phyag rgyar rtag tu bshad //
T02D1197:170b-27: sangs rgyas pa ni 'dod bzang lha //
T02D1197:170b-28: 'di lta bu yi phyag rgya gdab //
T02D1197:170b-29: phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che //
T02D1197:170b-30: de yi gzugs kyis phyir rol sdud //
T02D1197:170b-31: gsum la skyabs 'gro sogs don bzhin //
T02D1197:170b-32: 'on kyang sems can don dpang las //
T02D1197:170b-33: phyi ru don nyid bstan pa yin //
T02D1197:170b-34: rang rig bdag nyid las ni gzhan //
T02D1197:170b-35: gzhan du phyag rgya brjod pa min //
T02D1197:170b-36: de ltar 'di ni bstan pa yang //
T02D1197:170b-37: slob ma rnams la brtse dbang gis //
T02D1197:170b-38: de yang snga ma bzhin du 'byung //
T02D1197:170b-39: mi bskyod la sogs bde gshegs drug /'dir ni bstod pa yang ni byed //
T02D1197:170b-40: bdud ces bya sogs tshigs bcad kyis //
T02D1197:170b-41: stong pa dngos po kun gyi mchog //
T02D1197:170b-42: de yi snying po rdzogs longs spyod //
T02D1197:170b-43: de yang lhan cig skyes pa tsam //
T02D1197:170b-44: rtog pa yi ni dra ba spangs //
T02D1197:170b-46: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu //
T02D1197:170b-47: ye shes kyi ni sku de yis //
T02D1197:170b-48: bla ma dam pa phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1197:170b-49: mi bskyod dngos po'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1197:170b-50: rtag tu gtso bo kun du bzhugs //
T02D1197:170b-51: slar la yang ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1197:170b-52: mgon po dmigs pa yin ni mchog / de yi bstod pa'i nang chud pa //
T02D1197:170b-54: 'gro ba zhes sogs tshigs su bcad //
T02D1197:170b-55: de ltar sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1197:171a-2: rin chen 'od zer snying gsang ba //
T02D1197:171a-3: rdo rje mi phyed byed pa ni //
T02D1197:171a-4: sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun chags pas //
T02D1197:171a-5: chos kyi dbyings ni de yi gzhi //
T02D1197:171a-6: de ltar rin chen rdo rje che //
T02D1197:171a-7: bla ma ston pa 'gro ba'i gtso //
T02D1197:171a-8: ma byon rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D1197:171a-9: dngos po kun gyis phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1197:171a-10: yang ni dpag med rdo rje ru'i //
T02D1197:171a-11: yang dag bzhugs pa khyod dpa' bo //
T02D1197:171a-12: rdzogs sangs rgyas dag thob phyir dang //
T02D1197:171a-13: sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:171a-14: de bzhin byang chub sems bsgyings nas //
T02D1197:171a-15: de nyid la sogs yang dag bstan //
T02D1197:171a-16: de ltar yang ni lus la ni //
T02D1197:171a-17: byang chub sems ni 'byung ba ni //
T02D1197:171a-18: don dam pa yi gzugs ni nyid //
T02D1197:171a-19: de yi rang bzhin can phyag 'tshal //
T02D1197:171a-20: de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la sogs //
T02D1197:171a-21: theg pa che la sogs chos nyid //
T02D1197:171a-22: lus las yang dag 'byung ba yin //
T02D1197:171a-23: don yod grub pa dbang bsgyur bas //
T02D1197:171a-24: bstan pa dang ni g-yo sna tshogs //
T02D1197:171a-25: gtso bo khyod kyis sprul byed cing //
T02D1197:171a-26: khams gsum la sogs bskyed pa dang /
T02D1197:171a-28: de ltar sku sogs rdo rje gsum //
T02D1197:171a-29: dpa' po yis ni pha rol 'gro //
T02D1197:171a-30: dpa' bo 'gro ba'i bya ba spyod //
T02D1197:171a-31: don yod grub la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1197:171a-32: de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu sogs //
T02D1197:171a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag dngos kyis //
T02D1197:171a-34: gtso bo khyod ni yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1197:171a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba nyid //
T02D1197:171a-36: gzugs brnyan bzhin du mdzad pa'o //
T02D1197:171a-37: des na khyod kyi sku nyid ni //
T02D1197:171a-38: 'dod pa yi ni dngos grub ste //
T02D1197:171a-39: dpal ldan la sogs go sla'o //
T02D1197:171a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa drug rnams kyis //
T02D1197:171a-41: sras po gnyis la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1197:171a-42: yon tan la sogs go sla'o //
T02D1197:171a-44: da ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1197:171a-45: byang chub sems kyi gsang ba'i dbang brjod pa'i phyir
T02D1197:171a-46: // dpal ldan rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:171a-47: 'dir slob dpon ni sngon nas grub pa'i phyir de'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang po'o //
T02D1197:171a-48: gnyis pa ni byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1197:171a-49: de yang phyag rgya'i sbyor bas bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1197:171a-50: slar yang de nyid ni gci ka ste bdag gi dngos po'o //
T02D1197:171a-51: gnyis pa ni gzhan la phan pa'o //
T02D1197:171a-52: gang bdag gi dngos po de yang nang gi bla ma'o //
T02D1197:171a-53: de'i phyir padma'i snod aa wa dh'u t'i'i dbus su 'ongs te //
T02D1197:171b-0: lte @171b pa'i dbus su ngal ba sos pa'i byang chub sems so //
T02D1197:171b-1: rgyal ba bdag nyid skyes zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:171b-5: pho nya pho nya mo rang bzhin //
T02D1197:171b-7: de ni bden pa chen po'i sems //
T02D1197:171b-9: sgyu ma yis ni sdud par byed //
T02D1197:171b-11: yid kyis dbang bskur ba ni sbyin //
T02D1197:171b-15: bde ba'i sku yi dri ma nyid //
T02D1197:171b-17: khams gsum spro ba nyid kyis ni //
T02D1197:171b-18: g'a bde ba phun sum tshogs pa gzung //
T02D1197:171b-20: gnas dang gnas min nyams dga' ba //
T02D1197:171b-22: bkra shis yid can rnams kyis yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1197:171b-24: gsang ba'i dus su song nas ni //
T02D1197:171b-26: bde ba dmigs pa brgyud pa ni //
T02D1197:171b-28: ri bo yi ni phyir mchod pa //
T02D1197:171b-30: til las mar khu 'byung ba bzhin //
T02D1197:171b-32: 'byung ba'i rtsig pa la ni brten //
T02D1197:171b-33: de ltar phyag rgya phyag rgya che //
T02D1197:171b-34: ldan pa rnal 'byor pa de nas //
T02D1197:171b-35: slob ma dbang bskur bya zhes pa //
T02D1197:171b-36: de ni 'byung chen bdag nyid las ;
T02D1197:171b-38: de thams cad ni slob mar 'gyur //
T02D1197:171b-39: 'gro ba'i gtso bor zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:171b-40: 'gro ba'i gtso bor bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:171b-41: bya zhes pa ni slob dpon gyis dbang ngo //
T02D1197:171b-42: de ni khams gsum gyi sems can rnams la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:171b-43: de'i phyir mchog gi dbang phyug tu 'gyur te /
T02D1197:171b-44: sangs rgyas nyid du nges pa'o //
T02D1197:171b-45: da ni de rnams kyi rten brjod pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:171b-46: bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:171b-47: sbyin par bya zhes pa ni phyi'i rnal 'byor ma
T02D1197:171b-48: zhing skyes dang sngags skyes dang lhan cig skyes ma
T02D1197:171b-50: 'chad bzhin pa rnams kyi mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:171b-51: de bzhin du de yang gal te rnal 'byor pa
T02D1197:171b-52: sngon du rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la
T02D1197:171b-53: rnam par mos pas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag
T02D1197:171b-54: nyid du 'gyur ba de'i tshe rgyu des ni pha
T02D1197:171b-55: dang ma dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug dag
T02D1197:171b-56: gi rigs las skye bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:171b-57: 'on te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gcig pu la mos
T02D1197:171b-58: pa des na phan ni dpa' bo la sogs g-yon
T02D1197:171b-60: ma ni tha mal pa'i bud med do //
T02D1197:171b-61: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la mos pa
T02D1197:171b-62: des na ma ni dpa' mo la sogs pa'i yon
T02D1197:171b-63: tan gyis brgyan te pha ni tha mal pa'i skyes
T02D1197:171b-64: pa'o // des na cung zad ma gyur par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:172a-0: de'i phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba @172a * //
T02D1197:172a-2: des na dag pa'i sems de sbyin par bya zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:172a-3: des na nyid kyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:172a-4: de ltar dam tshig ces pa ni brda'i skad kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1197:172a-5: nyams dga' zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:172a-6: bzang po zhes pa ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi
T02D1197:172a-7: rang bzhin dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
T02D1197:172a-8: bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1197:172a-9: 'dus byas zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo de'i gnas so //
T02D1197:172a-10: khrag chen po zhes pa ni 'dir de'i rang gi
T02D1197:172a-11: ngo bo las byung ba'i sems de ma yis kyang
T02D1197:172a-12: rnal 'byor gyi nus pas de'i dus su mthong ngo
T02D1197:172a-13: // de'i tshe rang gi bdag nyid chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par bya ste /
T02D1197:172a-14: des rang byung gi me tog bskyed pa de ni khrag chen po'o //
T02D1197:172a-15: de dang ga bur bcas zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyi byang chub sems te /
T02D1197:172a-16: de yang de bzhin du bskyed ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:172a-17: 'on kyang tsandan dmar po dang sbyar zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:172a-18: pha chags pa chen po skyes pa des na rnal 'byor ma bskul te /
T02D1197:172a-19: des kyang 'khyud pa la sogs pa byed do //
T02D1197:172a-20: dmar po ni chags pas mchod pa'i phyir de'i tshe tsandan dri bzhin bri ba'o //
T02D1197:172a-21: ji ltar phyi'i rnam par rtog pas rdul phra rab
T02D1197:172a-22: lta bu'i sems can rnams shin tu phra bar 'gyur
T02D1197:172a-23: te / dri snom pas na dri za'o //
T02D1197:172a-24: de bzhin du 'dir yang tha mal pa'i byang chub sems ni dri ma med pa ste /
T02D1197:172a-25: tha mal pa'i bag chags kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1197:172a-26: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni de lta bu ma yin te /
T02D1197:172a-27: chags pa chen po'i bdag nyid tsandan bzhin du dri shes par bya ste /
T02D1197:172a-28: bag chags khyad par can las rang rig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:172a-29: de bzhin du yang ji ltar tsandan go shirsha'i dri
T02D1197:172a-30: bsnams pa tsam gyis gdung ba chen po nye bar
T02D1197:172a-32: de bzhin du rang rig pa'i bde ba nye bar
T02D1197:172a-33: mtshon pa tsam gyis 'khor ba'i bag chags rnams kyi
T02D1197:172a-34: gdung ba chen po nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1197:172a-35: // de yang de nyid bag chags su 'gyur te /
T02D1197:172a-36: de'i tshe dri ni sems can thams cad kyi ming can de de bzhin no //
T02D1197:172a-37: ma dang pha'i dri zhim po'i tsandan bzhin du de dag gi dri bsnams zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:172a-38: rdo rje chu dang bcas pa zhes pa ni pha'i byang chub sems 'dzag pa'i dus su'o //
T02D1197:172a-39: lnga pa sems las byung ba zhes pa ni kun
T02D1197:172b-0: gzhi rnam par shes pa dri za nye bar @172b
T02D1197:172b-1: 'khor gyi sems can de yang rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1197:172b-2: kyi sems khyad par can las byung ba de nyid
T02D1197:172b-3: ma dang pha'i bde ba dang lhan cig ro gcig
T02D1197:172b-4: par gyur pa skyed par byed pa de la ces
T02D1197:172b-7: ces pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus te
T02D1197:172b-8: dus kyi mtshan nyid de yang de bzhin gshegs pas
T02D1197:172b-9: dpal 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud thams cad sangs
T02D1197:172b-10: rgyas thams cad yang dag par bzhed pa gsungs so
T02D1197:172b-11: // de rnams kyang thog ma med pa'i dus su gsungs so zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:172b-12: de bzhin du bzang po bskyang bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:172b-13: de bzhin du sdom pa ni grub pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:172b-14: pas srog chags gsad mi bya zhes pa ni myur
T02D1197:172b-15: du mya ngan las 'das par mi bya zhes dgongs
T02D1197:172b-16: so // bud med rin chen dor mi bya //
T02D1197:172b-17: zhes pa ni dpal sgyu ma yongs su mi dor zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:172b-18: yang na gal te yongs su mya ngan las 'das par byed na /
T02D1197:172b-19: de'i tshe slob dpon gyis te /
T02D1197:172b-20: de ni dor zhes pa ni 'jig rten gsum spyod
T02D1197:172b-21: par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe sems can gyi don
T02D1197:172b-22: phun sum tshogs pa mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:172b-23: de'i phyir sdom pa mi 'dor te //
T02D1197:172b-24: ji srid du nam mkha'i sbyor ba 'dzin pa //
T02D1197:172b-25: de srid du sgyu ma'i lus bzhin du brtag ces pa ni mchog gi sdom pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:172b-26: sngon du gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:172b-27: ni 'dir sngon du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rig ma'i
T02D1197:172b-28: rang bzhin grub pa rnams mthong ba'i phyir gsang ba'i
T02D1197:172b-29: dbang ngo // yang na zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02D1197:172b-30: bdag gi rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni aa wa
T02D1197:172b-31: dh'u t'i la brten pas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
T02D1197:172b-32: bzhin dag bde'i tshe snga ma bzhin de la de
T02D1197:172b-33: skad ces bya'o // de bzhin du sihla zhes pa
T02D1197:172b-34: ni sgyu mar yid ches pa rang 'byung chags pa
T02D1197:172b-36: ga bur zhes pa ni yi ge lnga ste /
T02D1197:172b-37: ka ni sdong bu'i rtsa ba ru //
T02D1197:172b-39: pa ni rlung lnga rnams gu'o //
T02D1197:172b-40: au ni yi ge mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:172b-41: ra ni 'tshed pa'i chags sbyor bas /
T02D1197:172b-42: bud med de ni mi 'jag byed //
T02D1197:172b-43: ces pa ni snying rjer bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:172b-44: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de
T02D1197:172b-45: ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i rig pa thob pa'o
T02D1197:172b-46: // de srid bsten zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i
T02D1197:172b-47: yan lag drug gis rgyun du goms par bsten pa'o
T02D1197:173a-0: // // @173a * // de srid khu ba dang ldan 'gyur //
T02D1197:173a-1: zhes pa ni de goms nas rab kyi mthar thug
T02D1197:173a-2: pas yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir phyag
T02D1197:173a-3: rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:173a-4: de bzhin du phyag rgya'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:173a-5: phyag rgya'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:173a-6: phag rgya ni rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do //
T02D1197:173a-7: gdong ni bkab nas su zhes pa ni bsam gyis
T02D1197:173a-8: mi khyab pa de nyid bems po dang bcas pa'o
T02D1197:173a-9: // des na thabs kyi zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bya ba ste //
T02D1197:173a-10: de yang snying rje chen po rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsams du med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:173a-13: dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba'i rgyu //
T02D1197:173a-14: ye shes nyid las ye shes skye //
T02D1197:173a-16: 'di dag gi ye shes des slob ma mngon shes
T02D1197:173a-17: drug dang ldan pa rnams kyi kha nas kha ru
T02D1197:173a-18: spros pa'o // thams cad de'i rang bzhin zhes pa
T02D1197:173a-19: ni mdor bsdus nas sprul pa'i sku zhes pa de
T02D1197:173a-21: da ni thams cad de'i bdag nyid kyis na ye
T02D1197:173a-22: shes dang ye shes kyi shes rab dang ye shes
T02D1197:173a-23: kyi dbang gi sgo nas byung chub sems slob dpon
T02D1197:173a-24: dang rnam par shes pa slob ma'i 'bras bu brtag
T02D1197:173a-25: pa'i man ngag bstan pa'i phyir de nyid ces bya
T02D1197:173a-26: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:173a-27: 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'og dang steng gi
T02D1197:173a-28: dbye bas ye shes dang shes bya'i bdag nyid du
T02D1197:173a-29: 'gyur ba'o // de yang kun rdzob tu steng rkang
T02D1197:173a-30: pa gnyis kyi bar dang de bzhin 'og spyi po'o
T02D1197:173a-31: 'gyur ba'o // // de bzhin du thabs ni steng ngo //
T02D1197:173a-33: de dag gi ste 'og dang steng dag tu ye
T02D1197:173a-34: shes dang shes bya dag gis snyoms par 'jug par
T02D1197:173a-35: 'gyur te // des na byang chub sems bla ma de bzhin du gsungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:173a-36: de'i dngos po rang rig pa skyed par byed pa ni slob ma'o //
T02D1197:173a-37: de'i yang shes rab ni ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:173a-38: des na mnyam pa'i ro zhes pa ni ril por
T02D1197:173a-39: 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pas ro gcig par
T02D1197:173a-40: byed pa'o // btsan thabs kyi sbyor ba'i sems kyi
T02D1197:173a-41: srog dang thur sel phrad pa 'di dag gi snyoms
T02D1197:173a-42: par 'jug pa ni slob ma dang shes rab de
T02D1197:173a-43: nyid du 'du shes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:173b-0: yang de nyid du zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i ye ge gnyis bstan @173b pa'o //
T02D1197:173b-1: ae wam zhes pa rim las bzlog pas wam ni spyi bor ro //
T02D1197:173b-2: ae ni lte ba'i rtsa bar ro //
T02D1197:173b-3: de ltar gnyis ka 'dus pa ni wam zhes so //
T02D1197:173b-4: srid pa gsum ni thams cad shes //
T02D1197:173b-5: chos kyi 'byung gnas shes rab kyis //
T02D1197:173b-6: thig le rdo rje rlung gis ni //
T02D1197:173b-7: reg pas der ni thim par 'gyur //
T02D1197:173b-8: de bzhin shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi rjes
T02D1197:173b-9: thogs de nyid du tshig gi sgo nas bstan pa
T02D1197:173b-10: // de ni dang bla ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:173b-11: des kyang brtags pa'i phyir man ngag brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:173b-12: de bzhin du bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba nas //
T02D1197:173b-13: ji srid dngos dang dngos med ces pa'i mthar thug
T02D1197:173b-14: pa dpes nyams su myong ba'i mthar dpe med pa'i
T02D1197:173b-15: byang chub sems kyi bla ma zhes pa brjod du
T02D1197:173b-16: med pa de ni rang rig pa'i ye shes so
T02D1197:173b-17: // lhag ma 'di nyid kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:173b-18: de'i man ngag bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:173b-19: dang po dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
T02D1197:173b-20: 'dir spyi bo nas byung chub sems 'dzag pa'i dus su dang po nyid du dga' ba skye'o //
T02D1197:173b-21: de yang mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dpa' bo'o //
T02D1197:173b-22: slar yang byang chub sems lte ba'i gnas su phyin pa'i tshe dam bar dga' ba skye'o //
T02D1197:173b-23: rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni de bzhin du sbyor ba'i lam gyi steng du rgyu ba ste //
T02D1197:173b-24: rlung phrad pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pas so //
T02D1197:173b-25: des na shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid la rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:173b-26: gnyis po 'di dag las bde ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:173b-27: rtsa thams cad rgyu ba'i phyir aa wa dh'u t'is thams cad la khyab ste /
T02D1197:173b-28: de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi srog gi cha las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shes so //
T02D1197:173b-29: des na mchog tu chags pas dga' ba mi 'dzag pa'o //
T02D1197:173b-30: de nyid kyis na ma lus pa ni tham cad la khyab par byed pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:173b-31: des nyid kyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:173b-32: de bde ba'i thabs kyis thams cad rig / ces pa la /
T02D1197:173b-33: de zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T02D1197:173b-34: bral ba de nyid kyi ming bstan pa'i sgo nas te /
T02D1197:173b-35: des na 'di nyid mchog tu chags pa'i dga' ba
T02D1197:173b-36: dang dga' ba la sogs pa gsum gyi thabs kyis
T02D1197:173b-37: chos rnams thabs kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings dang
T02D1197:173b-38: de'i snying po rang rig pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1197:173b-39: rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis na 'od gsal ba'o /
T02D1197:174a-0: @174a * // 'di dag gi bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:174a-1: de'i rigs zhes pa ni skyed par byed par byed pa'i dga' ba gsum mo //
T02D1197:174a-2: de'i phyir 'di dag ni bla mar brjod de bskyed
T02D1197:174a-3: bya dang skyed byed 'brel pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so
T02D1197:174a-4: // de ltar don dam pa mthong bzhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:174a-5: de'i tshe 'dir gal te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
T02D1197:174a-6: las 'das pa gcig tu 'gyur na de ji ltar
T02D1197:174a-7: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis tshe 'dir sems can gyi
T02D1197:174a-8: don byed // gal te re zhig phyi'i bya ba
T02D1197:174a-9: bkag na slob ma la chos bstan pa med par
T02D1197:174a-10: don byed // 'gyur ro // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1197:174a-12: des na rang gi don mi 'byung ste ;
T02D1197:174a-13: sngon du ma thos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:174a-14: ci'i yang thos pa brgyud pa med par sems can
T02D1197:174a-15: gyi don du 'gyur ram zhes 'ga' zhig gi tshig
T02D1197:174a-16: tu 'gyur na de'i ma brjod de bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:174a-18: dang po dga' bzhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir bstan pa'i rgyun thams cad ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:174a-19: de ltar bstan pa ni 'og kyang bden mod thams cad don dam pa'o //
T02D1197:174a-21: gsungs pa kha cig tu yang khyed cag rnams kyis gtam tsam yang ma thos sam /
T02D1197:174a-23: gang gi phyir brtan dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:174a-24: chos thams cad ni mdor bsdus na rang bzhin gyis
T02D1197:174a-25: kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:174a-26: des na dang po nyid du lta ba drug la 'jug pa rnams 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02D1197:174a-27: bdag cag gis thar pa la ji ltar 'grong par 'gyur zhes gcig la gcig 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:174a-28: de'i tshe de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin
T02D1197:174a-29: pa'i dbang gis dge ba'i grogs dang phrad bar 'gyur
T02D1197:174a-30: ro // de nyid ni tshig 'di skad ces brjod
T02D1197:174a-31: de mu stegs la sogs pa'i slob dpon la bsnyen
T02D1197:174a-32: bkur gyis shig slob dpon chen ge mo'i khyim du
T02D1197:174a-33: song la chos nyon cig / de'i bka' drin gyis
T02D1197:174a-35: de'i srid pa zad par byed do //
T02D1197:174a-36: de ltar de yang song nas ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed do //
T02D1197:174a-37: slob pa dpon rnams kyang rang rang gi chos de dang de la sbyar ro //
T02D1197:174a-38: de'i phyir thams cad dam par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1197:174a-39: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bden pa gnyis la brten pas thar pa thob po //
T02D1197:174a-40: de yang stong pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:174b-0: de bzhin du rgyud dang 'bras bu med na @174b grol bar med do //
T02D1197:174b-1: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam ba'i bden pa dag go / de ltar gsungs pa //
T02D1197:174b-2: dang po nyid du dan dam pa ni rgyu'o //
T02D1197:174b-5: kun rdzob kyi bden pas don pa'i bden pa bsgrub so //
T02D1197:174b-6: des na sangs rgyas de nges 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1197:174b-7: pa'i bden pa'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu'i
T02D1197:174b-8: phyir bstan te 'jig rten pa'i bden pa'i sgo nas
T02D1197:174b-10: mi nus pa'i phyir rgyal po gzugs can snying po bzhin no //
T02D1197:174b-11: de'i phyir phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i //
T02D1197:174b-12: de ltar bstan pa ni gtsor sgyur ma yin te /
T02D1197:174b-13: don dam pa ni gtsor dngos grub kyi rgyu yin no //
T02D1197:174b-14: des na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bstan pa ston to //
T02D1197:174b-15: tha mal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:174b-16: 'o na ji ltar da ltar sems can rnams ston /
T02D1197:174b-17: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:174b-18: de'i phyir brjod de 'dir 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas
T02D1197:174b-19: sngon nyid du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1197:174b-20: chos ston te / de yang sdud par byed pas bsdus nas glegs bam la sogs par grags so //
T02D1197:174b-21: de yang phan tshun brgyud pas thos pa dang bsam
T02D1197:174b-22: pas phyag rgya chen po la mngon par bgrod do
T02D1197:174b-23: // des na da lta'i slob dpon rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1197:174b-24: de ring zhes bya ba la sogs pa na slob ma spro ba'i rjes thogs su //
T02D1197:174b-25: de nas rdzas ni gang zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:174b-26: pa ni slob dpon gyi yon ta gyi rjes thogs
T02D1197:174b-27: su'o // de nas slob ma la chos bstan ba'i
T02D1197:174b-28: rjes thogs su slar yang slob ma rnams rgyal tshab
T02D1197:174b-30: srid gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
T02D1197:174b-31: de nyid kyis zhes pa ni 'di nyid kyis te /
T02D1197:174b-32: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi gzhung lugs dag gis te /
T02D1197:174b-33: ji ltar gsungs pa'i gzhung lugs zab mo de nyid
T02D1197:174b-34: kyi cho gas da ltar gyi slob dpon rnams kyis
T02D1197:174b-35: rang dang gzhan gyi don bya zhes pa ni bcom
T02D1197:174b-37: 'on kyang slob ma rnams mos pa'i dbang gis chos bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:174b-38: des na slob ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
T02D1197:175a-0: de ltar dbang bskur ba thob pa'i slob ma'i yon tan gyi @175a * //
T02D1197:175a-1: tshigs bcad bstan pa'i phyir dbang bsgyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:175a-2: mchog ces pa ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02D1197:175a-3: de yang zab mo'i sgom pas rtogs pa'o //
T02D1197:175a-4: de bzhin du rnyed dka' zhes pa ni thog par dka' ba'o //
T02D1197:175a-5: mtshungs med ces pa ni sgom pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa med pa'o //
T02D1197:175a-6: de yang rnal 'byor pa chen po rnams kyis bgrod pa'o //
T02D1197:175a-7: zhing zhes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag gis rang gi lus nyid sbyangs pa'o //
T02D1197:175a-8: longs spyod ces pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes de'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:175a-9: de'i phyir dpal zhes pa ni gnyis med pa las
T02D1197:175a-10: gnyis med pa ni byang chub sems chen po de
T02D1197:175a-11: nyid do // de nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i gang
T02D1197:175a-12: rnal 'byor pa de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1197:175a-13: nyid do // ste / gang gi phyir rjes gnang
T02D1197:175a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de yang
T02D1197:175a-15: nyid do // ste / go sla'o // da ltar
T02D1197:175a-16: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes
T02D1197:175a-17: thogs su ye shes ster bar byed pa'i //
T02D1197:175a-18: de yang byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1197:175a-19: de la bo mchog gi bdag nyid kyis ni rtogs //
T02D1197:175a-21: nyin mo'i dus su dmigs pa yis //
T02D1197:175a-23: sems ni sems med rang bzhin byas //
T02D1197:175a-25: de yis mchog tu gnyis med do //
T02D1197:175a-27: sku rnams la ni rang blo med //
T02D1197:175a-29: gnyis kyi mgo bo ru ni gtor //
T02D1197:175a-31: dpa' bo nus pa de ru zhig / rang gi khyim du sems bla ma /
T02D1197:175a-32: kha sbyor thig le'u rgyud kyi rgyal po rtogs pa
T02D1197:175a-33: gnyis pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rang ru byed pa dang
T02D1197:175a-34: po'o rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i
T02D1197:175a-35: dran pa'i snang ba zhes pa'i gzhung bstan pa ste
T02D1197:175a-37: / da ni shes rab dang thabs kyi don bsgom pa'i rnam par 'grel pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:175a-38: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
T02D1197:175a-39: de nas zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
T02D1197:175a-40: rten las 'das pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs su
T02D1197:175a-42: de yang yang dag bshad bya zhes pa ni ji ltar go rims bzhin bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:175a-43: gang gi byis pa skye bo rnams kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:175a-44: gzhan don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:175a-45: sems can gang dag gzhan gyi don med par sgom
T02D1197:175a-46: pa byed pa de rnams ni mya ngan las 'das
T02D1197:175a-47: par 'gyur ro // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1197:175b-0: 'dir @175b gang gi phyir rtsod pa'i dus su sems
T02D1197:175b-1: can thams cad tshe thung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba
T02D1197:175b-2: spro ba chung ba bsod nam sa chung ba rnams
T02D1197:175b-3: 'byung ste / de'i tshe grub pa po rnams kyi
T02D1197:175b-4: rang gi sems kyi bsam pas sangs rgyas nyid 'dod
T02D1197:175b-5: 'byung ste / do // de la phan pa'i phyir
T02D1197:175b-6: tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'chang ba nyid 'thob
