T02D1197:175b-7: 'byung ste / do // pa'o // gang gis zhes
T02D1197:175b-8: pas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa zab mo 'dod chags la
T02D1197:175b-9: sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar
T02D1197:175b-11: de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das zhes pa ni rang
T02D1197:175b-12: gi don tsam yongs su spangs shing srid pa'i bya
T02D1197:175b-14: gang gi phyir rab kyi mthar thug pa zhes pa
T02D1197:175b-15: ni sngon du gsungs pa'i bsgom pa la ji srid
T02D1197:175b-16: rab kyi mthar thug par ma song ba de srid
T02D1197:175b-17: gzhan gyis sems mi bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:175b-18: 'on kyang gang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni dam bcas pa'i tshigs ste /
T02D1197:175b-19: de'i phyir dri ma med par byung ba'o //
T02D1197:175b-20: des na de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:175b-21: 'phel ba dang dbri zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:175b-22: dbri zhes pa ni chos rnams kyi med pa'i blo'o //
T02D1197:175b-23: 'phel zhes pa ni de rnams la kun du 'dzin
T02D1197:175b-24: pa ste 'di dag spangs pa'i blo de la de
T02D1197:175b-25: skad ces bya'o // bla med ces bya ba ni
T02D1197:175b-26: thams cad mkhyen pas kyang bsam du med pa brjod
T02D1197:175b-27: skad ces bya'o // du med pa'am / gdon du med pa'i tshig spangs pa //
T02D1197:175b-28: zhes pa slob dpon kha cig gi'o //
T02D1197:175b-29: de bzhin du dbri zhes pa ni 'dir sems can
T02D1197:175b-30: thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin gyis rang
T02D1197:175b-31: bzhin brgyad cu rnams la mdor bsdus nas sems ni
T02D1197:175b-32: brten pa'o // des na yang rtsa rnams kyang brten pa'o //
T02D1197:175b-33: de'i phyir shin tu zab pa dgongs pas bshad pa 'di nyid gsal bar gsungs pa //
T02D1197:175b-34: de yang bsdus na sems kyi rang bzhin gyis mtshan nyid de //
T02D1197:175b-35: de rnams kyi rang bzhin spangs pa ni dbri ba'o //
T02D1197:175b-36: yang na de rnams 'phel ba'i phyir 'phel ba'o //
T02D1197:175b-37: 'di dag gis rab bzhin spangs shing rnams par grol
T02D1197:175b-38: ba'i rnal 'byor pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1197:175b-39: // de ltar bsdus pa nyid phung po lnga zhes bya ba la sogs ba la /
T02D1197:175b-40: sogs pa'i sgra ni khams dang dbang po la sogs pa'i chos rnams te /
T02D1197:175b-42: des na phyi'i bya ba yang yongs su me dor te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:176a-0: gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa yid ches pa nyid de bzhin @176a * //
T02D1197:176a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyis dpe la yid ches pas chos ston to //
T02D1197:176a-2: 'on kyang de thams cad ni chu shing lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D1197:176a-3: ji ltar chu shing rnams kyi snying po ni stong ba ste /
T02D1197:176a-4: brtag pa na de mi dmigs so //
T02D1197:176a-5: de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni chos
T02D1197:176a-6: kyi dbyings las byung ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1197:176a-7: mtshan nyid do // nam mkha'i ngos su nam mkha' 'byung ba bzhin no //
T02D1197:176a-8: de dang mtshungs pas na mnyam dang mi mnyam zhes
T02D1197:176a-9: pa nam mkha' yang gdod nas ma skyes pa mi
T02D1197:176a-10: bden pa snang ba'i mtshan nyid de chos kyi dbyings
T02D1197:176a-11: brjod du med pa zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:176a-12: de bzhin du dang po nyid du la n'a dang
T02D1197:176a-13: ra sa n'a dang aa wa dh'u t'i'i lus dang
T02D1197:176a-14: ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:176a-15: brjod de / 'dir la la ni lus kyi rang gi ngo bo ste /
T02D1197:176a-16: des na stong ba nyid du mi bsgom zhes pa
T02D1197:176a-17: ni nag po'i phyogs la nyi ma'i cha 'phel ba'i
T02D1197:176a-18: dbye bas zla ba'i cha bco lnga zad do //
T02D1197:176a-19: de yang nang gi bdag nyid kyi byang chub sems te cha bco lnga'i bdag nyid kyi zla ba'o //
T02D1197:176a-20: des na lus kyi dngos po ste /
T02D1197:176a-21: de sbangs na rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don rnams la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:176a-22: de'i phyir de bsgom par mi bya ste /
T02D1197:176a-23: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ste nges pa 'o //
T02D1197:176a-24: mi stong bar yang zhes pas ni de bzhin du
T02D1197:176a-25: dkar po'i phyogs la zla ba'i cha'i longs spyod 'phel
T02D1197:176a-26: ba'i phyir nyi ma'i cha phri zhing nang du ni
T02D1197:176a-28: dkar bo'i tshes gcig la sogs pa cha bco lnga 'phel ba'i dbye bas so //
T02D1197:176a-29: de ltar mi stong zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1197:176a-30: mi stong ba yang bsgom pa min //
T02D1197:176a-32: de bsgoms pas ni ngag gi dngos po zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:176a-33: des na de'i tshig gsungs te /
T02D1197:176a-34: stong nyid dor mi bya zhes pa ni 'dir aa
T02D1197:176a-35: wa dh'u t'i'i cha bcu drug pa cha gcig ni
T02D1197:176a-36: sems kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:176a-37: de ltar stong ba dang mi stong ba'i phyogs gnyi ga yang mi dor zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:176a-38: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1197:176a-39: mi stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:176a-40: stong pa'am mi stong pa'i dngos po gcig la sems
T02D1197:176a-41: zhen pa'i phyir nyes pa yod do //
T02D1197:176a-43: tha mal ba'i rnam rtog skye zhes gsungs so //
T02D1197:176b-0: tha mal pa zhes pa ni dngos po gnyis @176b la 'dzin pas so so la zhen to //
T02D1197:176b-1: des na gnyis med pa'i blo mi skye'o //
T02D1197:176b-2: de ltar bsgom pa dman par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:176b-3: yongs su gtong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1197:176b-4: kun du rtog pa 'di dag la gang brten pa'i
T02D1197:176b-5: blo de ni yongs su dor ba'o //
T02D1197:176b-6: gnyi gar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02D1197:176b-7: rnam dag ces pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i sems so //
T02D1197:176b-8: des na rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:176b-9: zhes pa ni mi dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i ye she bsangs pa'o //
T02D1197:176b-10: de'i phyir bdag ces pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:176b-11: de bzhin du lus dang ngag dang sems rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin brjod de //
T02D1197:176b-12: de yang rang bzhin gyis dbye bas rang gi ngo bo'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:176b-13: 'gyur ba med ces pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:176b-14: chags bral gyi rang bzhin ni la la n'a ste /
T02D1197:176b-15: de ni 'gyur ba med pa'i bsgom pa'i dbang gis so //
T02D1197:176b-16: de ltar thams cad la yang khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1197:176b-17: ra sa n'a ni chags bral bar ma ste de yang so man yid pa'o //
T02D1197:176b-18: aa wa dh'u t'i'i chags bral chen po ste /
T02D1197:176b-19: de yang 'dod pa med cing dri ma dang bral zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:176b-20: de ltar sems rnam pa gsum dang bral zhing dri
T02D1197:176b-21: ma gsum gyi rang bzhin spangs zhes pa'i don te
T02D1197:176b-22: de bzhin du sems 'di'i srog rgyu ba rnam pa
T02D1197:176b-23: gnyis te / dang po ni steng du 'gro ba'o //
T02D1197:176b-25: de yang skye ba dang 'chi bar dgongs so //
T02D1197:176b-26: de dag las nges par grol bar dbus su nam
T02D1197:176b-27: mkha' bzhin du blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya'o
T02D1197:176b-29: de bzhin du sems can rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i ni mya ngan no //
T02D1197:176b-30: sems can yod par 'dzin par ni mya ngan par ma'o //
T02D1197:176b-31: sems can med par 'dzin pa ni mya ngan chen po'o //
T02D1197:176b-32: des na kun du rtog pa gsum du mi brtag go //
T02D1197:176b-33: de'i tshe spros pa med pa nyid zhi ba'i gzugs te /
T02D1197:176b-34: de'i shes rab kyi rtog pa brjod du med pa'o //
T02D1197:176b-35: slar yang 'khor ba las 'jigs pa dor ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:176b-36: yid bzhin nor ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:176b-37: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:176b-38: 'on kyang 'jigs par ma ni de bzhin du dmigs
T02D1197:176b-39: pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis bya ba rtson pa
T02D1197:176b-40: dang bral ba'o // des na yang shin tu 'jigs
T02D1197:176b-41: pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i brtse ba snying rje
T02D1197:176b-42: chen po bsam gyis mi khyab ba'o //
T02D1197:176b-43: de bzhin du gnyis ka ni srid pa ste /
T02D1197:177a-1: dang lhan cig pa de nyid srid pa bar ma'o //
T02D1197:177a-2: nam mkha' la nam mkha' bzhin du srid pa chen po nyid du nya bar song ba'o //
T02D1197:177a-3: de'i tshe nye bar len pa ni skyes bu 'ga'
T02D1197:177a-4: zhig gang na yang ste gang du yang sgom pa
T02D1197:177a-5: po med pa'o // des na gang na'ang sgom pa med //
T02D1197:177a-7: des kyang med dge ba nyid du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:177a-8: dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral zhes dgongs te /
T02D1197:177a-9: de'i tshe brjod pa bsgom par bya ba'i dngos po
T02D1197:177a-10: cung zad kyang med de rang gi sems yongs su
T02D1197:177a-12: gzhan yang rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin las byung
T02D1197:177a-13: ba'i skye bo de thams cad 'khor ba'i dbus su
T02D1197:177a-15: de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa la gdungs par byed do //
T02D1197:177a-16: de dang bral ba'i phyir de bzhin du 'dir tshor ba'i bya ba cung zad kyang med do //
T02D1197:177a-17: de'i tshe spyad par bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1197:177a-18: tshor ba bar ma ni byed pa po nyid de
T02D1197:177a-19: shin tu tshor ba las rnams par grol ba'i phyir
T02D1197:177a-20: ro // de'i skad cig la mtshon cing spyod pa'i
T02D1197:177a-21: don dam pa'i ye shes de las kyang rnam par
T02D1197:177a-22: ro // grol lo / des na bsam gyis mi
T02D1197:177a-23: khyab par 'gyur ba'i rnam par bsgom pa'i gnas thob
T02D1197:177a-24: ro // grol lo / pa'o // de bzhin du
T02D1197:177a-25: 'dir so sor rtog pa sgrub pa po yang med
T02D1197:177a-26: ro // grol lo / pa'o // do // de'i
T02D1197:177a-27: phyir bsgrub par bya ba yang med ces bya ba
T02D1197:177a-28: ni dngos po cung zad kyang med pa ste /
T02D1197:177a-29: gang gi ngo tsha ba'i dbang gis bya ba nye bar brkyang ba yang med pa'o //
T02D1197:177a-30: rgyu des na de ltar yang sbang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:177a-31: slar la yang brtse ba yang yod de /
T02D1197:177a-32: des na dngos po cung zad gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1197:177a-33: de yang brtse bar bya ba'i phyir de med de
T02D1197:177a-34: 'dir de yang brtse ba chen po'i dbang gis dri
T02D1197:177a-35: za ba la sogs pa'i dpe ldas nye bar 'jal
T02D1197:177a-36: ba des na nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1197:177a-38: dgongs pas dngos po gang dang gang mthong ba //
T02D1197:177a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:177a-40: de bzhin du the tshom nyid kyis dpe gsungs pa //
T02D1197:177a-41: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1197:177a-42: 'dir ji ltar khye'u dang bu mo'i bdag nyid 'ga'
T02D1197:177a-43: zhig rtse ba'i gnas skabs su gnyi ga'i dbang po
T02D1197:177a-45: de gnyis ma bslabs par yang dben par de dag 'dus nas bde ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:177a-46: de'i phyir bha gar ling ga rab tu gzhag mod
T02D1197:177a-47: dngos su cung zad kyang nyams su myong bar mi
T02D1197:177b-0: 'gyur te / @177b mi 'dzag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:177b-1: de bzhin du sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsgom
T02D1197:177b-2: pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams ser sna'i dbang gis bsnun
T02D1197:177b-3: te / thog ma med pa'i bskal ba grangs med
T02D1197:177b-4: pa'i bag chags kyi ser sna la sogs pa'i snyes
T02D1197:177b-5: pas nye bar bsnun pa'i phyir shes rab dang thabs
T02D1197:177b-6: nyid kyis bsgom pa gdod nas ma skyes pa byed
T02D1197:177b-7: de bskyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa go
T02D1197:177b-8: te / sla'o // de ltar la la na'i rang
T02D1197:177b-9: bzhin rtsa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1197:177b-10: rang gi ngo bo gsungs so //
T02D1197:177b-12: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i la la na'i
T02D1197:177b-13: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid du 'dod
T02D1197:177b-15: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa ni thams
T02D1197:177b-16: cad kyi gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang gi ngo
T02D1197:177b-18: slar yang ra sa n'a yis gsungs pa /
T02D1197:177b-19: bskyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:177b-20: la la na'i rkyen gyis ra sa na'i bstan te
T02D1197:177b-21: // de nyid kyang chags pa ni dang po'i //
T02D1197:177b-22: de'i mtha' ma ni khrag go //
T02D1197:177b-23: bar ma ni gnyi ga'i dri ma med pa'i ye
T02D1197:177b-24: shes mgu bar byed pa bskyed de mgu pa bar
T02D1197:177b-25: ma de nyid kyis ni rang rig pa bskyed do
T02D1197:177b-26: // ye shes de nyid ni shin tu mgu ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:177b-27: lus bor nas nas gzhan sems po'i dngos po la brjod par mi nus so //
T02D1197:177b-28: de bzhin du gzugs rnams kun la blta ba zhes
T02D1197:177b-29: pa ni sems po'i gzugs la shes par khyab par
T02D1197:177b-30: byed pa'i phyir // de mthong bas rang byin gyis brlabs pa de ni dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:177b-31: de bzhin du sgra'i bdag nyid dngos po rnams la
T02D1197:177b-32: rtog pa ming sna tshogs pa de rnams la byung
T02D1197:177b-33: ba de ni rab tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:177b-34: de bzhin du rang gis brtags pa'i phyir ngo mtshar
T02D1197:177b-35: bar byed pa'i tshigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
T02D1197:177b-36: bzhin du dga' ba lta bu'i dgod pa'o //
T02D1197:177b-37: 'am gyi sgra ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D1197:177b-38: gang gi phyir dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:177b-39: ji ltar dgod pa'i skad cig la sngon gyi dngos
T02D1197:177b-40: po yongs su gtang zhing ma 'ongs pa ma thob
T02D1197:177b-41: cing da lta'i gnas pa ni dgod pa'o //
T02D1197:177b-42: da lta'i ha si ta'i ha can gyis bsgyur bas aar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:177b-44: mkha' zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:178a-0: de bzhin du tshim pa thob pa ni sna tshogs ro rnams zhes pa @178a * //
T02D1197:178a-1: la ji ltar chags pa chen po'i tshul gyi ting
T02D1197:178a-2: nge 'dzin gyi phung po lnga rnams nam mkha' nyid
T02D1197:178a-3: du 'gyur te / de rnams ro gcig pa drug
T02D1197:178a-4: pa ye she skyi ro thams cad kyi gzugs sna
T02D1197:178a-5: tshogs chogs pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin thob pa'o //
T02D1197:178a-6: des 'khyud pas las rnams thams cad byed pas zhes
T02D1197:178a-7: pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams thams
T02D1197:178a-8: cad byed pa'o // de nyid 'o byed pa ste /
T02D1197:178a-9: shin tu brtse ba gzhan du song ba'i sems kyis
T02D1197:178a-10: min te phyi'i dngos grub rnams su thal ba'i bsam
T02D1197:178a-12: de bzhin du rgyun du zhes pa ni ma dub pas dub pa ba mi 'dor te /
T02D1197:178a-13: rnal 'byor bas rgyun mi 'chad par rnal 'byor la goms par byed de /
T02D1197:178a-14: ji ltar byis pas ma'i nu ma rgyun mi 'chad
T02D1197:178a-15: par 'jib kyang mi skyo ba de bzhin du ye
T02D1197:178a-16: shes la goms par byed de mgal me'i 'khor lo
T02D1197:178a-18: de bzhin du bstan pas bla na med pa'i sbyor ba skye ste //
T02D1197:178a-19: des na de kho na nyid //
T02D1197:178a-20: rig pa'i rnal 'byor bas mi zad pa'i ye shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:178a-21: des na gnyis med pa 'dis brtson 'grus 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
T02D1197:178a-22: des kyang 'dir rgyal gyis don dam pa'i byang chub sems dam pa phul du byung ba thob pa'o //
T02D1197:178a-23: de yang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1197:178a-24: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi
T02D1197:178a-25: dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par thob pa'o
T02D1197:178a-26: // de'o stobs kyis gsal bar sangs rgyas byas pa'o //
T02D1197:178a-27: de'i byang chub nyid ni spro ba'o //
T02D1197:178a-28: de bzhin nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyud de nyid
T02D1197:178a-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos kyi
T02D1197:178a-31: slar yang pha rol tu phyin pa kun dngos zhes
T02D1197:178a-32: pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i sa rnams
T02D1197:178a-33: so // de bzhin du snang ba med pa'i phyir
T02D1197:178a-34: kun du 'od de bzhin du 'dod de bzhin gshegs
T02D1197:178a-36: de la gnas pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i pa chen por 'gyur te rang gi don du'o //
T02D1197:178a-37: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes ba bar ma'i ni
T02D1197:178a-38: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu kun du 'od dag
T02D1197:178a-39: gnyis med pa'o // de yang drag po kun zab
T02D1197:178a-40: bzhin 'od gsal ba rnam par rtogs pa thams cad
T02D1197:178a-41: gnyis med pa'o // za ba'o // des na sangs
T02D1197:178a-42: rgyas thams cad kyi sgom pa'i mchog de nyid las
T02D1197:178a-43: rnam par sgeg pa'i byung ba na 'gro ba brtan
T02D1197:178a-44: pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:178b-0: @178b g-yo ba zhes pa ni zhe 'gras bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:178b-1: de bzhin du dge ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems
T02D1197:178b-2: dpa' mtha' yas pa dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1197:178b-3: kyis gsum gsal pos nyan thos la sogs pa rnams
T02D1197:178b-5: sogs pa'i sgras ni rang sangs rgyas rnams bsdu'o //
T02D1197:178b-6: de nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom byed zhes pa ni bden pa'i dngos dang /
T02D1197:178b-7: de bzhin du mi bden pa'i dngos bo de dag dang bral bar nges pa'o //
T02D1197:178b-9: dngos po zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T02D1197:178b-10: dngos po med pa zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1197:178b-11: de yang nye bar len pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:178b-12: de ltar 'jig rten pa las 'das pa dag las grol ba ster ba'o //
T02D1197:178b-13: des ni don pa'i ye shes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1197:178b-14: myur du 'grub 'gyur te zhes pa ni ji ltar 'grub ce na /
T02D1197:178b-15: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag la bskul bde la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:178b-16: rnal 'byor pa de nyid dpa' po nyid dpa' bo nyid de thabs myur bas 'grub pa'i don to //
T02D1197:178b-17: 'on kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:178b-18: nyid rtsam pa ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:178b-19: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'di rnams la 'jig rten
T02D1197:178b-20: pa'i bya ba la gnas pas ngo tsha ba mi
T02D1197:178b-21: bya ste byis pa bzhin du rnams phyad ces dgongs
T02D1197:178b-22: so // des na de la mtha' yas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:178b-23: mtha' yas zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa de la
T02D1197:178b-24: grangs med pa'i yon tan rdo rje 'chang bzhin no
T02D1197:178b-25: // skye bar 'gyur zhes pa ni 'dod pa spangs bzhin du'o //
T02D1197:178b-26: ji ltar 'o ma las mar bzhin du bems po las bems po 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:178b-27: de nyid kyis sgrub pa po de'i gsungs pa /
T02D1197:178b-28: dpal zhes pa ni gnyis med par ston to //
T02D1197:178b-29: des na srin po zhes pa ste ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid ma gsungs kyang thams cad bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1197:178b-30: de ltar thams cad song ba'i yon tan gnyis med pa las byung ba thams cad do //
T02D1197:178b-31: de'i 'dod pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bzhed pa'o //
T02D1197:178b-32: de ltar gnas thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa de nyid
T02D1197:178b-33: ni sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D1197:178b-34: du 'gyur ro // gzhan yang byis pa skye bo
T02D1197:178b-35: rnams gdug pa dang g-yo dang sgyu la chags pa
T02D1197:179a-1: rtog chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:179a-2: 'dir ji srid dur rab kyi mthar ma song ba'i
T02D1197:179a-3: de srid du sngon gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis
T02D1197:179a-4: so // chen po zhes pa ni mtha' med pa'i bskal pas rgan pa ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1197:179a-5: ji ltar lang tsho gzhon nu mkhas pa ye shes can yon tan gyis rgan pa ni rgan pa'o //
T02D1197:179a-6: gzhan yon tan med pa rmongs pa mi shes pa
T02D1197:179a-7: can rgan pa ma yon tan chung du de gang
T02D1197:179a-8: la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:179a-9: de yang 'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D1197:179a-10: des na mun pa zil gyis mnan na pa zhes
T02D1197:179a-11: pa ni ji ltar dmun long de'i kun gzhi rnam
T02D1197:179a-12: par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa
T02D1197:179a-13: brgyad long ba ni ma yin te /
T02D1197:179a-14: sngon nas lha'i mig yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:179a-15: de bzhin du byis pa rnam par rtog pa'i shes
T02D1197:179a-16: pa'i mun pas zil gyis man na cing glo bur
T02D1197:179a-18: g-yo dang gdug pa dang sgyu dang gya gyu'i las dang /
T02D1197:179a-19: de bzhin du chags sogs zhes pa 'dod chags dang
T02D1197:179a-20: zhe sdang dang gri mug dang phrag dog dang ser
T02D1197:179a-21: sna la sogs pa g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis 'dor bar
T02D1197:179a-22: mi nus te / des na rang bzhin dri ma
T02D1197:179a-23: med pa'i sems dri mas sbags te g-yo sgyu can
T02D1197:179a-24: de rnams gdon pa'i phyir 'khor bar bdud rtsi'i rang
T02D1197:179a-26: rdo rje can zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:179a-27: de yang 'od yang 'od gsal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:179a-28: de ltar thabs kyi rang bzhin bzhi bcur ra sa
T02D1197:179a-29: na'i rang bzhin gyi rang gi ngo bo gsungs pa
T02D1197:179a-31: 'dod chags kyi bag chags rnams yongs su zad pa'i rgyur gsungs so //
T02D1197:179a-32: da ni aa wa dh'u ti'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:179a-33: des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:179a-34: 'dir chags pa bar ma ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i skad cig ste /
T02D1197:179a-36: des na 'di las gzhan pa'i dngos po ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1197:179a-37: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:179a-38: de nyid ni brjed ngas pa byed pa de las
T02D1197:179a-39: gzhan ci yang med ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:179a-40: byed pa'o // rgyu ni zhes pa ni rgyu gtso bo ma yin pa gzhan de ni med de /
T02D1197:179a-41: 'khrul pas 'khor ba'i bde sna tshogs pa //
T02D1197:179a-42: rjes su tshol bde ma lus zad pa //
T02D1197:179b-0: zhes pa rnams @179b par rtog pa'i bde ba zad pa'o //
T02D1197:179b-1: de nyid kyis na 'ching ba zad par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1197:179b-2: des na mi smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:179b-3: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1197:179b-4: de'i phyir sems zhes pa ni brgya lam na bsgoms
T02D1197:179b-5: pas skyo na des shin tu brtags nas 'bad pas
T02D1197:179b-6: brtan par bya'o // min la le lor 'gyur te /
T02D1197:179b-7: de'i tshe sems rang bzhin gyis sna tshogs pa'i rnam par des ni gnyis gnyis su 'gyur te /
T02D1197:179b-8: de'i rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D1197:179b-9: des na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de nyid kyi rang
T02D1197:179b-10: bzhin 'gog cing sngon du gsungs pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1197:179b-11: bya ba nye bar 'gro ba ste bems po'i khams
T02D1197:179b-12: bzhin no // de ltar aa wa dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo gsungs so //
T02D1197:179b-13: des na gnyis med par 'gro zhes pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1197:179b-14: rnam pa bdun gyi bde bas de ltar mdor bsdus na rnam par gsum la brgyad cu'o //
T02D1197:179b-15: rgyas par ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i tshad dang
T02D1197:179b-16: grangs med pa skad cig dang thang cig la srog
T02D1197:179b-18: de bzhin du ji srid rtog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:179b-19: de bzhin du bsgom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1197:179b-20: 'dir ji skad du rnal 'byor ba 'khor ba la
T02D1197:179b-21: gnas pa de srid du rnam pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1197:179b-22: bsgom pa la dmigs par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:179b-23: gzhan du na thun mong gi dngos grub rnams bsgrub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:179b-24: des na sems can rnams yid ches par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:179b-25: 'on kyang rnal 'byor pa sangs rgyas nyid ces pa ni dang po nyid nas sems mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1197:179b-26: des na 'gyur zhes pa ni don dam pa'i sgrub thabs la nan tan byed par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:179b-27: de yang mtshon bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D1197:179b-28: 'dir mtshon bya'i rnal 'byor goms pa yang gang gis mtshon pa mtshon pa med par bya ste /
T02D1197:179b-29: sngon du gsungs pa'i rang bzhin gsum gyis rang gi don ngo bo gsum bsgom pa'o //
T02D1197:179b-30: de la mos pas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas de
T02D1197:179b-31: yang srog dang rtsol ba'i rim gyis nye bar mtshon
T02D1197:179b-32: par bya'o // de bzhin du srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1197:179b-33: tshig gi dbye bas drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam pa'i bsam gtan rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:180a-0: de rnams kyang gnad kyi sgo rnams su mtshon par bya'o @180a * //
T02D1197:180a-1: de la gnad kyi sgo gsum pa /
T02D1197:180a-2: 'dir lus la gnad phye ba'i sgo gcig kyang drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1197:180a-3: lte ba'i gnyis gnyis drug cu rtsa bzhi dbye bas
T02D1197:180a-4: mdud pa drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams su gnyi ga
T02D1197:180a-5: las rgyu ba 'di nyid kyis 'dod pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1197:180a-6: drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams so //
T02D1197:180a-7: de rnams kyi gnas rnams su rim pa bzhin brjod
T02D1197:180a-8: pa 'di lta ste dkar po'i phyogs kyi dkar po'i
T02D1197:180a-9: tshes gcig la sogs pa la mthe bo nas brtsams
T02D1197:180a-10: te / mthe chung gi mthar thug par steng du bu ga bzhi'o //
T02D1197:180a-11: de bzhin du long bu'i gnas su bzhi ni mdun dang rgya ba dang logs gnyis su'o //
T02D1197:180a-12: de bzhin du pus mo la ma dud pa bzhi'o //
T02D1197:180a-13: de bzhin du rked pa dang brla'i mtshams su yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1197:180a-14: sgo nga la yang de bzhin no //
T02D1197:180a-15: gsang ba dang lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin
T02D1197:180a-16: pa'i g-yon logs rnams su yang bu ga bzhir 'gyur
T02D1197:180a-17: ro // de bzhin du lag pa g-yon ba'i sor
T02D1197:180a-18: mo'i rtsa ba rnams su rkang ba g-yon pa'i sor
T02D1197:180a-19: ro // mo bzhin no // lag pa'i mkhrig ma rnams su ni long bu'i gnas bzhin no //
T02D1197:180a-20: gru mo'i gnas su ni bus mo bzhin no //
T02D1197:180a-21: de bzhin du dpung bar ni rked pa bzhin no //
T02D1197:180a-22: de bzhin du ba yu ba dang mkhur chos dang
T02D1197:180a-23: rna ba'i rtsa ba dang mig g-yon pa'i zur dag
T02D1197:180a-25: de bzhin du smin ma'i bu ga dang /
T02D1197:180a-26: de bzhin du mtshog ma dang dpral mtshams dang /
T02D1197:180a-27: de'i g-yon thur gyi gnas bzhi ru gnad kyi sgo gnyis gnyis so //
T02D1197:180a-28: de bzhin du spyi bo dang gtsug tor dang rgyab
T02D1197:180a-29: kyi char gnad kyi sgo phra mo gnyis gnyis drug
T02D1197:180a-30: go // da ltar rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhir rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:180a-31: de bzhin du nag po'i phyogs kyi nag po'i tshes
T02D1197:180a-32: gcig la sogs pa la g-yas rnams kyi gnad kyi
T02D1197:180a-33: sgo'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1197:180a-34: de dag la dbyug pa sor sor re re'i dus
T02D1197:180a-35: kyi dbang gis nya dang gnam stong gnyis 'dus par
T02D1197:180a-36: bya'o // des na aa wa dh'u t'i'i ye she
T02D1197:180a-37: skyi dkyil 'khor gyi skad cig las te de'i phyir
T02D1197:180a-39: rdo rje rlung gi gnas kyi sgo dbye bar bya ste /
T02D1197:180a-42: rang 'dod lha yi skyor ba yis //
T02D1197:180a-43: zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa thog ma
T02D1197:180b-0: med pa nas chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid @180b kyi
T02D1197:180b-1: lha de bzhin nyid yang dag pa bdag med pa
T02D1197:180b-2: la mos pas thig le stong pa mtshan par bya'o
T02D1197:180b-3: // mtshon bya ba de yang mtshon pa med par bya'o //
T02D1197:180b-4: de nyid kyis na rdzogs pa'i mtshon bya zhes gsung so //
T02D1197:180b-5: gsum pa zhes ni lus dang ngag dang sems so //
T02D1197:180b-6: gnas zhes pa ni bde ba rnams kyi gzhi'o //
T02D1197:180b-7: 'di rnams nam mkha' lta bu zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:180b-8: de ltar 'dod pa thams cad rab dor te //
T02D1197:180b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:180b-10: 'di nyid kyi bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
T02D1197:180b-11: ri'i rtsa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:180b-12: las dang po rnams kyi ni sgra ji bzhin no
T02D1197:180b-13: // rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'dod pas
T02D1197:180b-14: mtshan ma'i rgyu'i gnas rnams la de'i tshe re'i rtsa
T02D1197:180b-15: mo zhes pa ni ri brags kyi steng du sprin
T02D1197:180b-16: med pa'i nam mkha' la rnal 'byor ma drug cu
T02D1197:180b-18: de rnams kyang srog bcu dang de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bcu dang /
T02D1197:180b-23: de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi ste /
T02D1197:180b-24: drug cu rtsa bzhi bo de dag thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan mar shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:180b-25: de bzhin du zhi byed gnas zhes pa mtshan nyid
T02D1197:180b-26: gcig pa'i gnas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi brdas 'dul
T02D1197:180b-27: bar 'gyur te / de rnams kyi sgrub pa po la bka' stsol ba 'grub bo //
T02D1197:180b-28: yang na padma'i tshal zhes pa ni mtsho'i nang du
T02D1197:180b-29: mtshan mo dus su padma'i rang bzhin du yongs su
T02D1197:180b-30: brtag pa ste / nang gi rtsa rnams padmar snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:180b-31: des na rang nyid padma'i tshal bzhin du so sor snang ngo //
T02D1197:180b-32: de'i tshe kun du skrag par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1197:180b-33: sngon du phyi'i skyed mos tshal khyad par can te /
T02D1197:180b-34: gang du me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna
T02D1197:180b-35: tshogs pa'i dngos po rnams kyis brgyan par 'gyur ba'o
T02D1197:180b-36: // des na sems de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:180b-37: de'i tshe rang bzhin dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:180b-38: yang na 'di lta bu'i gnas su'o /
T02D1197:180b-39: thams cad ces pa ni skye bo dang bral zhing
T02D1197:180b-40: 'bras bu la sogs pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa
T02D1197:180b-42: rgas pa'i dbang gis nus pas kyang kyar res 'ga'
T02D1197:180b-43: rang gi khyim du dngos po thams cad spangs te
T02D1197:181a-1: yang na sems kyi mos pas gang du sems mngon
T02D1197:181a-2: par dga' ba dngos po'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:181a-4: 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:181a-5: gnas ni gang zhes pa ni sems can gang dang
T02D1197:181a-6: gang mos pa'i bdag nyid dang des gnas su bya'o
T02D1197:181a-8: phyag rgya bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1197:181a-9: gti mug gi gnyen po ni dam tshig gi phyag
T02D1197:181a-10: rgya'o // zhe sdang gi gnyen po ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1197:181a-11: phrag dog gi gnyen po ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:181a-12: 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:181a-13: phyag rgya de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:181a-14: la de dag ces pa ni gti mug la sogs
T02D1197:181a-15: pa'i rig ma rnams spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha
T02D1197:181a-16: mo'i gzugs su bskyed de tha mal pa'i dbang gis
T02D1197:181a-17: so // rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1197:181a-18: rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs pa sgyu ma lta bur
T02D1197:181a-19: so // ro // de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsten pa ni mchod pa ste /
T02D1197:181a-20: rig ma ltar bsams nas so //
T02D1197:181a-21: mngon sum du zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rang nyid kyang lha'i bdag gnyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:181a-22: de ltar gnyis ka yang lha'i gzugs su so sor snang ngo //
T02D1197:181a-23: des na rmongs pas zhes pa ni dkar pos zhi ba'i las so //
T02D1197:181a-24: khro bos zhes pa ni nag pos drag po'i las so //
T02D1197:181a-25: de bzhin du chags pas zhes pa ni dmar pos chags pa'i las byed do /
T02D1197:181a-26: de ltar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi las kyis de rnams kyi gnyen po'o //
T02D1197:181a-27: de don du zhes pa ni de'i don du'o //
T02D1197:181a-28: rab tu byed pa lnga po zhes pa ni rtog
T02D1197:181a-29: pa dang po'i rab tu byed pa dang po ni
T02D1197:181a-30: brjod pa dang rjod par byed pa dang byang chub
T02D1197:181a-31: tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i de
T02D1197:181a-32: kho na nyid kyi bar du byed pa'o //
T02D1197:181a-33: gnyis pa ni byang chub sems la 'jug pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:181a-34: gsum pa ni de kho na nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:181a-35: bzhi pa ni rtog pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed
T02D1197:181a-36: pa dang po byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur pa'o
T02D1197:181a-37: // lnga pa 'di ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi bsgom pa ston pas so //
T02D1197:181a-38: de'i phyir de rnams kyis rgyal ba yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:181a-39: de bzhin du res 'ga' rnal 'byor pa sems can
T02D1197:181a-40: gyi don gyi dbang gis bsgoms pa las langs shing
T02D1197:181b-0: @181b pa de'i tshe thun tshod bstan pa'i phyir tho rangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1197:181b-1: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs
T02D1197:181b-2: pa'i tshul gyis aa wa dh'u t'ir bzhugs pa ste
T02D1197:181b-3: / gzung ba'i rim pas srog gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1197:181b-5: des na dngos grub mi 'gyur zhes pa ni gzhan
T02D1197:181b-6: du ma yin par nges pa zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:181b-7: // de bzhin du bstan pa smod ces bya ba
T02D1197:181b-8: la sogs pa ni bstan dang dus thams cad du
T02D1197:181b-9: lhan cig pa'i rnal 'byor pa phyag rgya des rgyas
T02D1197:181b-10: btab cing spyi'i phyag rgya spangs pa'o //
T02D1197:181b-11: smod ces pas ni rmongs pas kha na ma thob byed pa spang ba'o //
T02D1197:181b-12: 'jigs pa zhes pa ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa
T02D1197:181b-13: ste 'khor bar smod pa'i skye bo mi srun zhes
T02D1197:181b-15: 'on kyang mngon sum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:181b-16: rnal 'byor pa dam bcas pa brtan por rtag tu 'di 'bad pa 'di sgrub po //
T02D1197:181b-17: de yang mngon sum shes zhes pa ni phyag rgya
T02D1197:181b-18: chen po'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid kyi shes rab
T02D1197:181b-21: byol song la yang des goms bya //
T02D1197:181b-22: zhes pa ni phyugs bzhin du rgyun du bya ba'o //
T02D1197:181b-23: de yang brjod pa mi byed ces pa ni 'di
T02D1197:181b-24: lta bu'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dam tshig dang
T02D1197:181b-25: lhan cig pa gal te rnal 'byor pa mi byed
T02D1197:181b-26: na de'i tshe dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:181b-27: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig sbyor ba rtag tu bya'o //
T02D1197:181b-28: dam tshig bskyang ba'i don du ma gsungs kyang bdud
T02D1197:181b-29: rtsi lnga la sogs pa chang dang sha rnam pa
T02D1197:181b-30: sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs dam tshig rnams
T02D1197:181b-31: bya zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:181b-32: gal te mi byed na de'i tshe nges par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:181b-33: de ci'i phyir zhe na nyin re la sogs par
T02D1197:181b-34: rnal 'byor pa mi phyed pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:181b-35: kyi nges pa'o // de ci'i phyir de'i bya ba'i don to //
T02D1197:181b-37: gang dag chang ni mi 'thung dang //
T02D1197:181b-38: yul gyi bdud rtsi mi bsten zhing //
T02D1197:181b-39: rgyun du byang chub sems mi bsten //
T02D1197:181b-40: skyes bu de 'dir glang dang mtshungs //
T02D1197:181b-41: slob dpon gus shing dam tshig gis ni tshim //
T02D1197:181b-42: sdug dang mngon 'dus dam tshig zas rtag za //
T02D1197:181b-43: sems can sdig pa 'di rnams nges bsnun pas //
T02D1197:181b-44: dus kun btung ba chang gi btung 'di bya //
T02D1197:181b-47: bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod pa bya //
T02D1197:182a-2: yul ni bsten zhing spyad par bya //
T02D1197:182a-3: thams cad du ni chang snying po //
T02D1197:182a-4: sems can sems bzang po yis btung //
T02D1197:182a-5: gal te yang ni 'dir byang chub //
T02D1197:182a-6: rab tu thob pa'i rgyu med na //
T02D1197:182a-7: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'di la blta //
T02D1197:182a-8: sha yi mchog ni bza' bar bya //
T02D1197:182a-10: de ru ro ni mang po la //
T02D1197:182a-11: lus can la ni dmar par 'khyud //
T02D1197:182a-12: cang te'u lag thogs slar gar bya //
T02D1197:182a-13: snod min la ni mngon 'dod chang //
T02D1197:182a-14: sbyin pa dang ni btung mi bya //
T02D1197:182a-15: de ltar dam tshig bsten zhing bsgrubs na dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:182a-16: gzhan du bag med pa la sogs pas dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:182a-17: des na dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:182a-18: des na nyin re'am zla re'am lo re'am rtag tu
T02D1197:182a-19: gal te rnal 'byor ma mchog gis padma la reg
T02D1197:182a-20: par mi byed na de'i tshe slar yang dam tshig
T02D1197:182a-21: dang sdom pa la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1197:182a-22: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:182a-23: de ltar sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i //
T02D1197:182a-24: kha sbyor ba yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:182a-25: zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor bas so //
T02D1197:182a-26: bud bya ba dang bya ba min par zos //
T02D1197:182a-28: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba ni gzung //
T02D1197:182a-30: yang dag sbyin pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:182a-32: dam tshig gnyis ni gcig tu bya //
T02D1197:182a-34: yid kyi dbang po yang dag mnan //
T02D1197:182a-36: skyes bu nyid du nye bar 'gro //
T02D1197:182a-38: tam zhes pa ni gnyis dbus su //
T02D1197:182a-40: skye gnas bu gar aa ni sbyar //
T02D1197:182a-41: ge khyim gyi snying por song nas thim //
T02D1197:182a-43: yid kyi dngos po 'dir mi snang //
T02D1197:182a-44: de ltar bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
T02D1197:182a-47: de ltar shes rab dang thabs kyi don bsgom pa
T02D1197:182a-48: zhes pa ni bsam du med pa gnyis med pa'o
T02D1197:182a-49: // de'i don ni nye bar brtags pa'i tshig gang gi rtog par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1197:182a-50: des na bsgom pa la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:182a-51: de yang rtog pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa de'i'o //
T02D1197:182a-52: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa
T02D1197:182a-53: gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i rgya cher
T02D1197:182a-54: 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pa'i snang
T02D1197:182a-55: ba'i gzhung bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D1197:182a-57: // / da ni bsam du med pa'i lha'i rnam pa bsgom pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:182b-0: @182b de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:182b-1: rab tu byed pa lnga'i rjes thogs su rgyal pa
T02D1197:182b-2: 'byung ba'i rgyu'i phyir de nyid kyi lha'i bdag nyid
T02D1197:182b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1197:182b-5: da yang yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D1197:182b-6: zhes pa ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:182b-8: ces pa ni rgyud thams cad kyi gang dkyil 'khor
T02D1197:182b-9: gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa de rnams la khyab
T02D1197:182b-10: par byed pa'o // de yang rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1197:182b-11: la sogs lha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgra ni
T02D1197:182b-12: dpal 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor dang rnal
T02D1197:182b-13: 'byor ma'i rgyud mtha' dag pa de rnams kyi dkyil
T02D1197:182b-14: 'khor ba dang gtso bo rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:182b-15: thams cad du ni sna tshogs mchog / ces pa
T02D1197:182b-16: ni de lta bu'i brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos
T02D1197:182b-17: po sna tshogs pa rnams 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1197:182b-18: gang gi phyir thams cad la khyab par byed pa'i
T02D1197:182b-19: chos kyi sku'i rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin ni gnyis
T02D1197:182b-20: med pa'i yang gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:182b-21: de'i longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid kyis na mchog go
T02D1197:182b-22: / de nyid ni gsal por dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1197:182b-23: lo'i gzugs so // de lta bu gang du bsgrub ces pa ni gsungs pa /
T02D1197:182b-24: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:182b-25: yi ge bcu drug ni de kho na nyid bcu
T02D1197:182b-26: drug ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gsang ba bla ma zhes pa las gsungs pa /
T02D1197:182b-29: khrag gi khams ni byas pa'i bdag / rus pa'i dra ba bzhu bar bya //
T02D1197:182b-31: lus kyi dra ba gsad par bya //
T02D1197:182b-33: khu ba dbus su bsnun pa ni //
T02D1197:182b-34: bde ba rnam shes mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:182b-35: thim pa ster ni thim bya ste //
T02D1197:182b-36: phung po lnga ni gsad par bya //
T02D1197:182b-38: mchog gi byang chub sems ni bsten //
T02D1197:182b-39: thig le'i gzugs ni mi shes pa //
T02D1197:182b-40: blo ldan bsam gtan tsam gyis ni //
T02D1197:182b-44: pags pa stong pa'i gnas kyi mchog / rlung gi gzugs su 'ongs nas ni //
T02D1197:182b-45: thig le mi 'dzag pa la reg / ra /
T02D1197:182b-46: ro dang dri ni nye bar 'gro //
T02D1197:182b-47: lha yi dbang po yis ni phye //
T02D1197:182b-48: bsnams kyang der ni yod min pa //
T02D1197:182b-49: ye shes dri ni bla na med //
T02D1197:182b-50: me tog nyid kyi nam mkha' ni //
T02D1197:182b-51: snying gi dbus su kha ni phye //
T02D1197:182b-52: de las lhan cig skyes pa ste //
T02D1197:183a-3: ras [?] n'a yi mkha' dbus su //
T02D1197:183a-4: chags pa kun du thim pa der //
T02D1197:183a-5: snying rje yi ni ro skyes te //
T02D1197:183a-6: des na bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs //
T02D1197:183a-8: sha 'di rtag tu zos pa ni //
T02D1197:183a-9: 'bar ba bzhin du don dam pa //
T02D1197:183a-11: seng ge bzhin du yongs su zos //
T02D1197:183a-13: kun nas nor bu gtsug tor gyis //
T02D1197:183a-14: mtshams gnyis la ni nyer brten nas //
T02D1197:183a-15: srog ni mi g-yo bar byas pas //
T02D1197:183a-16: stong dang mi stong pa ni 'gro //
T02D1197:183a-18: g-yon pa'i rtsa nas bkug nas ni //
T02D1197:183a-19: de ni mgo nas rkang mthe bor //
T02D1197:183a-20: srog gi thig le drug gi phyed //
T02D1197:183a-21: gnas la brten te dbang ba nyid //
T02D1197:183a-23: bag chags gnas ni kun zos pas //
T02D1197:183a-24: snang ba gsum ni 'byung ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:183a-25: dbang po rnams dang bral ba yis //
T02D1197:183a-26: sdong bu las skyes padma gnyis //
T02D1197:183a-28: smin mar song ba'i rnal ma dgod //
T02D1197:183a-29: cho ga 'dod pa rnams kyis gzung //
T02D1197:183a-30: mar khu'i dri ni dri zhim pa //
T02D1197:183a-31: gtso ni sgrub pa'i thabs kyis bsgrub //
T02D1197:183a-33: mtho min gnas su thig le ni //
T02D1197:183a-34: bgrod med ting du bzung ba ni //
T02D1197:183a-35: zhi byed mchog tu brtag pa ste //
T02D1197:183a-36: yid lta bu yis mchog ni mnan //
T02D1197:183a-38: mchog gi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya //
T02D1197:183a-39: kun rdzob bden par lta ba yi //
T02D1197:183a-40: shes pa yang ni de la med //
T02D1197:183a-41: ye shes snying po btus pa'o //
T02D1197:183a-43: chos dang chos min rnam dpyad pa //
T02D1197:183a-44: mkhas pa rnams kyis mi bya'o //
T02D1197:183a-45: gang gi rnam pa kun gyis ni //
T02D1197:183a-46: tshig 'di yis ni dngos po med //
T02D1197:183a-48: gang dang gang gi rnam pa yis //
T02D1197:183a-50: de dang de ni thams cad bya //
T02D1197:183a-51: la lar la la'i ci yang med //
T02D1197:183a-52: de ltar gnas rnams su sna tshogs kyi mchog bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1197:183a-53: de bzhin du rgyu'i gnas dang 'bras bu sgrub pa'i yang gnas gsungs pa /
T02D1197:183a-54: rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:183a-55: 'dir rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba ni bdag
T02D1197:183a-56: gi ngar 'dzin pa spangs pa ste /
T02D1197:183a-58: gnas zhes pa ni gcig gi rnam pa'i sems kyi gnas de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:183a-59: 'am zhes pa ni rang gi lag pa gnyis bzlog
T02D1197:183a-60: pa rgyab tu thal mo sbyar ba bcings pa'i sbyor
T02D1197:183a-61: bas mgo gzung zhing lce rim las bzlog par bya
T02D1197:183b-0: ste / de bzhin @183b du steng gi rkan gyi mdud pa la reg par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:183b-1: byed pa des srog gi rlung dbyung ba dgug pa'i rnam par gnas te /
T02D1197:183b-2: sna yi dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa mi 'gro ste /
T02D1197:183b-3: gnas de ru rang gi sems nye bar mtshon par
T02D1197:183b-4: byas pa de ni bsgom pa de bzhin du 'gyur
T02D1197:183b-5: ro // rang gi skyed mos tshal zhes pa la
T02D1197:183b-6: sogs pa ni slar la yang dkyil 'khor bcu po
T02D1197:183b-7: rnams rang rang gi dus tshod la gang du skyes
T02D1197:183b-8: pa de rnams la der lag pas mnan pa'o //
T02D1197:183b-10: gtsug tor dang ni spyi bor gsungs //
T02D1197:183b-11: smin ma'i dbus dang mgrin pa'i mtshams //
T02D1197:183b-12: snying ga dang ni lta ba'i gnas //
T02D1197:183b-13: rgyu zhabs nyid dang gsang ba'i rtsar //
T02D1197:183b-14: nor bu'i bu ga de bzhin te //
T02D1197:183b-15: lce'u chung ba yi mdud pa'i rtser //
T02D1197:183b-16: gnas 'di rnams su srog ni gang //
T02D1197:183b-17: skyes pa de ni dgag par bya //
T02D1197:183b-18: lag pa gnyis ni rnams bzung pas //
T02D1197:183b-19: gnad kyis mtshams ni brtsir bar bya //
T02D1197:183b-20: dkyil 'khor re re rgyu ba yis //
T02D1197:183b-22: des ni dgag pa dag ni bya //
T02D1197:183b-23: sgom pa rtogs pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1197:183b-24: sangs rgyas sku la sogs pa sgom //
T02D1197:183b-25: de nas rdo rje 'chang sa thob //
T02D1197:183b-26: de ltar sa la rab brten te //
T02D1197:183b-27: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rnam par bya //
T02D1197:183b-28: bsam du med bsgom bsam pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:183b-29: rang bzhin las 'byung ngo bo nyid //
T02D1197:183b-30: sogs pa'i sgras ni phyi'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'i dang po'i gnas su bya'o //
T02D1197:183b-31: de ltar rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i ye shes nyid /
T02D1197:183b-32: kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D1197:183b-33: sna tshogs phyag rgya zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyi
T02D1197:183b-34: sku gang gis phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D1197:183b-35: la sogs pa sna tshogs pa rgyas btab cing de
T02D1197:183b-36: la brten pa yang 'dis rgyas btab ste /
T02D1197:183b-37: de ltar phan tshun rgyas par yid ches par bya'o //
T02D1197:183b-38: des na sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya stong pa nyid kyi skus sdom pa'o //
T02D1197:183b-39: kun du sna tshogs sdom pa zhes pa ni de
T02D1197:183b-40: yang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa kun
T02D1197:183b-41: gyi rang bzhin gang brtan pa dang /
T02D1197:183b-42: g-yo ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1197:183b-43: nang du 'dus pas kyang dngos po thams cad kyang
T02D1197:183b-44: sdom pa'o // de nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid kun
T02D1197:183b-45: du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la kun du'i
T02D1197:183b-46: sgras ni ba la sogs pa'i las tshogs rnams bzung
T02D1197:184a-0: sdom pa'o // ngo // de rnams kyi snga tshogs ni sems can sna tshogs pa'i don @184a * //
T02D1197:184a-2: de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo nyid du bya
T02D1197:184a-3: ba ni 'bras bu'i gzugs de nyid 'bras bu'i go
T02D1197:184a-4: 'phang thob pa'i rgyud sna tshogs dri ma med pa'i
T02D1197:184a-5: chos kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:184a-6: bsgrub par bya zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:184a-7: ji ltar bde bar zhes pa ni rang rig pas
T02D1197:184a-8: zab mo'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bsgrub par bya
T02D1197:184a-10: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:184a-11: dkyil 'khor ni dngos po thams cad gcig pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1197:184a-12: dngos po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1197:184a-13: sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ba rnams so
T02D1197:184a-14: // de rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus
T02D1197:184a-15: pa'i gzugs ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po chos kyi
T02D1197:184a-16: sku'i mtshan nyid he ru ka la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D1197:184a-17: // te / de yang rang bzhin gyi sku las byung ba'o //
T02D1197:184a-18: stong pa nyid ye shes zhes pa ni sna tshogs mthong ba sangs rgyas kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:184a-19: de bzhin du yang khro bo rnams kyis zhes pa
T02D1197:184a-20: ni rang bzhin gyi dbang gis nyin mo skyes pa
T02D1197:184a-21: rnams te / 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D1197:184a-22: khro bo gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu po rnams rim pa bzhin du brjod do //
T02D1197:184a-23: gshin rje gshed ni gsang ba'i rtsar //
T02D1197:184a-24: bu ga gcig nas 'bab nang du //
T02D1197:184a-25: sa yi dkyil 'khor ming can la //
T02D1197:184a-26: sna tshogs bya ba rnams ni byed //
T02D1197:184a-27: shes rab mthar byed khro chen po //
T02D1197:184a-28: chu so'i bu ga bshad lam nang //
T02D1197:184a-29: chu yi dkyil 'khor ming can la //
T02D1197:184a-30: der ni rgyas pa'i las byed do //
T02D1197:184a-31: padma mthar byed lte rtsa bar //
T02D1197:184a-32: aa ni 'byung ba'i bu ga ru //
T02D1197:184a-33: sems can thams cad bsad pa ni //
T02D1197:184a-34: me yi dkyil 'khor la ni bya //
T02D1197:184a-35: snying gar khro bo bgegs mthar byed //
T02D1197:184a-36: bu ga thig le 'bab nang du //
T02D1197:184a-37: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba la //
T02D1197:184a-38: bskrad pa'i las ni sna tshogs byed //
T02D1197:184a-39: mgrin par khro bo mi g-yo bas //
T02D1197:184a-40: yid bzangs bu ga'i nang du ni //
T02D1197:184a-41: dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i ming can la //
T02D1197:184a-42: dbang gi las rnams byed pa yin //
T02D1197:184a-43: smin ma'i dbus su dbyug sngon can //
T02D1197:184a-44: mdzod spu'i bu ga'i nang du'o //
T02D1197:184a-45: g-yon pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1197:184a-46: dgug pa'i las ni sna tshogs byed //
T02D1197:184a-47: spyi bor 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni //
T02D1197:184a-48: bu ga aa wa dh'u t'i 'bab //
T02D1197:184a-49: rlung zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1197:184a-50: rengs pa'i las ni thams cad byed //
T02D1197:184a-51: gtsug tor du ni stobs po che //
T02D1197:184b-0: bu ga @184b nam mkha' 'byung ba ru //
T02D1197:184b-1: me yi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba la //
T02D1197:184b-2: dge ba yi ni las rnams byed //
T02D1197:184b-3: gsang ba'i lte bar gnod mdzes ni //
T02D1197:184b-4: khu ba 'byung ba'i bu ga ru //
T02D1197:184b-5: chu yi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba la //
T02D1197:184b-6: lkugs pa yi ni las rnams byed //
T02D1197:184b-7: lce'u chung mdud par gtsug tor ni //
T02D1197:184b-8: bu ga bdud rtsi thig le 'bab //
T02D1197:184b-9: sa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1197:184b-10: rmongs pa'i las ni thams cad byed //
T02D1197:184b-11: de ltar khro bo mchog thams cad //
T02D1197:184b-12: sgyu ma'i rnam par lta bu nyid //
T02D1197:184b-13: 'bad pa yis ni bsam byas nas //
T02D1197:184b-15: de rnams dbang po'i gzhung lta bur //
T02D1197:184b-17: sa bcu yi ni nang rnams la //
T02D1197:184b-18: gnas kyang der ni mi mthong ngo //
T02D1197:184b-19: tshogs kyi grangs ni thob pa nyid //
T02D1197:184b-20: gzhan du yi ni gyo ba min //
T02D1197:184b-21: de ltar rang bzhin thams cad ni //
T02D1197:184b-22: mthong ba yid kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:184b-23: de ni rnam par bcom pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:184b-25: de bzhin du zhi bzhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:184b-26: ni mtshan mo'i ni zhi ba'i lha rnam par snang
T02D1197:184b-27: mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang
T02D1197:184b-28: / de bzhin du sa'i snying bo la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' drug skye'o //
T02D1197:184b-29: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1197:184b-30: byang chub sems dpa' bcu po rnams sngon du gsungs
T02D1197:184b-31: pa'i gnas su srog rgyu ba'i dus kyi khyad par
T02D1197:184b-33: de rnams kyi las ni sngon bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1197:184b-34: dang gis ni slar yang khro bo rnams 'byung ba'i
T02D1197:184b-35: dus su spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi
T02D1197:184b-36: dkyil 'khor so so las dang chu dang me dang
T02D1197:184b-37: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D1197:184b-38: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rdo rje ma nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1197:184b-39: de rnams skye ba'i gnas ni sngon du gsungs so //
T02D1197:184b-40: 'on kyang gnas re re la yang spu'i tshad tsam gyi rtsa lnga lngar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:184b-41: de bzhin du mtshan mo la gzugs rdo rje ma
T02D1197:184b-42: la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma lnga dkyil 'khor lnga
T02D1197:184b-43: la rgyu'o // de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnal 'byor
T02D1197:184b-44: ma bcu po 'di rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu
T02D1197:184b-45: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i tshig dang 'brel pa
T02D1197:184b-46: la rgyu'o // gsungs pa / rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen gtso //
T02D1197:184b-47: 'dod dpag med dang don yod grub //
T02D1197:184b-48: sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02D1197:185a-0: @185a * // mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyag dang //
T02D1197:185a-1: sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang //
T02D1197:185a-2: de bzhin kun du bzang po'o //
T02D1197:185a-3: 'di nyid gcig ma tshang ba'i yid //
T02D1197:185a-4: lnga bcu tham pa dag gis bshad //
T02D1197:185a-5: de rnams kyi ni gtan dbab brjod //
T02D1197:185a-6: rgyu yi phyir ni gnas la spyod //
T02D1197:185a-7: gcig ma tshang ba'i lnga bcu yi //
T02D1197:185a-8: re mig rnams la rim pa bzhin //
T02D1197:185a-9: yi ge re re'i rang bzhin yang //
T02D1197:185a-10: tsa yi de kho nas phye nyid //
T02D1197:185a-11: dang po bdun grangs de bzhin bdun //
T02D1197:185a-12: bdun lnga yi ni re'u mig la //
T02D1197:185a-14: dri ma med pa'i spyi med pa'i spyi bor gsungs //
T02D1197:185a-18: rkang pa'i 'og nyid du ni gtso //
T02D1197:185a-20: chu ba rnams ni yang dag gyo //
T02D1197:185a-22: thugs kyi 'khor lor gang phra mo //
T02D1197:185a-24: ro yi khams dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1197:185a-26: de rnams nye bar 'bar byed pa /
T02D1197:185a-28: sgra tsam la ni nyes thim phyir//
T02D1197:185a-30: phung po drug la gang phra mo //
T02D1197:185a-32: bdud rtsi 'bab pa yis ni rtsa //
T02D1197:185a-34: dbang po rnams la gang phra mo //
T02D1197:185a-36: skar ma lta bur dri ma med //
T02D1197:185a-38: lte ba'i rtsa rnams su ni 'bar //
T02D1197:185a-40: khams rnams bskyed par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1197:185a-42: dril bu'i sgra ni rtsa ni gang //
T02D1197:185a-46: nyis brtsegs snying dang lte dbus su //
T02D1197:185a-50: sum khrel gyi ni dbus kyi rtse //
T02D1197:185a-54: smin ma'i dbus su 'bab pa gang //
T02D1197:185a-56: rtsa ba dag gi rtsa bar 'bab //
T02D1197:185a-58: sum gril gi ni dbus su rol //
T02D1197:185a-60: sdong bu yin ni rtsa bar me //
T02D1197:185a-62: chu dang ko sko dag tu 'byar //
T02D1197:185a-64: bya bzhin du ni rus mo gnyis //
T02D1197:185a-65: ga 'gro ba yi ni bla lam du //
T02D1197:185a-67: bha ga'i dbus kyi rtsa ni gang //
T02D1197:185a-69: ba spu mtshams rnams su ni gyo //
T02D1197:185a-71: skra zhes pa ni gtsug tor du //
T02D1197:185a-72: shva dbugs ni thams cad du 'gro ba //
T02D1197:185a-74: rdul 'bab pa yi rtsa ni gang //
T02D1197:185a-76: stan las dang po langs pa nyid //
T02D1197:185a-78: tshigs kun du ni rab 'bab pa //
T02D1197:185a-82: bar gyi dbus su sbrul pa'o //
T02D1197:185a-84: gang du tshigs ni 'byung ba nyid //
T02D1197:185a-86: dga' la sogs pa yi ni rtsa //
T02D1197:185a-88: chu yi mtshams su song bar des //
T02D1197:185a-89: gi sna tshogs mdud pa rab 'phyad pa //
T02D1197:185a-91: phrag pa la sogs rus pa'i 'phreng //
T02D1197:185b-0: sems kyis sa @185b bon yid ni 'phrog //
T02D1197:185b-2: de yi yang ni gzhan ni gang //
T02D1197:185b-4: nu ma yi ni rdog mar gzhag //
T02D1197:185b-6: mtshams ni sngon 'gro rked rus te //
T02D1197:185b-8: de yi dbus su gzhan mtshams nyid //
T02D1197:185b-10: snal ma'i grangs med phra ba nyid //
T02D1197:185b-12: tshangs pa'i gnas su de las gzhan //
T02D1197:185b-14: dbu ma las ni thams cad 'bab //
T02D1197:185b-15: ka ci dang ci 'bab rtsa ni gang //
T02D1197:185b-16: de la bde ba brten pa'o //
T02D1197:185b-17: de ltar re mig mchog ni gsungs //
T02D1197:185b-18: bdun phrag bdun zhes bya ba yi //
T02D1197:185b-19: lus las rtag tu rnam shes rgyu //
T02D1197:185b-20: re mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la //
T02D1197:185b-21: yi ge re re'i dbus su bsgom //
T02D1197:185b-22: lha mo bzang mo'i gzugs can la //
T02D1197:185b-23: spyan ma'i bkod pa tha dag ni //
T02D1197:185b-24: nam mkha' gang bas zhi ba yi //
T02D1197:185b-25: las ni dri ma med par bya //
T02D1197:185b-26: de bzhin m'a ma k'i sogs dang //
T02D1197:185b-27: de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs //
T02D1197:185b-28: de bzhin sangs rgyas gar mkhan ni //
T02D1197:185b-29: ma lus bsam mi khyab par bsam / sems can grangs ni bsam med phyir //
T02D1197:185b-30: de bzhin du yang las ni bya //
T02D1197:185b-31: des na der ni thim par 'gyur //
T02D1197:185b-32: rang gi re mig 'byung gnyis med //
T02D1197:185b-33: spyan ma lha yi mi ga tu 'gyur //
T02D1197:185b-34: m'a ma ka'i ni shes rab mig //
T02D1197:185b-35: gos dkar ye she smig tu gsungs //
T02D1197:185b-36: sgrol ma sangs rgyas spyan de bzhin //
T02D1197:185b-37: sha yi mig tu byas pa'i bdag / gzugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'o //
T02D1197:185b-38: lha yi sgra sogs de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1197:185b-39: sgra sogs pa yi lha mo 'dod //
T02D1197:185b-40: de ltar yon tan khyad par gyis //
T02D1197:185b-41: rnal 'byor ba yi sems nyid med //
T02D1197:185b-42: de mig rnams la de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1197:185b-43: lha mo'i rigs ni grangs med pa'o //
T02D1197:185b-44: sgyu ma'i de nyid 'dir gsal bar //
T02D1197:185b-45: mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin //
T02D1197:185b-46: slob dpon la ni bsnyen bkur pas //
T02D1197:185b-47: rgyas pa de ni shes par bya //
T02D1197:185b-48: re mig mthar ni byung ba dang //
T02D1197:185b-49: yi ge rnam par rtog bsgom pa //
T02D1197:185b-50: de ni med cing 'di ni med //
T02D1197:185b-51: rkyen gyi don ni 'ba' zhig go /'on kyang thams cad mkhyen bgrod pa //
T02D1197:185b-52: med par de ni dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02D1197:185b-53: de ltar yang gsungs pa bdag gi ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1197:185b-54: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud thams cad du //
T02D1197:185b-55: dkyil 'khor lo'i bsgom pa la sog sngon du 'gro
T02D1197:185b-56: bas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa
T02D1197:185b-57: ma yin nam / de 'dir ji ltar sangs rgyas
T02D1197:185b-58: gar mkhan gyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te
T02D1197:185b-60: lha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:186a-1: cad sems kyi rnam 'phrul lo zhes pa ni sgom
T02D1197:186a-2: pa la sogs 'di dag thams cad nyes sems kyi
T02D1197:186a-3: rnam par rtog pa tsam du rab tu 'grub po
T02D1197:186a-4: // sems gcig pu nyid sna tshogs pa rnams pa'i
T02D1197:186a-5: sgom pa la dmigs pa lha'i gzugs snang ba tsam
T02D1197:186a-6: // mo // des ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs
T02D1197:186a-7: pa rnams su gsungs pa de dag ni sems kyi
T02D1197:186a-10: sgom pa sems dang sems 'byung ba //
T02D1197:186a-11: 'khrul bas sgrub pa po ni rmongs //
T02D1197:186a-12: sgom pa nyid kyis rtag tu grol //
T02D1197:186a-13: gang phyir rtog pa rnams 'ching byed //
T02D1197:186a-14: rtog pa bden par 'gyur ma yin //
T02D1197:186a-15: sems dang sems las byung ba gzhan //
T02D1197:186a-16: sems kyang der ni yod min na //
T02D1197:186a-17: sems las byung ba smos ci dgos //
T02D1197:186a-18: sems kyi thog med bag chags kyi //
T02D1197:186a-19: rtog pa las ni lus byung ste //
T02D1197:186a-20: lus la sems ni gnas pa yin //
T02D1197:186a-21: 'di dag sgyu ma ru ni gsungs //
T02D1197:186a-22: de bzhin bsgom pa la sogs ni //
T02D1197:186a-23: de lta bur ni yongs su brtag / sangs rgyas sku ru skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:186a-24: de phyir sangs rgyas 'di sgyu ma //
T02D1197:186a-25: sngon gyi bag chags las nyid kyis //
T02D1197:186a-26: sems can rnams ni de de bzhin //
T02D1197:186a-27: gzhan las sangs rgyas 'byung ba min //
T02D1197:186a-28: sems can nyid kyang sems can min //
T02D1197:186a-29: rnam par rtog pas rnam rtog 'byung //
T02D1197:186a-30: de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid shes bya //
T02D1197:186a-31: sangs rgyas min bden pa ru 'dod //
T02D1197:186a-32: 'on kyang sems can de sgyu ma /
T02D1197:186a-33: ji srid khams gsum gnas kyi bar //
T02D1197:186a-34: de srid sangs rgyas sgyu ma yang //
T02D1197:186a-35: snying rje'i rkyen gyis bzhugs pa yin //
T02D1197:186a-36: de kun de nyid nyam dga' gnas //
T02D1197:186a-37: bcu drug pa yi char mi phod //
T02D1197:186a-38: sems dang sems byung sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1197:186a-39: dngos po ru ni gdod nas bstan //
T02D1197:186a-40: de ltar gnyi ga mi bden par //
T02D1197:186a-41: de phyir bsam mi khyab sangs rgyas //
T02D1197:186a-42: gar mkhan gyi ni sgyu ma nyid //
T02D1197:186a-43: ces pa ni sems sgom pa la sogs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:186a-44: de bzhin du sems can rnams gzhug pa'i don du'o //
T02D1197:186a-45: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:186a-46: bdag gis zhes pa ni sh'a kya thub pa bdag gis so //
T02D1197:186a-47: rgyud du zhes pa ni ba sbyor 'di la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1197:186a-48: sems can zhes pa ni de rnams la phan gdags pa'i don du'o //
T02D1197:186a-49: gang gi phyir sngon nas rigs gcig pa'i dngos po
T02D1197:186a-50: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes ni rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1197:186a-51: zhes pa de nyid rtog pa'i dbang gis rigs mtha'
T02D1197:186a-52: yas te / sems can grangs med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:186a-54: rigs ni rnams pa lnga zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:186b-0: @186b bshad ces pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rigs pas rigs gcig go //
T02D1197:186b-1: stong ba'i rdo rje can zhes pa ni stong pas
T02D1197:186b-2: nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje bsam du med gnyis
T02D1197:186b-3: med pa'i rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes pa'i
T02D1197:186b-5: da ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1197:186b-6: pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa skyed pa dang rdzogs
T02D1197:186b-7: pa'i rim pa sgrub pa thabs sna tshogs pa'i man
T02D1197:186b-9: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:186b-10: gsol ba zhes pa ni ci gsol zhe na /
T02D1197:186b-12: bshad du gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o //
T02D1197:186b-13: dgyes pa chen po zhes pa ni zab mo longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:186b-14: de yang ji ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1197:186b-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku dag ro gcig par 'gyur
T02D1197:186b-16: bas chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'bras bu'i
T02D1197:186b-17: rang bzhin no // nges na zab mor gsungs so //
T02D1197:186b-18: de ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob kyi
T02D1197:186b-19: phyogs la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyi chos
T02D1197:186b-20: su 'grub po // don dam par ni rgyu dang
T02D1197:186b-21: 'bras bu dag 'gog pa yod de mi bden pa'i
T02D1197:186b-22: su 'grub po // phyir ro // de bzhin du
T02D1197:186b-23: gtso bo zhes pa ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:186b-24: su 'grub po // phyir ro // do // de
T02D1197:186b-25: ltar gtso bo sbrul pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das la
T02D1197:186b-27: gang gis zhes pa nas cho ga zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1197:186b-28: 'dis ni de lta ba'i sgrub pa po'i sems can 'grub pa'o //
T02D1197:186b-29: gang gis zhes pa ni dngos po'i rnams pas so //
T02D1197:186b-30: de bshad du gsol zhes pa de'i tshe bcom ldan
T02D1197:186b-31: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1197:186b-32: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lan gyi tshig go //
T02D1197:186b-33: de bzhin du dang po zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:186b-34: pa ni 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mthun pa'i
T02D1197:186b-35: chos kyi rjes su 'brangs pa rnams kyis bsgom pa
T02D1197:186b-36: 'di bya'o // gang gi phyir thog ma med pa
T02D1197:186b-37: nas 'jig rten gyi chos bum pa dang ras dang
T02D1197:186b-38: shing rta sogs pa rnams la sems 'jug go //
T02D1197:186b-39: des na de dag thog ma med pa'i bag chags
T02D1197:186b-40: kyi rgyun gyis 'jug pa 'di'i tshe bskal pa bzang
T02D1197:186b-41: po 'di la rnam par gzigs la sogs pa'i de
T02D1197:186b-42: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos ston pa mdzad cing
T02D1197:186b-43: sh'a kya thub bas kyang zab mo'i chos bstan to
T02D1197:186b-44: // de'i phyir yang zab mo'i chos ston to //
T02D1197:187a-1: dang po zhes pa ni rdzogs ldan gyi dus su'o //
T02D1197:187a-2: byams pa bsgom par bya zhes pa ni de la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:187a-3: der gnyis par zhes pa ni gsum ldan la snying rje'o //
T02D1197:187a-4: gsum pa zhes pa ni gnyis ldan la dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:187a-5: kun gyi mthar ni zhes pa ni dus gsum gyi
T02D1197:187a-6: mthar rtsod pa'i dus su btang snyoms bsgom pa ni
T02D1197:187a-8: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang bsgom pa'i dus su bya zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:187a-9: de bzhin du dang po sgom pa'i dus sems kyi mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te /
T02D1197:187a-10: langs pa'i gnas skabs su rang gi don dang gzhan
T02D1197:187a-11: gyi don la brtson pa des ni 'bras bu yang
T02D1197:187a-12: dag par rdzogs pa thob ste /
T02D1197:187a-13: sems dang sems las byung ba'i dngos po'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:187a-14: de yang byams pa ni shin tu brtse ba'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1197:187a-15: de'i tshe dang po'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin skye'o //
T02D1197:187a-16: des na rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi sems can rnams phan tshun byams pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:187a-17: des na 'bras kyi 'brul la sogs pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:187a-18: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis byams pa grub ste /
T02D1197:187a-19: dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig lta ba drug pa
T02D1197:187a-20: dang bral ba rmongs te yon tan med kyang de'i
T02D1197:187a-21: tshe sems can rnams la phan pa byed de rang
T02D1197:187a-22: bzhin gyis brtse ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:187a-23: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1197:187a-24: rnams kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byams pa'i rang
T02D1197:187a-25: bzhin gyi grub pa des na dang por byams pa
T02D1197:187a-26: bstan te / rtsod pa'i dus su yang sgra tsam
T02D1197:187a-27: gyis mngon du byed de rdzogs ldan gyi dus su
T02D1197:187a-28: ni sgra tsam ma yin no //
T02D1197:187a-29: de bzhin du gsum ldan gyi dus su chos kyi chag gcig dang bral te /
T02D1197:187a-30: sems can rnams drag po'i blo dang ldan pas de'i
T02D1197:187a-31: tshe rang bzhin gyis snying rje'i rang bzhin grub ste
T02D1197:187a-32: sngon la ltos pas sangs rgyas rnams bsgom pa'i dus
T02D1197:187a-33: su yang bgegs bskrad pa'i phyir khro bo'i ting nge
T02D1197:187a-34: 'dzin la dmigs pa ni rmi lam gyi gnas skabs
T02D1197:187a-36: de'i tshe snying rje'i rang bzhin de yang sangs rgyas
T02D1197:187a-37: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtsod pa'i dus
T02D1197:187a-38: su gsung gi yi ga bstan pas sems can rnams
T02D1197:187a-39: snying rje la dmigs so zhes pa ni nges pa'o
T02D1197:187b-0: // de bzhin du gnyis ldan gyi dus @187b su chos kyi cha gnyis med de /
T02D1197:187b-1: de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon du bsgom
T02D1197:187b-2: pa'i dus su bdag dang gzhan gyi gnas su bsrung
T02D1197:187b-3: ba'i 'khor lo sogs pa bsam pas cung zad sems
T02D1197:187b-4: rtse gcig pas sngon gyi dngos po dang bral te
T02D1197:187b-5: / des na rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis shin tu nyal ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:187b-6: des na gnyis ldan gyi dus su sems can rnams
T02D1197:187b-7: dga' ba'i yid kyis rang bzhin gyis rab tu dga'
T02D1197:187b-8: ba grub po // de bzhin du rtsod pa'i dus
T02D1197:187b-9: su bsgom pa'i dus su yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1197:187b-10: gsung tsam gyis bstan pa de la de skad ces
T02D1197:187b-11: ba grub po // bya'o // de bzhin du rtsod pa'i dus su chos kyi cha gsum med de /
T02D1197:187b-12: sngon du sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsgom pa'i dus su
T02D1197:187b-13: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir aom sva bh'a wa
T02D1197:187b-14: shuddha: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad brjod pas sems dngos po
T02D1197:187b-15: dang dngos po med pa dang bral lo //
T02D1197:187b-16: des na rtsod pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams blo
T02D1197:187b-17: chung ba 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D1197:187b-19: ji ltar bsgom pa'i dus su yid brtan pa de
T02D1197:187b-20: ltar dngos po rnams la yid brtan pa'i dngos po
T02D1197:187b-21: rnams nyung zhing 'bras kyi 'brul sogs pa nyung ba'o
T02D1197:187b-22: // des na btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:187b-23: de yang sems can rnams phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams la btang snyoms su mi byed de /
T02D1197:187b-24: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sh'a kya thub pas 'jig
T02D1197:187b-25: rten gyi chos brgyad rnams la mi 'jug par bya
T02D1197:187b-26: ba'i phyir btang snyoms bstan to //
T02D1197:187b-27: de bzhin du rdzogs ldan la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1197:187b-28: tshe rnams kyi tshe rnams kyang 'phral ba dang 'bri
T02D1197:187b-29: ba'o // da ltar tshangs pa'i gnas rnams bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:187b-30: dus 'dir yang gsal ba nyid du bya'o //
T02D1197:187b-31: slar yang de ltar dus so so re re la
T02D1197:187b-32: rnams par bzhag pa de bzhin du bsgom pa'i dus
T02D1197:187b-33: su yang rtag du nyi ma re re bya'o //
T02D1197:187b-34: de ltar yang gsungs pa sngon du sangs rgyas la bskrun pas /
T02D1197:187b-35: sems ni nyan thos rnam pa'o //
T02D1197:187b-36: rdzogs ldan byams pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:187b-37: phan tshun sems can rnams chen rnams ni 'jug / gsum ldan snying rje'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1197:187b-38: khro la brtan pa'i cha ni bri //
T02D1197:187b-39: sems can bgegs la gsod par byed //
T02D1197:187b-40: des na rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur //
T02D1197:187b-41: gnyis ldan gnas sogs bsrung ba ste //
T02D1197:188a-1: ni rtse gcig bsgom pa yis //
T02D1197:188a-2: sems can de rnams de rnams cha ni bri //
T02D1197:188a-3: rab tu dga' ba bsgom pas ni //
T02D1197:188a-4: theg pa chen po de sangs rgyas //
T02D1197:188a-5: btang snyoms kun gyi mtha' mar yang //
T02D1197:188a-6: cha gsum bri ba des sangs rgyas //
T02D1197:188a-7: dag pa chos kyi bsgom pa ni //
T02D1197:188a-8: sngags kyi theg chen de sgrub cing //
T02D1197:188a-9: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan la //
T02D1197:188a-10: de ltar thams cad bya ba nyid //
T02D1197:188a-11: rtsod dus lha yi sgrub thabs so //
T02D1197:188a-12: ma yis thams cad 'joms pa ste /
T02D1197:188a-13: gti mug la sogs sdig 'byung ba //
T02D1197:188a-14: sems can thams cad dbang byas te //
T02D1197:188a-15: 'tsho ba'i tshe ni bslu bar bya //
T02D1197:188a-16: ae ni dbang po thams cad de //
T02D1197:188a-17: shin tu tshim pa yis ni gzhom //
T02D1197:188a-18: nyan thos thos spyod pa bskyang ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:188a-19: dbang phyug nyid ni rtag tu 'byung //
T02D1197:188a-20: thams cad skrag par mi byed de //
T02D1197:188a-21: srog chags rnams kyi dngos po rnams //
T02D1197:188a-22: bskyang ba dang ni thar par 'gyur //
T02D1197:188a-23: de ltar dri ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:188a-25: 'di dag bu ni rtag tu bya //
T02D1197:188a-27: sdug bsngal la sogs de bzhin du //
T02D1197:188a-28: bden pa bzhi yi mtshan nyid rnams //
T02D1197:188a-29: ka ni las rnams byed pa nyid //
T02D1197:188a-30: gong du 'dzin pa skye ba yi //
T02D1197:188a-31: rgyu dang 'bras bu zhen pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:188a-32: grangs las 'das pa sems ni nyid //
T02D1197:188a-34: der ni gnyis ka yod min te //
T02D1197:188a-35: rnal 'byor zhi ba'i don 'ba' zhig / sems dang bral yang ru byed de //
T02D1197:188a-38: bya ba rnam pa gnyis ni 'joms //
T02D1197:188a-39: nyan thos rang sangs rgyas de bzhin //
T02D1197:188a-40: sems can rnams la phan byed pa //
T02D1197:188a-41: theg pa chen pa 'joms pa byed //
T02D1197:188a-42: mu ni sdud pa nyid yin te //
T02D1197:188a-43: dga' ba'i bde ba yi ni rgyud //
T02D1197:188a-44: de nyid du ni grol byed pa //
T02D1197:188a-46: de nyid phyed chas sad byas pas //
T02D1197:188a-47: ye shes bdud rtsi 'dus pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:188a-48: sems dang sems las byung ba spangs //
T02D1197:188a-49: 'di yi shing rta la ni zhon //
T02D1197:188a-51: ji srid mkha' yi mtha' klas pa //
T02D1197:188a-52: de srid sangs rgyas nyid byed pa'o //
T02D1197:188a-53: gzhan gyi bya ba rnams byed pa //
T02D1197:188a-54: srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ni grol //
T02D1197:188a-56: glo bur ba ni 'byung ba kun //
T02D1197:188a-57: lus kyi rgyu ba spangs pa ni //
T02D1197:188a-58: des ni de yi rang bzhin 'gro //
T02D1197:188a-59: rnal 'byor pa ni sangs rgyas rtse //
T02D1197:188a-61: de nyid bdud rtsi lta bu nyid //
T02D1197:188b-0: bdud rtsi mya @188b ngan 'das pa nyid //
T02D1197:188b-1: bla ma'i bka' yang bdud rtsi ste //
T02D1197:188b-3: ksha ni dngos po zad pa ste //
T02D1197:188b-4: sems kyi rnam rmongs thams cad nyid //
T02D1197:188b-5: sems ni zad pa'i rgyu yis na //
T02D1197:188b-6: de nyid rnam par rtog pa'ang zad //
T02D1197:188b-7: da ni 'dra ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1197:188b-8: sgom pa po'i stong pa nyid kyi byang chub kye mtshan nyid brjod de /
T02D1197:188b-9: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02D1197:188b-10: slar yang zhes pa ni 'dir sangs rgyas rnams bsgom
T02D1197:188b-11: pa'i dus su aom su bi shuddha: zhes bya ba
T02D1197:188b-12: la sogs pa'i tshigs cad kyi rjes thogs su /
T02D1197:188b-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:188b-14: sngags brjod de 'dir khams gsum pa mtha' dag stong
T02D1197:188b-15: par dmigs so // des na byang chub ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1197:188b-16: de de bzhin du rtsod pa'i dus kyi mthar thams cad stong par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:188b-17: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dngos po nyid do //
T02D1197:188b-18: de'i phyir des rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'grub po //
T02D1197:188b-19: dus der sems can dbyibs chung ngu'i bdag nyid can
T02D1197:188b-20: rnams phan tshun stong pa'i sems su 'gyur te sngon
T02D1197:188b-21: gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1197:188b-22: de bzhin du gnyis pa la ni stong pa nyid kyis sgom pa lags so //
T02D1197:188b-23: sa bon bsdu zhes pa ni byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rgyus sems tsam la lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:188b-24: sems can rnams la yang rang bzhin gyis sems la so sor rtogs par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:188b-25: dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:188b-26: de bzhin du gsum pa la ni zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i sems tsam las so //
T02D1197:188b-27: gzugs sogs zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang la gzugs
T02D1197:188b-28: la sogs pa mtha' dag sems kyis mngon du byed
T02D1197:188b-29: cing rdzogs pa'i rgyur zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:188b-30: sems can rnams la yang rmi lam bzhin rgyu dang
T02D1197:188b-31: 'bras bu rnams la sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de
T02D1197:188b-33: de bzhin du yang bzhi pa la ni zhes pa
T02D1197:188b-34: ni de ltar sems bskyed cing bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:188b-35: pa rnams kyi rang la yid ches pas rang gis
T02D1197:188b-36: lus kyi dbyibs nam mkha' bzhin du blta ste yi
T02D1197:188b-37: ga dgod pa'i gzugs dmigs pas gsal bar 'gyur te
T02D1197:188b-38: 'di ni ngag gi ming zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:189a-0: sems can rnams la yang lus kyi @189a * //
T02D1197:189a-1: dngos po las ngag gsal ba nyid du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:189a-2: sngon la ltos pa'i rang gi 'du shes kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:189a-3: de'i phyir mdun du ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D1197:189a-4: de ltar de'i dus su rnal 'byor pa de rnams
T02D1197:189a-5: kyi sems nyid rjes su chags pas ra'i rkyen du
T02D1197:189a-6: 'gyur ro // des na ra las nyi ma ye
T02D1197:189a-7: shes 'od gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan sems nyid nyi ma'i
T02D1197:189a-9: mdun du zhes pa ni rang gi lus la ltos pa'i mdun du snang ba'o //
T02D1197:189a-10: bsgom ma zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:189a-11: de ltar yang 'dir nyi ma der zhes pa ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i nyi ma'o //
T02D1197:189a-12: h'um byung zhes pa ni sems kyang 'dod chags kyis dkris pa de nyid gcig gi rnam pa'o //
T02D1197:189a-13: des na h'um gi rkyen gyis bdag nyid zhu zhing
T02D1197:189a-14: ser thim pa nyid kyis 'bras gu'i dbang gis rgyud
T02D1197:189a-15: nyams te sa bon dang myu bzhin no //
T02D1197:189a-16: des na de'i bdag nyid sna tshogs rdo rje zhes
T02D1197:189a-17: pa ni de bzhin du sems gcig nyid ye shes
T02D1197:189a-19: rdo rje yang snying po'i gzugs te khyad par can
T02D1197:189a-20: gyi shes rab kyi mtshan nyid chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1197:189a-21: rten bzhin no // de'i phyir de nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:189a-22: sna tshogs rdo rje las 'od zer rnams spros pa'o //
T02D1197:189a-23: sems kyang sna tshogs pa'i rnam par snang ste /
T02D1197:189a-24: smig rgyu'i dra ba bzhin mthong bas yid ches pas brdzun pa bsgom pa la zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:189a-25: de ltar de rnams rdo rje ste rgyu dang rkyen mang po'i don gyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:189a-26: de yis bsgom par bya ba ni 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1197:189a-27: ra ba dang ni dra ba zhes pa ni sngon du bya ba ste /
T02D1197:189a-28: ji ltar chos rnams thams cad kyi sngon du snga
T02D1197:189a-29: nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam pa de bzhin du
T02D1197:189a-30: bya ba zhes pa ni ra ba'o //
T02D1197:189a-31: de bzhin du dra ba ni kun nas sngon du
T02D1197:189a-32: sprul pa'i skus sems can sna tshogs pa rnams sangs
T02D1197:189a-33: rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir byang chub bskyed
T02D1197:189a-34: pa'o // rigs sna tshogs kyi dbang gi chos kyi
T02D1197:189a-35: sku la sogs pa de rnams kyang grangs med pa'o
T02D1197:189a-36: pa'o // // des na rdo rje'i gur nye bar gnas par 'gyur zhes dgongs so /
T02D1197:189a-37: cho ga ni bzhin zhes pa ni cho ga 'dis
T02D1197:189a-38: sems can rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu gsungs pa
T02D1197:189a-39: / 'dir yang slar la rdzogs ldan gyi dus 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:189b-0: de'i dus @189b su byams pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
T02D1197:189b-1: sngon byams pa'i gnas sgom pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:189b-2: de yang 'dod chags kyi rkyen gyis de bzhin du
T02D1197:189b-3: 'dir dus der bsod nams kyi dbang gis sems can
T02D1197:189b-4: rnams la sangs rgyas rnams snang ba'i phyir mthong ngo
T02D1197:189b-5: // de la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir nyi ma dang h'um las ku bzhin du'o //
T02D1197:189b-6: de ltar sna tshogs rdo rje las 'od zer 'phro
T02D1197:189b-7: ba de bzhin du sems can sna tshogs pa dri
T02D1197:189b-8: ma med pa nyid kyis gcig la gcig rtse ba
T02D1197:189b-9: dang bcas pas spyod pa'i dang tshul can no //
T02D1197:189b-10: des na rdo rje bzhin mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1197:189b-11: kyi phyir zhes pa ni dri ba la sogs par
T02D1197:189b-12: blta'o // de ltar rtsig pa rten te rang nyid
T02D1197:189b-13: dang gzhan bla ma dang bral ba yang ye shes
T02D1197:189b-14: snang par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi lam du nye
T02D1197:189b-15: blta'o // bar 'gro'o // des na gur bcings zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:189b-16: de bzhin du dang por ro zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:189b-17: sogs pa ni 'dir dang por zhes pa nye bar
T02D1197:189b-19: 'on kyang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'khrul pa spangs pa bsgom pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1197:189b-20: ro ni bsgom par bya zhes pa ni sems brtan pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1197:189b-21: mar las mar bzhin rkyen gyi sna tshogs rdo rje dang gur rab dang /
T02D1197:189b-22: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi dbus su ae'i
T02D1197:189b-23: rnam pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi gzugs bsams pa'o
T02D1197:189b-24: // de nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas dag pa'i yon
T02D1197:189b-25: tan gyis bdag nyid de rnams rang bzhin gyi sku
T02D1197:189b-26: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mkhas pas zhes pa'i
T02D1197:189b-27: // rkyen no // de'i phyir ro ni dang pa'i
T02D1197:189b-28: sems chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin las rang bzhin nyid
T02D1197:189b-29: 'phro ba dang de dag ro gcig pa'i gzugs ni
T02D1197:189b-30: // rkyen no // ro'o // ji ltar lus dang
T02D1197:189b-31: sems dag 'chi ba'i gnas skabs kyi dus su sems
T02D1197:189b-32: can rnams kyi ril po gcig tu 'gyur te sna
T02D1197:189b-34: de bzhin du 'dir yang de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:189b-35: de'i steng rnal 'byor pa 'dug ste zhes pa ni
T02D1197:189b-36: 'dir so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs su rnal 'byor
T02D1197:189b-37: pa zhes pa ni las dang po pa sgom pa
T02D1197:189b-38: po dbang po rtul po gnyis med pa mngon sum
T02D1197:189b-39: du byed mi nus pa ste /
T02D1197:190a-1: la dbang po rnams longs spyod cing chags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:190a-2: de'i phyir kun rdzob kyi phyogs la de'i steng du
T02D1197:190a-3: zhes pa chos kyi 'byung gnas la sogs par btags
T02D1197:190a-4: pa'i gzugs can lag nas kyi don dam pa la
T02D1197:190a-5: gnas pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:190a-6: 'on kyang don dam par khams gsum ro'i rnam par
T02D1197:190a-7: mi rtog pa de'i dngos po yang chos kyi dbyings
T02D1197:190a-9: chos kyi dbyings nyid ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:190a-10: des na mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de'i
T02D1197:190a-11: steng du gnas pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o zhes sbyar
T02D1197:190a-12: ro // de ltar dus rnams kyi go rims bzhin /
T02D1197:190a-13: he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom zhes pa ni
T02D1197:190a-14: 'dir rdzogs ldan gyi dus su sems can thams cad
T02D1197:190a-15: skal pa phun sum tshogs pa ni sngon du sgom
T02D1197:190a-16: pa'i dus su bha ga mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:190a-17: de bzhin du yang grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rang bzhin gyis de'i steng du 'dug ste /
T02D1197:190a-18: nang du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyi ro //
T02D1197:190a-21: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:190a-22: de ltar mdor bsdus te gsungs pa dus dang dus la yang dang yang rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:190a-23: de bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba yang shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:190a-24: de'i phyir he ru ka'i ye shes kyi phyir yang
T02D1197:190a-25: he ru ka la sogs pa'i bsgom pa la sogs
T02D1197:190a-26: par dam bca'o // de ltar shes rab kyi dngos
T02D1197:190a-27: po bsgom par bstan nas de bzhin du thabs kyi
T02D1197:190a-29: rang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pha gsungs te /
T02D1197:190a-30: 'dir rang gi snying gar zhes pa ni rang gi sems chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:190a-31: de'i bsgom par bya ba ni snying rje'i rkyen gyis rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:190a-32: de yang re pa zhes pa'i ming gis kun gzhi
T02D1197:190a-33: rnam par shes pa dngos po rnams kyi rgyu mi
T02D1197:190a-34: byed pa'o // de yang rtag bzhin pa zhu ba las te /
T02D1197:190a-35: de byung nyi ma zhes pa ni gzugs snang ba
T02D1197:190a-36: tsam sems nyid de'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir nyi
T02D1197:190a-38: de steng zhes pa ni de bzhin du nags pa'i
T02D1197:190a-39: ye shes las chags pa dang bral ba'i ye shes
T02D1197:190a-40: 'byung ngo // de yang h'um zhes bya ba ni
T02D1197:190b-0: zhes pa la h'um gi chi byad ni ming @190b
T02D1197:190b-1: 'byung ngo // tsam mo // de ltar yang 'dod chags dang bral ba dag 'dres par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:190b-2: de nas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid ces
T02D1197:190b-3: pa ni stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med ba'o
T02D1197:190b-4: // de la yid ches ba dog nag po zhes
T02D1197:190b-5: bya ba la sogs pa ni khro bo rdo rje
T02D1197:190b-6: zhe sdang ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:190b-8: h'um las tha mal pa'i zhe sdang zad pa chags bral lo //
T02D1197:190b-9: des na yang zhe sdang chen po'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:190b-11: 'jigs pa chen po zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:190b-12: sngon gyi zhe sdang gi bag chags sdud pa'i gzugs
T02D1197:190b-13: 'bar ba'i rdo rjer lnga'i bdag nyid nam mkha' lnga
T02D1197:190b-14: mchog gi gzugs des 'gro ba lnga 'gog pa ste
