T02D1197:190b-15: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:190b-16: slar yang rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas pa //
T02D1197:190b-17: zhes pa ni mi'i ming can dbus kyi ra'o //
T02D1197:190b-18: h'um de nyid ces pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1197:190b-19: rang bzhin gyi ngo bo rang gi rang bzhin du
T02D1197:190b-20: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon par
T02D1197:190b-22: de ltar de ni yongs su shes pa ni rdo
T02D1197:190b-23: rje dang h'um sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'am rdo
T02D1197:190b-24: rje sems dpar gyur zhes pa ni 'gro ba lnga
T02D1197:190b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig gcig tu byas
T02D1197:190b-26: par blta'o // zhe sdang bdag nyid ces pa ni
T02D1197:190b-27: rgyu dang 'bras bu lhan cig pa gcig gi dngos
T02D1197:190b-28: po mi bskyod pa'i ming can he ru ka zhal
T02D1197:190b-29: gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sku sems can thams cad dang
T02D1197:190b-30: lhan cig pa bsdus pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1197:190b-31: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni lus lhar bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:190b-32: de yang rdo rje lus te dpa' bo che zhes
T02D1197:190b-33: pa ni 'gro ba lnga yang rdo rje la gnas
T02D1197:190b-34: pa'i phyir te / gang gi phyir chos rnams thams cad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:190b-35: de yang mi phyed pas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de /
T02D1197:190b-36: de las bla mar gyur pa 'byung ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyis so //
T02D1197:190b-37: des na rtse lnga dang bcas par lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1197:190b-38: rdo rje de nyid 'gro ba lnga zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:190b-39: to // tshul 'dis rdo rje las skyes pa'i h'um sems dpa'i gzugs mi phyed pa ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:190b-40: rtag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi mi bzad pa'i phyir dpa' bo'o //
T02D1197:190b-41: slar yang 'dam skyes sngon po zhes pa ni khu byug sgra'o //
T02D1197:190b-42: lta bu zhes pa ni kha dog de dang 'dra ba ste nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:191a-2: de yang bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba ma 'khrul pa nyams su myong ba nyid do //
T02D1197:191a-3: yang na don yang rtogs pa'o //
T02D1197:191a-4: des na cung zad dmar snang ba //
T02D1197:191a-5: zhes pa ni ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par
T02D1197:191a-6: 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i phyir sngon po'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:191a-7: cung zad dmar bar snang bar 'dod pa gang yin
T02D1197:191a-8: pa'o // sngon po cung zad dmar bar snang ba
T02D1197:191a-9: 'di ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes pa'i
T02D1197:191a-10: pa'o // don to // dad pas nges par bsgom par bya //
T02D1197:191a-11: zhes pa ni 'dir dus kyi go rim sa bzhin rang nyid 'grub ste /
T02D1197:191a-12: rang gi ngo bo la yongs su rtogs pas so //
T02D1197:191a-13: 'on kyang dad pas bems po nyid kyi de rnams lta ba gzhan rnams la 'jug go //
T02D1197:191a-14: de bzhin du sngon du sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1197:191a-15: sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgom pa la chags pa'i bdag
T02D1197:191a-16: nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa sngon
T02D1197:191a-18: / nges par zhes pa ni gdon mi za bar zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:191a-19: da ni rtsod pa'i dus 'ba' zhig gis rnam par
T02D1197:191a-20: gzhag pa der mchod pa'i rim gro bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1197:191a-21: // nam mkhar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:191a-22: nam mkha' zhes pa ni rtsod pa'i dus ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:191a-23: tshes dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:191a-24: sems can yang de'i rang bzhin de'i tshe de'i bdag
T02D1197:191a-25: nyid kyis nam mkha' rje btsun zhes pa ni bdag
T02D1197:191a-26: nyid sgrub pa'i dus su rdzogs ldan gyi dus sa'i
T02D1197:191a-28: rang gi lus las nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:191a-29: de bzhin du gsum ldan dang gnyis ldan ni chu dang me'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:191a-30: rang gi lus la bsgom pa'i dus su chu dang me nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:191a-31: des na rtsod pa'i dus ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:191a-32: des na nam mkha'i ming du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:191a-33: rang gi lus kyi khams rnams gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:191a-34: des na bcom pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir rje
T02D1197:191a-35: btsun sems kyi dngos po gsal ba'i gzugs dmigs pa
T02D1197:191a-37: bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po dag chu'i zla ba bzhin snang ba'o //
T02D1197:191b-1: rdo rje las skyes zhes gsungs te //
T02D1197:191b-2: des na sngon nyid du bshad zin to //
T02D1197:191b-3: brtse ba chen po zhes pa ni snying rje chen
T02D1197:191b-4: po'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyi sprul pa'i sku 'dzin
T02D1197:191b-5: pa dus phyir bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:191b-6: 'dis mchod par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:191b-7: 'dir mchod pa'i tshig ni bla na med pa'i ye
T02D1197:191b-8: shes bdag gir byed pa'i phan tshun lus kyi dngos
T02D1197:191b-9: po ste / goo r'i ma la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis so //
T02D1197:191b-10: de yang rnam par shes pa rnam par brgyad kyi
T02D1197:191b-11: dngos po dang chos mthun pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so
T02D1197:191b-12: // rgyan thams cad 'dzin pa'i lha mo zhes pa
T02D1197:191b-13: ni rnal 'byor ma rang rang rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:191b-14: khams kyi khyad par gyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D1197:191b-15: khams re re la khams thams cad kyis khyab pa nyid kyis na dngos po'i rgyan te /
T02D1197:191b-16: gzhan yang rgyan nyid ni rang gi bde ba 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes so //
T02D1197:191b-17: de yang goo r'i la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1197:191b-18: des goo r'i'i zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i ngang
T02D1197:191b-19: tshul can gyi byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de
T02D1197:191b-21: ri dags kyis mtshan zhes pa ni ji ltar ri
T02D1197:191b-22: bong gi rgyas btab pa'i zla bde bas rgyas btab
T02D1197:191b-23: pa khu ba de nyid 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1197:191b-24: gang gi rnam par shes pas de 'gro ba la brtson pa'i phyir goo r'i zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:191b-25: de ci ltar mo rtags yin zhe na /
T02D1197:191b-26: rang bzhin gyi dbang gis te sems nyid kyi bden pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa des ni goo r'i'o //
T02D1197:191b-27: de ltar sgra nye bar 'gro ba zhes so //
T02D1197:191b-28: de bzhin du tsoo r'i zhes pa ni g-yo ba'i
T02D1197:191b-29: yid kyis khrag gi khams kyi rang bzhin chags pa
T02D1197:191b-30: chen po des na de nyid 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1197:191b-31: do // nyi ma'i snod ces pa ni de nyi
T02D1197:191b-32: ma'i 'od zer rnams te bde ba rtogs pa'i phyir
T02D1197:191b-33: do // ro // ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba'i
T02D1197:191b-34: dus su yang padma kha zum pa kha bye ba
T02D1197:191b-35: de bzhin du chags pa chen po ma sad pa'i
T02D1197:191b-36: rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi bag
T02D1197:191b-37: chags kyis sad par byed pa de nyid kyi rang
T02D1197:191b-38: gi yan lag can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:191b-39: de bzhin du be t'a l'i zhes pa ni byang
T02D1197:191b-40: chub sems kyi rgyun thag pa bzhin brtan pa'i ming
T02D1197:191b-41: sems dang sems las byung ba'i dngos po rang bzhin
T02D1197:192a-1: chu zhes pa ni 'ju ba'i dngos po de'i rang
T02D1197:192a-2: bzhin 'og dang steng du 'gro ba des 'dzin pa
T02D1197:192a-3: dag gzhan ma yin pa mi bskyod pa'i bde ba
T02D1197:192a-4: mi g-yo ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:192a-5: 'on kyang sems nyid rgyal ba'i gnas skabs skyes pa
T02D1197:192a-6: des mngon du byed par thal ba min pa ni
T02D1197:192a-7: ro langs mo'o // de bzhin du gha sma r'i
T02D1197:192a-8: zhes pa ni sman 'dzin pa ltar rnam par snang
T02D1197:192a-9: mdzad kyi khams 'dzin pa de'i tha mal pa'i dri
T02D1197:192a-10: 'gog pas zos pas phyir lha'i dri 'dzin to //
T02D1197:192a-11: de bzhin du dri tshul yang ngo //
T02D1197:192a-12: gha sma r'i zhes pa ni 'du byed kyi ye
T02D1197:192a-13: shes la 'gro ba mi dran pa'i lha'i ye shes
T02D1197:192a-14: kyi dri 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:192a-15: de bzhin du pukka s'i ni dri'i phyag ces pa
T02D1197:192a-16: ni 'dir khu ba dang khrag dang dri chu dang
T02D1197:192a-17: dri chen gyi khams rnams zad pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:192a-18: sha'i khams su mi 'gyur te ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:192a-19: dri zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i dri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1197:192a-21: khams rnams thams cad zad byed de ;
T02D1197:192a-22: / sna tshogs gzhan yang nam mkhar song //
T02D1197:192a-23: mkha' la ka shi'i me tog bzhin //
T02D1197:192a-24: rtag tu 'khor bar gnas pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:192a-25: de nyid kyis ni dri nam mkha' khyab bar byed
T02D1197:192a-26: de gnas pa med pa yang de lta bur shes
T02D1197:192a-27: par bya'o // de'i phyir ro 'dzin sha ba r'i //
T02D1197:192a-28: zhes pa ni ro yang nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:192a-29: des na de'i bdag nyid kyi r'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa ro bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:192a-30: sha ba r'i zhes pa ni dbugs kyang ro'i rang
T02D1197:192a-31: bzhin ltar rgyu bas khams sna tshogs pa rgyu ba
T02D1197:192a-32: des 'gog pa de thams cad kyang nam mkha'i mtshan
T02D1197:192a-33: nyid du za ba de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1197:192a-34: // de bzhin du tsanda l'i ni cang te'u brdung //
T02D1197:192a-35: zhes pa ni 'dir rnam pa drug du rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa ste /
T02D1197:192a-36: de rnams me'i khams kyis skal pa nye bar mtshon
T02D1197:192a-37: pas aa'i yi ge phyed pa nyid kyis rlung dang
T02D1197:192a-38: rnam par shes pa tha dad pa'i gzugs su 'gyur
T02D1197:192a-39: te / des na rab tu 'bar te /
T02D1197:192a-40: gtum mo'o gzugs kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:192a-42: a'a li zhes par shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:192a-43: de'i tshe mi shigs pa'i sgra skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:192a-44: des na rgyun mi 'chad par brdungs pa'o //
T02D1197:192a-46: da ni nam mkhar 'gro bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:192b-0: nam mkha' yang de @192b bzhin du mi 'chi ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:192b-1: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad de la brten pa nyid kyis na lha'i sgra byed de /
T02D1197:192b-2: kam gi rkyen gyi don bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:192b-3: de nyid kyis na g-yung mos rang gi lus la 'khyud par gsungs so //
T02D1197:192b-4: de yang srog gi rlung rdo rje lta bu ste /
T02D1197:192b-5: khams rnam pa bdun gyi nang du 'dus te /
T02D1197:192b-6: chos rnams la goms pa nyid kyis na de'i go 'phang thob pa'o //
T02D1197:192b-7: 'khyud pa nyid ni med de gzhan du 'khyud pas
T02D1197:192b-8: bstan pa ni bstan pa tsam du byung ba de
T02D1197:192b-10: mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de ltar yang sngon du gsungs pa te /
T02D1197:192b-11: mchod pa zhes pa ni rang la yid ches pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:192b-12: cho ga zhes pa ni gsungs pa gang ngo //
T02D1197:192b-13: rgyas pa zhes pa ni 'dir mdor bsdus pa'i khams bdun gyis so //
T02D1197:192b-14: rgyas par ni khams sna tshogs par yongs su shes
T02D1197:192b-15: pa'i phyir gzhan du rnyed sla bas des na 'dir
T02D1197:192b-16: ma gsungs te / de rnams kyis mchod de ;
T02D1197:192b-17: de yang yang dag par nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
T02D1197:192b-18: gtso bo zhes pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
T02D1197:192b-19: dngos su rang gi lus la yid ches pas ji
T02D1197:192b-20: srid yid ches pa med pa byed kyi bar du
T02D1197:192b-21: bla na med pa'i mchod pa de la de skad
T02D1197:192b-22: ces bya'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:192b-23: pa la de ltar tshig ces pa ni mchod pa'i
T02D1197:192b-24: ces bya'o // tshig go // rnam grol zhes pa
T02D1197:192b-25: ni lus dang lus gnyis med pa'i dngos po gnyis
T02D1197:192b-26: dang bral ba'i lta ba ste sngon bzhin du rigs
T02D1197:192b-27: ces bya'o // tshig go // pa las so // de'i phyir /
T02D1197:192b-28: chos kun bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D1197:192b-29: zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:192b-30: de ltar rtsod pa'i dus ni chos kyi skur rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1197:192b-31: rdzogs ldan gyi dus su ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:192b-32: de bzhin du gsum ldan ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:192b-33: gnyis ldan ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:192b-34: de ltar rtsod pa'i dus la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:192b-35: pa rnams ni chos rnams thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:192b-36: te / de bzhin du slar yang sprul pa'i sku gzung ba'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs pa /
T02D1197:192b-37: a'a li'i zla bas zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T02D1197:192b-38: 'dir sngon du byams pa la sogs pa'i ting nge
T02D1197:192b-39: 'dzin la gnas pa nyid kyis dang po'i smon lam
T02D1197:192b-40: rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rang gi sems nyid las
T02D1197:193a-0: de yang thams cad sems kyi rnam @193a * //
T02D1197:193a-1: 'phrul zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:193a-2: de ltar yang 'di'i yi ge'i don brjod de /
T02D1197:193a-3: a'a lis zla ba zhes pa ni a'a la sogs
T02D1197:193a-4: pa'i yi ge bcu drug yongs su gyur pa ni
T02D1197:193a-5: zla ba'o // de bzhin du k'a lis nyi zhes
T02D1197:193a-6: pa ni ka la sogs pa ha'i mthar thug pa'i
T02D1197:193a-7: yi ge yongs su gyur pa ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1197:193a-8: de ltar me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid
T02D1197:193a-9: kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dag gam mtshan dang
T02D1197:193a-10: dpe byad kyi rang bzhin de dag gi dbus su'o
T02D1197:193a-11: // sa bon zhes pa ni h'um zhes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:193a-12: de ltar bsam par bya zhes pa ni sngon gyi rnam par rtog pa'ang shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:193a-13: yang nges pa'i don ni a'a lis 'jug pa'i rang
T02D1197:193a-14: bzhin te 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir zla ba'o
T02D1197:193a-15: // de bzhin du k'a lis 'gro ba'i rang bzhin te 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir nyi ma'o //
T02D1197:193a-16: de dag sngon du 'grog [*'grogs] pas sems la brten pa'i h'um gis bon no //
T02D1197:193a-17: de yang rang gi rang bzhin rmi lam bzhin du lta'o //
T02D1197:193a-18: de nyid kyis na de nyid sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:193a-19: de nyid ces pa ni h'um sems kyi sa bon no //
T02D1197:193a-20: sems pa zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan
T02D1197:193a-21: nyid de sems can thams cad kyi brtan pa dang
T02D1197:193a-22: g-yo ba rnams la khyab par byed pa nyid kyis
T02D1197:193a-23: sems pa'o // brjod ces pa ni ye shes dang
T02D1197:193a-24: shes bya dag dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir
T02D1197:193a-25: sems pa'o // ro // yang na brjod ces pa ni yid tshim par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:193a-26: de nyid kyis na de nyid mchog tu dga' ba'i
T02D1197:193a-27: rang bzhin zhes pa ni sad pa'i gnas skabs las
T02D1197:193a-28: rmi lam gyi gnas skabs shes par byed do //
T02D1197:193a-29: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs gzung bas bkug pa'i chos kyi
T02D1197:193a-30: sku nyid nyal ba'i gnas skabs sgrub par byed pa'o
T02D1197:193a-31: // de la rmi lam gyi gnas skabs kyang longs
T02D1197:193a-32: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya
T02D1197:193a-33: de'i phyir yang sprul pa'i sku bzhi pa las 'das
T02D1197:193a-34: par bsgrub par bya zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:193a-35: des na rang lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:193a-36: ni mi 'dor bzhin du yang rnam par shes pa'i
T02D1197:193a-38: rang lus las zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1197:193b-0: kyi rdo rje'i lus las mi dmigs pa'i @193b phyir
T02D1197:193b-1: nam mkha' las glog 'byung ba de bzhin du 'od
T02D1197:193b-3: slar yang snying gar bsdus bkug nas //
T02D1197:193b-4: zhes pa ni 'od zer de rnams ni mar me'i
T02D1197:193b-5: rtse mo bzhin nang du thim par gyur pa gsal
T02D1197:193b-6: snang bzhin mthong ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir
T02D1197:193b-7: yod pa'o // des na rnal 'byor zhes pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i sems so //
T02D1197:193b-8: zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur zhes pa ni dngos po
T02D1197:193b-9: dang dngos po med pa'i mi bskyod pa'i khams kyi
T02D1197:193b-10: rang bzhin no // 'gyur zhes pa ni de ltar zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:193b-11: des na snying gar zhes pa ni gnyes med pa'i ye shes nyid kyis gcig tu byas pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:193b-12: de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:193b-13: pa la rtsod pa'i dus kyi rkyen gyis 'byung ba
T02D1197:193b-16: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1197:193b-17: sprul pa dag las bzhi pa las 'das pa'i khyad
T02D1197:193b-18: par gyi ye shes kyi sku skyed par byed pas
T02D1197:193b-19: so // nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa ni mi bskyod
T02D1197:193b-20: pa phra mo chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin phyag
T02D1197:193b-21: rgya chen po nyid kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi
T02D1197:193b-22: gzugs dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1197:193b-23: pa gong na med pa thog ma dang dbus dang
T02D1197:193b-24: mtha' mar gnas pa rtag pa zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:193b-25: so // // de yis yid ches pa'i bdag nyid phyi'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gzugs so //
T02D1197:193b-26: de nyid kyi las kyi phyag rgya dang 'dus pas phyag rgya chen po mthong ngo zhes so //
T02D1197:193b-27: des na phul du byung ba'i 'dod chags kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes thob kyi /
T02D1197:193b-28: nyan thos la sogs pas yongs su brtags pa'i shes
T02D1197:193b-29: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes ni
T02D1197:193b-30: ma yin snyam du dgongs so //
T02D1197:193b-32: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02D1197:193b-33: zhes pa ni 'dod chags kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gsal ba'i dngos por 'gyur te /
T02D1197:193b-34: gang gis sems can thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:193b-35: des na der zhes pa ni rgyu de na rnal 'byor sgom pa byed pa ste /
T02D1197:193b-36: lhan cig skyes pa'i he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:193b-38: der ni h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:194a-0: h'um ni sngon du rdo rje @194a * //
T02D1197:194a-1: lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste /
T02D1197:194a-2: dngos po de las kyang sems gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:194a-4: skyes pa sngon po cung zad dmar 'dra bar //
T02D1197:194a-5: zhes pa nyid du bstan zin to //
T02D1197:194a-6: rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa zhes pa ni rang
T02D1197:194a-7: nyid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams kyis brgyan zhing
T02D1197:194a-8: bya ba rnams kyis brgyan te /
T02D1197:194a-9: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi
T02D1197:194a-10: rang gi bag chags rnams kyis rdzogs ldan gyi dus
T02D1197:194a-11: su sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams kyis brgyan pa'i
T02D1197:194a-13: sngon gyi bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis so //
T02D1197:194a-14: de bzhin du phyag gnyis zhes pa ni de'i dus
T02D1197:194a-15: su gnyis kyis dngos po med de des na de
T02D1197:194a-16: 'dzin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:194a-17: zhal gcig ces pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa 'ba' zhig la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02D1197:194a-18: de bzhin du spyan gsum zhes pa ni theg pa gsum la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:194a-20: skra ni ser po gyen brdzes dang //
T02D1197:194a-21: zhes pa ni ldem po sna tshogs pa nyid kyis
T02D1197:194a-22: sngags kyi theg pa chen po gcig tu mthar phyin
T02D1197:194a-23: pa'o // des na dang ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:194a-24: de bzhin du gdugs ltar zhes pa ni srid pa
T02D1197:194a-25: gsum sdud cing za ba la sogs pa'i lta ba'o
T02D1197:194a-26: // brgyad gnyis lo'i tshad ces pa ni lo'i bcu drug ste /
T02D1197:194a-27: gzugs khams bcu drug gi lha'i gnas rnams kyi tshe ru yongs su brtag pa'o //
T02D1197:194a-28: rdzogs ldan gyi dus der mngon shes dang ldan pa
T02D1197:194a-29: lhun gyis grub pa 'byung ba'i sems can rnams gcig
T02D1197:194a-30: la gcig mthong ba'i stobs kyis nus pa skyes te
T02D1197:194a-31: / gang gi phyir thams cad nyid yongs su dag
T02D1197:194a-32: pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir zhes pa ste nges pa'o
T02D1197:194a-33: / // de bzhin du yang 'jigs byed zhabs kyis
T02D1197:194a-34: mnan zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa dam
T02D1197:194a-35: pa gcig gi mtshan nyid mnan te /
T02D1197:194a-36: de'i rang bzhin gyis na 'bras bu'i dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:194a-37: des na phyag g-yon pa ni kha tvam ga zhes
T02D1197:194a-38: pa ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa kun gyi
T02D1197:194a-39: mchog dang ldan pa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
T02D1197:194a-40: med pa ston par byed par dgongs so //
T02D1197:194a-41: thod pa yang ni bsnams pa ste //
T02D1197:194a-42: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyang thod pa'i ming can te /
T02D1197:194b-1: de yang brdzun pa dang bdag tu 'dzin pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1197:194b-2: g-yon na zhes pa ni song ba'i don ston pa'o //
T02D1197:194b-4: g-yon du rdo rje nag po bsnams //
T02D1197:194b-5: zhes pa ni de'i dus su byung ba'i sems can
T02D1197:194b-6: thams cad kyi rang gi rang bzhin mthong bas te
T02D1197:194b-7: / rdo rje zhes pa ni sgom pa la gnas pa nyid kyi sems so //
T02D1197:194b-8: nag po zhes pa ni snying rje'o //
T02D1197:194b-9: de ltar mthong bas sad pa de'i skad cig gnyis
T02D1197:194b-10: la mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar 'gro ste
T02D1197:194b-11: / gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:194b-12: de bzhin du yang h'um zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1197:194b-13: la 'don pa'i bdag ces pa ni de ltar rnal
T02D1197:194b-14: 'byor pa rnams kyi bsgom pa dang bral ba'i dus
T02D1197:194b-15: su rang bzhin sna tshogs pa spangs pa'i phyir h'um
T02D1197:194b-16: zhes pa 'don pa ni dngos po thams cad spangs
T02D1197:194b-17: pa 'ba' zhig gi sems tsam de la de skad
T02D1197:194b-18: ces bya'o // gtso bo dur khrod du ni rol //
T02D1197:194b-19: zhes pa ni dbugs gnas pas na dur khrod do //
T02D1197:194b-22: ro yi yon tan dbugs de rnams //
T02D1197:194b-24: yid kyi sa 'khrul pa rgyas pa nyid //
T02D1197:194b-25: sha / bags kyis des rnams rdzogs ldan gyi //
T02D1197:194b-27: dus su mi yi mchog ni 'gro //
T02D1197:194b-28: de yi phyir ni rol pa thabs //
T02D1197:194b-29: dus 'dir ru ni sems kyis sprul //
T02D1197:194b-30: de nyid rol mo der mgon po //
T02D1197:194b-31: sems can rnams kyi sems zhugs pa'o //
T02D1197:194b-33: dbugs dbyung zhes pa'i rigs 'di yis //
T02D1197:194b-34: dur khrod ces su brjod pa'i yin //
T02D1197:194b-36: shva / rang gi padma'i snod la ste //
T02D1197:194b-37: snying gar gsang ba lnga la ni //
T02D1197:194b-38: sbyor ba yi ni gnas skabs lnga //
T02D1197:194b-39: zad pa'i mtshams su rim gyis 'byung //
T02D1197:194b-41: ro langs rnams ni rgyu ba ste //
T02D1197:194b-42: 'og / du ma la sogs shi ba brgyad //
T02D1197:194b-43: de bzhin lce brgyad shes par bya //
T02D1197:194b-44: rtsa brgyad nyid ni 'bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:194b-46: me gnon po yis rab gdungs pas //
T02D1197:194b-47: gnas mtshams su ni des na dpa' //
T02D1197:194b-49: mi rtog dga' ba ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02D1197:194b-50: tya ni gar byed dpa' bo ste //
T02D1197:194b-51: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams //
T02D1197:194b-52: bsreg la sogs pa'i gnas brten te //
T02D1197:194b-53: rang lus rig pa'i bde ba'i bdag / n+ya ni rjes su gzung ba'i don //
T02D1197:194b-54: mnyes pa yang ni shes rab phyir //
T02D1197:195a-2: skrag pas bdag gi rtag tu gsad //
T02D1197:195a-4: der ni gang su rung mkha' 'gro //
T02D1197:195a-5: sna tshogs rtsar ni yongs brtags phyir //
T02D1197:195a-6: 'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrogs pas za //
T02D1197:195a-7: yid can rnams kyi rang 'dod pa'o //
T02D1197:195a-9: rnal 'byor pa ni lang cho'i tshogs //
T02D1197:195a-10: de yi dbus su 'ongs nas ni //
T02D1197:195a-11: gzhan gyi lus la rol par byed //
T02D1197:195a-12: nus pa yi ni rang bzhin mchog / k'a ni rnam gsum shes bya ste //
T02D1197:195a-13: bya rog bya bzhin 'ug pa rnams //
T02D1197:195a-14: gang ci'ang rung ba'i sems spangs pa'i //
T02D1197:195a-15: sha ni de rnams thams cad za //
T02D1197:195a-16: sha / stan la 'gyel ba'i ro rnams ni ;
T02D1197:195a-17: / khu ba btung bas rgyal ba'o //
T02D1197:195a-19: tsheg tsheg ces 'bar dbus su ni //
T02D1197:195a-20: thod pa can ni nges par gzung //
T02D1197:195a-21: sha / phyogs kyi gos can rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1197:195a-22: ro yi rnam pas gar byed do //
T02D1197:195a-23: blo ldan gzung dang 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1197:195a-24: chang ni phan tshun 'thung bar byed //
T02D1197:195a-26: shi ba khyer bzhin pa yi ni //
T02D1197:195a-27: sems ni rnal 'byor ma sdug pa'o //
T02D1197:195a-28: zad byed kyis ni mes bsregs nas //
T02D1197:195a-29: mkha' spyod nyid du nges par 'gro //
T02D1197:195a-31: lha lnga la sogs rol mo rnams //
T02D1197:195a-34: phung po'i bud shing tsam yang ngo //
T02D1197:195a-36: zhig pa'i lus las skyes pa yi //
T02D1197:195a-37: rnam shes lus ni thams cad 'gro //
T02D1197:195a-38: lan bdun 'khor pa'i khams rnams kyi //
T02D1197:195a-39: des ni nyi ma bdun par brtags //
T02D1197:195a-41: lha yi mngon shes sngon 'gro bas //
T02D1197:195a-42: brtan pa nyid ni yang dag 'thob //
T02D1197:195a-43: byang chub brgyud pas bag chags ni //
T02D1197:195a-44: 'dir ni slar yang sdud par byed //
T02D1197:195a-46: sems kyi bag chags bzang po yis //
T02D1197:195a-47: 'dir ni gshin rje skyong bar byed //
T02D1197:195a-48: zab mo'i chos ni bstan thos pas //
T02D1197:195a-49: chu bo chen po'i pha rol 'gro //
T02D1197:195a-51: de rnams yang ni skyes nas su //
T02D1197:195a-52: srid pa'i rgya mtsho brtse bzhin pas //
T02D1197:195a-53: sems can rnams kyi lus brtan te //
T02D1197:195a-54: thams cad du ni skyob par byed //
T02D1197:195a-55: de bzhin du lha mo brgyad ces pa ni /
T02D1197:195a-56: goo r'i sogs pas bskor te rol pa'o //
T02D1197:195a-58: goo r'i gzugs kyi phung por 'gyur //
T02D1197:195a-59: chom rkun ma ni tshor bar brjod //
T02D1197:195a-60: ro langs ma ni 'du shes nyid //
T02D1197:195b-0: de @195b bzhin za phod ma 'du byed //
T02D1197:195b-1: rnam shes phung po'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D1197:195b-2: bcom ldan 'das su yongs su brtags //
T02D1197:195b-3: pukka s'i ni sa nyid de //
T02D1197:195b-4: ri khrod chu yi khams su brtags //
T02D1197:195b-5: gtum mo me ru shes par bya //
T02D1197:195b-6: g-yung mo rlung du rab tu brtags //
T02D1197:195b-7: bdag med nam mkha'i khams su'o //
T02D1197:195b-8: de ltar khams rnams dang mnyam pas //
T02D1197:195b-9: sangs rgyas 'byung ba brjod mi lang //
T02D1197:195b-10: 'gro ba'i gnyen gyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1197:195b-12: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:195b-13: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:195b-14: dbang po rtul po'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1197:195b-15: rnal 'byor kun gyi bdud rtsi mchog / ces pa ni /
T02D1197:195b-16: 'bring dang chen po la sogs pa rnal 'byor thams
T02D1197:195b-17: cad kyi nang nas las dang po pa dang po
T02D1197:195b-18: slob ma rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog bdud rtsi dang
T02D1197:195b-19: 'dra ba bdud rtsi bzhin thams cad la khyab par
T02D1197:195b-20: byed pa po mi zad par byed pa'i phyir bdud
T02D1197:195b-21: rtsi lta bu mi 'jigs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
T02D1197:195b-23: des na mchog ni gnyis med pa'i dngos por mi 'dod pa'o //
T02D1197:195b-24: de ltar rtsod pa dang rdzogs ldan gyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:195b-25: 'on kyang rtsod pa'i dus su yang gal te dbang
T02D1197:195b-26: po 'bring dang chen po'i rnal 'byor par 'gyur pa
T02D1197:195b-27: de'i tshe 'di nyid la rang nyid kyi dngos grub
T02D1197:195b-29: de lta mod kyi rnam pa dang bcas pa'i sgom
T02D1197:195b-30: pa lhag par mos pas so zhes pa ni nges
T02D1197:195b-31: pa'o // da ni gsum ldan gyi nges par brjod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:195b-32: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:195b-33: de nyid ces pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i phyag
T02D1197:195b-34: rgya gnyis pa'i he ru ka rnal 'byor pa de
T02D1197:195b-35: nyid bcom ldan 'das te bsgom pa gsal bas bcom
T02D1197:195b-37: des na rnal 'byor pa zhes pa ni sgyu ma'i
T02D1197:195b-38: rnam pa gnyis kyis sna tshogs kyi don byed pa'i
T02D1197:195b-39: phyir sems can grangs med pa rnams snying rje'i sgo
T02D1197:195b-40: nas lus gsum ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1197:195b-41: de rnams kyis gangs rgyas rnyed pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:195b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1197:195b-44: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid he ru ka'i gzugs sngon nas dmigs par nges pa'o //
T02D1197:196a-1: na rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1197:196a-2: bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa zad par ma gyur
T02D1197:196a-3: pa'o // sems dpa' ni rigs te de rnams la
T02D1197:196a-4: rigs gcig gis khyab par byed pa nyid kyis ni
T02D1197:196a-6: yang sems dpa' zhes pa ni dus bzhi'i nang du
T02D1197:196a-7: thim pa rtag pa'i gzugs des grub pa'i sna tshogs
T02D1197:196a-8: la khyab par byed pa chos kyi sku dbyer mi
T02D1197:196a-10: de nyid rtag pa'i gzugs chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:196a-11: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1197:196a-12: rnal 'byor pa las gzhan dngos po med ces pa'i
T02D1197:196a-13: don to // des na khro bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:196a-14: 'dir bsgom pa'i dus su yang rang bzhin gyis snying
T02D1197:196a-15: rje ba des na gsum ldan gyi sems can yang
T02D1197:196a-16: cung zad khro bo'i gzugs can yin pa de na
T02D1197:196a-17: de rnams gdul ba'i don du'o //
T02D1197:196a-18: khro bo'i gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog / ces pa ni snying rje chen po las /
T02D1197:196a-19: khro bo chen po'i dngos po mngon du gnas //
T02D1197:196a-20: zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D1197:196a-21: de bzhin du phyag bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:196a-22: g-yon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:196a-23: thod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems te /
T02D1197:196a-25: 'on kyang chos rnams thams cad gsog go //
T02D1197:196a-26: sngon du yang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs kyi
T02D1197:196a-27: dus su dge ba'am mi dge ba gang yang byas
T02D1197:196a-29: des na thod pa'i mtshan mas sems can rnams sad par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:196a-30: lha dang lha min gyi khrag gis gang ba'i thod
T02D1197:196a-31: pa zhes pa ni gsum ldan gyi dus der lta
T02D1197:196a-32: dang lha ma yin rtsod par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:196a-34: de rnams kyis thod pa mthong ba'i phyir rang gi sems dran par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:196a-35: de las byung ba'i chags pa'i sems de nyid dang bral te /
T02D1197:196a-36: de ltar ma rungs pa'i sems dang chags pa dag
T02D1197:196a-37: par rnam par bcom pa'i phyir khyad par can du
T02D1197:196a-39: de bzhin du g-yas su zhes pa ni zhe sdang 'jigs par byed pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:196a-40: de yang 'bar ba'i bzhin te 'bar ba'i gzugs so //
T02D1197:196a-41: gang gi phyir zhes sdang gi me ni ye shes
T02D1197:196a-42: kyi mes 'joms pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1197:196b-0: // de bzhin du gzhan @196b zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:196b-1: sogs pa la phag mo bcom ldan gzugs can zhes
T02D1197:196b-2: pa ni 'dir shes rab ni shes bya'i rnam pa'o
T02D1197:196b-3: // // des ni sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i shes bya'i blo nye bar 'gro ba ste /
T02D1197:196b-4: ji ltar bdag de ltar sems can //
T02D1197:196b-6: des na bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can te /
T02D1197:196b-7: sems can thams cad de'i bdag nyid du bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:196b-8: bsgom par zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1197:196b-9: bya zhes pa ni de ltar gsungs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:196b-10: da ni gnyis ldan gyi nye bar spyod pa bstan
T02D1197:196b-11: pa'i phyir dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:196b-12: gsungs te // stong nyid ces pa ni chos kyi
T02D1197:196b-13: sku'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyed pa dang longs spyod
T02D1197:196b-14: rdzogs pa gnyis las byung ba 'dres pa'i chos gnyis
T02D1197:196b-15: ldan gyis dus su stong pa chos kyi sku'i ming
T02D1197:196b-16: can du sngon du gsungs te /
T02D1197:196b-17: des na dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pas dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'am /
T02D1197:196b-18: stong pa nyid tsam bsgoms pas so //
T02D1197:196b-19: de nyid kyi lte ba'i cha med pa la zhes
T02D1197:196b-20: pa ni dam tshigs sems dpa' de'i snying gi 'dab
T02D1197:196b-21: ma brgyad kyi lte ba'i dbus su ye shes kyi
T02D1197:196b-22: rang bzhin gyi yi ge aa ste /
T02D1197:196b-23: de yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1197:196b-24: rtsa g-yon pa'i srog rgyu ba'i dus su aa ba dh'u t'i la //
T02D1197:196b-25: dmigs pas srog thams cad 'gag par 'gyur te rtsa
T02D1197:196b-26: thams cad kyi gcig pa nyid kyis srogs dang lhan
T02D1197:196b-27: cig ri bong can 'ongs nas aa ba dh'u t'i'i
T02D1197:196b-28: dbus su gnas pa de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi ming
T02D1197:196b-29: du brjod de / de'i dbus su gnas pa'i h'um
T02D1197:196b-30: ye shes kyi ming can rang rig pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:196b-32: de la yang sngon du gsungs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02D1197:196b-33: snying gar ye shes sems dpa' de dang 'dra ba
T02D1197:196b-34: zhal gsum phyag drug pa spyan gsum pa zhal g-yon
T02D1197:196b-35: dmar po g-yas dkar po cung zad dmar bar snang
T02D1197:196b-36: ba zhal dbus ma sngon po sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D1197:196b-37: khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid kyi ro mnan pa /
T02D1197:196b-38: phyag rnams pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1197:196b-39: phyag g-yon pa'i dang po la rtse gsum /
T02D1197:196b-41: de bzhin du phyag g-yas kyi dang po na rdo rje //
T02D1197:196b-42: gnyis pa na gri gug go //
T02D1197:197a-0: lhag ma phyag gnyis kyis shes rab ma @197a * //
T02D1197:197a-1: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can ma la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1197:197a-2: de'i g-yas dang g-yon na gri gug dang thod pa'o //
T02D1197:197a-3: zhal gsum yang chags pa chen po dang zhe sdang chen po dang gti mug chen po'o //
T02D1197:197a-4: de yang gnyis ldan gyi dus kyi gti mug chen
T02D1197:197a-5: po las lhan cig skyes pa dang longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1197:197a-6: pa dang chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid sems can bsam
T02D1197:197a-7: pa sna tshogs pa rnams te /
T02D1197:197a-8: de yang gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i don bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:197a-9: da ni slar yang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi ming
T02D1197:197a-10: can zab ming rgya che ba'i mchog rdo rje sems
T02D1197:197a-11: dpa' sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1197:197a-13: de ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:197a-14: der zhes pa ni padma'i lte ba'i dbus su h'um bsgoms pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:197a-15: de ltar sems kyis bon ye shes kyi rnam pa
T02D1197:197a-16: ni me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin rang bzhin gyis
T02D1197:197a-17: dri ma med par snang ste /
T02D1197:197a-18: ji ltar chu dang ba'i nang du nya skye ba
T02D1197:197a-19: de bzhin du sems gsal ba las sems las byung
T02D1197:197a-20: ba h'um gi rnam pa bsal ba rkyen gyis bdag
T02D1197:197a-21: nyid rgyud dang 'bras bu'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:197a-22: de bzhin du bsgom par bya zhes pa ni padma'i
T02D1197:197a-23: lte bar a'a li dang k'a li kha sbyor gyi
T02D1197:197a-24: dbus su h'um las rdo rje de'i lte bar h'um
T02D1197:197a-25: gi 'od zer rnam pa lnga nam mkha'i ngos su
T02D1197:197a-26: 'phros te / 'od zer de rnams kyis lha'i tshogs
T02D1197:197a-27: bkug la sa bon de nyid du bsdu bar bya'o
T02D1197:197a-28: 'phros te / // de ltar mtha' dag yongs su
T02D1197:197a-29: gyur pa las bdag nyid lha'i gzugs su blta ste
T02D1197:197a-30: 'phros te / // / zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:197a-32: / slar yang nges pa'i don gsungs pa 'dir gnyis
T02D1197:197a-33: ldan las rtsod dus sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1197:197a-34: de nyid dus dus su 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:197a-35: de yang sngon bsgoms pa goms pa dang sngon du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis te /
T02D1197:197a-36: des na sangs rgyas rnams mngal du rim gyis 'jug par brjod do //
T02D1197:197a-37: 'dis ni padma 'dab ma brgyad par zhes pa ma'i skyes gnas su'o //
T02D1197:197a-38: de'i rang bzhin gyi kha dog ni rang bzhin gyi
T02D1197:197a-39: phyag rgya lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma dkar
T02D1197:197a-40: mo'i bsam gtan la rtag tu chags pa'o //
T02D1197:197a-41: de yang rnam pa brgyad de 'di lta ste /
T02D1197:197b-0: zhing brgyad du ni rtsa ni @197b brgyad //
T02D1197:197b-1: rtsa brgyad kyi ni sna ni gnas //
T02D1197:197b-2: de nyid ri bong can rab rdzogs //
T02D1197:197b-3: rtag tu mi 'dzag par ni gnas //
T02D1197:197b-5: dkar po'i bsam gtan yang dag spyod //
T02D1197:197b-6: rtsa ni re re yin ni grangs //
T02D1197:197b-7: rnal 'byor dus su brjod pa yin //
T02D1197:197b-8: des na rnam pa brgyad yin te //
T02D1197:197b-9: skad cig kyang ni rnam pa brgyad //
T02D1197:197b-10: de ni thun ni brgyad po nyid //
T02D1197:197b-11: dus bsdu ba ni sngon 'gro ba'o //
T02D1197:197b-12: dus rnams kyang ni gza' brgyad de //
T02D1197:197b-13: de rnams bsdus pa nag po nyid //
T02D1197:197b-14: de ltar bsam gtan chags de yang //
T02D1197:197b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid //
T02D1197:197b-16: des na sprul pa'i dngos por 'gyur //
T02D1197:197b-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum rgyu ma /
T02D1197:197b-18: dben pa ma yin brdzun ma yin //
T02D1197:197b-20: de'i zla ba zhes pa ni padma'i rigs can gyi bha bzang mor dgongs so //
T02D1197:197b-21: de bzhin du der ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:197b-22: de'i zhes pa ni sngon du bstan te /
T02D1197:197b-23: de bzhin du sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis de bzhin
T02D1197:197b-24: gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las
T02D1197:197b-25: gyur pa ni bsam gtan du 'dus pa'i phyir sgyu
T02D1197:197b-26: ma nyid sgyu ma chen po sngon du gsungs pas
T02D1197:197b-27: sems can rnams la snying rje'i dbang gis mi 'dod
T02D1197:197b-29: de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi stabs kyis bsgrubs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sems de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:197b-30: de ltar bsgom par bya zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:197b-31: rjes su 'jug pa de ci zhe na /
T02D1197:197b-32: gsungs pa sems las byung ba 'dir 'gyur te /
T02D1197:197b-33: der pha dang ma yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir
T02D1197:197b-34: h'um zhes pa ni dri za nye bar 'khor gyi
T02D1197:197b-35: sems can gyi ming can no //
T02D1197:197b-36: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni der gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:197b-37: de yang lha'i gzugs zhes pa ni pha dang ma
T02D1197:197b-38: yang dag par sbyor bas rang rigs pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:197b-39: te / bsrub pa dang bsrubs pa las kun gzhi
T02D1197:197b-40: rnam par shes pa 'jug pa de dang lhan cig
T02D1197:197b-42: de yang zhal gsum pa zhes pa ni khrag dang
T02D1197:197b-43: khu ba dag gi dbus su dang po nag po
T02D1197:197b-44: zhes pa rlung dang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:197b-45: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1197:197b-46: de bzhin du g-yas dkar po ni khu ba'o //
T02D1197:198a-1: pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:198a-2: g-yon dmar ba lta bu zhes pa ni khrag gi khams so //
T02D1197:198a-3: de bzhin du spyan gsum zhe pa ni zhal gsum la spyan dgu'o //
T02D1197:198a-4: de yang rtsa dgu skyes pa'i dus su sa dgu mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:198a-5: mdzes pa'i gzugs zhes pa nis bcu pa chos kyi sprin no //
T02D1197:198a-6: de ltar yang de rnam la srogs la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:198a-7: rlung sum cu 'byung ba de la de skad ces
T02D1197:198a-8: bya'o // de'i phyir phyag drug ces pa ni lus la khams drug rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1197:198a-10: ma las gyur pa rnam pa gsum //
T02D1197:198a-11: de bzhin pha las gyur pa gsum //
T02D1197:198a-12: sbubs drug gi ni gong bu 'di //
T02D1197:198a-13: lus kyi khams su btags pa yin //
T02D1197:198a-15: pags pa sha dang de bzhin khrag / ma yi g-yon gyi phyag ni gsum //
T02D1197:198a-16: de bzhin rus pa tshil rgyus pa //
T02D1197:198a-17: pha yi g-yas kyi phyag ni gsum //
T02D1197:198a-18: rgyan rnams kun ni rab tu rdzogs //
T02D1197:198a-19: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1197:198a-20: 'on kyang sa bcu gcig pa kun du 'ongs sangs rgyas kyi sa ste des brgyan pa'o //
T02D1197:198a-22: sngon du gsungs pa'i mnyam nyid gzugs //
T02D1197:198a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa las rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:198a-24: thod pa'i gdan zhes pa ni chos rnams thams cad
T02D1197:198a-25: kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' gnyis med
T02D1197:198a-26: pa'i rnam pa'o // des na thod pa'i gdan no //
T02D1197:198a-28: ka ni gang na yang chos med do //
T02D1197:198a-29: p'a ni ye shes me yis rtag tu bsregs //
T02D1197:198a-31: rnyed dang ma rnyed rnam par spangs //
T02D1197:198a-33: lhan cig skyes rnams ngo bo yis //
T02D1197:198a-35: mi ni sprul pa'i gzugs can te //
T02D1197:198a-37: dar ni rdzogs sangs rgyas bzhugs so //
T02D1197:198a-39: mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid bzhugs //
T02D1197:198a-41: de ru chos ni rtag tu rigs /
T02D1197:198a-42: de mngon tshig nyid mtshon par bya //
T02D1197:198a-44: dngos po thams cad brtags nas ni //
T02D1197:198a-46: bag chags gzang po sngon 'gro ba //
T02D1197:198a-48: snang ba rtsam la dmigs pa ni //
T02D1197:198a-50: byang chub sngon 'gro'i rgyu phyir ro //
T02D1197:198a-52: ro bzhin chen rnams thams cad la //
T02D1197:198a-54: yang dag ye shes rtogs byed pa'o //
T02D1197:198a-56: rdzogs pa'i zla ba bzhin du blta //
T02D1197:198b-0: de ltar mngal @198b na brten pa yi //
T02D1197:198b-1: rol mo bdag gi don spangs nyid //
T02D1197:198b-2: bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub rim //
T02D1197:198b-3: bag chags de nyid byis rnams la //
T02D1197:198b-5: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D1197:198b-6: mi 'dod sems can bya ba rnams //
T02D1197:198b-7: mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'byung //
T02D1197:198b-8: sangs rgyas de rnams rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1197:198b-9: mi smra dbang po rnams ni thul //
T02D1197:198b-10: de bzhin bshad dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:198b-11: sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu de rnams
T02D1197:198b-12: la bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba dang
T02D1197:198b-14: des na gang ba'i thod pa phyag na bsnams //
T02D1197:198b-15: zhes pa ni khams bzhi po aa ba dh'u t'i'i nang du 'bab ste /
T02D1197:198b-17: de nyid kyis na mda' gzhu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:198b-18: gzhu zhes pa ni srog gi rtsa ra sa n'a'o //
T02D1197:198b-19: de'i rgyud ni thur sel gyi rtsal la n'a'o //
T02D1197:198b-20: de dag rnam par 'dzin pa'i phyir aa ba dh'u t'i mdas thig le 'ben la bsnun no //
T02D1197:198b-21: de'i tshe rdo rje dril bu zhes pa ni mi
T02D1197:198b-22: shigs ba'i tsam rang rig pa dbyer med pa'i ye
T02D1197:198b-23: shes thob pa tham cad du 'dzin pa de la
T02D1197:198b-25: de ltar yang dang po rdo rje 'bar ba zhes
T02D1197:198b-26: pa ni drang don du phyag g-yas na rdo rje
T02D1197:198b-27: bsnams pa'o // nges pa'i don du dang po goms
T02D1197:198b-28: pa'i dus su gtum mo'i rnal 'byor ba'i phyir zhes
T02D1197:198b-29: bsnams pa'o // dgongs so // 'dir gsungs pa /
T02D1197:198b-30: gzhu ni g-yas kyi srog yin te //
T02D1197:198b-31: de bzhin ra sa n'a yi rgyud //
T02D1197:198b-32: thur sel la la n'a 'gog nyid //
T02D1197:198b-34: aa ba dh'u t'i'i mda' nyid do //
T02D1197:198b-35: thig le rdzogs pa rna ltag mtha' //
T02D1197:198b-36: 'ben dang 'ben ni med par gzhig / dril bu'i sgra ni des bshad de //
T02D1197:198b-37: rgyud btang ba ni sgra tsam 'di //
T02D1197:198b-38: des na mi shigs sus ni 'di //
T02D1197:198b-39: sangs rgyas mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:198b-40: goms pa'i sbyor ba zhes pas ni //
T02D1197:198b-41: de nas khams ni bzhir rgyu'o //
T02D1197:198b-43: lte ba'i dbus kyi me thab tu //
T02D1197:198b-44: rdo rje me ni mngon ldang ste //
T02D1197:198b-45: rkan gyi bu ga ru ni 'gro //
T02D1197:198b-46: de ru khams rnams bsregs nas ni //
T02D1197:198b-47: gzhan yang thal ba lta bur gnas /
T02D1197:198b-49: ro ni nam mkha'i ming can te //
T02D1197:199a-0: @199a * // de yang ye shes bdud rtsir brjod //
T02D1197:199a-1: byang chub sems ni bde chen po //
T02D1197:199a-2: lte ba'i rtsa ba ru ni lang //
T02D1197:199a-3: phyag rgya bzang mo'i phyir rgyal nyid //
T02D1197:199a-4: chu shing snying po zhes bya ba //
T02D1197:199a-5: phyag rgya med cing khams kyang med //
T02D1197:199a-6: sems kyi sbyong ba 'di dag ni //
T02D1197:199a-8: de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas dpa' bos //
T02D1197:199a-9: byang chub sems ni sa bon bsgrub pas //
T02D1197:199a-10: de bzhin du mdung rtse gsum zhes pa ni mi shes pa gsum zad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:199a-11: de bzhin du shes rab 'khyud ces pa ni khrag
T02D1197:199a-12: dang khu ba'i rang bzhin phyag gnyis po de la
T02D1197:199a-13: brten pa de yang khrag ni snying rje chen po'o
T02D1197:199a-14: // de bzhin du khu ba ni chags pa chen po'o //
T02D1197:199a-15: rang bzhin gnyis med cing gnyis med pa'i dngos po 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:199a-16: de nyid kyis na dpal ldan zhes pa ni gyi sgra ni mi bcad pa'i dngos po ste /
T02D1197:199a-18: ldan zhes pa ni de lta bu du dang ldan zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:199a-19: ral pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni bems po'i 'jig rten 'khor lo can du bya ba dang /
T02D1197:199a-20: sems can gya gyu can bcing ba'i phyir ral pa'i thor tshugs can te /
T02D1197:199a-21: gang gi phyir dang po'i sems can sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir cod pan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1197:199a-22: de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:199a-23: ni sems kyi 'od zer gyis sems can gyi don
T02D1197:199a-24: bya ba'i phyir // mngal du gnas nas kyang sngon
T02D1197:199a-25: gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis bems po ma yin
T02D1197:199a-26: pa'i khams 'di gsal bar spro ba'o //
T02D1197:199a-28: gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la nyal ba bzhin gnas mod /
T02D1197:199a-29: 'on kyang rmi lam bzhin sad pa'i gnas skabs mi 'dor ro //
T02D1197:199a-31: 'od gsal la gnas sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1197:199a-32: shin tu gnyid log ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1197:199a-33: 'on kyang sad pa'i gnas skabs ni //
T02D1197:199a-35: ji ltar sems dang sems byung rnams //
T02D1197:199a-36: rnam par brtags na mi dmigs te /
T02D1197:199a-37: de ltar der ni yid ches te //
T02D1197:199a-38: mun pa la ni mar me bzhin //
T02D1197:199a-39: de la sogs pa mtha' yas nyid //
T02D1197:199a-40: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyu ru ni //
T02D1197:199b-0: @199b thams cad rgyu nyid gzhan du min //
T02D1197:199b-1: de nyid kyis na bha ga yi //
T02D1197:199b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:199b-3: der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D1197:199b-4: zhes pa ni gnas der mgo dang lag pa dang
T02D1197:199b-5: rkang pa dang sor mo la sogs pa rnams gsal
T02D1197:199b-7: bha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa po //
T02D1197:199b-8: zhes pa ni 'dir sgrub pa po rang gi sems
T02D1197:199b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa las grol
T02D1197:199b-10: ba'o // de yang mngal du sems bskyed pa'i dus
T02D1197:199b-11: su aa ba dh'u t'i'i dbus su blo chung ba
T02D1197:199b-12: ni bha ga'i dbus su zhes pa'i ming du 'gyur
T02D1197:199b-13: ba'o // ro // ci'i phyir bha ga zhe na /
T02D1197:199b-14: gru gsum nyid kyis te gang gi phyir lus dang
T02D1197:199b-15: ngag dang sems nang du 'dus pa de'i phyir bha
T02D1197:199b-16: ga zhes bya'o // de'i dbus su zhes pa ni //
T02D1197:199b-17: rang rig pa'i bde ba nyid kyis bsgrub po zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1197:199b-18: gang gi phyir ba sgrub bya dang sgrub pa po
T02D1197:199b-19: dang sgrub thabs rnams bsgrub bya'i rigs gcig tu thal
T02D1197:199b-20: bar yid ches pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1197:199b-21: // da ni drang ba'i don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi cho ga gsungs te /
T02D1197:199b-22: bha ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:199b-23: bha ga'i dbus su zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung
T02D1197:199b-24: gnas kyi khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su lha'i gzugs
T02D1197:199b-25: bsgom par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:199b-26: sgrub pa po zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje snying po la bos pa ste /
T02D1197:199b-27: gang gi phyir rdo rje snying po ni rnam par
T02D1197:199b-28: shes pa'i mtshan nyid de rang gi sems nyid sgrub
T02D1197:199b-30: lha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i
T02D1197:199b-31: phyir gnas 'dir phyag rgya zhes pa ni phyag rgya
T02D1197:199b-32: chen po'i rang bzhin lha mo'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1197:199b-33: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni gsal ba nyid du
T02D1197:199b-34: rang byin gyis brlabs pa las nye bar mtshon par
T02D1197:199b-35: bya'o // lha dang lhan cig mtshungs pa zhes pa
T02D1197:199b-36: ni rnal 'byor ma dang rang bsang gi thabs de
T02D1197:199b-37: rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i dang tshul de'o //
T02D1197:199b-38: de bzhin du bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang po yang
T02D1197:199b-39: rang snang ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa de'i gzugs
T02D1197:199b-40: kyi rang bzhin zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:199b-41: de bzhin du 'dab ma zhes bya ba sogs pa la /
T02D1197:199b-42: 'dab ma brgyad rnal 'byor ma brgyad bri zhes pa ni dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1197:199b-43: de bzhin du dbyug to zhes pa ni rtse mo
T02D1197:199b-44: na tho ba'i rnam pa'i rdo rje zad 'og phyogs
T02D1197:200a-1: rnam pa chang gzugs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:200a-2: de bzhin du ba dan gsum zhes pa ni mthe
T02D1197:200a-3: bos mthe'u chug mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams
T02D1197:200a-4: mdung gi rnam pa lha bu nyid do //
T02D1197:200a-5: gzhan thams cad ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:200a-6: 'on kyang rnal 'byor ma brgyad bo 'di rnams kyi
T02D1197:200a-7: ming dam pa ji ltar rab tu byed pa gsum
T02D1197:200a-9: 'dir yang rdo rje drag mo la sogs pa brgyad brjod de //
T02D1197:200a-10: de la shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje drag mo'o //
T02D1197:200a-12: nub tu rdo rje chags ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-13: byang du rdo rje zhi ba mo'o //
T02D1197:200a-14: de bzhin du me'i mtshams su rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-15: bden bral du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-16: rlung du sgra rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-17: dbang ldan du sa rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-18: de ltar lha mo rnams kyi thod pa zhes bya
T02D1197:200a-19: ba la sogs pa gdan dang kha dog dang zhal
T02D1197:200a-20: dang phyag dang mtshan ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:200a-21: de bzhin du rol mo sna tshogs zhes pa ni
T02D1197:200a-22: byed pa sum cu rtsa drug tu brjod pa klu
T02D1197:200a-23: dkyugs [?] sna tshogs pas mdzes pa'i rol mo'o //
T02D1197:200a-24: de yang sbubs dang rgyud dang sil snyan dang rnga sbubs so //
T02D1197:200a-25: de bzhin du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhes pa
T02D1197:200a-26: ni snying gi dkyil 'khor du mi shigs pa zhes
T02D1197:200a-27: pa dus kyi pho nya sum cu rtsa drug padma'i
T02D1197:200a-28: sna lam lta bu'i rtsa'i sgra'i dbang gis grong la
T02D1197:200a-30: de yang rol mo de rnams kyang 'chad bzhin pa'i
T02D1197:200a-31: thun mtshams bzhi'i rtsa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro
T02D1197:200a-32: ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:200a-33: de bzhin du sgo skyong lha mo zhes bya ba
T02D1197:200a-34: la sogs pa sga bzhi rnams su re re yang
T02D1197:200a-35: dag par bri zhes pa ni bsam par bya'o /
T02D1197:200a-36: de ltar rdo rje lcags kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:200a-37: da ni dkyil 'khor 'di rnams kyi rim pa bzhin nges pa'i don gsungs te /
T02D1197:200a-38: der ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:200a-39: phyag rgya zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:200a-40: de gang zhe na 'dir gzugs kyi phyung po la sogs pa rgyas btab pas na phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:200a-41: de yang gzugs kyi phyung po ni rdo rje drag mo'o //
T02D1197:200a-42: tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje lus ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-43: de bzhin du 'du shes kyi phung po rdo rje chags ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-44: 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje zhi ba ma'o //
T02D1197:200a-45: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:200b-0: de bzhin du sa'i khams ni rdo rje gnod sbyin @200b ma'o //
T02D1197:200b-1: chu'i khams ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1197:200b-2: de bzhin du me'i khams ni sgra rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1197:200b-3: rlung gi khams nyis rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1197:200b-4: de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams ni rang 'od kyi shes rab ma'o //
T02D1197:200b-5: de bzhin du sgo srung bzhi ni las kyi dbang po lnga bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:200b-6: da ltar bco ldan sa bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:200b-7: snying po bcom ldan 'das rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i sa ste /
T02D1197:200b-8: sngon du gsungs pa'i rtsa'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lor
T02D1197:200b-9: bshad pa'i rtsa bcu gnyis kyi nang du 'dus pa'i
T02D1197:200b-10: rdo rje lta bu'i srog gis ring nge 'dzin la
T02D1197:200b-11: snyom par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:200b-12: des na sngon gyi rgyun gyis 'dir yang mngal du de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:200b-13: de bzhin du bsgom par bya zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:200b-14: lha dang lhan cig mtshungs pa ni //
T02D1197:200b-15: zhes pa ni sems kyang rnam pa brgyad de //
T02D1197:200b-16: de yang rtsa brgyad rnams las khams kyi dbye bas 'byung ba'o //
T02D1197:200b-17: des na mtshungs par ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:200b-18: 'dab la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:200b-19: snying gi 'khor lo'i rtsa brgyad ni 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1197:200b-20: do // de rnams kyi dbus su thod pa'i gdan
T02D1197:200b-21: zhes pa ni khong stong nyid kyis na chos kyi
T02D1197:200b-23: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni thad pa brgyad las rnal 'byor ma'i rnal 'byor 'byung ba'o //
T02D1197:200b-24: de yang sna tshogs gzugs can zhes la gcig nyid
T02D1197:200b-25: kyi dus sna tshogs la grangs med pa'i kha dog
T02D1197:200b-26: dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:200b-28: de nyid kyis na yid dga' ma /
T02D1197:200b-29: zhes pa ni gang dang gang du rtsa rnams la
T02D1197:200b-30: rlung rgyu bar 'gyur ba de dang de ru yid
T02D1197:200b-31: 'gro zhes pa'o // de'i phyir gzugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1197:200b-32: de ltar brgyad brgyad la sogs pa grangs med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:200b-34: sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te //
T02D1197:200b-35: gzugs ni du mas mtshan pa nyid //
T02D1197:200b-37: rtsa ni brgyad pa mchog ster ba'o //
T02D1197:200b-38: de yang zhe sdang sems sogs rnams //
T02D1197:200b-39: sangs rgyas rnams ni rtags ba zhes pa //
T02D1197:200b-40: zhe sdang la sogs dngos po yis //
T02D1197:200b-41: 'dod pa yang ni chen por brjod //
T02D1197:200b-42: de las yid ni khyad can 'byung //
T02D1197:200b-43: rdo rje drag mo sogs lha mo //
T02D1197:200b-44: mngal brjod byis pa sngon 'gro ba //
T02D1197:201a-3: de tshe pha rol phyin pa shes //
T02D1197:201a-4: dgongs pa'i skad kyis gsungs pa yin //
T02D1197:201a-5: lhag ma rnams ni gang bskyed pa //
T02D1197:201a-6: de bzhin sa rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1197:201a-7: sgo srung rnam pa bzhi po ni //
T02D1197:201a-8: dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhi 'gro //
T02D1197:201a-9: bcom ldan bde ba chen po nyid //
T02D1197:201a-12: dus kyi kha dog kun du bsgrubs //
T02D1197:201a-13: thod pa yi ni ming gi rtsa //
T02D1197:201a-14: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid phyir //
T02D1197:201a-15: 'dab ma rnams ni gang skyed pa //
T02D1197:201a-16: srog la sogs pa'i rlung gis te //
T02D1197:201a-17: rtsa rnams lha mo'i ming du ni //
T02D1197:201a-18: sems kyi rgyud de de bdag nyid //
T02D1197:201a-19: rtag tu 'dir ni nges par yang //
T02D1197:201a-20: rnal 'byor ma ni mchog de nyid //
T02D1197:201a-21: rang bzhin med pa'i dngos po yis //
T02D1197:201a-22: 'dir ni dus su bstan pa med //
T02D1197:201a-25: de phyir 'dir brtag dus ni med //
T02D1197:201a-26: sangs rgyas mi rtag chos nyid do //
T02D1197:201a-27: de rnams kyi ni rtog pa yod //
T02D1197:201a-28: stong ba de yi ming can phyir //
T02D1197:201a-29: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:201a-30: de bzhin du re re'i zhal gcig ces pha ni
T02D1197:201a-31: rnal 'byor ma thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rang
T02D1197:201a-32: bzhin dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par
T02D1197:201a-34: bcom ldan 'das ni srid par dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:201a-35: de'i phyir phyag bzhi zhes pa ni brgyad po de
T02D1197:201a-36: rnams kyi nang du re re la yang bzhi bzhin
T02D1197:201a-37: nang du 'dus pa 'khor lo bzhi po gnas pa'o
T02D1197:201a-38: // de'i phyir de rnams thams cad phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02D1197:201a-39: des na rnal 'byor ma re res kyang las bzhi bzhi byed do //
T02D1197:201a-40: mda' dang gzhu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:201a-41: dang po zhes pa ni dang po goms pa'i dus
T02D1197:201a-42: su 'og dang steng gi srog gi rtsa sngon du
T02D1197:201a-43: gsungs pa 'gog pa'i phyir gzhu dang rgyud dag go
T02D1197:201a-44: // de dag gi mda' ni mtshon pa'o //
T02D1197:201a-45: des na mdzes pa ni dbang po thams cad rnams kyis gdug pa rnams skrag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:201a-46: des na zhe sdang chen po la sogs pa rnams skye'o //
T02D1197:201a-48: de bzhin du thod pa zhes pa ni chos kyi
T02D1197:201a-49: dbyings kyi rtsa la khu bas rab tu gang ba
T02D1197:201b-0: de nyid kyis na lcags kyu phyag na bsnams @201b
T02D1197:201b-1: ba zhes pa ni thur sel gyis byang chub kyi
T02D1197:201b-2: sems lcags kyu bzhin 'gugs pa ste /
T02D1197:201b-4: de ltar rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad
T02D1197:201b-5: ches phra ba de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa bzhi'o
T02D1197:201b-6: // des na mi phyed ma la sogs pa bzhi po de rnams kyi las gsungs so //
T02D1197:201b-7: de bzhin du rim pa bzhin bzhi bzhi brgyad kyi bar sum cu gnyis 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:201b-8: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de rnams kyi nges
T02D1197:201b-9: pa'i tshig rtog pa dang por gsungs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:201b-11: de bzhin du gnyis pa'i phyag na mdung zhes pa
T02D1197:201b-12: ni 'dir gsang ba'i gnas su aa ba dh'u t'i'i
T02D1197:201b-14: de'i 'gog pa'i phyir khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa
T02D1197:201b-15: zhes pa la khrag ni rdul gyi khams te de
T02D1197:201b-16: yang steng du rgyu ba'i phyir zla ba dang nyi
T02D1197:201b-17: ma dag 'dres par 'gyur ba nya dang gnam stong
T02D1197:201b-18: dag go // rdo rje zhes pa ni de dag la sgra gcan gyis zos pa'o //
T02D1197:201b-19: de bzhin du zhags pa zhes pa ni mjug ma phra ba ste /
T02D1197:201b-20: bcu drug pa'i cha bzang po 'di'o //
T02D1197:201b-21: de yang bdag gis zos par gyur ba ste /
T02D1197:201b-22: khams drug za ba nyid do //
T02D1197:201b-23: de las kyang longs spyod 'byung ba ste mtshan mo byed pa'i chos nyin mo byed pa'o //
T02D1197:201b-25: dus 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog go //
T02D1197:201b-26: de bzhin du gsum pa'i phyag na ral gri zhes
T02D1197:201b-27: pa ni snying gnas ral gri lta bu'i rtsa dus
T02D1197:201b-30: srid pa gsum ni 'bar byed pa //
T02D1197:201b-31: las kyi chogs rnams zad byed pa'o //
T02D1197:201b-32: zhes pa ni las kyi ral gri'i nges pa'o //
T02D1197:201b-33: chu yis gang ba'i thod pa zhes pa ni de
T02D1197:201b-34: bzhin du yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rtsa las chu
T02D1197:201b-36: chu yang rnam pa gnyis te dri chu'i chur btags pa'o //
T02D1197:201b-37: de bzhin du gnyis pa ni khams thams cad zhu ba'i rang bzhin gyi chu'o //
T02D1197:201b-38: rgyu ba de nyid 'dzin pa'i thod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:201b-39: de bzhin du rdo rje zhes pa ni mes de thams cad za ba'o //
T02D1197:201b-40: de bzhin du dril bu zhes pa ni lte ba'i
T02D1197:201b-41: dbus nas de nyid can rdo rje kab bzhin no
T02D1197:201b-42: // de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku'o //
T02D1197:201b-43: gang gi phyir sbrul pa'i 'khor lo sku'i rang bzhin de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:201b-44: de bzhin du phyag na kha tv'am ga zhes pa
T02D1197:201b-45: ni smin ma'i dbus nas byung ba'i rtsa'i snal ma
T02D1197:202a-0: @202a * // des sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying por
T02D1197:202a-1: gnas kyang de lus kyi dngos po mi len te
T02D1197:202a-2: tshor ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:202a-3: de yang stong pa la kha tv'am ga'i ming du dgongs so //
T02D1197:202a-4: de bzhin du thod pa zhes pa ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi 'gog pa'o //
T02D1197:202a-5: de nyid kyis na dbyug to zhes pa ni 'og
T02D1197:202a-6: tu gtun gdungs kyi rnam pa lus thams cad kyi
T02D1197:202a-7: rlung rnams 'og tu mi 'gro ba ste des na
T02D1197:202a-8: phra ba'o // des na steng tho ba'i rnam par 'dzin pa de ni dbyug to'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D1197:202a-9: de bzhin du ba dan gsum zhes pa ni lus
T02D1197:202a-10: dang ngag dang sems kyi spyod pa dang bral ba'i
T02D1197:202a-12: de bzhin du phyag na dbyug pa zhes pa la /
T02D1197:202a-13: dbyug pa ni mtshams kyi snal ma ro gcig dngos po'o //
T02D1197:202a-14: de bzhin du thod pa zhes pa ni dbang po
T02D1197:202a-15: rnams kyi rtsa 'gog pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa
T02D1197:202a-17: de bzhin du autpala zhes pa ni 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1197:202a-18: kyi ming gis rnam par shes pa brgyad ston pa
T02D1197:202a-19: snying gi rtsa grub ma la sogs pa brgyad de
T02D1197:202a-28: rtsa brgyad po de rnams ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba can te /
T02D1197:202a-30: de bzhin du cang te'u'o zhes pa ni kha'i rtsa ste /
T02D1197:202a-31: gang gi phyir smra ba dang len pa 'gog pa'i
T02D1197:202a-32: phyir rang nyid smra ba po rang 'byung ba nyid
T02D1197:202a-33: kyi phyir ro // de bzhin du padma zhes pa dbang po brgyad de //
T02D1197:202a-50: de yang de rnams kyi yul gyi dngos po rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyis de dag 'gog pa'o //
T02D1197:202a-51: de bzhin du zhag gis gang ba'i thod pa zhes
T02D1197:202a-52: pa la zhag ni stobs te dgongs bshad kyis ston
T02D1197:202a-53: pa'i mngon shes drug gi mtshan nyid nus pa'o //
T02D1197:202a-54: de'i phyir des gang ba ni aa ba dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:202a-55: de bzhin du me long zhes pa ni mngon shes te /
T02D1197:202a-56: de rnams kyis chos rnams thams cad kyi rang bzhin me longs bzhin nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:202b-0: de bzhin du dgra ste zhes pa ni khams @202b
T02D1197:202b-1: gsum pa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags gcod pa'i phyir
T02D1197:202b-2: ro // khams gsum pa yang lus dang ngag dang sems te /
T02D1197:202b-3: de yang aa ba dh'u t'i'i ming can tha mal ba'i rtsa'o //
T02D1197:202b-4: de'i rgyu ba ni ma rig pa ste de gcod
T02D1197:202b-5: par byed pa'i sgra sta de la de skad ces
T02D1197:202b-6: bya'o // de bzhin du mdung zhes pa ni dbyug pa la rdo rje'i tho lum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:202b-7: de yang mi shes pa'i ri bo gcod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:202b-8: de ni lto ba 'bab pa'i rtsa gang gi zas
T02D1197:202b-9: la gnyis med pa des ni mi shes pa skye
T02D1197:202b-10: zhing zhe sdang la sogs pa yang skye ste /
T02D1197:202b-11: de rnam par bcom pas de'i phyir skyes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:202b-12: de bzhin du dung zhes pa ni dbu ma'i rtsa'i
T02D1197:202b-13: nang du lus thams cad kyi srog gang gnas pa
T02D1197:202b-14: de yang rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis rang la
T02D1197:202b-15: dbang thob pa de ma dmigs pa'i phyir shin tu
T02D1197:202b-16: chags pa'i sgra 'byung ba ni khyad par ro //
T02D1197:202b-17: de nyid kyis na sham kham rim las zlog pa ste /
T02D1197:202b-18: kha zhes pa ni bya gdong de la brten pa'o //
T02D1197:202b-19: sham shes pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:202b-21: kha ni rkan la bzhar ba'i lce //
T02D1197:202b-23: sham ni 'di ru gzag pa yang //
T02D1197:202b-25: de bzhin du 'khor lo zhes pa ni dngos po
T02D1197:202b-26: thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1197:202b-27: der gnas pa des na thams cad mkhyen pa dang
T02D1197:202b-28: rnam pa kun mkhyen pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:202b-29: de nyid kyis ni mtshon cha zhes pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:202b-30: mtshon cha'i sgra ni gang dang gang gis bsam pa
T02D1197:202b-31: dang ldan pa de dang de la de nyid bstan
T02D1197:202b-32: zhes dgongs so // de bzhin du ro yis gang
T02D1197:202b-33: ba'i thod pa zhes pa ni 'di nyid kyis yi
T02D1197:202b-35: ka / sdong bu'i rtsa bar gang skyes pa //
T02D1197:202b-37: smin byed rnam pa rmang du byung //
T02D1197:202b-39: 'og tu bltas pa'i rtsa ni dmigs //
T02D1197:202b-41: ro bzhin du ni yongs su thim //
T02D1197:202b-43: de yang padma sar pa'i rtsa ba bzhin //
T02D1197:202b-45: mtshams kyi dus su kha dog can //
T02D1197:202b-47: srid pa gsum ni thams cad bkang //
T02D1197:202b-49: sgra can nyid la thim pa can /
T02D1197:202b-50: de bzhin du dgod ces bya ba la sogs pa ni //
T02D1197:202b-52: dang pa nam mkhar 'gro bar mdzod //
T02D1197:202b-54: ro mnyam pa yi tshul ni za //
T02D1197:202b-56: lam rnams la ni bgrod pa'i bya //
T02D1197:202b-58: sna tshogs dang pa yid rgyu'i phyir //
T02D1197:203a-3: bum pa can ni dgang yang na //
T02D1197:203a-5: a'a li k'a li gnyis ni bza' //
T02D1197:203a-7: des na sngon po nam mkhar 'gro //
T02D1197:203a-8: de bzhin du phyag na bum pa zhes pa ni
T02D1197:203a-9: ji ltar bum pa bzang po rin po che thams
T02D1197:203a-10: cad kyis rab tu gang ba de bzhin du de
T02D1197:203a-11: ltar aa ba dh'u t'i'i chos nyid grangs med pa'i
T02D1197:203a-12: yon tan gyis brgyan pa des na kun rdzob kyi
T02D1197:203a-13: phyogs la de chos kyi dbyings zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:203a-14: // de nyid kyis na rdo rje zhes pa ni mi phyed pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs byed pa'o //
T02D1197:203a-15: de nyid thabs kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1197:203a-16: de'i shes rab dril bu zhes pa ni dngos po thams cad rtogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:203a-17: des na pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1197:203a-18: de gnyi ga ni stong pa nyid rdo rjer brjod do //
T02D1197:203a-19: thod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:203a-20: mi'i pags pas g-yogs shing zhes pa ni de bzhin
T02D1197:203a-21: du sangs rgyas kyi thod pa dang dngos po thams
T02D1197:203a-22: cad kyi stong ba khong stong mngal nas skyes pa'i
T02D1197:203a-23: sems can rnams la de bstan pas sha dang pags
T02D1197:203a-25: des na mi'i pags pas g-yogs pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi sku'o //
T02D1197:203a-27: bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min //
T02D1197:203a-28: de bzhin ma skyes mi 'gag pa //
T02D1197:203a-29: snang ba tsam gyi mtshan nyid de //
T02D1197:203a-30: de yang sgyu ma gzhan du min //
T02D1197:203a-31: de bzhin du rdzas kyis bkang ba zhes pa ni
T02D1197:203a-32: khrag dang khu ba dang bshang ba dang gci ba
T02D1197:203a-34: des na rang bzhin yongs su shes pa'o //
T02D1197:203a-35: de yang sngon nas rnam par gzung ba des sangs
T02D1197:203a-36: rgyas rnams kyi sku'i gnas skabs kyi zab mo'i chos
T02D1197:203a-37: kyang ston to // de bzhin du 'dab ma zhes pa ni de rnams la'o //
T02D1197:203a-38: lha mo bri zhes pa ni rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:203a-39: de bzhin du lte bar zhes pa ni aa ba dh'u t'i la'o //
T02D1197:203a-40: bde ba chen po zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1197:203a-41: de dang ldan pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:203a-42: rol mo zhes pa ni sangs rgyas gcig nyid kyi
T02D1197:203a-43: thugs kyi dngos po las 'byung po sna tshogs pa
T02D1197:203a-44: grangs med pa dang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1197:203a-45: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spros pa'o //
T02D1197:203a-46: de ji ltar rol mo yin zhe na /
T02D1197:203a-47: mi shigs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas de rnams
T02D1197:203a-48: kyang shes rab kyi sgra yis sad par byas pa'o
T02D1197:203b-0: // des na rol mo ni nye bar @203b btags par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:203b-2: sgra yi dbus las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1197:203b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad du gshegs pa //
T02D1197:203b-4: shes rab kyis ni 'di bskul te //
T02D1197:203b-5: shin tu chags pa'i sgra yis sad //
T02D1197:203b-6: de nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:203b-7: de bzhin du sgo skyong zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:203b-8: pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:203b-9: rnal 'byor ma bzhi byams pa dang snying rje dang
T02D1197:203b-10: dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:203b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtsod pa'i dus la sogs pa rnams su 'khrungs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:203b-13: bhaga'i dbus su bsgoms nas su //
T02D1197:203b-14: zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa sdud pa'i phyir
T02D1197:203b-15: bha gzhes pa ni ma'i skye gnas zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:203b-16: to // des na sngags kyi bzlas pa zhes pa ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1197:203b-17: de yang h'um la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:203b-19: h'um ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02D1197:203b-20: zhes pa ni sems rang rig pa'i srog gi h'um gi ming can no //
T02D1197:203b-22: aom zhes bya ba'i dbyangs kyis phye //
T02D1197:203b-23: zhes pa ni lus dang sems 'dres par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:203b-24: a'a: zhes bya ba'i dag dang ldan //
T02D1197:203b-25: zhes pa ni des na lus dang ngag dang sems kyi chos rnams bsdus pa'o //
T02D1197:203b-27: dag pa'i shel ma dang mtshungs //
T02D1197:203b-28: zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i mdog go //
T02D1197:203b-29: de bzhin du h'um ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:203b-30: de bzhin du bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:203b-31: yi ge gcig ces pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i
T02D1197:203b-32: bsam gtan gyis 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rlung gsum
T02D1197:203b-34: de'i tshe mi 'dzag pas na yi ge gcig go //
T02D1197:203b-35: 'gyur zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02D1197:203b-36: de ltar bsdus nas aom h'um a'a: dh'i sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:203b-37: slar yang 'dab ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:203b-38: lha mo rnams zhes bya ba ni rdo rje drag
T02D1197:203b-39: mo la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags 'dab ma rnams
T02D1197:203b-40: la dgod pa'o // bsdus nas aom h'um a'a: badzra budha'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D1197:203b-41: de bzhin du thams cad kyi ming bar du spel ba sngags dang po dang tha mar sbyar ro //
T02D1197:203b-42: de nas sa bon bzhi zhes pa ni ha dang ai dang ra dang tsheg drag go //
T02D1197:203b-44: mchod pa bzhi zhes pa ni phyi dang nang gsang ba dang bla na med pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-1: nyid ces pa ni dga' ba la sogs pa bzhi byed pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-2: des na dang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:204a-3: aa de dang bor ldan zhes pa ni shes rab ma rang gi padma ste /
T02D1197:204a-4: hr'i: yongs su gyur ba de'i lte bar aa las chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-5: de yang dbus su hr'i: dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-6: de bzhin du sgo skyong zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i sngags so //
T02D1197:204a-7: bsdus nas sa bon bzhi zhes pa ni h'um dang a'a:'o //
T02D1197:204a-8: sogs pa'i sgra ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D1197:204a-10: de ltar aom h'um ya badzra aom ku shr'i dhr'i sv'a h'a'o //
T02D1197:204a-11: thams cad du zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags rang gi ming brjod pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-12: yang na sa bon bzhi zhes pa ni spyi bor aom mo //
T02D1197:204a-15: pus mo dang rkang pa la sv'a h'a'o //
T02D1197:204a-16: de ltar thams cad du zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad rigs lnga'i spyan du byas pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-17: gang yang dkyil 'khor pa de rnams kyang ma la
T02D1197:204a-18: sogs pa rtog pa dang po'i rab tu byed pa
T02D1197:204a-21: ma dang sring mo nyid dang ni //
T02D1197:204a-22: de bzhin bu mo gnyen mo dang //
T02D1197:204a-23: bram ze dang rgyal rigs mo'o //
T02D1197:204a-24: rje'u mo dmangs mo gar mkhan mo //
T02D1197:204a-25: khrus mkhan ma dang g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1197:204a-26: gtum mo bcu gnyis shes par bya //
T02D1197:204a-27: de rnams kyi cho ga ni ji lta gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1197:204a-28: de nas sgrub pas sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bha gang mtshan ma gzhug pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-29: de yang bha ga ldang mtshan ma de dag kyang ngo gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1197:204a-30: 'on kyang rdo rje h'um yongs su gyur pas bya ste /
T02D1197:204a-31: de'i lte bar aom dkar po byang chub sems kyi bu gar ro //
T02D1197:204a-33: de'i dbus su chags pa chen po'i rang bzhin dra'i zhes pa ni steng du kha phyogs pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-34: de ltar aom dang hr'i: dag gi dbus su a'a: kha dog dmar po'o //
T02D1197:204a-35: aom ni kha 'og tu bltas pa'o //
T02D1197:204a-36: tsheg drag gi mthar sv'a h'a sbyar ro //
T02D1197:204a-37: 'dis ni rnal 'byor ma rnams mi 'dzag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:204a-39: bzlas pa'i sngags su rab bstan pa'i //
T02D1197:204a-40: bsam gtan gyis ni yig gcig 'gyur //
T02D1197:204a-41: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas nges so //
T02D1197:204a-42: de bzhin du sgrub pa pos zhes bya ba la kha nas h'um dang hr'i: dag gdon par bya'o //
T02D1197:204b-0: man @204b ngag las yi ge phye dang gnyis gnyis
T02D1197:204b-1: hi ka dang aa hi ka bzhin stang du hr'i
T02D1197:204b-2: ngo // 'og tu hr'i: zhes pa gnyis ka dag
T02D1197:204b-3: mgrin nang du brjod pa'i phyir srog dang thur sel
T02D1197:204b-5: kha yis zhes pa ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i lam nas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1197:204b-6: de yang de las blang ba ste //
T02D1197:204b-7: khu ba zhes pa ni gcig ni ro'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:204b-8: gnyis pa ni yi ge'i don nges par gsungs pa'i
T02D1197:204b-9: tshig gis 'dir sh'u zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u
T02D1197:204b-10: t'i'i nang du'o // kram zhes pa ni sngon du
T02D1197:204b-11: gsungs pa'i ro'i ming can 'pho bas thams cad aa
T02D1197:204b-12: ba dh'u t'i'i bzhin du 'gyur te /
T02D1197:204b-14: khrag gi dus su zhes pa ni chags pa'i dus
T02D1197:204b-15: su sngon du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis las kyi phyag
T02D1197:204b-16: rgya dang rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir de bya zhes
T02D1197:204b-17: dgongs so // yang na dbang po gnyis yang dag
T02D1197:204b-18: par sbyor ba las skyes pa rang gi kha'i lces
T02D1197:204b-20: rgyal shes rab ma rang byung gi me tog dang
T02D1197:204b-21: ldan pa de'i tshe yang dus der byang chub sems
T02D1197:204b-22: dpa' lhan cig 'dres par 'gyur ba bza' bar bya
T02D1197:204b-23: zhes pa ni khrag gi dus su zhes bya ba
T02D1197:204b-24: la sogs pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D1197:204b-25: des na rnal 'byor ma'i mchog mnyes par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:204b-26: de'i tshe sgrub pa po rnams kyi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:204b-27: slar la yang h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nges pa'i don gsungs te /
T02D1197:204b-28: h'um zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1197:204b-29: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1197:204b-30: a'a: ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1197:204b-31: hr'i: ni 'od dang ga med do //
T02D1197:204b-32: sva ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1197:204b-33: h'a ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:204b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams skyes tsam nyid na mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:204b-35: des na hr'i: zhes pa ni lha mo bcu gnyis
T02D1197:204b-36: bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1197:204b-37: sngags rnams te / rang gi ming dang mthun pa'i las bya ba'o //
T02D1197:204b-38: nges na sa bon bzhi zhes pa ni sprul pa
T02D1197:204b-39: dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang bde ba
T02D1197:204b-41: yang dag ldan zhes pa ni sa bcu gnyis kyi rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1197:204b-42: des na mchod pa bzhi zhes pa'i ni dus bzhi
T02D1197:204b-43: gang gis mchod pa ni rdzogs ldan la sogs dus
T02D1197:204b-44: bzhi gang gis zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:204b-45: de yang chos kyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1197:204b-46: yang na sa bon bzhi zhes pa ni aom a'a: sv'a h'a'o //
T02D1197:205a-0: @205a * // dang po'i dbyangs yig la sogs ldan //
T02D1197:205a-1: zhes pa ni dbyangs yig bcu gnyis te rnal 'byor
T02D1197:205a-2: ma bcu gnyis po re re'i yi ge sa bon
T02D1197:205a-3: bzhi'i dbus su nges par sbyar ro //
T02D1197:205a-4: bsdu na aom a'a: aam hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D1197:205a-5: zhes pa rdo rje drag mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:205a-7: dang po'i dbyangs la sogs pa zhes pa ni dbyangs
T02D1197:205a-8: yig bcu gnyis po rnams kyi dbus su aa la
T02D1197:205a-9: sogs pa dbyangs bzhi rdzogs ldan gyis te /
T02D1197:205a-11: de bzhin du gsum ldan la au a'u ae'o //
T02D1197:205a-14: rdzogs ldan dang rtsod ldan gya dus kyi dbus su
T02D1197:205a-15: thog ma dang tha ma dang aam aa: spro ba
T02D1197:205a-17: de bzhin du ri r'i l'i ste de ltar rang nyid kyis dus rnams so //
T02D1197:205a-18: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i dus su ni rdzogs ldan no //
T02D1197:205a-19: de bzhin du dang du len pa'i dus su ni gsum ldan no //
T02D1197:205a-20: nyams su myong pa'i dus ni gnyis ldan no //
T02D1197:205a-21: rang bzhin med pa'i dus su ni rtsod dus so zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:205a-22: des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:205a-23: rdo rje dang bha ga dag ces pa ni sna
T02D1197:205a-24: tshogs pa'i chos ni chos nyid du nye bar spyad
T02D1197:205a-25: par byas nas gang du skyes pa de thim par
T02D1197:205a-26: 'gyur te / bcom ldan 'das zhes pa 'od gsal ba'i na thar yang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1197:205a-27: des ni der ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:205a-28: stong ba dang snying rje'i sa bon gnyis po 'dis te //
T02D1197:205a-29: kha zhes pa ni stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i sems te /
T02D1197:205a-30: des na bza' zhes pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1197:205a-31: khu bzhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i 'bras bu bzang po'i rgyu zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:205a-32: de yang khrag gi dus su zhes pa ni snying
T02D1197:205a-33: rje'i dus su bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnyis med
T02D1197:205a-34: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o
T02D1197:205a-35: // 'dir ni mdor bsdus te gsungs so //
T02D1197:205a-36: rgyas par yang rgyud sna tshogs pa'i dgongs pas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1197:205a-37: de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna
T02D1197:205a-38: tshogs pas de rnams kyi bsam pa rnams gcig tu
T02D1197:205a-39: bya ba'i phyir thabs rnams bstan pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:205a-40: der ni sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D1197:205a-41: zhes pa ni rtog pa thams cad nyams su myong
T02D1197:205a-42: ba'i dus su ngag gi sgo nas brjod pa'i yi
T02D1197:205b-0: de rnams kyi rang @205b rig pa bsam du med pa nyid ni bzlas pa'o //
T02D1197:205b-1: der ni zhes pa ni mi 'jag pa'i gnas su rdo rje bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1197:205b-2: rlung bcu rnams nges par gzung ba'i thabs te h'um gi ming can gyis so //
T02D1197:205b-3: ye shes sems dpa' de nyid kyi snying gar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ste /
T02D1197:205b-4: 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams nye bar dgod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:205b-5: de'i tshe rim pa bzhin shar gyi 'dab ma la
T02D1197:205b-6: sogs par g-yas skor gyis rdo rje phag mo la
T02D1197:205b-8: drag mo zhes pa ni zhe sdang skyed pa'i rtsa ba'o //
T02D1197:205b-9: de bzhin du lus gti mug skyed pa'o //
T02D1197:205b-10: chags ma zhes pa ni 'dod chags skyed pa'o //
T02D1197:205b-11: zhi ba zhes pa ni zhi bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:205b-12: gnod sbyin zhes pa ni phrag dog go //
T02D1197:205b-13: mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa ni ngar 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1197:205b-14: sgra zhes pa ni ser sna'o //
T02D1197:205b-15: sa zhes pa ni nga rgyal rgyu ba can zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:205b-16: de ltar yang dam tshig sems dpa' bzhin dgyes pa'i
T02D1197:205b-17: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma phyag bzhi pa bsgom pas
T02D1197:205b-18: de rnams kyi nyes pa dang bral lo //
T02D1197:205b-19: slar yang rtsa brgyad po de rnams kyis zhe sdang
T02D1197:205b-20: chen po la sogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir rdzogs pa
T02D1197:205b-21: yang ste thams cad la rdo rje'i sgras brjod do
T02D1197:205b-22: // de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo phyag bzhi
T02D1197:205b-23: pa'am phyag drug pa lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ro
T02D1197:205b-24: // // de nyid kyis gnyis ldan gyi dus su
T02D1197:205b-25: sbyin pa la sogs pa la 'jug pas sems can
T02D1197:205b-26: thams cad kyi sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1197:205b-27: // // sbyar ro // da ltar gyi dus su
T02D1197:205b-28: yang dpa' bo rnon po rnams la gsal bar 'gyur
T02D1197:205b-29: // // sbyar ro // te / gzhan du ma yin zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:205b-30: da ltar de la sogs pa bstan pa de'i tshe /
T02D1197:205b-31: sgom pa po rnams kyi sgrub thabs kyi don du
T02D1197:205b-32: ting nge 'dzin gsal bar byas pa ni 'dir rnyed
T02D1197:205b-34: bdag gis ni dgos pa tsam zhig bstan to //
T02D1197:205b-35: de yang bdag gi bla ma'i bkas so //
T02D1197:205b-36: rang gis rang bzos ni ma yin te byis pa
T02D1197:205b-37: rnams kyis sun 'byin cing tho 'tshams pas 'jigs pa'i
T02D1197:205b-38: phyir zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1197:205b-39: gang phyir byis pa skye bos yon tan can mi bzod cing nyes pas rgas par 'gyur //
T02D1197:205b-40: sred pa gsum du mi bden dngos po mi rtag pa nyid 'dir ni 'di mi rigs //
T02D1197:205b-41: de phyir sdug bsngal las kyi byis pa rnams //
T02D1197:205b-42: shi nas du 'bod la sogs dmyal bar 'gro //
T02D1197:206a-1: pa grangs med 'tshe ba kyi hud snying re rje //
T02D1197:206a-2: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa
T02D1197:206a-3: gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i rgya cher
T02D1197:206a-4: rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran
T02D1197:206a-5: pa'i snang ba zhes pa'i gzhung bstan pa ste gsum
T02D1197:206a-7: / da ni rtsod pa'i dus kyi sems can mngon
T02D1197:206a-8: spyod kyi las la sogs pa la dga' ba rnams
T02D1197:206a-9: kyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bya ba'i phyir
T02D1197:206a-10: dang thabs dang bcas pas sems can gyi don du
T02D1197:206a-11: sgrub thabs sna tshogs pa'i phyir mdor bstan pa'i rab
T02D1197:206a-12: tu byed pa gsum gyi mthar slar bshad pa brjod
T02D1197:206a-13: de / nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:206a-14: rdo rje zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po la bos te nyon cig ces pa'o //
T02D1197:206a-15: de ltar tshul ji bzhin zhes pa ni go rims bzhin te /
T02D1197:206a-16: sngon du gsungs pa'i dus rnams kyi mthar rtsod pa'i
T02D1197:206a-17: dus kyi nges pa gang gi dus gsum yang yongs
T02D1197:206a-19: des kyang skal ba bzang po'i nang du sems can
T02D1197:206a-20: rnams kyi glo bur ba'i dri ma rjes su bsdus
T02D1197:206a-21: pa gang yin pa de thams cad yongs su zad
T02D1197:206a-22: par 'gyur ba'o // des na 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:206a-23: 'khor lo yang 'chad bzhin pa des so //
T02D1197:206a-24: bsgrub bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
T02D1197:206a-25: khyad par nyid ces bya ba ni man ngag ji
T02D1197:206a-26: lta ba las rnal 'byor gyis nus pas zhes pa
T02D1197:206a-27: ste nges pa'o // des kyang ci zhig byed ce na gsungs pa /
T02D1197:206a-28: zhi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:206a-29: gcig gis kyang bsgrub bya'i khyad par sna tshogs pa
T02D1197:206a-30: byed de / zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:206a-31: de yang re mig cas bya ba la sogs te /
T02D1197:206a-32: re mig dgu'i 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa bzhin
