T02D1197:220b-50: khrag ni sha ba ra'i ru brtags //
T02D1197:220b-51: khu ba'i gzugs ni tsanda l'i //
T02D1197:220b-52: tshil dang rkang dag dombi na'i //
T02D1197:220b-53: pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun //
T02D1197:220b-54: rus pa bden pa rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1197:220b-55: de ltar lhag par mos nas sngags pas lha'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bya'o /
T02D1197:221a-1: rigs skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1197:221a-2: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:221a-3: de ltar mdor bsdus te spros pa ni dpal bla
T02D1197:221a-4: ma'i nges pas dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1197:221a-5: gsum gyi sgom pa rgya cher 'grel las gsungs pa
T02D1197:221a-6: ni las dang po'i rnal 'byor pas mos pa tsam
T02D1197:221a-8: 'on kyang slob pa la gus pa rnams kyis khams
T02D1197:221a-9: gsum pa nyid ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mtshan nyid
T02D1197:221a-11: des kyang sgrub thabs la dmigs te /
T02D1197:221a-12: sems can sna tshogs pa'i rgyu ru'o //
T02D1197:221a-13: da ni bdag po dang dkyil 'khor ba 'di rnams kyi nges pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:221a-14: bdag med mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:221a-15: 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba sngon du gsungs pa ste /
T02D1197:221a-16: skye ba brgyud par mngon du byas pa de'i phyir
T02D1197:221a-17: dgyes pa'i rdo rje mchog gi gzugs de kho na
T02D1197:221a-18: nyid do // de nyid kyi sku bdag med ma
T02D1197:221a-19: zhes pa ni gang zag la bdag med pa zhes
T02D1197:221a-20: nyid do // pa'i don to // des na nyon zhes pa ni nges par gzung ba nyid do //
T02D1197:221a-23: he ru ka zhes pa ni snying gi chags pa
T02D1197:221a-24: chen po la he ru ka de'i skyed pa'i rgyu'o
T02D1197:221a-25: // sgrub thabs zhes pa ni khams sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyis rkyen gyi rang bzhin thabs te /
T02D1197:221a-26: des na dus kyi pho nya rnams 'dus par brjod do //
T02D1197:221a-27: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku sdud pa'o //
T02D1197:221a-28: de dag thams cad ces pa ni khams gsum pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems las kyang byung ba'o //
T02D1197:221a-29: gdug pa la sogs pa ni bde ba 'dod pa'i dbang po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:221a-30: de rnams 'dul ba zhes pa ni rang bzhin med par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:221a-31: mkha' 'gro zhes pa ni nam mkha' mnyam par song ba ste /
T02D1197:221a-32: de ni nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkhar khyab pa can no //
T02D1197:221a-33: de nyid kyis na mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa ni
T02D1197:221a-34: gang la de dang 'dra ba'i 'gro ba'i ngang tshul
T02D1197:221a-35: las brtson pa'i yid yod pa de ni mkha' 'gro
T02D1197:221a-37: de ltar de dag thams cad ces pa ni mtshan
T02D1197:221b-0: nyid gang gis rnal 'byor pa sangs rgyas @221b nyid
T02D1197:221b-1: de mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba de thams
T02D1197:221b-2: cad bstan par bya zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:221b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni 'dir rdo rje sems dpa'i sgra ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1197:221b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'i bsdu ba rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1197:221b-5: de la rdo rje'i sgras ni chos dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid rtag pa'i gzugs gzung ngo //
T02D1197:221b-6: de bzhin du sems dpa' zhes pa ni chos can skye ba dang 'jig pa'o //
T02D1197:221b-7: des na srid pa gsum gcig pa nyid mnyam pa'i
T02D1197:221b-8: tshul du skyes bu 'jug pa mi rtag pa'i gzugs
T02D1197:221b-9: so // de bzhin du gnyis las gnyis med par byed pa'o //
T02D1197:221b-10: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang zhes pa ni yang 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:221b-13: rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1197:221b-14: de yang rdo rje nyid 'dzin zhes pa ni gnyis par 'gyur te /
T02D1197:221b-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bya zhes dgongs te /
T02D1197:221b-16: de'i tshe gzhan gyi gzugs dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byas pa'o //
T02D1197:221b-17: des na 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:221b-19: sngon goms pa'i phyir 'bar ba zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D1197:221b-20: de ltar sngon du bstan pa des na cung zad
T02D1197:221b-21: sa bon tsam pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1197:221b-23: de yang 'du shes kyi shes pas sa bon tsam pa thim par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:221b-25: zla zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:221b-26: 'dir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sbyangs pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:221b-27: de'i dbus su sa bon phreng ba zhes pa ni
T02D1197:221b-28: dus kyi pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug gi
T02D1197:221b-29: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor g-yon dang g-yas kyi dbye
T02D1197:221b-30: bas so // 'dir yang dus ni g-yas kyi rtsa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do //
T02D1197:221b-31: pho nya mo ni g-yon gyi rtsa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud do //
T02D1197:221b-32: de ltar gnyis ka'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D1197:221b-33: phreng ba bzhin dgod ces ba ni der thim par
T02D1197:221b-34: bya'o // de nas zhes pa ni de'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:221b-35: rdo rje can zhes pa ni rang bzhin rig pa tsam mo //
T02D1197:221b-36: de yang chags pa chen pos zhes pa ni rang rig pa mi 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:221b-37: lhag ma rnam par shes pa tsam mo //
T02D1197:221b-38: zhu zhes pa ni nub par gyur pa'o //
T02D1197:222a-1: yang rig mar bcas pa zhes pa ni snying rje dang lhan cig go //
T02D1197:222a-2: de'i tshe skul bar byed ces pa ni ye shes
T02D1197:222a-3: kyi dkyil 'khor thim pas yang dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rnal
T02D1197:222a-4: 'byor mas sad pa'i ngo mtshang gis langs pa'o //
T02D1197:222a-5: glu blangs pas zhes pa ni rang byung gi sgras so //
T02D1197:222a-6: de yang rig ma sna tshogs zhes pa ni gtsug
T02D1197:222a-7: tor la sogs pa'i 'khor lo drug la gnas pa'i
T02D1197:222a-8: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang rnams su //
T02D1197:222a-9: sgra'i dbyangs rang byung nyid langs pa'o //
T02D1197:222a-10: de bzhin du snying rje zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:222a-11: pa ni 'khor lo drug rnams yi ge brgya bzhi
T02D1197:222a-13: de la gtsug tor du lnga'o //
T02D1197:222a-15: de bzhin du mgrin par sum cu'o //
T02D1197:222a-17: de bzhin du lte bar drug cu'o //
T02D1197:222a-20: au tha bha r'a dho zhes pa la au ni spyi bo'i snal ma ste /
T02D1197:222a-21: tha ni dbus kyi shar nyid du //
T02D1197:222a-22: bha ni dbus kyi lho ru'o //
T02D1197:222a-23: de bzhin byang du r'a nyid do //
T02D1197:222a-24: nub tu dho zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1197:222a-25: 'dir ni rtag tu nam mkha' lnga //
T02D1197:222a-26: sgra lnga yi ge lnga rnams nyid //
T02D1197:222a-27: rigs ni lnga ru gsungs pa yin //
T02D1197:222a-28: de ltar rtsa ni lnga rnams la //
T02D1197:222a-29: 'khor lo rnam pa lnga ni gnas //
T02D1197:222a-30: rtsa yi dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1197:222a-31: yi ge yi ni nang du 'dus //
T02D1197:222a-32: rtsa ni lnga po re re la //
T02D1197:222a-33: 'khor lo lnga ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1197:222a-34: 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas pa ni //
T02D1197:222a-35: yi ge lnga yi rnam dag nyid //
T02D1197:222a-36: de ltar de bla med phung po'o //
T02D1197:222a-37: 'khor lo'i rnam pa nyid du gnas //
T02D1197:222a-39: bcom ldan 'das ni yi ger bzhugs //
T02D1197:222a-40: ka ru na ma na pukka s'i ma hu pa ri t'a hi ma zhes pa la /
T02D1197:222a-42: thod pa'i dbus su rtsa ni gang /
T02D1197:222a-46: gus pa dang ni 'dul ba'i gzugs /
T02D1197:222a-48: byang chub kyi ni bde bas brgyan /
T02D1197:222a-50: ston pa'i tshig ni rjes su 'gro //
T02D1197:222a-52: sngon gyi chos ni ston pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:222a-54: las nyid bag chags sngon 'gro ba /
T02D1197:222a-56: rtsa ni bcu bzhi rnams ni 'grub /
T02D1197:222a-58: dbu ma yang ni gtsug gtor du //
T02D1197:222a-59: hu ni nam mkha'i ming can te /
T02D1197:222a-61: lhag ma yang ni rnam pa bzhi /
T02D1197:222a-62: ri ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D1197:222b-0: de @222b ru rtsa ni bcu phrag gsum /
T02D1197:222b-2: shar du gser gyi gzugs su song //
T02D1197:222b-3: ma ni sems ni 'di lta bu //
T02D1197:222b-4: de ltar yi ge sum cu'o //
T02D1197:222b-5: ma h'a su ha dzo ae kam ma h'u tsha d'a hi su na sa h'a ba a'i /
T02D1197:222b-6: tu dz'u bi h'u ne aa ma ra ai ha au zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:222b-8: dkyil 'khor bcu ni phrag gsum nyid //
T02D1197:222b-9: h'a ni mi shigs pa yang de /
T02D1197:222b-11: bde ba yi ni gzugs su gnas //
T02D1197:222b-12: ha ni sgra yi sa bon can /
T02D1197:222b-14: rtag tu 'od kyi gzugs ni nyid /
T02D1197:222b-16: rnal 'byor pa yis de ltar blta /
T02D1197:222b-18: 'dir ni su yi ming ni gnas /
T02D1197:222b-20: yid kyi ming yang cung brad med /
T02D1197:222b-22: yid kyi sangs rgyas rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1197:222b-23: h'u ni bdag kyang cung zad med /
T02D1197:222b-25: gdugs su gyur pa snying gi mkha' //
T02D1197:222b-26: d'a ni mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs //
T02D1197:222b-27: hi ni de nyid ji lta ba /
T02D1197:222b-29: shin tu sad pa'i mi shigs pa /
T02D1197:222b-31: de nyid kun dang bral ba min /
T02D1197:222b-33: 'di la 'ang thams cad gnas pa med //
T02D1197:222b-34: h'a ni rang bzhin med pa nyid //
T02D1197:222b-35: ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa de /
T02D1197:222b-37: de ltar gyur pa 'byung chen po //
T02D1197:222b-38: tu ni blo ldan 'di nyid de /
T02D1197:222b-40: thig le phra mo chen mo 'dzag bi /
T02D1197:222b-41: sna tshogs rnam pa rtag tu gnas //
T02D1197:222b-42: h'u ni dbugs dang bral ba yis /
T02D1197:222b-44: bag chags med pa mkha' mtshan nyid //
T02D1197:222b-45: aa yis thams cad la khyab byed //
T02D1197:222b-47: aa wa dh'u t'i dbus kyi mkha'/
T02D1197:222b-49: sems ni nyi ma'i gzugs su song //
T02D1197:222b-51: yid la sogs pa zla ba'i gzugs //
T02D1197:222b-52: ha ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod /
T02D1197:222b-54: sangs rgyas gar mkhan bzhengs pa ni //
T02D1197:222b-55: de bzhin pad rtsa gzhon nu ltar //
T02D1197:222b-56: snying du rtsa ni brgyad rnams so //
T02D1197:222b-57: gtsug tor gyi ni lnga po rnams //
T02D1197:222b-58: de las kyang ni lho yis 'dir //
T02D1197:222b-59: au nas dzal thug par ni //
T02D1197:222b-60: au la sogs pa'i yi ge brgyad //
T02D1197:222b-61: dur khrod brgyad du lha mo rnams //
T02D1197:222b-62: aoo dyan la sogs pa yi gnas //
T02D1197:222b-63: nam mkha'i bu ga rta tu brgyan //
T02D1197:222b-64: aom zhes pa ni cha lnga pa //
T02D1197:222b-65: pha zhes pa ni mtshams su sbyin //
T02D1197:222b-67: gangs can gyi ni mdun nas 'bab /
T02D1197:222b-69: ba mo yi ni ma khengs lus //
T02D1197:222b-70: h'u yi yi ge'i rgyu las so //
T02D1197:222b-71: he ni stong pa'i snying po ru /
T02D1197:222b-73: chos kyi khams rnams gnas pa yin //
T02D1197:222b-74: dza ni rtag tu bems po yin //
T02D1197:222b-75: de ltar yang ni gnas pa ni //
T02D1197:222b-76: 'dir ni zhing gi gzugs mdzes pas //
T02D1197:223a-1: ni rtag tu bzhengs pa ni //
T02D1197:223a-2: dbang po'i sgo dgu las 'das so //
T02D1197:223a-3: de yang rtsa ni bcu drug rnams //
T02D1197:223a-4: yi ge drug cur brjod pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:223a-5: tsha dal sogs au tha'i bar //
T02D1197:223a-6: 'bras bu dang ni rgyu phyir gsungs //
T02D1197:223a-7: tsha ni grib ma'i rnam pa ste //
T02D1197:223a-9: spros pa yi ni blo dang bral //
T02D1197:223a-10: hi 'tshe ba dang ni bral ba'i gzugs /
T02D1197:223a-12: yid kyi ngo bo yid ni med //
T02D1197:223a-13: na ni lus kyi 'di ni med /
T02D1197:223a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku mi zad //
T02D1197:223a-16: ha ni he ru ka nyid de //
T02D1197:223a-17: da ni sems dang sems las byung /
T02D1197:223a-19: 'di dag thams cad stong ci bzhin /
T02D1197:223a-21: spros pa nyid ni spangs pa'o /
T02D1197:223a-23: yid dga' bar ni gar tshe gyur //
T02D1197:223a-24: ha ni bde ba lta bu'o //
T02D1197:223a-28: bems po'i gnas skabs kyang ni ri //
T02D1197:223a-29: aa ni bde ba'i rnam pa nyid /
T02D1197:223a-31: sems kyi rgol ba bsal la sogs /
T02D1197:223a-33: sems can gyi ni rgyu ru bya //
T02D1197:223a-34: dzu zhes pa ni chags pa'i cha /
T02D1197:223a-36: ba spu'i khung bu'i 'od zer gyis /
T02D1197:223a-38: nam mkha' ru ni sems ming nyid /
T02D1197:223a-40: de nyid du ni sprul pa'i gzugs /
T02D1197:223a-42: bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams /
T02D1197:223a-44: skyabs gsum la ni 'jug pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:223a-46: bcom ldan 'das ni bde ba dran /
T02D1197:223a-48: rnal 'byor pha rol byin pas rol //
T02D1197:223a-49: aa ni rnal 'byor rnams la khyab /
T02D1197:223a-52: h'u zhes pa ni rab sbyor bas /
T02D1197:223a-54: gtso bo bdag la bde ba gnas /
T02D1197:223a-56: 'di de stong pa'i gzugs ni min /
T02D1197:223a-58: gtso bo bdag ni sdig tshar gcod //
T02D1197:223a-59: tsha ni sangs rgyas yon tan rnams /
T02D1197:223a-61: dngos grub sems can rnam ster byed /
T02D1197:223a-63: 'dir ni mang po smos ci dgos /
T02D1197:223a-65: sems kyi sgyu ma'i gzugs su blta //
T02D1197:223a-66: ha zhes pa ni rgyu med pa /
T02D1197:223a-68: stong pa'i mtshan nyid las ni bzhengs //
T02D1197:223a-69: tsanda l'i yi yig gsum gyis /
T02D1197:223a-71: gzugs rnams nam mkha'i rang bzhin no /
T02D1197:223a-73: sna yi bu gar song nas nyal //
T02D1197:223a-74: ba rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis /
T02D1197:223a-76: bde ba chen po khyod brten nas /
T02D1197:223a-78: dbang po rnams kyis byang chub mchog / te zhes pa yis bde ba nyid /
T02D1197:223a-80: 'di ni sems can gyis rtogs pa /
T02D1197:223a-82: bde ba'i rang bzhin la ni gnas //
T02D1197:223a-83: nyam yis sems ni gnyis su med /
T02D1197:223b-0: rang bzhin gnas @223b nyid 'don pa nyid //
T02D1197:223b-1: ha ni gnyis su med pa'i mchog / mi zhes pa ni bdag dang bsre /
T02D1197:223b-3: stong dang stong min ming ni med /
T02D1197:223b-5: nyin dang mtshan mo de bzhin mtshams /
T02D1197:223b-7: bde ba btang nas ma zhugs shing /
T02D1197:223b-10: de ni mgon med sems can la //
T02D1197:223b-12: byang chub phyir ni 'bod par byed /
T02D1197:223b-14: thim pa'i gzugs ni rtag tu 'dor /
T02D1197:223b-16: drag po'i gzugs kyis mdzes pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:223b-17: tha zhes gnas ni drug cu bzhi //
T02D1197:223b-18: de yis rnal 'byor ma ni bskul //
T02D1197:223b-19: klu yi yi ge drug cu po //
T02D1197:223b-20: re re yang ni lnga lngar byas //
T02D1197:223b-21: de ltar lte ba'i 'khor lo nyid //
T02D1197:223b-22: sprul pa rnal 'byor ma yi lugs //
T02D1197:223b-24: de yang thim nas langs pa'o //
T02D1197:223b-26: de ni spros dang sdud pa'i gzugs //
T02D1197:223b-27: de bzhin yi ge sum cu yang /
T02D1197:223b-30: ye shes dkyil 'khor pho nya mo //
T02D1197:223b-31: yi ge re re yis ni bskul //
T02D1197:223b-32: tu zhes pa ni bdag gi gzugs //
T02D1197:223b-33: hu ni khyod dang gcig pa nyid //
T02D1197:223b-34: sa gzugs thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis /
T02D1197:223b-36: sems kyi mtshan nyid mi g-yo ba /
T02D1197:223b-38: mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid /
T02D1197:223b-40: des na gco bo sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D1197:223b-42: da ltar gzugs ni rtag tu bya /
T02D1197:223b-44: bsam gyis mi khyab mtshan nyid bsam /
T02D1197:223b-46: btsun mo bdag nyid 'khyud par byed //
T02D1197:223b-47: tsi ni rtag tu sems kyi gzugs /
T02D1197:223b-49: de nas gzhan gyi don shes bya /
T02D1197:223b-51: yan lag gzugs kyi ming ni byed /
T02D1197:223b-53: he ru ka dang de thabs gcig me /
T02D1197:223b-54: re re dang ni gnas kyang rung //
T02D1197:223b-55: do mbi spros pa las ring ba'o //
T02D1197:223b-56: mi ni dregs pa las brtson pa'o /
T02D1197:223b-58: rtag tu bdag ni rtag pa'i gzugs //
T02D1197:223b-59: tshi ni chad pa'i chos nyid do //
T02D1197:223b-60: aa ni mgon po bdag spyod dang /
T02D1197:223b-62: phyag rgya chen po'ang don med pa'o //
T02D1197:223b-63: nu zhes pa yis stong par 'dod //
T02D1197:223b-64: ma ni sgyu ma rtag tu rig ka /
T02D1197:223b-65: mgon po khyod ni bya ba yin /
T02D1197:223b-67: nam mkha' yi ni dbus su rol /
T02D1197:223b-69: thod pa'i dbus su gang tshe 'byung /
T02D1197:223b-73: khyod ma gtogs par ci yang med /
T02D1197:223b-75: byang chub mtshan nyid khyad par can //
T02D1197:224a-0: ci zhes pa ni gang bsam @224a * //
T02D1197:224a-2: / ta de ni bde ba kun gyi gnas //
T02D1197:224a-3: de ltar rnal 'byor ma rtag par //
T02D1197:224a-4: gnas kyis rnams la sgyu mas //
T02D1197:224a-5: de ltar gnas nas 'bod par byed //
T02D1197:224a-6: rang gi sems kyi snang bar bsam //
T02D1197:224a-7: h'um aam ye shes rnam par shes //
T02D1197:224a-8: sems dang sems las byung bar bstan //
T02D1197:224a-9: gnyis las bzhengs pa'i rdo rje can //
T02D1197:224a-10: thams cad du ni rang bzhin sku //
T02D1197:224a-11: lhag ma rnams ni 'chad bzhin pa'i //
T02D1197:224a-12: rnam par dag pa bshad pa las //
T02D1197:224a-13: de'i nges pa'i don bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:224a-14: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:224a-15: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa
T02D1197:224a-16: gsum pa'i he ru ka bskyed pa'i rab tu byed
T02D1197:224a-17: pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag par lta ba'i
T02D1197:224a-18: dran pa'i snang ba las ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi
T02D1197:224a-19: drang ba dang nges pa'i don bstan pa'i rab tu
T02D1197:224a-22: // / da ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma 'khor dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:224a-23: nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:224a-24: dgyes pa'i rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub thabs
T02D1197:224a-25: bstan pa'i rjes thogs su de nyid bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1197:224a-26: ji ltar 'jigs sde la 'jigs pa zer ba bzhin
T02D1197:224a-27: du 'on kyang gdan bzhi'i don ye shes mkha' 'gro
T02D1197:224a-28: ma la sogs pa dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid khong
T02D1197:224a-30: 'dir rdo rje gtso rgyal po zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:224a-31: 'dir sngon du rdo rje sems dpa' zhu ba las
T02D1197:224a-32: dgyes pa'i rdo rje can du gyur pa de'i bsdus
T02D1197:224a-34: de yang gtso bo zhes pa ni bdag med ma'i
T02D1197:224a-35: lta ba gsal ba'i 'od de dang ldan pas na
T02D1197:224a-36: rdo rje'o // de yang rnal 'byor thams cad la khyab par byed pa'i phyir rgyal po ste /
T02D1197:224a-37: gdan bzhi'i bdag po de'i shes rab yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:224a-38: de yang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa ni de'i gzugs kyi sgrub thabs rnal ba du ma'o //
T02D1197:224a-39: des na ye shes kyi don ni sna tshogs pa
T02D1197:224a-40: gcig pa nyid de'i mkha' 'gro ma ni mang po'i
T02D1197:224a-41: don te / sngon du gsungs pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:224a-42: de bzhin du gnyis kyi dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:224a-43: gnyis kyi dngos po zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes dang shes bya'o //
T02D1197:224b-0: de'i phyir gnyis med chos @224b zhes pa ni gnyis
T02D1197:224b-1: kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir sngon du zhu ba'i
T02D1197:224b-2: gzugs stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor mas bskul ba'i
T02D1197:224b-3: phyir bslang ba 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi dbus su rang
T02D1197:224b-4: bzhin med pa'i rnal 'byor de gnyis med par brjod
T02D1197:224b-5: do // de'i dbus su sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1197:224b-6: sems dpa' rnams kyis sam rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi
T02D1197:224b-7: rang gi sems kyi ngo bo las byung ba spros
T02D1197:224b-8: do // pa'i phyir / des na sems can gnyis med pa'i chos kyi ye shes can no //
T02D1197:224b-9: de rnams kyi dag pa rnam pa gsum zhes pa
T02D1197:224b-10: ni ye shes dang shes bya dang sbyor ba dag
T02D1197:224b-11: pa'o // de yang lan gsum du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1197:224b-12: sems can gyi lus la dbang po rnon po rnams
T02D1197:224b-13: kyis brjod pa tsam gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
T02D1197:224b-14: ye shes gnyis med pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:224b-15: des na rnal 'byor kun gyi dang por zhes pa
T02D1197:224b-16: ni rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bsdus pa ni gnyis
T02D1197:224b-18: de'i rnal 'byor ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:224b-19: dang po ni phul rab tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:224b-20: de nas sva bh'a wa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags nge /
T02D1197:224b-21: rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi sngags so //
T02D1197:224b-22: de bzhin badzra shuddha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags ni sna tshogs su sprul pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:224b-23: de bzhin du 'di dag gnyis med pa de'i mchog
T02D1197:224b-24: ni yo ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1197:224b-25: te / gnyis med pa'i yang gnyis med pa //
T02D1197:224b-26: zhes pa dbang po rnon po rnams dang sangs rgyas
T02D1197:224b-27: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni bzlas pa
T02D1197:224b-29: de bzhin du 'di nyid du da ltar gyi sems can rnams kyi sgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:224b-30: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung te /
T02D1197:224b-31: de ltar brjod nas zhes pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnyis med pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:224b-32: sva bh'a wa zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags brjod pa'o //
T02D1197:224b-33: des byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya zhes
T02D1197:224b-34: pa ni dang po nyid du gnyis med pa la
T02D1197:224b-35: bsam par bya'o // de yang las dang po'i rnal
T02D1197:224b-36: 'byor pas de'i dang po yang bskyed pa'i rim par
T02D1197:224b-37: bsam par bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // de yang
T02D1197:224b-38: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:224b-40: dang po gdong dag pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1197:225a-0: bsam gtan gyi gnas su zhugs nas @225a * //
T02D1197:225a-1: bde ba'i stan gyi steng du 'dug ste /
T02D1197:225a-2: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sku ras ris la sogs par chud par dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1197:225a-3: nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa phul te /
T02D1197:225a-4: bdud rtsi zos la gtor ma byin nas bzod par gsol te /
T02D1197:225a-6: skad cig tsam gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:225a-7: ni 'chad bzhin pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs
T02D1197:225a-8: dmigs par bya'o // des na rang gi snying gar
T02D1197:225a-9: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon nyi ma la
T02D1197:225a-10: gnas pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs las de bya ba'i
T02D1197:225a-11: cho ga de nyid kyi bsgom pa'o //
T02D1197:225a-12: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa ni ye shes kyi
T02D1197:225a-13: dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te cho ga'i bya bas mchod
T02D1197:225a-14: pa dbul zhing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa
T02D1197:225a-15: byas nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1197:225a-16: lhun po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nam
T02D1197:225a-17: mkha'i dbus su rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i
T02D1197:225a-18: dbus su lhun po'i steng du dkyil 'khor gyi khang
T02D1197:225a-19: pa rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:225a-20: sogs pa'i sgras mtshams su yang gser la sogs pa spras pa'o //
T02D1197:225a-21: khang bzangs de'i nang du rgyan rnams bsam mo //
T02D1197:225a-22: de la dbus su seng ge'i gdan la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon thig le tsam mo //
T02D1197:225a-23: des na bdag gi dbugs las 'byung ba zhes pa
T02D1197:225a-24: na 'dir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sa bon tsam
T02D1197:225a-25: mo // des na ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sna
T02D1197:225a-26: tshogs pas brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi
T02D1197:225a-27: rang bzhin gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1197:225a-29: de'i dbus su seng ge'i gdan zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:225a-30: sogs pa ni dbus dang shar dang byang dang nub
T02D1197:225a-31: dang lho ste gnas lnga ru'o //
T02D1197:225a-32: de rnams kyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re
T02D1197:225a-33: re ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor re rer
T02D1197:225a-34: 'gyur ro // des na sgrub thabs thams cad nyid
T02D1197:225a-35: kyi stong pa nyid kyi sgra ni ye shes kyi
T02D1197:225a-37: de yang khams sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no ;
T02D1197:225a-38: / des na mkha' 'gro ma'i rang gi dus rang
T02D1197:225a-39: rang gi khams las byung ba bdag gi dbugs las
T02D1197:225a-40: byung ba'i dus der ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la
T02D1197:225a-41: sogs pa bsgom pa nyid yod pa de la de
T02D1197:225a-42: skad ces bya'o // de ltar sngon gos dkar mo'i
T02D1197:225a-43: rnam par spros pa rgyu'i mkha' 'gro ma'i rjes su
T02D1197:225b-0: kha dog sngon @225b po bsgom pa ni 'o ma
T02D1197:225b-3: de bzhin du ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i shar dang
T02D1197:225b-4: byang dang nub dang lhor rim pa bzhin rdo rje
T02D1197:225b-5: mkha' 'gro ma dang 'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang
T02D1197:225b-6: ro langs mkha' 'gro ma dang gtum mo mkha' 'gro
T02D1197:225b-7: ma rnams so // de bzhin du dbang ldan la
T02D1197:225b-8: sogs pa'i mtshams bzhir rim pa bzhin bsam par bya
T02D1197:225b-9: ma rnams so // ste / seng ge mo dang /
T02D1197:225b-12: 'ug ba mo rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02D1197:225b-13: de bzhin du shar la sogs par g-yon skor gyi
T02D1197:225b-14: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi rnams su
T02D1197:225b-15: rim pa bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1197:225b-18: g-yo ldan ma'i rnal 'byor ma rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02D1197:225b-19: de ltar ye shes kyi dbang phyug ma bcu gsum
T02D1197:225b-20: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor las byung bar bsgom par
T02D1197:225b-21: bya'o // de nas ye shes kyang de bzhin du gzugs tsam gyis mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1197:225b-22: de'i tshe phrag mo gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:225b-23: de ltar gnyis med pa'i gnyis med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:225b-24: rig ma dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:225b-25: dang po sgra ni gnyis med par gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:225b-26: de nyid kyi dam tshig rlung dang zhes bya ba
T02D1197:225b-27: la sogs pa ni bdun du brtsegs pa'i sa bon
T02D1197:225b-28: te 'og tu ya la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:225b-29: de yang rdo rje'i sa bon gyis zhes pa ni ha zhes pa'i steng du sbyin pa'o //
T02D1197:225b-30: de ltar bsdus nas hkshmlwry'u de ltar brgyad brtsegs kyi
T02D1197:225b-31: bdag nyid lus kyi ming can rnam par bsam mo
T02D1197:225b-32: // de bzhin du thig le dang sgra dang tsheg
T02D1197:225b-33: drag dang lhan cig bsdus pa'i yi ge bcu gsum
T02D1197:225b-34: ni mkha' 'gro ma bcu gsum rnams bsdus pa'i phyir
T02D1197:225b-35: // te / aa wa dh'u t'ir mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1197:225b-36: bcu gsum gyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1197:225b-38: phra mo'i rnam pa la 'jug pa gang gis bsam
T02D1197:225b-39: gyis mi khyab pa gnyis med pa nyid du 'gyur
T02D1197:225b-40: ro // gtsug tor nas ni rkang mtheb bar //
T02D1197:225b-41: yi ge rnams bkod bsgom par bya //
T02D1197:225b-42: mkha' 'gro ma rnams bskyed pa gang //
T02D1197:225b-43: rkang gnyis pa yis rim zhes bya //
T02D1197:225b-44: yi ge sum cu ming ni nyid //
T02D1197:225b-45: sa nyid kyang ni bcu gsum nyid //
T02D1197:225b-46: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma rnams bsgom //
T02D1197:225b-47: bza' ba'i rang bzhin mdzes pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:226a-0: de bzhin du char pa'i rgyun zhes pa ni h'um ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i @226a * //
T02D1197:226a-2: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:226a-3: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa
T02D1197:226a-4: gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i rgya cher
T02D1197:226a-5: 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pa'i snang
T02D1197:226a-6: ba zhes pa'i gzhung ste gnyis pa bstan pa'o /
T02D1197:226a-8: // / da ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi shin tu
T02D1197:226a-9: phra ba sngon du gsungs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D1197:226a-10: 'khor las mkha' 'gro ma bcu gsum bskyed de /
T02D1197:226a-11: de'i re re'i dus las bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs lha mo bco lnga'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:226a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:226a-13: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs kyi rjes thogs
T02D1197:226a-14: su de nas zhes pa ni rnal 'byor rang bzhin
T02D1197:226a-15: med pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o //
T02D1197:226a-16: bdag med ma zhes pa ni phung po dang khams
T02D1197:226a-17: dang skye mched la sogs pa bdag med pa'i gzugs
T02D1197:226a-18: so // de'i sgrub thabs zhes pa ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid de /
T02D1197:226a-19: de bzhin du bshad ces pa ni mdor bsdus te dpyis phyin par gsungs pa'o //
T02D1197:226a-20: de nyid gsungs pa nam mkha'i dbyings //
T02D1197:226a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon du gsungs
T02D1197:226a-22: pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dus kyi rnal 'byor
T02D1197:226a-23: yi ge bcu gsum yi ge gcig gi rang bzhin
T02D1197:226a-24: chos thams cad 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo
T02D1197:226a-25: bo ste de nyid nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ming can
T02D1197:226a-26: ma mo rnams kyi skye gnas bzhin chos rnams thams
T02D1197:226a-28: de'i dbus su chud par zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:226a-29: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis rdul chags chen bsam zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:226a-32: 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ye
T02D1197:226a-33: shes kyi dkyil 'khor thim pa'i phyir slar yang de
T02D1197:226a-34: nyid du aa wa dh'u t'i'i chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1197:226a-35: las ye shes kyi khams lnga rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1197:226a-36: ro // de bzhin du 'khor lo zhes pa ni ye shes kyi sa'o //
T02D1197:226a-37: sngon du zhes pa ni ye shes kyi chu'o //
T02D1197:226a-38: tshul ji bzhin zhes pa ni ye shes kyi me'o //
T02D1197:226a-39: lha rnams zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rlung ngo //
T02D1197:226a-40: ci ltar 'byung ba zhes pa ni ye shes kyi nam mkha'o //
T02D1197:226a-41: de nyid ni rnal 'byor pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:226a-42: de bzhin du de nyid du sa bon dang myu
T02D1197:226b-0: gu bzhin thig le lnga 'byung @226b ba byang chub
T02D1197:226b-1: sems kyi rang gi ngo bo don dam pa'o //
T02D1197:226b-2: de yang khams lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:226b-3: de nyid kyis na 'khor lo sngon du song zhes
T02D1197:226b-4: bya ba la sogs pa bsgom par bya zhes pa'i
T02D1197:226b-6: de ltar ye shes dang shes bya'i bdag nyid rnam pa bcu nang gi yang nang ngo //
T02D1197:226b-7: chos 'byung las 'byung zhes pa ni au a'u ya
T02D1197:226b-8: ra wa la ma sha ka ksha ha zhes pa'i
T02D1197:226b-9: yi ge bcu las sa bcu dang sangs rgyas kyis
T02D1197:226b-10: 'byung ba'o // des na 'khor lo zhes pa ni sgra tsam mo //
T02D1197:226b-11: de yang nyis brtsegs zhes pa ni thig le dang tsheg drag dag khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:226b-12: dag pa'i rang bzhin med pa zhes pa ni stong
T02D1197:226b-13: pa dang snying rje bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi
T02D1197:226b-14: phyed pa'i gzugs la mos pas spyod pa'i sa dang
T02D1197:226b-15: rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i sa dag la lha'i rnam
T02D1197:226b-16: pa rnams zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:226b-17: de ltar sems can gyi ris rnams su sangs rgyas
T02D1197:226b-18: rnams spro zhing rang bzhin med pa'i de la rnam
T02D1197:226b-19: par spyod pa'o // de bzhin du ;
T02D1197:226b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskyed pa dang /
T02D1197:226b-22: rdzogs pa tha mal pa dang 'dus byas pa'i dbye
T02D1197:226b-23: bas rtogs par bya ste sku gsum la brten pa'i
T02D1197:226b-24: phyir ro // lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:226b-25: 'on kyang las dang po pas ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis bsgom par bya zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:226b-26: de bzhin du de nyid gsum zhes pa ni ye
T02D1197:226b-27: shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'dus pa'i bdag
T02D1197:226b-28: med ma'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D1197:226b-29: gnyis pa ni de nyid du dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:226b-30: de bzhin du gsum pa ni gnyis med pa'i yang
T02D1197:226b-31: gnyis med pa de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas pa'i phyir
T02D1197:226b-34: au ni rkang pa'i mthil nas brjod //
T02D1197:226b-35: 'dir ni pus mo gnyis ka yi //
T02D1197:226b-36: snal ma phra mor sdud par 'gyur //
T02D1197:226b-37: a'u zhes pa ni au gnyis so //
T02D1197:226b-38: ya zhes pa ni brla gnyis su //
T02D1197:226b-40: ra zhes pa ni me yi khams //
T02D1197:226b-41: gsang ba nyid du brjod pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:226b-42: wa zhes pa ni lto ba'i snar //
T02D1197:226b-43: la zhes pa ni brang du brjod //
T02D1197:226b-44: ma zhes pa ni 'di nyid du //
T02D1197:226b-45: brjod pa yis ni thim par 'gyur //
T02D1197:226b-46: sha ni mgrin pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D1197:226b-47: ka ni lce yi rtsa ba ru //
T02D1197:226b-48: ksha ni brjod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1197:226b-49: dbang po rnams ni sdud par 'gyur //
T02D1197:227a-2: dpral bar zla ba phyed pa'o //
T02D1197:227a-3: gtsug tor gnas su thig le ni //
T02D1197:227a-4: brjod pas der ni thims par 'gyur //
T02D1197:227a-6: bsam med gnyis su med mtshan nyid //
T02D1197:227a-7: de ltar srid dang mya ngan 'das //
T02D1197:227a-8: rang gi ngo bo 'dir mtshon pa /
T02D1197:227a-9: mkha' spyod sa spyod lha mo gnyis //
T02D1197:227a-10: 'di rnams thog mthas rgyas gdab pa'i //
T02D1197:227a-11: rgyu ni bde ba nyid kyi phyir //
T02D1197:227a-12: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:227a-13: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa
T02D1197:227a-14: gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i rgya cher
T02D1197:227a-15: 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pa'i snang
T02D1197:227a-16: pa zhes pa'i gzhung ste gsum pa bstan pa'o /
T02D1197:227a-18: // / da ni slob ma rnams kyis phyag rgya chen
T02D1197:227a-19: po'i dngos grub thob par bya ba dang chos kyi
T02D1197:227a-20: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pas
T02D1197:227a-21: bris pa de bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1197:227a-22: sngon du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' sgom pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:227a-23: dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa mdor bstan pa 'di'i slar bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:227a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:227a-25: de nas zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa
T02D1197:227a-26: gsum pa bstan pa'i mthar slar bshad pa la 'jug
T02D1197:227a-27: pa'o // phyis sngon du bstan pa'i rjes thogs su 'byung ba de la'ang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:227a-28: de yang yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1197:227a-29: zhes pa ni gang gis nyan pa'i skye bo rnams
T02D1197:227a-30: kyis khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar shin
T02D1197:227a-31: tu gsal ba nyid du bshad par bya'o //
T02D1197:227a-33: dkyil 'khor chen po bla na med //
T02D1197:227a-34: ces pa ni snga ma la ltos pa'i phyir rab tu rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1197:227a-35: yang na bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis nus pa
T02D1197:227a-36: bstan pa tsam gyis sems can rnams kyis phyag rgya
T02D1197:227a-38: ji ltar bdag cag gi brgyud pa padma badzra'i zhal
T02D1197:227a-39: snga nas kyis ao dyan pa la bstan cing des
T02D1197:227a-40: kyang rdo rje slob dpon aindra bh'u ti bdag la
T02D1197:227a-41: bstan pas spros pa dang bcas pas phyag rgya chen
T02D1197:227a-42: po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba de ltar /
T02D1197:227a-43: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni //
T02D1197:227a-44: zhes pa ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02D1197:227a-45: rdo rje snying po la dbang byin zhing 'di nyid
T02D1197:227a-46: du sems can thams cad lung bstan pa de ltar
T02D1197:227b-0: rdo rje dbyings dang mtshungs @227b pa zab mo las
T02D1197:227b-1: kyang zab pa rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D1197:227b-2: rnam pa gsum pa'i don la dang po rdo rje
T02D1197:227b-3: dbyings kyi tshul gyis bya zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:227b-5: rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar brjod //
T02D1197:227b-6: ces pa ni cung zad nus pa thob pa'i slob dpon gyis bya'o //
T02D1197:227b-7: de nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:227b-8: yang na tha mal pa'i slob dpon yang 'dod chags
T02D1197:227b-9: la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral zhing rdo rje
T02D1197:227b-10: sems dpa'i yang nga rgyal dang ldan pa sangs rgyas
T02D1197:227b-11: dang mtshungs pa des kyang dkyil 'khor 'di byas shing
T02D1197:227b-12: slob mas kyang dad pas blangs nas thams cad sangs
T02D1197:227b-13: rgyas thob par 'gyur te gzhan du ni ma yin
T02D1197:227b-15: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gnas zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:227b-16: sogs pa ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bya ba'i phyir
T02D1197:227b-17: so phag la sogs pa gsal lo //
T02D1197:227b-19: phyag rgya chen po yongs su bzung //
T02D1197:227b-20: zhes pa ni 'chad bzhin pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1197:227b-21: sngags pas 'di ni zhes pa la sngags pa ni
T02D1197:227b-22: rnam pa gnyis te grub pa dang ma grub pa'o
T02D1197:227b-23: // des na thams cad nyid la zhes pa ni
T02D1197:227b-24: sems can thams cad nyid la bltas na mi shes
T02D1197:227b-25: pa rgyang ring bar 'gyur ba de la de skad
T02D1197:227b-26: // ces bya'o // 'dir ji ltar aodyan pa'i zhal
T02D1197:227b-27: snga nas kyis rdo rje bu mo bstan pas phyag
T02D1197:227b-28: rgya chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed par
T02D1197:227b-30: yang dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir sa sbyangs pa'i rjes
T02D1197:227b-31: thogs su gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:227b-33: tshon sna lnga las bcos pa'i srad bu dkyil 'khor
T02D1197:227b-35: des na ci ltar nus pa zhes pa ni khru gang nas brtsams te /
T02D1197:227b-36: ji srid khru stong gi bar gyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:227b-37: gru bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:227b-38: rdo rje srad bu zhes pa ni zlum por bskor
T02D1197:227b-39: ba'i phyir ka ba brgyad kyi phyi ru rdo rje
T02D1197:227b-42: rdo rje ka ba'i rtser gnas pa //
T02D1197:227b-43: dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan par bya //
T02D1197:227b-44: zhes pa ni sgo'i mthar thug par lnga brtsegs su byas te /
T02D1197:227b-45: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rim pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:228a-0: de nas zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de rnams kyi dbus su sangs rgyas kyi @228a * //
T02D1197:228a-1: gzugs brnyan zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams 'chad bzhin pa'i rim pas dgod par bya'o //
T02D1197:228a-2: de'i don gyi dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
T02D1197:228a-3: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D1197:228a-4: ji ltar phyis mdor bsdus te gsungs pa 'di nyid
T02D1197:228a-5: sngon du cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D1197:228a-7: de bzhin du sgrub thabs khyod la bshad ces pa
T02D1197:228a-8: la kyang gi sgra ni 'di nyid du rdo rje
T02D1197:228a-9: dbyings bzhin du 'dir yang sgrub thabs kyi tshul las
T02D1197:228a-10: mi gsal ba gsal bar byed pa de la bshad
T02D1197:228a-12: de la dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de la zhes pa ni de'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:228a-13: dang po zhes pa ni dang po nyid du'o //
T02D1197:228a-14: lha'i khang par zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i gnas sam
T02D1197:228a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi khang par bzhugs te der bsgom par
T02D1197:228a-16: bya zhes pa'o // der bris pa'am 'bur du brkos
T02D1197:228a-17: pa'am blugs pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs
T02D1197:228a-18: bya zhes pa'o // dmigs te ; rang gi snying
T02D1197:228a-19: gar aa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zla
T02D1197:228a-20: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sa bon yongs su

T02D1197:228a-22: bya zhes pa'o // dmigs te ; de / gcig
T02D1197:228a-23: ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rim pas aom mo
T02D1197:228a-24: bya zhes pa'o // dmigs te ; de / // rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rim pas h'um ngo //
T02D1197:228a-25: yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer las
T02D1197:228a-26: ji ltar gsungs pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur te de ltar
T02D1197:228a-27: cho ga bzhin zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:228a-28: de bzhin du rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi rdo rje
T02D1197:228a-29: rnams kyis thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1197:228a-31: sogs pa'i sgras ni spyan ma la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang khro bo'i lha rnams bzung ste /
T02D1197:228a-32: de rnams kyis ji ltar sprul pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02D1197:228a-33: gzhan yang de rnams kyi mdun du bdag la dgongs
T02D1197:228a-34: su gsol zhes pa la sogs pa la thams cad
T02D1197:228a-36: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:228a-37: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni sngon nas bsgoms pa'i sku sgra brnyan lta bu'o //
T02D1197:228a-38: de yang de las byung ba'i sems can de rnams la chos ston par snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:228a-39: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de
T02D1197:228a-40: bzhin du chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi yid
T02D1197:228a-41: de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:228a-42: yid kyang brtags na bdag med pa'o //
T02D1197:228a-43: de bzhin du thams cad blta'o //
T02D1197:228b-0: phyir zhes pa la sogs pa la @228b sprul pa
T02D1197:228b-1: zhes pa ni spros pa dang bcas pas sprul pa'o
T02D1197:228b-2: // de'i phyir sems med pa zhes pa ni da
T02D1197:228b-3: ltar gyi sems can rnams kyi dngos pos yongs su
T02D1197:228b-5: des rtsod pa'i dus su sems de nyid kyis yongs
T02D1197:228b-6: su brtags pa'i phyir dngos po zhes phul du byung
T02D1197:228b-7: ba de bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:228b-8: des na chos thams cad gdod nas ma skyes zhes
T02D1197:228b-9: bya ba la sogs pa yid kyis sngags brjod par
T02D1197:228b-10: bya'o // de nas rang bzhin 'grub pa zhes bya
T02D1197:228b-11: ba la sogs pa ni don ji lta ba nyid
T02D1197:228b-13: 'on kyang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis rnal 'byor gyi khyad par yod de /
T02D1197:228b-14: gtum mo sbyar bas thig le'i zla ba lta ste /
T02D1197:228b-15: de yi sngags ni aom la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:228b-16: gru gsum zhes pa ni aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs
T02D1197:228b-17: sum skor bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ba de
T02D1197:228b-19: yangs pa'i gzugs can zhes pa ni spros pa'i gzugs can no //

T02D1197:228b-23: kyi bdag nyid bha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya'o
T02D1197:228b-24: // de nyid ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rim pas de kho na nyid sdud pas brjod do //
T02D1197:228b-25: de bzhin du me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug brjod de /
T02D1197:228b-26: de la me tog ma dang /
T02D1197:228b-42: de ltar lhag ma ni go sla bas bdag gis
T02D1197:228b-43: rgyas par ma bris te gzhung rgyas pas 'jigs pa'i
T02D1197:228b-44: phyir dang gzhan du rnyed sla ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:228b-45: de bzhin du phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:228b-46: sogs pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las phyi ru
T02D1197:228b-47: spros pa'o // snga ma dang 'dra ba de'i phyed tshad tsam zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:228b-48: nang gi rim pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor las phyi'i dkyil 'khor lnga'o //
T02D1197:228b-49: de re re'i nang nas snying po'i rim pa'i phyi
T02D1197:228b-50: phyogs bzhir rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa
T02D1197:229a-0: lta bu bri'o // de bzhin du ma gsungs kyang rim pa gzhan dkyil 'khor @229a * //
T02D1197:229a-1: lhag ma so so gsum la /
T02D1197:229a-2: me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams re res byas so //
T02D1197:229a-3: de bzhin du rim pa bzhis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:229a-4: de bzhin du 'dir rnal 'byor thams cad shes rab dang thabs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:229a-5: de bzhin du yang lha thams cad kyi ste dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:229a-6: ral gri zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil
T02D1197:229a-7: 'khor thams cad kyi shar dang mer rnam par snang
T02D1197:229a-8: mdzad la sogs pa'i g-yas kyi phyag dang po la
T02D1197:229a-9: 'khor lo'o // de bzhin du dbang ldan dang byang
T02D1197:229a-10: du don yod par grub pa la sogs pa'i ni
T02D1197:229a-11: 'khor lo'o // ral gri'o // de bzhin du rlung
T02D1197:229a-12: dang nub tu 'od bdag med pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:229a-13: 'khor lo'o // ral gri'o // lcags kyu'o // de
T02D1197:229a-14: bzhin du bden bral dang lho ru rin chen 'byung
T02D1197:229a-15: ldan la sogs ba'i zhags pa'o //
T02D1197:229a-16: de bzhin du dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams
T02D1197:229a-17: cad kyi phyag lhag ma g-yon pa dang g-yas pa
T02D1197:229a-18: dag gi phyag lnga lnga po rnams kyi ni bcom
T02D1197:229a-20: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi yi ge'i don ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:229a-21: 'on kyang 'dir dkyil 'khor ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1197:229a-22: spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa dang /
T02D1197:229a-23: shin tu spros pa med pa'o //
T02D1197:229a-24: de la gang spros pa dang bcas pa de ni
T02D1197:229a-25: rdul tshon la sogs pas bris pa'am 'bur du byas
T02D1197:229a-26: pa ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i don du bya'o
T02D1197:229a-27: // de bzhin du spros pa med pa ni rim
T02D1197:229a-28: pa gsum la sogs pa'i khang bzangs su dpa' bo
T02D1197:229a-29: dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams 'dus par bya'o
T02D1197:229a-30: // // de yang rdo rje dbyings bzhin du kha
T02D1197:229a-31: dog dang mtshan mar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang
T02D1197:229a-33: de'i dbus su rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje sems
T02D1197:229a-34: dpa'i nga rgyal gyis bsgyings par bdag nyid bsgom par
T02D1197:229a-35: bya'o // de rnams kyi mdun du nye bar spyod

T02D1197:229a-37: bca' ba la sogs pa dang btung bas sogs pa
T02D1197:229a-38: rnams 'chad bzhin pa las bya zhes pa ni nges
T02D1197:229a-39: bya'o // pa'o // de la shin tu spros pa
T02D1197:229a-40: med pa'i dkyil 'khor la spyod pa ni rang gi
T02D1197:229a-41: bdag nyid kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pas nus
T02D1197:229a-42: pa thob nas mngon sum du dkyil 'khor spros pa
T02D1197:229a-43: de mthong bas slob ma'i tshogs dkyil 'khor bde rnams
T02D1197:229b-1: de rnams kyang snyoms par zhugs pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par byed ces dgongs so //
T02D1197:229b-2: 'on kyang tha mal pa'i slob dpon gyis kyang de'i
T02D1197:229b-3: bdag nyid mngon sum du byed de 'dod pa'i yon
T02D1197:229b-4: tan lnga dang ldan zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:229b-5: de ltar gzhung lugs cung zad 'chad bzhin pa las gsal bar byed do //
T02D1197:229b-6: des na 'dir ma gsungs zhes pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1197:229b-7: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo'i rtog pa
T02D1197:229b-8: gsum mdor bstan pa gsum gyi mthar slar bshad pa'i
T02D1197:229b-9: rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta pa'i dran
T02D1197:229b-10: pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzhung bstan pa ste
T02D1197:229b-12: / da ni de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D1197:229b-13: pa mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi nang gi dam
T02D1197:229b-14: tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:229b-15: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:229b-16: nyan par 'tshal zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po
T02D1197:229b-17: la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1197:229b-18: la zhus pa'o // phyag rgya zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1197:229b-19: de yang ngag gi zhes pa ni ngag gi sgo nas khong du chud pa ste /
T02D1197:229b-20: tha mal pa'i gnas skabs kyi dus su yang sems
T02D1197:229b-21: dang sems las byung ba'i dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir
T02D1197:229b-22: ro // de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ces pa ni mngon sum du nyams su myong ba'o //
T02D1197:229b-23: de nas gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:229b-24: rnal 'byor zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1197:229b-25: de yang rnal 'byor ma'i zhes pa ni aa wa
T02D1197:229b-26: dh'u t'i'i rnam pa drug dang sbyor ba'i yan lag
T02D1197:229b-27: drug ste 'khor lo drug gi rab tu dbye bas
T02D1197:229b-28: so // des na mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi dam
T02D1197:229b-29: tshig gi brda'i skad kyis de bstan zhes gsungs te
T02D1197:229b-30: so // / thub pa chen po zhes pa ni
T02D1197:229b-31: chos kyi sku rtag pa des sna tshogs rgyas btab
T02D1197:229b-32: pas na thub pa can no //
T02D1197:229b-33: brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid ni thub pa'o //
T02D1197:229b-34: yang na 'di ltar rang rig pas nye bar spyod
T02D1197:229b-35: pa la 'jug pa'i mi smra ba'i sbyor ba de
T02D1197:229b-36: ni thub pa chen po zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1197:229b-38: ldan 'das zhes pa ni rar rig pa'i sems so
T02D1197:229b-39: // de nyid mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa ni 'khor
T02D1197:229b-40: lo drug la bsgyur ba'i dus kyi pho nya mo
T02D1197:229b-41: drug ni aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:229b-42: de yang ming drug dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1197:230a-1: dus kyi pho nya mo drug gi nang du 'dus
T02D1197:230a-2: pa nyid kyi sems rtse gcig pa nyid mngon shes
T02D1197:230a-4: de bzhin du rnam par rgyal pa'i stobs zhes pa
T02D1197:230a-5: ni phyag rgya chen por rab tu song bas bdud
T02D1197:230a-6: las rnam par rgyal ba ste snying rje'i stobs kyis
T02D1197:230a-7: so // de ltar phyag rgya dang snying rje chen
T02D1197:230a-8: po gnyis med pa'i dngos po zhes pa gang yin
T02D1197:230a-9: so // pa de'o // de bzhin du ting nge

T02D1197:230a-36: de la 'khor lo drug ni khams drug gi rang bzhin te dus kyi rtsa'o //
T02D1197:230a-37: de rnams la thabs kyi rang bzhin gsum mo //
T02D1197:230a-38: de bzhin du shes rab kyi rang bzhin gsum mo //
T02D1197:230a-39: de la gtsug tor dang dpral ba dang snying ga'i 'khor lo gsum ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:230a-40: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang lte ba dang gsang ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:230a-41: de bzhin du aa wa dh'u t'i'i gnyis te lte ba'i steng du lam gsum du song ba'o //
T02D1197:230a-42: de bzhin du 'og tu lam gsum du song ba'o //
T02D1197:230a-43: de dag gi rnam pa drug ni dus kyi rtsa'o //
T02D1197:230a-44: de ltar lte ba'i dbus kyi 'og dang steng du bo la dang kakko lar brjod do //
T02D1197:230a-45: de la yi ge'i don brjod pa /
T02D1197:230a-47: gzhu yi rnam pa lta bu'i rlung //
T02D1197:230a-48: 'og tu dus me'i rtsa rnams la //
T02D1197:230a-49: thur sel dang ni khu ba gnas //
T02D1197:230a-50: de ni ye shes khu bar brjod /
T02D1197:230a-52: de nyid sum cu gnyis su shes //
T02D1197:230a-53: mkha' 'gro ma ni snal phra mo //
T02D1197:230a-54: de nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'o /
T02D1197:230a-56: khu ba la sogs lha mo thim /
T02D1197:230a-58: dbang po dang ni lhan cig srog / re /
T02D1197:230a-59: khu ba yi ni lha rnams gang //
T02D1197:230a-60: thi zhes pa ni bshang bas gang /
T02D1197:230b-0: byang chub ces @230b pa nyid ni byed /
T02D1197:230b-3: mu ni rmongs pa'i lha mo'o //
T02D1197:230b-7: rgyu med pa yi ro ni myang /
T02D1197:230b-9: 'byin byed byis pa'i rtsa ni gang /
T02D1197:230b-11: de bzhin 'dam skyes gang byed pa /
T02D1197:230b-13: khu byug sgra ni steng du 'bar /
T02D1197:230b-15: bde ba bdag gi sems ni rnyed /
T02D1197:230b-17: dril bu'i rgyun la sems brtag pas /
T02D1197:230b-19: yid kyis bsams te snyan par smra /
T02D1197:230b-21: gshin rje'i pho nya 'dir ni shes /
T02D1197:230b-23: tshig rgyun du ni ci bgyi ba'o /
T02D1197:230b-25: sna yi rtse las chang 'thung ba'o //
T02D1197:230b-26: ta zhes pa ni nam mkha'i lha //
T02D1197:230b-27: ho ni chags pa can lha mo /
T02D1197:230b-29: mda' can gsang ba'i nang du'o /
T02D1197:230b-31: skra dkar byed pa'i lha mo yang /
T02D1197:230b-33: dbang po sna yi nang du rgyu /
T02D1197:230b-35: ral gri zhes bya lkugs par byed /
T02D1197:230b-37: khrag gi kha yi lha mo'o /
T02D1197:230b-41: ge sar skye gnas ming can te /
T02D1197:230b-43: nga ru byed pa 'dzin pa nyid /
T02D1197:230b-45: dbang po sgyu ma dbyangs can ma //
T02D1197:230b-47: mi yi gzugs ni lha mor shes /
T02D1197:230b-49: ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mtshams su //
T02D1197:230b-50: de ltar rtsa ni sum cu gnyis //
T02D1197:230b-51: ye shes 'khor lo'i ming nyid do //
T02D1197:230b-52: rtse gcig nang du gnas pa nyid //
T02D1197:230b-53: ye shes mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis //
T02D1197:230b-55: dus me gcig bu la ni thim //
T02D1197:230b-56: ye shes phung po sngon rgyu ba //
T02D1197:230b-57: thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed //
T02D1197:230b-58: de las ye shes khams ni skyes //
T02D1197:230b-59: rnam shes rnam pa'i sems byas te //
T02D1197:230b-60: de bzhin gtsug tor gyi ni rtsa //
T02D1197:230b-61: lte dbus aa wa dh'u t'i ni //
T02D1197:230b-62: steng du song ba sgra gcan te //
T02D1197:230b-63: nam mkha' yi ni rtsa ni lnga /
T02D1197:230b-65: mdzes ma rnams kyi za ba'i rtsa /
T02D1197:230b-71: rdo rje sna yi nang du bde /
T02D1197:230b-73: lnga pa yi ni dbus su mtshon //
T02D1197:230b-74: lha mo yang ni 'byung lnga rnams //
T02D1197:230b-76: dpral ba'i rtsa ni med phyed sogs //
T02D1197:230b-77: ye shes dbus su yi ge rnams //
T02D1197:230b-78: nang du byang chub sems rgyu ba //
T02D1197:230b-79: grangs ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1197:230b-81: sems dang sems byung mkha' mnyam pa /
T02D1197:230b-83: mngal nas 'byung ba rnams la rgyu /
T02D1197:230b-85: dbang po'i sgo'i bde ba yis /
T02D1197:230b-87: sna yi nang nas gzhan du 'gro //
T02D1197:230b-88: de ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yi //
T02D1197:231a-0: @231a * // ma ni de bzhin dam tshig ste //
T02D1197:231a-2: na ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyid /
T02D1197:231a-7: ha zhes pa'i ni sems ming la /
T02D1197:231a-9: nam mkha' ya ni rlung thim mo /
T02D1197:231a-11: blo dang dbugs ni 'gog byed pa /
T02D1197:231a-13: 'khyud pas zla ba sad pa nyid /
T02D1197:231a-14: dza rdo rjer 'dzags pas shin tu nyal /
T02D1197:231a-16: de ni dngul chu'i rgyun dang mtshungs /
T02D1197:231a-18: lta ba yi ni rtsa bar ltung /
T02D1197:231a-20: sdong bu yi ni rtsa bar sprul /
T02D1197:231a-22: mi shigs thams cad khyab pa'o //
T02D1197:231a-24: 'di ni dbang por gnas pa'i rgyus /
T02D1197:231a-26: de yang gzung bar dka' ba'i gnas /
T02D1197:231a-28: mtshan ma ngan pa rtag tu spangs /
T02D1197:231a-32: bde ba'i dba' rlabs zhes bya'i phyir /
T02D1197:231a-36: du ni rnam pa bzhi ru 'dzin //
T02D1197:231a-37: dzri 'dir gnas pa yi blo ni med /
T02D1197:231a-39: rten gyi dga' ba las ni grol //
T02D1197:231a-40: ai ni zla ba dang bral ba'o /
T02D1197:231a-42: zla ba'i ye shes dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1197:231a-43: au yid dbyangs ni thams cad 'gro //
T02D1197:231a-44: de ltar rtsa ni sum cu gnyis //
T02D1197:231a-45: dgyes pa'i rdo rje kun nas gtso //
T02D1197:231a-46: de rnams las byung rtog pa ni //
T02D1197:231a-47: sum cu rtsa gnyis bdag gis brjod /
T02D1197:231a-48: mi phyed ma sogs dang mo ni //
T02D1197:231a-49: rdo rje snying po mngon byang chub //
T02D1197:231a-50: rtog pa'i rgyal po ru ni brjod //
T02D1197:231a-51: gnyis pa sgyur 'phrul rtog pa ste //
T02D1197:231a-52: gsum pa sangs rgyas gar mkhan no //
T02D1197:231a-53: bzhi pa sna tshogs rtog pa ste //
T02D1197:231a-54: lnga pa rdo rje rtog pa'o //
T02D1197:231a-55: drug pa stobs po che yi ste //
T02D1197:231a-56: bdun pa mi g-yo ba rtog pa //
T02D1197:231a-57: brgyad pa gzungs kyi rtog pa'o //
T02D1197:231a-58: dgu pa rigs ni byed ma yi //
T02D1197:231a-59: bcu pa mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis //
T02D1197:231a-61: bcu gnyis pa ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1197:231a-62: dngos grub rtog pa sgrol ma yi //
T02D1197:231a-63: rtog pa 'di ni bcu gsum pa //
T02D1197:231a-64: rdo rje phag mo bcu bzhi ba //
T02D1197:231a-65: bco lnga pa ni me lha yi //
T02D1197:231a-66: bdag med rtag pa bcu drug pa //
T02D1197:231a-67: bcu bdun pa ni gshin rje'i dgra //
T02D1197:231a-68: bco brgyad pa ni h'um mdzad kyi //
T02D1197:231a-69: bcu dgu pa ni phyir bzlog pa //
T02D1197:231a-70: sbyin sreg rtog pa nyi shu pa //
T02D1197:231a-71: nyi shu gcig ni rab gnas kyi'o //
T02D1197:231b-0: dkyil @231b 'khor chen po rtog pa ni //
T02D1197:231b-1: nyi shu gnyis pa nyid du 'dod //
T02D1197:231b-2: nyi shu gsum pa gtor ma'i rtog / nyi shu bzhi ba lha'i gnas kyi //
T02D1197:231b-3: nyi shu lnga pa mngon rtogs kyi //
T02D1197:231b-4: de bzhin rgyas btab nyi shu drug / nyi shu bdun pa byed pa ni //
T02D1197:231b-5: nyi shu brgyad pa klu yi 'od //
T02D1197:231b-6: de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa //
T02D1197:231b-7: padma gang dbang phyug rtog pa //
T02D1197:231b-8: sum cu ba ni dbyangs rtog pa //
T02D1197:231b-9: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rtog pa nyid //
T02D1197:231b-10: sum cu rtsa gcig pa ru 'dod //
T02D1197:231b-11: srid mthar phyin pa rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02D1197:231b-12: rtog pa sum cu gnyis por brjod //
T02D1197:231b-13: de ltar rtsa rnams yas byung ba //
T02D1197:231b-14: dus kyi longs spyod la ni spyod //
T02D1197:231b-15: lte ba'i steng gi g-yon gyi rtsar //
T02D1197:231b-16: bde chen 'khor lo zhes pa nyid //
T02D1197:231b-17: de bzhin mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D1197:231b-18: lte ba'i steng gi g-yas gnas pa //
T02D1197:231b-19: de rnams rtsa ni rab tu bshad //
T02D1197:231b-20: rnam pa bcu drug de kho na //
T02D1197:231b-21: yi ge bcu drug dbye ba yi //
T02D1197:231b-22: dam tshig mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid do /
T02D1197:231b-24: kun du bzang po zhes pa nyid /
T02D1197:231b-26: dbu ma'i dga' ba tsam na nyid /
T02D1197:231b-28: zla ba'i dga' ba de bzhin shes /
T02D1197:231b-29: ko keng rus kyi ni dga' ba nyid //
T02D1197:231b-30: thu ni mi rtog dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:231b-31: ri zhes ni de bzhin mchog / sa ni reg bya'i dga' ba nyid /
T02D1197:231b-33: yid tshim pa yi dga' ba nyid //
T02D1197:231b-34: de ni yid can dga' bar byed //
T02D1197:231b-35: hi ni snying gi dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:231b-36: ka ni nam mkha'i dga' ba nyid //
T02D1197:231b-37: pu ni 'jigs pa'i dga' ba nyid //
T02D1197:231b-38: ra ni de bzhin dga' bral nyid //
T02D1197:231b-39: la ni lhan cig skyes dga' mtshon //
T02D1197:231b-40: ai ni de bzhin sna tshogs pa'o /
T02D1197:231b-42: aa wa dh'um t'i'i bla ma'o //
T02D1197:231b-43: de ltar rnal 'byor mchog gis phul //
T02D1197:231b-44: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi dam tshig gzhan //
T02D1197:231b-45: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ni ming //
T02D1197:231b-47: de yang khams kyi dbang gis shes //
T02D1197:231b-48: dus kyi rtsa yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1197:231b-49: der ni khrag gi thig le rgyu //
T02D1197:231b-50: gsang ba la sogs yi ge 'dod //
T02D1197:231b-51: de rnams kyi yang don ni gang //
T02D1197:231b-52: 'chad bzhin pa yis bstan par bya //
T02D1197:231b-53: de'i phyir lte ba'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D1197:231b-55: yi ge nyid kyang drug cu bzhi //
T02D1197:231b-56: ai ni gnas kyi rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1197:231b-58: phreng ma zhes pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1197:231b-59: le zhes pa ni thong rmo ma /
T02D1197:231b-61: de bzhin du ni shing 'tshong ma /
T02D1197:232a-0: bur shing phyed mar de bzhin @232a * //
T02D1197:232a-2: dha na gzhu mkhan ma dang gar mkhan ma //
T02D1197:232a-3: sa zhes pa ni smad 'tshong ma'o /
T02D1197:232a-5: gzhon nu ma yi 'khyud pa ma /
T02D1197:232a-7: sgo nga las skyes rnams 'tshong ma /
T02D1197:232a-9: snal ma thag pa de bzhin nyid //
T02D1197:232a-10: hi ni de bzhin 'tshod pa mo /
T02D1197:232a-12: bram ze mo yi rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1197:232a-14: de bzhin khro bo'i rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1197:232a-16: bza' dang btung la chags pa gang /
T02D1197:232a-20: 'brul la sogs pa'i tshong pa nyid //
T02D1197:232a-22: dbang po dkar mo'i rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1197:232a-23: pe ni khron pa byed pa mo /
T02D1197:232a-25: shan ma zhes pa'i rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1197:232a-29: nam mkhar 'gro ma de bzhin nyid //
T02D1197:232a-30: ta zhes pa ni sbubs byed ma /
T02D1197:232a-32: de bzhin zas 'tsho mar ni shes /
T02D1197:232a-34: ro 'dzin pa yi blo gros can //
T02D1197:232a-35: te zhes pa ni rgyud byed ma /
T02D1197:232a-37: bzang mo'i rtsa ni spyong byed ma /
T02D1197:232a-43: mche ba srub pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1197:232a-44: na zhes pa ni nya pa mo //
T02D1197:232a-45: ma zhes pa ni lham byed ma /
T02D1197:232a-47: de bzhin chos dkar bdag por gnas /
T02D1197:232a-49: 'dir ni rus pa byed pa nyid //
T02D1197:232a-50: ai ni spra tshil byed pa mo //
T02D1197:232a-51: ni ni de bzhin ras 'tshong ma //
T02D1197:232a-52: ra zhes pa ni chos mkhan ma ;
T02D1197:232a-54: gser byed ma yi rnal 'byor m'a /
T02D1197:232a-56: mi 'ching ba rnams mchod byed ma /
T02D1197:232a-58: dri yi rdzas la sogs 'tshong ma /
T02D1197:232a-60: de bzhin du ni gtum mo nyid //
T02D1197:232a-61: da zhes pa ni g-yung mor 'dod /
T02D1197:232a-63: gnyug mar med pa'i rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1197:232a-65: kun dga' rab srung byed ma /
T02D1197:232a-67: so rtsi so la 'tshong byed ma /
T02D1197:232a-70: dza ni ba lang skyong mar shes //
T02D1197:232a-74: de bzhin rgyal po'i pu mo nyid //
T02D1197:232a-76: pa zhes pa ni shing mkhan ma //
T02D1197:232a-77: pa ni gos bzo byed ma'o //
T02D1197:232a-78: na ni gnyug me'i gar byed ma'o //
T02D1197:232a-79: ai ni mar khu mar zhes bya //
T02D1197:232a-81: ai ni mching bu byed ma'o //
T02D1197:232a-82: ma ni ri mo byed ma'o //
T02D1197:232a-84: ai ni rgyal po'i nang 'khor ma //
T02D1197:232a-85: dza ni de la rje'u rigs mo //
T02D1197:232a-86: ku bum pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1197:232a-87: du ni dmangs rigs mo nyid do //
T02D1197:232b-1: nad sel pa yi sman pa mo /
T02D1197:232b-2: ga gdong 'gegs lha mo khyim pa mo //
T02D1197:232b-3: de / de ltar lte ba'i g-yon logs kyi //
T02D1197:232b-5: rnal 'byor ma'i cha lugs mang po ni //
T02D1197:232b-6: lus kyi dngos po las ni byung //
T02D1197:232b-8: dus kyi rtsa las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1197:232b-9: 'di nyid kyi ni g-yas logs la //
T02D1197:232b-10: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa brgyad gnas //
T02D1197:232b-11: ta zhes pa ni ma nyid de //
T02D1197:232b-12: ai ni de bzhin bu mo'o //
T02D1197:232b-13: na zhes pa ni tsha mo'o //
T02D1197:232b-14: de ni de bzhin sring mo'o //
T02D1197:232b-15: ma zhes pa ni sgyug mo'o //
T02D1197:232b-16: ba ne de bzhin gnyen mo'o //
T02D1197:232b-17: dzi ni pha yi sring mo'o ;
T02D1197:232b-18: / aa yi khyad byed yi ge gnyis //
T02D1197:232b-19: de la aa ni nam mkhar 'gyur //
T02D1197:232b-20: ai zhes pa ni rlung dang ldan //
T02D1197:232b-21: rtsa bcu po ni rlung gi gzugs //
T02D1197:232b-22: ai da la sogs lte ba'i ming //
T02D1197:232b-23: yi ge rnams ni rlung gi ming //
T02D1197:232b-24: de ltar rtsa ni drug rnams kyi //
T02D1197:232b-25: yi ge'i don dang rjes su mthun //
T02D1197:232b-26: yi ges rnal 'byor rnams ni brjod //
T02D1197:232b-27: ming ni dam tshig gi ni skad //
T02D1197:232b-28: de bzhin lte ba'i 'khor lo yi //
T02D1197:232b-29: rnal 'byor ma yi gnas kyi ma //
T02D1197:232b-30: drug cu rtsa bzhi yi ni grangs //
T02D1197:232b-31: myu gu la sogs yi ge rnams //
T02D1197:232b-32: mu zhes pa ni kha yi gnas //
T02D1197:232b-33: gho sna'i bu ga g-yon pa la //
T02D1197:232b-34: ghu ni sna khung g-yas su 'dod //
T02D1197:232b-35: de ltar gu gu gnyis ni mig / de bzhin rna gnyis la myu gu //
T02D1197:232b-36: gci ba'i bu ga dang bshang sgo //
T02D1197:232b-37: gnyis la lu ghu gnyis ni brjod //
T02D1197:232b-38: de bzhin 'dir ni dra zhes pa //
T02D1197:232b-39: khu ba'i bu ga'i nang du'o //
T02D1197:232b-40: lta ba'i bu ga'i gnas rtag tu //
T02D1197:232b-41: shtha zhes pa ni gcig pur brjod //
T02D1197:232b-42: de ltar dgongs bshad gzhan ma yin //
T02D1197:232b-43: sa ni bcu gnyis dag la gnas //
T02D1197:232b-44: de nyid kyis na de dag ces bya ba la
T02D1197:232b-45: rnal 'byor pas mthong zhes bya ba ni spyod yul
T02D1197:232b-46: lo // sa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis grub pa'i tshig gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:232b-47: 'di rnams kyi mtshan ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khams rnams gnas su brjod /
T02D1197:232b-48: ta zhes pa ni mthil ni lnga //
T02D1197:232b-49: tya ni sor mo nyi shu'o //
T02D1197:232b-50: ra ni mtshan ma zhes su gsungs //
T02D1197:232b-51: da di zhes pa sgo nga gnyis //
T02D1197:232b-52: pu su gnyis ni phrag brgya pa //
T02D1197:232b-53: rkang par ma yo yi ge gnyis //
T02D1197:232b-54: bhi dhi spyi bo mgrin par ro //
T02D1197:232b-55: lu zhes pa ni snying gar gnas //
T02D1197:233a-2: sa ni de bzhin lto bar ro //
T02D1197:233a-3: pi zhes pa yang ye shes pa //
T02D1197:233a-4: gdan gnyis su ni brtan par bya //
T02D1197:233a-5: bha bhi zhes pa gnyis kar yang //
T02D1197:233a-6: blo yi gnas dag tu ni bstan //
T02D1197:233a-7: bu bhu zhes pa gnyis ka yang //
T02D1197:233a-8: 'dir ni gu mo gnyis kyi ming can te //
T02D1197:233a-9: di gha zhes pa mkhrig mar ro //
T02D1197:233a-10: dri ku nu ma gnyis su ste //
T02D1197:233a-11: ha ni rkang pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D1197:233a-12: dza zhes pa ni lce nyid du //
T02D1197:233a-13: bha zhes pa ni so nyid do //
T02D1197:233a-14: sva zhes pa ni lus kun la //
T02D1197:233a-15: pu la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1197:233a-16: gnas nyid du ni rab tu grags //
T02D1197:233a-17: de yang khams ni nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1197:233a-18: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ni gnas //
T02D1197:233a-19: de ltar nang ni thams cad nyid //
T02D1197:233a-21: grub pa'i kha spyor rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1197:233a-22: rnal 'byor pa la bde ster byed //
T02D1197:233a-23: 'di ni dus kyi rtsa rnams kyi rgyu ba'i cho ga ste bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1197:233a-24: de ni phyi'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag
T02D1197:233a-25: pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1197:233a-26: nga gi phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:233a-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:233a-28: de nas zhes bya ba ni ngag gi gnas kyi
T02D1197:233a-29: rnal 'byor ma'i dam tshig bstan pa'i rjes thogs su
T02D1197:233a-30: 'byung ba'i ye shes las de bzhin du 'byung ba
T02D1197:233a-31: las gyur pa ye shes te /
T02D1197:233a-32: yang dag bshad bya ba zhes pa ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1197:233a-33: slar yang bskyed pa'i sgo nas rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1197:233a-35: de yang brda'i cho ga'i rim zhes pa ni phyag rgya'i brda'i skad do //
T02D1197:233a-36: cho ga rim zhes pa ni ji ltar sngon nyid
T02D1197:233a-37: du rnal 'byor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i
T02D1197:233a-38: 'khor de'i nang nas rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis pa
T02D1197:233a-39: bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:233a-40: lhag ma lnga bcu gnyis lus kyi dngos po rnams phyi ru spros pas ni dam tshig gi brda'o //
T02D1197:233a-41: gang gis zhes pa ni rgyus zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:233a-42: mang po zhes pa ni rigs gcig pa'i dpa' bo'o //
T02D1197:233a-43: de bzhin du srid mo zhes pa'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1197:233a-44: de rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i skad las gsang ste spyad pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:233a-45: po tang gi zhes pa ni gsang por smra ba'o //
T02D1197:233a-46: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang brda
T02D1197:233a-47: dang brda' lan po tang gi'i sgras sngon du rang
T02D1197:233a-48: rig pa'i ye shes las de bsgoms pas rang bzhin
T02D1197:233b-0: @233b gyis da aang gi zhes pa de'i don to
T02D1197:233b-1: // de bzhin du d'a di zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:233b-2: sogs pa sa'i mthar thug pa'i yi ge nyi shu
T02D1197:233b-3: rtsa lnga dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:233b-4: // ming po'o // de bzhin du pa dza zhes
T02D1197:233b-5: bya ba la sogs pa ma ku'i mthar thug pa'i
T02D1197:233b-6: yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
T02D1197:233b-7: rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin rnams ni sring mo'o //
T02D1197:233b-9: de ltar dus kyi rtsa drug lus kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:233b-10: de rnams las byung bas gsung pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni ngag gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1197:233b-11: des na ngag gi brda yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam
T02D1197:233b-12: pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir zhes pa ni nges pa'o
T02D1197:233b-13: // kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'o rtog
T02D1197:233b-14: pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i rgya
T02D1197:233b-15: cher 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pa'i
T02D1197:233b-16: snang ba zhes pa'i gzhung ste dang po bstan pa'o
T02D1197:233b-18: // / // da ni dus kyi pho nya mo drug las byung
T02D1197:233b-19: ba'i rnal 'byor ma bdun po rnams kyi mtshan ma'i
T02D1197:233b-20: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:233b-21: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:233b-22: de la gzugs can ma zhes pa ni lte ba'i
T02D1197:233b-23: 'og gi g-yon logs su sku'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i
T02D1197:233b-24: rtsa rnams rigs mang po'i khyad par ni gzugs can
T02D1197:233b-25: ma'o // de bzhin du lte ba'i dbus la aa
T02D1197:233b-26: wa dh'u t'i'i steng gi rtsa rnams ni'o byed ma'o
T02D1197:233b-27: ma'o // // de'i dbus las 'og tu dus me'i rtsa ni mdzes ma'o //
T02D1197:233b-28: de bzhin du thugs kyi 'khor lo rtsa rnams ni yongs gyur ma'o //
T02D1197:233b-29: de bzhin du lte ba'i steng gi g-yon gyi rtsa
T02D1197:233b-30: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rgyu ba de ni
T02D1197:233b-31: byis bcas ma'o // slar yang lte ba'i g-yas kyi
T02D1197:233b-32: rtsa mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rgyu ba ni mi ldog
T02D1197:233b-33: byis bcas ma'o // pa'o // de bzhin du rtsa
T02D1197:233b-34: drug po rnams kyis thams cad la khyab pa can
T02D1197:233b-36: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan
T02D1197:233b-37: nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan ma gsungs te
T02D1197:233b-38: / gang gi smin ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:233b-39: 'di rnams kyi 'dod pa'i lha'i mtshan ma khyim du bri ba brjod do //
T02D1197:233b-40: thod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzugs
T02D1197:233b-41: can ma la sogs pa mtshan ma bdun 'dzin pa'o
T02D1197:233b-42: // de la thod pa la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhi byang chub sems dang /
T02D1197:234a-1: rnam par dag pa'i mtshan ma bdun no //
T02D1197:234a-2: yang na thod pa la sogs pa ni kun gzhi
T02D1197:234a-3: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes
T02D1197:234a-5: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la kha
T02D1197:234a-6: sbyor cho ga zhes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D1197:234a-7: dus kyi rtsa de rnams las byung ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1197:234a-8: drug kha sbyor shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1197:234a-9: gnyis med pa'o // des na rnal 'byor rig pas zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1197:234a-10: rtag mtshon bya zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi spyod
T02D1197:234a-11: par bya ba ste rang gi bdag nyid rgyu ba'i
T02D1197:234a-12: phyir zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:234a-13: lus srul po zhes pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1197:234a-14: ka ta'i sgra ni gcod pa'i don de rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis 'khor ba gcod pa'o //
T02D1197:234a-15: mchog tu bde 'byung ba chen po chags pa chen
T02D1197:234a-16: po'i ting nge 'dzin las byung bas lhag ma'i mtshan
T02D1197:234a-17: nyid ni pu ti'i don to //
T02D1197:234a-18: lus srul po'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya de bzhin
T02D1197:234a-19: du gsungs pa nyid ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1197:234a-20: kyi nges pa'o // de ltar yang gsungs pa /
T02D1197:234a-21: ka zhes pa ni gcod par gsungs //
T02D1197:234a-22: sgra ni sgra yi mtshan nyid de //
T02D1197:234a-23: pu ni sngon gyi lhag ma'o //
T02D1197:234a-24: ti zhes pa ni 'byung ba'i nyid //
T02D1197:234a-25: n'i ni rnal 'byor ma shes bya //
T02D1197:234a-26: ci ni sems dang sems byung ba //
T02D1197:234a-27: hra ni gnyis su med par 'gro// phyag rgya nyid
T02D1197:234a-28: ni che sngon 'gro// kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi
T02D1197:234a-29: rgyal po'i rtog pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa'i
T02D1197:234a-30: rgya che ra 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i
T02D1197:234a-31: dran pa'i snang ba'i zhes bya ba'i gzhung ste gnyis
T02D1197:234a-33: / da ni sa bcu gsum rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1197:234a-34: mkha' 'gro ma bcu gsum gyi tshul gyi mtshan ma
T02D1197:234a-35: dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la rtag par rnam par sbyor pa'i rab tu dbye bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:234a-36: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:234a-37: padma zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis thal mo
T02D1197:234a-38: gnyis sbyar ba phye ste ser mo thams cad padma'i
T02D1197:234a-39: 'dab ma'i rnam pa ltar byas pa ni padma'i phyag
T02D1197:234a-40: rgya'o // yang na rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:234a-41: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni dbus ma'i sor mi'i bar du gzhug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:234a-42: mdung rtse'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni mthe bos mthe chud mnan te /
T02D1197:234a-43: sor mo lhag ma'i steng du brkyang ba'i rnam pa ni rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:234b-0: mdung gi phyag rgya zhes pa ni @234b mdzub mo dbyug pa'i rnam par byas te bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:234b-1: dril bu'i phyag rgya ni khu tshur g-yon pa dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul du bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:234b-2: de bzhin du 'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i thal mo rgyab sbyar ba bsnol te /
T02D1197:234b-3: 'khor lo'i rnam pa ltar byas pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:234b-4: de bzhin du dung gi phyag rgya zhes pa ni
T02D1197:234b-5: mthe bong dang mdzub mo sbyar la rtse mo/ kha
T02D1197:234b-6: ba ltar byas shing lhag ma gsum nang du bskul
T02D1197:234b-7: pa ni dung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1197:234b-8: klu'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni lag pa gnyis sbrul
T02D1197:234b-9: mgo gdengs pa ltar bstan pa ni klu'i phyag rgya'o
T02D1197:234b-10: // lhag ma thams cad ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:234b-11: de ltar dam tshig can gyi mis phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gnyis kyi dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1197:234b-12: 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i rigs las byung ba'o //
T02D1197:234b-13: yang na mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bcu gsum las 'byung ba'o //
T02D1197:234b-15: kha sbyor thig le'u rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa
T02D1197:234b-16: bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i rgya cher
T02D1197:234b-17: 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pa'i snang
T02D1197:234b-18: ba zhes bya ba'i gzhung ste gsum pa bstan pa'o
T02D1197:234b-20: / // / da ni phyi'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug po 'di rnams kyi cha bstan pa'o //
T02D1197:234b-21: des na phan tshun ming po dang srid mo rnams kyi gnas bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:234b-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:234b-23: mdor bstan pa gsum gyi rjes su mi gsal ba
T02D1197:234b-24: de'i phyir phyag rgya dang rgya'i lan cung zad brjod
T02D1197:234b-25: de / yang dag bshad bya ba zhes pa ni de la spyi gtsug dang /
T02D1197:234b-32: gsang ba dang pus mo dang /
T02D1197:234b-41: smin ma g-yas pa bskul ba zhes pa'i gnas rnam
T02D1197:234b-42: pa bco brgyad la gang reg pa'i lus kyi phyag
T02D1197:234b-43: rgya de nyid kyi mtshan nyid rnams kyi sangs rgyas
T02D1197:234b-44: kyi yon tan rnams yod par mtshon no //
T02D1197:234b-45: de yang dam tshig can te /
T02D1197:234b-46: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:234b-47: rnal 'byor ma de nyid la rnal 'byor ba'i spyi
T02D1197:234b-48: po la sogs pa'i khams bco brgyad rnam par dag
T02D1197:235a-1: kyi dgod pa'i rab tu byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D1197:235a-2: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyu ba ston pa'i phyir zhes bya
T02D1197:235a-5: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang chen zhes pa ni ngag gnyis kyi dang po gnyis med pa'o //
T02D1197:235a-6: dpal kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las
T02D1197:235a-7: byung pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje mkha' 'gro
T02D1197:235a-8: rnams kyi brda'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag pa'i
T02D1197:235a-9: lta ba'i dran pa'i snang ba zhes pa'i gzhung ste
T02D1197:235a-10: mdor bstan pa gsum gyi rjes su slar bshad pa
T02D1197:235a-13: // / da ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs
T02D1197:235a-14: pa bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:235a-16: phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gyis rjes su rtog
T02D1197:235a-17: pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa'i rjes su dpa' bo dang
T02D1197:235a-18: dpa' mo dbang phyug 'dus pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1197:235a-19: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1197:235a-20: zhes pa ni yang dag par bshad pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:235a-23: mdza' ba dam pa kun 'dus pa //
T02D1197:235a-24: zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i skye bo dpa' bo
T02D1197:235a-25: dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rgyud gcig las spros
T02D1197:235a-26: pa'i phyir ro // de yang brdas gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis su'o //
T02D1197:235a-27: snod gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bza'
T02D1197:235a-28: ba zhes pa ni kun rdzob tu bza' ba lnga
T02D1197:235a-29: rnams bza'o // 'dir zhes pa 'dus pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D1197:235a-30: snod gnyis lhag ma zhes pa dpa' ba dpa' bo
T02D1197:235a-31: dang dpa' mo'i phyug dag lhan cig tu zas la
T02D1197:235a-32: spyod pa ste / gcig la gcig gi snod dag la 'dus pa'o //
T02D1197:235a-33: nan tan du zhes pa ni kha dang kha ru rol pa'i phyir zas kyi khams ster ba'o //
T02D1197:235a-34: don dam pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis la
T02D1197:235a-35: longs spyad pa dang thim pa dang dbang du byed
T02D1197:235a-37: des na srog rgyu ba des rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1197:235a-38: des ni dri ma med pa'i ye shes gnyis med pa de'i zas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1197:235a-39: ni zhes pa ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:235a-40: de bzhin du snod gnyis lhag ma zhes pa ni
T02D1197:235a-41: bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnyis pa'i lhag ma mchog
T02D1197:235a-42: gi gnyis med pa de la skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:235a-43: de bzhin du lce zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje snying pos zhus pa'o //
T02D1197:235a-44: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni ci gsungs she na /
T02D1197:235a-45: rdo rje snying po'i lan gsungs pa'o //
T02D1197:235b-0: de la gnas dang zhes bya ba la sogs @235b
T02D1197:235b-1: pa ni phyi ru ni don ji lta bzhin no
T02D1197:235b-2: // nang du ni spyi gtsug tu dz'a landha ra'o //
T02D1197:235b-3: de bzhin du rna ba g-yas par ni ao spyan no //
T02D1197:235b-4: sbyin bor ni pu lli ra'o //
T02D1197:235b-5: rgyas kyi char ni de bzhin du aa rbu da'o //
T02D1197:235b-6: gnas 'di bzhi ni sa rab tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:235b-7: de bzhin du nye ba'i gnas bzhi ni rnab g-yon par gor ba ri'o /
T02D1197:235b-8: smin ma'i dbus su ni de bzhin du r'a me shva ra'o //
T02D1197:235b-9: mig gnyis su ni lha mo'i mkhar ro //
T02D1197:235b-10: phrag pa gnyis su ni m'a la wa'o //
T02D1197:235b-11: 'di ni dri me med pa'i sa'o //
T02D1197:235b-12: de bzhin du mchan khung gnyis su ni k'a ma r'u pa'o //
T02D1197:235b-13: de bzhin du nu ma gnyis su ni aom dre'o //
T02D1197:235b-14: 'di ni zhing ste 'od byed pa'i sa'o //
T02D1197:235b-15: de bzhin du lte ba'i rtsa bar ni tri sha ku ne'o //
T02D1197:235b-16: sna'i rtse mor ni ko sa la'o //
T02D1197:235b-17: 'di ni nye ba'i zhing gnyis te /
T02D1197:235b-21: 'dir bdun pa ste mngon du gyur pa'i sa'o //
T02D1197:235b-23: rgu zhabs su ni hi m'a la wa'o //
T02D1197:235b-26: de bzhin du mtshan mar ni pre ta di ae si ni'o //
T02D1197:235b-27: bshang lam du ni gri ha de ba ta'o //
T02D1197:235b-28: 'di ni 'dus pa ste ring du song ba'i sa'o //
T02D1197:235b-29: de bzhin du brla gnyis su ni so r'a sht'o //
T02D1197:235b-30: rje dang gnyis su ni su ni su rna d'i pa'o //
T02D1197:235b-31: 'di gnyis ni nye ba'i 'dus pa sta /
T02D1197:235b-33: de bzhin du rkang pa'i bor mo rnams la ni n'a ga ra'o //
T02D1197:235b-34: da la rkang pa dag gi bol du ni sindhu'o //
T02D1197:235b-35: 'di ni dur khrod gnyis te legs pa'i blo gros kyi sa'o //
T02D1197:235b-36: de bzhin du mthe bong ni ma ru'o //
T02D1197:235b-37: pus mo dag tu ni ku la t'o //
T02D1197:235b-38: 'di ni nyi ba'i dur khrod de chos kyi sprin gyi sa'o //
T02D1197:235b-39: de bzhin du snying gi gnas rnams su rtsa brgyad
T02D1197:235b-40: rnams rim pa bzhin ka ru na la sogs pa
T02D1197:235b-41: bzhin du'i mthar thug pa bzhin ni grong mtha' dang
T02D1197:235b-42: nye ba'i grong mtha' ste mos par spyod pa'i sa'o
T02D1197:235b-43: // de bzhin du yi dgas 'dus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1197:235b-44: 'gram zhes pa'i mthar thug pa bzhin der khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod de /
T02D1197:235b-45: 'di nyid ni kun du 'od kyi sra shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:235b-46: de bzhin du 'di nyid ni bcu gsum pa rdo
T02D1197:235b-47: rje 'dzin gyis khyab par byed pa nyid rnam pa
T02D1197:235b-48: brgyad de rtsa brgyad dang zhing brgyad kyi nang du
T02D1197:235b-49: 'dus pas spabs pa'i gnas zhes pa ste nges pa'o
T02D1197:236a-0: // de rnams kyang de nas zhes @236a * //
T02D1197:236a-1: bya ba la sogs pa zhing brgyad rnams kyi gnas
T02D1197:236a-2: rnams so// de bzhin du lhag par zhes pa ni
T02D1197:236a-4: gnas pa'i zhes pa ni rten gyi gnas so //
T02D1197:236a-5: de rnams kyi cho ga zhes pa ni rim pa bzhin no //
T02D1197:236a-6: bshad ces pa ni sgrub pa'o //
T02D1197:236a-7: de la rdul bral zhes pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la'o //
T02D1197:236a-8: de'i rgya mtsho'i ming can purna' gi rir tsu ti'i shing la gnas pa dpal chen mo'o //
T02D1197:236a-9: de bzhin du lho'i 'dab ma la ko ko ni
T02D1197:236a-10: ra so ma ba lingga zhes pa aa shvdtha'i shing
T02D1197:236a-11: la gnas pa sgyu ma chen mo'o //
T02D1197:236a-12: de bzhin du yang nub tu tsa ri tri du ka rnydza'i shing la gnas pa zhig byed ma'o //
T02D1197:236a-13: de bzhin du byang du aa ta har sa kad mba'i shing la gnas pa zhi ba dmigs pa'o //
T02D1197:236a-14: de bzhin du dbang ldan du de wa'i ko t'ir
T02D1197:236a-15: ba ta'i shing la gnas pa rna ba mu tig
T02D1197:236a-16: ma'o // de bzhin du mer ha ri ki lir
T02D1197:236a-17: shing ha ri'am par ka ti la gnas pa rlung
T02D1197:236a-18: ma'o // shugs ma'o // bden bral du aodyan du
T02D1197:236a-19: aa shva ka'i shing la gnas pa lha mo nag
T02D1197:236a-20: ma'o // shugs ma'o // mo'o // rlung du dz'a
T02D1197:236a-21: landha rar gser shing la gnas pa 'bar ma'i gdong
T02D1197:236a-22: ma'o // shugs ma'o // mo'o // ma'o // 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin gsungs pa /
T02D1197:236a-23: khams brgyad rnams kyi dbang gis brgyad rnam par shes pa yang brgyad nyid de /
T02D1197:236a-24: gnas dang shing ni brgyad du brtag / rnal 'byor ma brgyad 'dir 'dus yang //
T02D1197:236a-25: khams ni 'dus par brtag pa yin //
T02D1197:236a-26: de ru rtsa ni rgyu ba ru //
T02D1197:236a-27: dus ni khyad par las ni bya //
T02D1197:236a-28: thig le brgyad du song ba kun //
T02D1197:236a-29: rtsa ni zla ba'i ming can no //
T02D1197:236a-30: dus dang thig le de bzhin brgyad //
T02D1197:236a-31: rtsa las nyi ma'i thig le spro //
T02D1197:236a-32: de yang srog gi ming ni brgyad //
T02D1197:236a-33: grong mtha' la sogs rnam pa brgyad //
T02D1197:236a-34: de rnams re re rnam gsum 'gyur //
T02D1197:236a-35: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim pa yis //
T02D1197:236a-36: ku lu t'a la sogs par rgyud //
T02D1197:236a-38: sku yi 'khor lor rtsa rnams la //
T02D1197:236a-39: thim dang longs spyod sogs rim pas //
T02D1197:236a-40: sa rnams la ni log pa ru //
T02D1197:236a-41: der ni rnal 'byor ma spyod do //
T02D1197:236a-42: g-yas skor dang ni g-yon skor gyis //
T02D1197:236a-43: rim pa rgyas pa las zhes bya //
T02D1197:236a-44: nag po zhes pa bus mor gnas //
T02D1197:236a-45: sgyu ma chen po mchog gi mchog / gtsig [*gtsigs] ma mthe bo'i gnas su'o //
T02D1197:236b-0: de bzhin cod pa na sor mo @236b la //
T02D1197:236b-1: mi sdug ma ni rkang bol du //
T02D1197:236b-3: rje ngar dag la dga' las 'das //
T02D1197:236b-4: mtshams kyi rtsa ni steng rgyu ba //
T02D1197:236b-5: brla gnyis su ni log 'dren ma //
T02D1197:236b-6: bshang ba'i lam du rgan byas ma //
T02D1197:236b-7: gsang bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma //
T02D1197:236b-8: dka' zlog lha mo chu so ru //
T02D1197:236b-9: snying gar dbyangs can ma nyid do //
T02D1197:236b-10: rgyal ma zhes pa mgrin gnas su //
T02D1197:236b-11: kha ru rnam rgyal mar zhes bya //
T02D1197:236b-12: sna rtser mi thub ma de bzhin //
T02D1197:236b-13: nu ma gnyis la che gzugs ma //
T02D1197:236b-14: lha mo nyid ni bde gzugs ma //
T02D1197:236b-15: thams cad du ni bya ba byed //
