T02D1197:254b-30: 'byor pa ni rnyed par dka' ste gang la 'di
T02D1197:254b-31: lta bu'i bsam pa yod pa de ni de bzhin
T02D1197:254b-33: thog ma zhes pa ni sgra tsam gyi dus su'o //
T02D1197:254b-34: dbus zhes pa ni da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba'i dus su'o //
T02D1197:254b-35: de bzhin du mtha' mar zhes pa ni thams cad
T02D1197:254b-36: kyi rang bzhin gyi chos rgyun mi 'chad par ji
T02D1197:254b-37: srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par sems can gyi don
T02D1197:254b-38: bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa ni rnal
T02D1197:254b-40: 'dir bsrub ba cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:254b-41: 'dir bsrub ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do //
T02D1197:254b-42: bsrub pa ni shes rab kyi rgyud do //
T02D1197:254b-43: ci'i phyir srub pa rnal 'byor yin zhe na /
T02D1197:254b-44: 'dir gang gi phyir shes rab kyi dngos po'i dbye
T02D1197:254b-45: bas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung ba'i mtshan
T02D1197:255a-0: nyid do // des na de bsrubs pas bla na @255a * //
T02D1197:255a-1: med pa thob ces pa'i don to //
T02D1197:255a-2: de bzhin du shes rab kyi rgyud rnams su thabs
T02D1197:255a-3: kyi dngos po'i dbye bas bsrubs pas mtshon bya'i rgyu'i
T02D1197:255a-5: de'i phyir 'di dag sbyor ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnyis med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1197:255a-6: ji bzhin pa ni 'di'i rgyu dang 'bras bu sngags bzlas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:255a-7: sogs pa'i sgra ni 'chang bzhin pa'i sbyor pa'i bsgom
T02D1197:255a-8: pa'o// de bzhin du shes pa ni rgyud bshad kyis
T02D1197:255a-10: 'dir rgyud ces pa ni shes rab dang thabs 'dus pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D1197:255a-11: bshad kyis zhes pa ni mtshon bya'o //
T02D1197:255a-12: de yang nyon zhes pa ni khong du chud pa'o //
T02D1197:255a-13: de bzhin du rgyud kyi sgra ni gzhan rnams kyi rgyud yin pas na gzhan dbang ngo //
T02D1197:255a-14: bshad kyis zhes pa ni kun du brtags pa'i rgyud do //
T02D1197:255a-15: nyon zhes pa ni yongs su grub pa'i rgyud do //
T02D1197:255a-16: rgyud de gsum gyi dngos pas gang bsgrub bya dang
T02D1197:255a-17: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:255a-18: rnam par rig pa tsam nyid do //
T02D1197:255a-19: des na rnam par mi rtog pa'i dngos po rnams la sgrub pa po 'jug par byed do //
T02D1197:255a-20: rnam par mi rtog pa yang sems po ma yin
T02D1197:255a-21: pa stong pa nyid bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa'i
T02D1197:255a-23: de yang med pas na rnam par mi rtog pa
T02D1197:255a-24: bdag tu 'jig pa dang bral pa de la de
T02D1197:255a-26: rnam par rtog pa gang la la yid las byung
T02D1197:255a-27: bar 'gyur pa ni kun dor ba'i rang bzhin no
T02D1197:255a-28: // gang yang dga' dang bcas pa'i gzugs //
T02D1197:255a-29: snying ni dga' bar byed pa ni //
T02D1197:255a-30: de yang kun du rtog pa tsam //
T02D1197:255a-31: de yang chags dang bral pa'i tshul //
T02D1197:255a-32: gzhan yang de dang de gnyi ga / srid pa yi ni dang po'i rgyud //
T02D1197:255a-33: kha cig gi ni yul la yang //
T02D1197:255a-34: rnam par mi rtog bdag dngos las //
T02D1197:255a-35: mya ngan 'das pa gzhan na med //
T02D1197:255a-37: nges pa la sogs don ni 'di //
T02D1197:255a-38: zab mo'i tshul ni dpa' bos gsungs //
T02D1197:255a-39: shes rab dman la rnam shes ni //
T02D1197:255a-40: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang //
T02D1197:255a-41: kha cig gnyis ka las grol ba'o //
T02D1197:255a-43: da ltar mar me bltam [*bltams?] pa yi //
T02D1197:255a-45: mar khur nub pa'i stong bu yang //
T02D1197:255a-46: mar khu zad pas sdong bu de //
T02D1197:255b-0: @255b ldog pa yi ni dus su thob //
T02D1197:255b-1: de bzhin du ni ye shes 'di //
T02D1197:255b-2: de ltar ma rig zad pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:255b-4: mar me bzhin du mya ngan 'das //
T02D1197:255b-5: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1197:255b-6: ma rig par ni gang brjod pa //
T02D1197:255b-7: rnam shes g-yo ba'i rgyu yis ni //
T02D1197:255b-8: gzhan dbang la sogs sbyang ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:255b-9: rig pa bzang po de dag gsungs //
T02D1197:255b-10: 'on kyang byis pa mkhas rnams kyis //
T02D1197:255b-11: rnam par rig pa rtag btags phyir //
T02D1197:255b-12: sngon po la sogs snang tshul gyis //
T02D1197:255b-13: zab mo'i tshul ni sun 'byin byed //
T02D1197:255b-14: kun rdzob dang ni don dam lam //
T02D1197:255b-15: bden pa gnyis kyi don gsungs pa //
T02D1197:255b-16: 'di ni zab mo'i tshul gsal ba //
T02D1197:255b-17: bla ma'i rim pas shes par bya /
T02D1197:255b-18: theg pa gsum la mos pa yis //
T02D1197:255b-19: bstan pa rtsod pa'i sus kyi phyir //
T02D1197:255b-20: de rnams spyod pa la ni 'jug kun brtags la sogs rim pa bzhin //
T02D1197:255b-21: kun brtags dang ni gzhan gyi dbang //
T02D1197:255b-22: yongs su grub pa nyid de bzhin //
T02D1197:255b-23: kha cig phyogs ni rnam bcas te //
T02D1197:255b-24: rnam pa med pa nyid du brtags //
T02D1197:255b-25: byis pa rnams kyi blo 'phel phyir //
T02D1197:255b-26: dngos po tsam zhig gzhag pa yin //
T02D1197:255b-27: kun brtags la sogs snang pa yi //
T02D1197:255b-28: rang bzhin du ni gsum min nam //
T02D1197:255b-29: de rnams mngon sum nyid du 'grub //
T02D1197:255b-30: mtshan mo la sogs rim ji bzhin //
T02D1197:255b-31: ji ltar blo ni 'phel phyir yin //
T02D1197:255b-32: rang gi phyogs la mnyes par gsungs //
T02D1197:255b-33: lung dang tshad ma rgyas pa ni //
T02D1197:255b-34: 'ba' zhig ma gsungs gzhan la 'ang yod //
T02D1197:255b-35: zhi byed la sogs lha lnga po //
T02D1197:255b-36: de rnams rang rang lung rnams su //
T02D1197:255b-37: snang ba gsum ni yid ches phyir //
T02D1197:255b-38: bum pa yi ni dpe bzhin du //
T02D1197:255b-39: 'dir ni rtag tu bstan pa yin //
T02D1197:255b-40: gnyi ga yang ni spyod par mtshungs //
T02D1197:255b-41: stong pa'i phyogs la ni tha dad //
T02D1197:255b-42: ji ltar mi ni rigs bzhi yi //
T02D1197:255b-43: cha shas rnams la dbye ba med //
T02D1197:255b-44: de bzhin snang la sogs snang ba //
T02D1197:255b-45: sngon gyi sangs rgyas la sogs gsungs //
T02D1197:255b-46: thun mong stong gsum rang bzhin phyir //
T02D1197:255b-47: snying stobs sogs yon tan sbyor las //
T02D1197:255b-48: sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:255b-49: de ltar gang la dgos yod pa //
T02D1197:255b-50: de la bdag gis tshig 'di brjod //
T02D1197:255b-51: de ni don gsungs ma yin te //
T02D1197:256a-2: /'dir ni kun brtags la sogs gang //
T02D1197:256a-3: khyod kyis brjod pa'i tshig ni nyid //
T02D1197:256a-4: skyes bu la sogs cha shas bzhin //
T02D1197:256a-5: de phyir thams cad thun mong nyid //
T02D1197:256a-6: snang ba la sogs snang gsum nyid //
T02D1197:256a-7: sngags kyi tshul la mtshungs med phyir //
T02D1197:256a-8: gang phyir dngos po thams cad la //
T02D1197:256a-9: mu stegs rnams la mtshungs 'di yis //
T02D1197:256a-10: sngags kyi theg pa snying por 'gyur //
T02D1197:256a-11: dngos po kun gyi nang du 'dus //
T02D1197:256a-12: dngos po'ang de yi nang du 'dus //
T02D1197:256a-13: de bzhin 'dir ni man ngag gis //
T02D1197:256a-14: kun brtags la sogs snang ba gsum //
T02D1197:256a-15: tshig tsam phyir ni mtshungs pa med //
T02D1197:256a-16: de ltar sngags kyi theg pa ni //
T02D1197:256a-17: theg pa gsum ni 'dus pa ste //
T02D1197:256a-18: chos bsdus la sogs pa ru ni //
T02D1197:256a-19: sna tshogs rnam par dag gsungs phyir //
T02D1197:256a-20: de bzhin 'dir ni man ngag las //
T02D1197:256a-21: gang phyir kha cig tu ni don //
T02D1197:256a-22: kun dga' bo ni phyag rdor zhes //
T02D1197:256a-23: sh'a ri'i bu ni byams pa ste ;
T02D1197:256a-25: de bzhin mood gal gyi ni bu //
T02D1197:256a-26: nam mkha'i mdzod du brjod pa yin //
T02D1197:256a-27: de la sogs par shes par bya //
T02D1197:256a-28: dngos po gcig la sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D1197:256a-29: ming rnams sngon du 'gro ba ni //
T02D1197:256a-30: dngos po gcig la ming du ma'o //
T02D1197:256a-31: 'on kyang theg pa gsum gsungs pa ;
T02D1197:256a-32: / chos gang gis ni sems can rnams //
T02D1197:256a-33: sems kyi rnam rtog sna tshogs pa //
T02D1197:256a-34: rtsod pa tsam ni 'ba' zhig dang //
T02D1197:256a-36: gzhan rnams la ni phyir bzlog pa //
T02D1197:256a-37: de nyid kyis brtul sems can gyi //
T02D1197:256a-38: rgyu ni sngags kyi theg pa mchog / rtsod pa'i dus las gzhan pa yi //
T02D1197:256a-39: dus rnams la ni gtan dbab min //
T02D1197:256a-41: skye ba snga mar rtogs phyir ro //
T02D1197:256a-42: 'on kyang gsang sngags theg chen las //
T02D1197:256a-43: ma rtogs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1197:256a-44: de yang sngon du mos pa yis //
T02D1197:256a-45: nyan thos sems kyis sbas pa yin //
T02D1197:256a-46: de phyir rdzogs ldan sogs dus su //
T02D1197:256a-47: sngags kyi theg pa snying la gnas //
T02D1197:256a-48: skye ba 'bum phrag dus nas su //
T02D1197:256a-49: de ma rtogs par dngos grub med //
T02D1197:256a-50: gnyi ga'i mtha' la brten nas ni //
T02D1197:256a-51: byang chub dam pa gsungs pa yin //
T02D1197:256a-52: de ltar kun brtags la sogs kun //
T02D1197:256b-0: man ngag @256b gi ni nang du 'dus //
T02D1197:256b-1: de las byung ba'i snang ba ni //
T02D1197:256b-4: byis pa rnams kyi tha mal gsungs //
T02D1197:256b-6: gang cung zad kyi don dam pa'i //
T02D1197:256b-7: phyogs dang gar mkhan grangs med pa //
T02D1197:256b-8: de dag thams cad 'byung ba nyid //
T02D1197:256b-9: ma rig pa yang der zad 'gyur //
T02D1197:256b-10: rig pa bzang po yi ni rgyu //
T02D1197:256b-11: shes dang shes bya dag mi g-yo //
T02D1197:256b-12: gzhan du sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1197:256b-13: de yang 'dus byas sgom pa pos //
T02D1197:256b-14: rnam par mi rtog de kho na //
T02D1197:256b-15: de ni med cing de yang med //
T02D1197:256b-16: bdag la brjod du med bas brgyan //
T02D1197:256b-17: rnam grangs sbyor las sangs rgyas 'byung //
T02D1197:256b-18: de ltar snying rje la dmigs pa'i //
T02D1197:256b-19: blo ldan nan tan shes bya ba //
T02D1197:256b-20: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:256b-21: byis pa bzhin du yang dag spyad //
T02D1197:256b-22: gang yang mu stegs pa rnams kyis //
T02D1197:256b-23: rtag tu snang ba'i ming nyid kyis //
T02D1197:256b-24: dus tsa nye bar mtshon pa nyid //
T02D1197:256b-25: dam pa'i don ni dngos po min //
T02D1197:256b-26: de rnams rig pa mi shes pas //
T02D1197:256b-27: 'dir ni lta ba nyams pa nyid //
T02D1197:256b-28: gang yang rigs pas shes pa ni //
T02D1197:256b-29: de nyid sangs rgyas gzhan du min //
T02D1197:256b-30: dam ba'i don gyi lta ba yis //
T02D1197:256b-32: lta ba gzhan nas sems can yang //
T02D1197:256b-33: dam pa'i dngos pos grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1197:256b-34: de bzhin du phyi dang nang du rnal 'byor bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:256b-35: skye gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:256b-36: skye gnas zhes pa ni lte ba'i dbus su'o //
T02D1197:256b-37: rtsa gnyis zhes pa ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a gnyis so //
T02D1197:256b-38: khu ba zhes ba ni kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1197:256b-39: de bzhin du rang 'byung yang shes bar bya'o //
T02D1197:256b-40: de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos kyi dbyings zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1197:256b-41: 'dus pa yin zhes pa ni rtsa gnyis 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:256b-42: don dam pa'i yul la ni sgra'i tshul lo //
T02D1197:256b-43: de bzhin du yang snying stobs la sogs pa tshigs
T02D1197:256b-44: su bcad pa phyed kyis nang du bskyed ba ston
T02D1197:256b-45: pa'i phyir ro // 'byung ba'i gnas ni chos kyi dbyings skye gnas so //
T02D1197:256b-46: de'i phyir rtsa las bsam gyis mi khyab la bsam du med pa 'byung ste /
T02D1197:257a-4: gzhan dbang dang aom dang a'a:'o //
T02D1197:257a-13: kun brtags pa dang aa dang hr'i:'o //
T02D1197:257a-14: de bzhin du mun pa dang /
T02D1197:257a-20: yang dag par sbyor ba dang /
T02D1197:257a-24: ye shes de rnams kyi rang bzhin rnams su lus
T02D1197:257a-25: dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid grangs med pa
T02D1197:257a-26: sangs rgyas kyis rang bzhin du dgongs pa'o //
T02D1197:257a-27: 'byung ba las gyur pa'i de rnams la srid par 'byung bar brjod do //
T02D1197:257a-29: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyis na zhes gsungs bas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1197:257a-31: snying stobs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su
T02D1197:257a-32: bcad pa phyed kyis de'i don bshad de sngon gyi
T02D1197:257a-33: bag chags kyis bsod nams nye bar spyod pa'i phyir
T02D1197:257a-34: ma dang pha sbyor ba sngon du gsungs so //
T02D1197:257a-35: dngos po zhes pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de la de bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D1197:257a-36: de bzhin bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:257a-37: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sku'i lus can no //
T02D1197:257a-38: brjod ces pa ni sbyor ba'o //
T02D1197:257a-39: rus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:257a-40: rnam gnyis las byung zhes pa ni pha dang ma'i
T02D1197:257a-41: khams kyi dbang gis sam byang chub sems dang srog
T02D1197:257a-42: las srog tu sems kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid
T02D1197:257a-43: rnam pa mang po'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:257a-44: de bzhin du gcig ces pa ni rang rig pa'i sgra'i bde ba'o //
T02D1197:257a-45: du ma zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1197:257a-46: de yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1197:257a-47: gyis gnas pa rdo rje can ye shes kyi sku
T02D1197:257a-49: de yang rtsa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa rnams dang da ltar gyi dus su'o //
T02D1197:257a-50: rgyu ba zhes pa ni rgyas par ni rtsa stong
T02D1197:257a-51: phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams la rlung stong phrag
T02D1197:257a-52: nyi shu rtsa gcig dang drug brgya rnams rgyu'o //
T02D1197:257a-53: des na rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi chas gang dus des ni 'di bya ba'o //
T02D1197:257b-1: rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi rtsa re re la'o //
T02D1197:257b-2: sgo zhes bya ba ni 'og dang steng du sgo gnyis su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:257b-3: de'i gnyis zhes pa ni 'og dang steng las gang du rgyu ba ni spro ba'i dus su'o //
T02D1197:257b-4: 'og gi sgo nas rgyu ba ni sdud pa'i dus so //
T02D1197:257b-5: de dag gi zhes pa ni g-yon dang g-yas su srog 'pho ba'i dus su'o //
T02D1197:257b-6: 'dus dus su zhes pa ni rtsa rnams kyi phan tshun srog rgyu ba'i dus su'o //
T02D1197:257b-7: lha zhes pa ni aa wa d'u t'ir 'pho ba'i
T02D1197:257b-8: phyir thig le'i mtshon pa nyid rang bzhin med pa
T02D1197:257b-9: rlabs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar dmigs par
T02D1197:257b-10: 'gyur ro // des na 'gyur zhes pa ni bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:257b-11: da ni gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor bas gtum mo'i sbyor ba'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:257b-12: steng gi sgo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1197:257b-13: 'dir rtsa thams cad rgyu ba'i phyir de'i gang du
T02D1197:257b-14: bskyed pa'i gnas der sgo gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:257b-15: de ni spyi bo'i gnas steng gi sgo zhes brjod do //
T02D1197:257b-16: de nyid kyi srog rgyu ba'i bu ga ni 'og gi sgo'o //
T02D1197:257b-17: de nyid kyi 'og gi sgor rnam par shes pa srog gi sbyor ba la gnas so //
T02D1197:257b-18: steng gi sgo ru zhes pa ni skye ba'i gnas su'o //
T02D1197:257b-19: khams rnams zhes pa ni lus kyi gong bu'i ba
T02D1197:257b-20: spu dang pags pa la sogs pa'i khams rnams kyi
T02D1197:257b-21: gnas rnams su'o // 'jug par bsam zhes pa ni
T02D1197:257b-22: rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i srog gi rlung
T02D1197:257b-23: gnas rnams su'o // bsam par bya'o // rnal 'byor ba zhes pa ni sems so //
T02D1197:257b-24: rtsa rnams thams cad ces pa ni rtsa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:257b-25: 'dus pa zhes pa ni thim par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:257b-26: des na steng sgor zhes pa ni sngon gyi tshul gyis bskyed pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D1197:257b-27: de nyid kyis na ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1197:257b-28: de zhes pa ni der ro //
T02D1197:257b-29: lus zhes pa ni lus la'o //
T02D1197:257b-30: rtag tu zhes pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
T02D1197:257b-31: rdo rje can zhes pa ni ye shes kyi khams so //
T02D1197:257b-32: rtag tu gnas zhes pa ni khams bzhi'i nang du 'dus par gnas so //
T02D1197:257b-33: de las ni mi bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:257b-34: da ni de bzhin du snying gar ro //
T02D1197:257b-35: sthi ni rang 'byung gi me tog go //
T02D1197:257b-36: ta ni khu ba nyid do //
T02D1197:257b-37: de bzhin du steng zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:257b-38: ni de'i steng gi sgo la 'khrul 'khor gsum mo
T02D1197:257b-39: // sgo dgu zhes pa ni rtsa dgus yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1197:258a-0: de la kye bcom ldan 'das zhes @258a * //
T02D1197:258a-2: de yang sngon gyi tshig gi rjes su 'gro ba rtag tu bzhugs zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1197:258a-3: de la bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni bstan pa'i slar bshad pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1197:258a-6: gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir 'khrul
T02D1197:258a-7: 'khor gyi sgras ni rtsa so so rnams kyi bskyed
T02D1197:258a-8: pa'i gnas rnams su lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
T02D1197:258a-9: dbye bas smig rgyu'i skud ba bzhin rtsa gsum 'khrul
T02D1197:258a-10: 'khor gyi gzugs 'khyil pa'i rnam pa nyid du gnas
T02D1197:258a-11: te / de nyid sum 'khyogs thong pa'i cha byad
T02D1197:258a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi khams su brjod
T02D1197:258a-13: te / do // de la chung du zhes pa
T02D1197:258a-14: ni aom 'jug pas sa 'og gnas ma rnams bskyed
T02D1197:258a-15: te / do // pa'o // de bzhin du 'bring
T02D1197:258a-16: zhes pa ni a'a: gnas pa'i phyir sa spyod rnams
T02D1197:258a-17: te / do // pa'o // bskyed pa'o // de
T02D1197:258a-18: bzhin du mchog ces pa ni h'um ldad pa'i phyir
T02D1197:258a-20: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum dang /
T02D1197:258a-27: de kho na nyid gsum dang /
T02D1197:258a-43: gzugs gsum gyi rim bas grangs med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:258a-44: de ltar dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la ka
T02D1197:258a-45: ba gcig ces pa la sogs pa ni rkang ba
T02D1197:258a-46: nas mgo'i bar du nor las rgyal zhes pa'i rlung
T02D1197:258a-47: lus thams cad kyi rten no //
T02D1197:258a-48: de nyid kyi sgor dgu zhes pa ni nor las
T02D1197:258a-49: rgyal zhes pa la snal ma phra mo sgo dgu'i
T02D1197:258a-50: bdag nyid srog la sogs pa'i rlung rgyu ba de
T02D1197:258a-52: rags pa zhes pa ni srog la sogs pa rlung
T02D1197:258a-53: lnga rnams phung po lnga'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lnga'o
T02D1197:258a-54: // de rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:258a-55: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D1197:258a-56: de bzhin du bug zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:258b-0: ni snal ma phra mo rnams sbom po nyid @258b
T02D1197:258b-1: du 'gyur ro // bu ga zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa'i sgor son pa'o //
T02D1197:258b-2: dgu zhes pa ni ka ba gcig dgu'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1197:258b-3: de rnams re res gsum gsum gyi bu ga rnams so //
T02D1197:258b-4: de nyid du gsungs pa tha ma la zhes bya
T02D1197:258b-5: ba la sogs pa 'dir tha ma ni 'jug pa'i
T02D1197:258b-6: phyir aom zhes pa lus kyi sgor lus la khyab
T02D1197:258b-8: de nyid kyis ni sbom bo zhes pa ni sa
T02D1197:258b-9: la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba'i spyan ma la
T02D1197:258b-10: sogs pa'o // lha mo rnam par sprul zhes pa ni bshad ba dang /
T02D1197:258b-14: khu ba nam mkha'i khams can te /
T02D1197:258b-15: de rnams kyi lus su sprul zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:258b-16: de yang sems ldan zhes pa la sogs pa rnal
T02D1197:258b-17: 'byor pa'i mthar thug pa'i ming gi rnam grangs kyi
T02D1197:258b-18: lnga ste khams lnga'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:258b-19: de bzhin du rtag tu zhes pa ni yi ge gnyis kyi sgo'i mchog gtan la phab pa'o //
T02D1197:258b-20: de yang ngag gi sgo dus rnams kun du 'gro ba zhes pa'i tshig gi khyad par gyis te /
T02D1197:258b-21: des na 'gro ba sems kyi rnam par rtog pa las sems las byung ba'i tshig go //
T02D1197:258b-22: de nyid kyis na brtags pa'i rgyud do //
T02D1197:258b-23: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D1197:258b-24: rkang gcig ces pa skyes bu'i khyad par ro //
T02D1197:258b-25: rkang bzhi zhes pa ba la dang rta dang ma he la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
T02D1197:258b-26: sogs pa'i sgras ni rkang gnyis la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D1197:258b-27: de rnams kyi rlung la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'chad bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:258b-28: sogs pa'i sgra yang dkyil 'khor lnga po nyid do //
T02D1197:258b-29: 'gro ba zhes pa ni dus de'i tshe skyes pa
T02D1197:258b-30: dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i gnas la sogs par
T02D1197:258b-33: de bzhin du rlung ni rnam pa bzhi zhes pa
T02D1197:258b-34: rlung yang rlung gcig gi khyad par la dbang chen
T02D1197:258b-35: la sogs pa rnam pa bzhir brjod do //
T02D1197:258b-38: sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:258b-39: gnas pa zhes pa ni sngon du rtag tu yi ge gnyis kyi don gsungs so //
T02D1197:258b-40: de ltar gnas zhes pa ni sgras brjod do //
T02D1197:258b-41: de ltar gnas zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:258b-42: sems can gyi rigs te de yang rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1197:258b-43: de la thim pa la sogs pa bstan pa dang /
T02D1197:258b-44: bshad pa khong du chud bar bya ste /
T02D1197:259a-0: 'dir gang thim pa yang yul thams cad la nye bar @259a * //
T02D1197:259a-2: de bzhin du bshad pas thim pa rtag tu zhes
T02D1197:259a-3: pa ni dngos po thams cad kyi nang du 'dus
T02D1197:259a-4: pas dus thams cad du yang ma song zhes pa'i
T02D1197:259a-5: don to // de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga
T02D1197:259a-6: ni dbang po drug yul la 'jug par bstan to
T02D1197:259a-7: don to // // 'dir bshad pa 'jug pa dang ;
T02D1197:259a-8: 'gro ba dang sems can thams cad la zhes pa
T02D1197:259a-9: ni dngos po thams cad mthong ba'i phyir de'i tshe
T02D1197:259a-10: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:259a-11: de nyid kyis na de rnams la thim pa'i phyir 'gro ba zhes ba skye ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:259a-12: de bzhin du yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'gro ba'o //
T02D1197:259a-13: gang yang 'jig rten pa de ni byis pa rnams
T02D1197:259a-14: bems po'i blos rtogs pas 'gro ba drug gi 'khor
T02D1197:259a-16: gang yang 'jig rten las 'das ba de ni 'phags
T02D1197:259a-17: pa rnams rtag tu bems po'i ma yin pa'i blo'i
T02D1197:259a-18: khyad par gyis rtag tu dam pa la spyad pa'i
T02D1197:259a-19: mtshan nyid kyis bde 'gro zhing nga rgyal med par
T02D1197:259a-20: 'gro ba'o // des na sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten dga' ldan la sogs pa rnams su 'gro'o //
T02D1197:259a-21: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go
T02D1197:259a-22: sla'o // de nas 'khor lo bzhi'i rab tu dbye
T02D1197:259a-23: bas dkyil 'khor lnga rgyu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:259a-24: me dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:259a-25: 'dir me'i dkyil 'khor gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin mgrin pa'i 'khor lo nas rgyu ste /
T02D1197:259a-26: g-yon dang gang kyi sna khung nas steng du rgyu'o //
T02D1197:259a-27: de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni dpral pa'i
T02D1197:259a-28: 'khor lo nas sna'i bu ga gnyis ka'i logs nas
T02D1197:259a-29: rgyu'o // de bzhin du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1197:259a-30: ni lte ba'i 'khor lo nas thad ka zhes pa
T02D1197:259a-32: chu'i dkyil 'khor ni snying ga'i 'khor lo nas 'og tu 'gro bas rgyu'o //
T02D1197:259a-33: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor bzhi dang mnyam por rgyu'o //
T02D1197:259a-34: de nyid kyis na gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:259a-35: 'di rnams kyi log pa'i dngos po gsum ste /
T02D1197:259a-36: rnam snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dkyil
T02D1197:259a-37: 'khor rnams kyi lhag pa'i lha'i rang bzhin gyis sangs
T02D1197:259a-38: rgyas lnga'i rlung las bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:259a-39: steng gi sgo ru zhes pa ni rtsa rnams bskyed
T02D1197:259a-40: pa'i gnas rnams su lus kyi khams la rlung mi
T02D1197:259b-0: g-yo ba'o // de bzhin @259b du 'og tu zhes
T02D1197:259b-1: pa ni sna'i bu ga la sogs pa nas byung
T02D1197:259b-3: de rnams rnam par gnas zhes pa ni rlung rgyu
T02D1197:259b-4: ba nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang
T02D1197:259b-6: de nas steng du gshegs gsol zhes pa ni spyi
T02D1197:259b-7: bo nas bskyed pa'i rnams su bla ma'i man ngag
T02D1197:259b-8: gis stong pa'o // de bzhin du spyan drangs zhes
T02D1197:259b-9: bya ba la sogs pa ni sems las byung ba
T02D1197:259b-10: rnams kyi dngos po rnams la'o //
T02D1197:259b-11: rtag tu zhes pa ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02D1197:259b-12: 'gro ba zhes pa ni yul dang yul can rnams la 'gro ba'o //
T02D1197:259b-13: de bzhin du ji lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi tshig
T02D1197:259b-14: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1197:259b-15: go sla'o // de ltar gsungs pa /
T02D1197:259b-16: thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yin te /
T02D1197:259b-17: des na yang sdud pa po bdag nyid kyi nyes
T02D1197:259b-18: pa bsal pa'i don du 'di ni zhes bya ba
T02D1197:259b-19: la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das de nyid ston pa'i
T02D1197:259b-21: da ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:259b-22: ma rnams kyi zhu ba sna tshogs pa bstan pa'i
T02D1197:259b-23: phyir // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:259b-24: de nas zhes pa ni rdo rje snying pos dris
T02D1197:259b-25: pa zhus pa'i rjes su bcom ldan 'das la lha
T02D1197:259b-26: mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de nas bcom
T02D1197:259b-28: sems dpa' chen po zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku can de la tshig 'di zhus pa ste /
T02D1197:259b-29: de yang bstan te zhes pa nas bdag la bshad du gsol ba'i bar du zhus pa'o //
T02D1197:259b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes
T02D1197:259b-31: pa ni nyon cig ces pa la sogs pa bstan
T02D1197:259b-32: pa dang bshad pa sna tshogs par ba tu byed
T02D1197:259b-33: pa 'di nas rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i mthar
T02D1197:259b-34: thug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig
T02D1197:259b-35: go // de bzhin du gnas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:259b-36: mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa ni rab gtum mo la
T02D1197:259b-37: sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi shes par zhes pa
T02D1197:259b-38: ni nges pa'o // gzhan ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:259b-39: 'on kyang 'chad bzhin pa slar bshad pa gsal ba nyid kyis na 'dir ma bshad do //
T02D1197:259b-40: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa
T02D1197:259b-41: drug pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i rgya cher
T02D1197:259b-42: 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pa'i snang
T02D1197:259b-43: ba gzhung bstan pa ste dang po'o /
T02D1197:260a-0: // / da ni rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar @260a * //
T02D1197:260a-1: byung ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:260a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:260a-3: gzhan yang zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi'o //
T02D1197:260a-4: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khyad par skyes bu chen po'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:260a-5: de bzhin du snying ga'i dbus zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:260a-6: sogs pa ni 'dir rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa
T02D1197:260a-7: gnyis po rnams kyi re re'i snying por rtsa'i 'khor
T02D1197:260a-8: lo sdom pa'i dbye bas shin tu phra ba'i dus
T02D1197:260a-9: brjod do // padma zhes pa 'dir padma'i skra ni sa'o //
T02D1197:260a-10: de yang 'dab ma brgyad ces pa ni zhing brgyad kyi rtsa'o //
T02D1197:260a-11: lte bar babs zhes pa ni thams cad nam mkha'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1197:260a-12: de'i dbus su son pa'i rtsa zhes pa ni snying
T02D1197:260a-13: rje'i rgyun gyi chags pa chen po rgyun mi 'chad
T02D1197:260a-14: pa'i rtsa mar me'i rgyun bzhin no //
T02D1197:260a-15: de nyid kyis na mar me ltar bu'i gzugs can no //
T02D1197:260a-16: de bzhin du de yang chu shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:260a-17: kha ni thur du zhes pa ni rtsa thams cad
T02D1197:260a-18: dang yul dang yul can las bdud rtsi'i ro dgug
T02D1197:260a-19: ste / sems kyi chu shing gi me tog bzhin
T02D1197:260a-20: ro gcig par gyur pas mdun du dmigs bzhin pas
T02D1197:260a-21: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs kyi
T02D1197:260a-22: ste / phyir ro // de bzhin du de'i dbus
T02D1197:260a-23: zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i chags pa'i rtsa rnams kyi
T02D1197:260a-24: ste / phyir ro // dbus su'o // gnas pa'o
T02D1197:260a-25: zhes pa ni rnam par rtog ba mtha' dag sbangs
T02D1197:260a-26: pa'i phyir dpa' bo rdo rje lta bu'i srog go
T02D1197:260a-27: ste / phyir ro // dbus su'o // // yungs
T02D1197:260a-28: kar sbom po'i tshad tsam zhes pa ni don dam
T02D1197:260a-29: pa'i byang chub kyi sems thig le'i gzugs h'um ngo
T02D1197:260a-31: ji ltar rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo nas khu
T02D1197:260a-32: ba'i thig le 'dzag pa padmar h'um ltung pa de'i
T02D1197:260a-33: bar la lhan cig skyes pa rnams so //
T02D1197:260a-34: de ltar sna'i rtse mo nas srog yungs kar tsam srog ring po 'gro ba'o //
T02D1197:260a-35: des na 'gro ba h'um mi shigs pa srog sa bon zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:260a-36: 'dzag pa yin zhes pa ni byang chub kyis bon mi 'dzag pa'o //
T02D1197:260a-37: de yang bsam gtan zhes bya ba la /
T02D1197:260a-38: bzhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbus //
T02D1197:260a-39: rtag tu 'dod pa la rol ba //
T02D1197:260a-41: de tshe dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhugs //
T02D1197:260a-42: sa zhes pa ni tshig kun du //
T02D1197:260a-43: rnal 'byor ma yi gnas rgyas pas //
T02D1197:260a-45: rgyu ba'i spyod pa la ni spyod //
T02D1197:260a-46: ta zhes pa ni snal ma stong //
T02D1197:260a-47: bdun cu rtsa gnyis go rims las //
T02D1197:260b-0: de yi dbus gnas dpa' bo @260b ni ;
T02D1197:260b-1: / ze'u 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul can //
T02D1197:260b-2: de bzhin til ka zhes pa la //
T02D1197:260b-3: ta ni aa sngon 'gro ba yis //
T02D1197:260b-4: chu la rlung ni thim pa nyid //
T02D1197:260b-5: der gnas pa yi skyems par byed //
T02D1197:260b-6: lus kyi tshogs kun rnam la khyab //
T02D1197:260b-7: la zhes pa ni sa lho ru //
T02D1197:260b-8: aa yi pha rol tu ni ra //
T02D1197:260b-9: des na me dang mnyam par gnas //
T02D1197:260b-10: sa yi rnam pa dang ni sems //
T02D1197:260b-11: ka ni nam mkha'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1197:260b-12: phung po lnga la yang dag gnas //
T02D1197:260b-13: thams cad du ni bdag med nyid //
T02D1197:260b-14: des na bdag nyid ma ru grags //
T02D1197:260b-15: de bzhin du las kyi rlung zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:260b-16: sogs pa ni rtsa so so rnams kyi nang rnams
T02D1197:260b-17: su dpyid kyi thig le yang dag par gnas te
T02D1197:260b-18: / slar la yang dpyid kyi thig la'i nang du
T02D1197:260b-19: las zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna chu 'bab
T02D1197:260b-20: ba ste zhes pa'i mthar thug pa khong du chud
T02D1197:260b-21: / par bya'o // gzhan dag ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:260b-22: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo'i rtog pa
T02D1197:260b-23: drug pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa lus la
T02D1197:260b-24: rtsa dgod pa zhes pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang
T02D1197:260b-25: dag par lta ba'i dran pa'i snang ba zhes pa'i
T02D1197:260b-26: gzhung bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D1197:260b-28: // / da ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:260b-29: nang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:260b-30: sogs pa'i sgras ni 'khor lo bzhi dang dkyil 'khor rnams la sogs pa las zhus pa bsdus pa'o //
T02D1197:260b-31: ci lta bur 'gyur zhes pa ni rnam pa gang gis 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:260b-32: bde ba chen pos zhes pa ni bde ba chen po las mnyam par 'tshal ba'o //
T02D1197:260b-33: bdag la bshad du gsol zhes pa ni bdag med ma bdag la bshad du gsol pa'o //
T02D1197:260b-34: der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni lan gyi tshig go //
T02D1197:260b-35: he ru ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha rnams so //
T02D1197:260b-36: sogs pa'i sgras ni goo r'i la sogs pa'am mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D1197:260b-37: rtsa'i gzugs ni zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin he ru ka'o //
T02D1197:260b-38: de nyid kyis na shin tu bsdams pa ste de rnams sdom pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:260b-39: de bzhin du lus kyi zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:260b-40: pa ni dkyil 'khor thog ma tha ma'i rang bzhin
T02D1197:260b-41: nyid do // de yang sgo bzhir ldan zhes pa'i don ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:261a-0: 'on kyang rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyi rtsa re re'i nang @261a * //
T02D1197:261a-1: du snying gi rtsa rnams khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1197:261a-2: de nyid kyi na du dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:261a-3: rnal 'byor ma rnams the tshom skyes nas zhus zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:261a-4: 'dir gal te re zhig rtsa phra ba'i yang phra
T02D1197:261a-5: ba de'i tshe chos la sogs pa sku bzhi'i gzugs
T02D1197:261a-6: kyis ji ltar rol zhes sbyar ro ;
T02D1197:261a-7: / de rnams zhes pa ni chos la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:261a-8: dbye ba zhes pa ni rab tu dbye ba'o //
T02D1197:261a-9: mi 'tshal zhes pa ni shin tu phra ba'i rnam par shes pa shes par bya ba nyid do //
T02D1197:261a-10: de'i phyir bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol zhes so //
T02D1197:261a-11: rim pa min pas bde ba chen po'i ye shes
T02D1197:261a-12: kyi sku'i nang du sku gsum yang dag par gnas
T02D1197:261a-13: zhes dgongs so // de bzhin du de las byung
T02D1197:261a-14: ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa
T02D1197:261a-15: ni bde ba chen po nyid la rnal 'byor pa
T02D1197:261a-16: rnam par gnas pa'i phyir rab tu rtogs pa'i tshul
T02D1197:261a-17: zhes dgongs so // lo // de la mgo zhes
T02D1197:261a-18: pa ni mgo'i nang nas lte ba la thug par
T02D1197:261a-19: sngon du gsungs pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang du
T02D1197:261a-20: zhes dgongs so // lo // 'khor lo bzhi'o //
T02D1197:261a-21: de yang snying zhes bya ba la sogs pas mgrin
T02D1197:261a-22: pa la thug par ae'i dbus su wam lta bu'i
T02D1197:261a-23: zhes pa de'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:261a-24: de bzhin du de nyid kyi lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:261a-25: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sde tshan brgyad ces pa
T02D1197:261a-26: ni thung du dang ring po'i dbye bas shes rab
T02D1197:261a-27: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid yi ge gnyis gnyis te
T02D1197:261a-28: / de yang aa la sogs pa nyis 'gyur du byas pa dang /
T02D1197:261a-29: de bzhin du ka la sogs pa nyis 'gyur nyid gnas lnga bcu la'o //
T02D1197:261a-30: de bzhin du gnas bcu la /
T02D1197:261a-31: aom sham sham tha wa tha'o //
T02D1197:261a-33: de bzhin du mtshams bzhir aa a'a aam aa:'o //
T02D1197:261a-34: de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhir srog nang gi rang
T02D1197:261a-35: bzhin sprul pa can du rtogs par bya zhes dgongs
T02D1197:261a-36: so // de bzhin du 'khor lo gsum rnams la yang man ngag gis shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:261a-37: dbyangs yig lnga zhes pa ni dbus su mi shigs pa'i gnas su a'o //
T02D1197:261a-38: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang rnams su rim pa bzhin du ai ri li au'o //
T02D1197:261a-39: de bzhin du me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su yar la wa'o //
T02D1197:261a-40: de bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la cha zhes pa ni /
T02D1197:261a-42: de bzhin du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la
T02D1197:261b-0: zla ba nyi ma zhes pa @261b ni a'a li
T02D1197:261b-1: dang k'a li phreng gnyis so //
T02D1197:261b-3: de bzhin du dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1197:261b-4: zhes pa ni yi ge thung du ni shes rab
T02D1197:261b-5: bo // yi ge ring po thabs su gsungs pa'i
T02D1197:261b-6: rim pas de rnams kyi 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
T02D1197:261b-7: des bar bcings pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:261b-8: 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1197:261b-9: la sngon du goms pas phyi dang nang sgyu ma
T02D1197:261b-10: lta bur shes te de nyid kyis na 'gog pa'i
T02D1197:261b-11: chos nye bar dmigs pas nye bar dmigs par bya
T02D1197:261b-13: da ni 'khor lo bzhi'i tshul gyis dbyangs dang gsal
T02D1197:261b-14: byed kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i
T02D1197:261b-15: phyir / 'char dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:261b-16: 'dir slar yang srog 'jug pa dang 'byung ba 'gog pa'i don to //
T02D1197:261b-17: de'i phyir 'char zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ting
T02D1197:261b-18: nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ba rang byin
T02D1197:261b-19: gyis brlab pa sgyu ma lta bu la gnas pas
T02D1197:261b-20: shin tu nyal ba'i gnas skabs las sad pa rmi
T02D1197:261b-22: de sad pa 'ba' zhig gi rgyus sprul pa'i skur
T02D1197:261b-23: gnas te de ltar 'od gsal ba las rang byin
T02D1197:261b-25: de nyid kyis na gnyis kyi tshig tu bya'o //
T02D1197:261b-26: de bzhin du sprul pa'i skul gnas pas kyang gnyis
T02D1197:261b-27: med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i phyir de'i
T02D1197:261b-29: g-yas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir mi
T02D1197:261b-30: bzad pa'i phyir g-yas dang g-yon zhes pa ni sngon
T02D1197:261b-31: du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis kyi rang
T02D1197:261b-32: bzhin de'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs su dbyangs kyi
T02D1197:261b-33: ming can 'pho ba bcu gnyis po rnams lte ba'i
T02D1197:261b-34: gnas su rgyu'o // de yang steng bltas zhes pa
T02D1197:261b-35: ni srog gang du skyes pa der thim zhes sbyar
T02D1197:261b-36: gnas su rgyu'o // ro // de yang steng gi sgor stong bzhin pas gnas so //
T02D1197:261b-38: steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:261b-39: dal zhing dal bas 'gro byas te //
T02D1197:261b-40: 'dir ni grangs dang dus dag dang //
T02D1197:261b-41: dpyad pa yis ni dmigs par bya //
T02D1197:261b-42: nye bar dmigs pa shes med pa //
T02D1197:261b-43: chu shing snying po lta bu ni //
T02D1197:261b-44: cung zad med cing ci yang med //
T02D1197:261b-45: bag chags kyis ni sangs rgyas 'dod //
T02D1197:261b-46: de phyir tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1197:261b-47: a'a li dang ni k'a lir brjod //
T02D1197:261b-48: de yang steng du bltas zhes bya //
T02D1197:261b-49: brjod du med pa'i rgyu yis so //
T02D1197:262a-1: de bzhin du de rnams ka la sogs pas bskor
T02D1197:262a-2: zhes pa ni rim pa min pas 'khor lo bzhir
T02D1197:262a-3: bskor ba'o // 'dir ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1197:262a-5: ka zhes pa ni ka'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1197:262a-6: sogs pa'i sgras ni aa la sogs pa'i phreng ba bzung ngo //
T02D1197:262a-7: de nyid kyis na 'khor lo bzhi las rgyu ba
T02D1197:262a-8: des na bskor ba'i dbyangs yig bcu gnyis srog gis
T02D1197:262a-9: thim pa de'i tshe de rnams ka la sogs pa
T02D1197:262a-10: 'khor lo bzhi la gnas pas bskor ba'o //
T02D1197:262a-11: 'og tu bltas pa zhes pa ni ji ltar sems
T02D1197:262a-12: can thams cad rnams kyi thams cad pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1197:262a-13: su sna'i bu ga dag las rgyu ba ni las
T02D1197:262a-14: ngan pas so // de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:262a-15: 'on kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba
T02D1197:262a-16: yang sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir rgyu zhes
T02D1197:262a-18: de bzhin du 'og gi cha ru sdud cing steng gi char spros pa'o //
T02D1197:262a-19: de nyid kyis na ksha zhes pa ni bsrung bar
T02D1197:262a-20: brjod ces pa ni rnam par mi rtog pas dngos
T02D1197:262a-21: po thams cad bsdus pa 'og gi cha zhes pa'i
T02D1197:262a-22: mthar thug pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1197:262a-23: dkris pa zhes pa ni sems chos kyi dbyings su dmigs zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:262a-24: de bzhin du nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i rab tu
T02D1197:262a-25: dbye ba gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir gang tshe zhes
T02D1197:262a-26: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:262a-27: 'dir gang gi tshe mgrin pa zhes pa ni srog skyes pa'i bu ga'i rtsa'o //
T02D1197:262a-28: chags pa chen po zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i bde ba'i gzugs kyis te /
T02D1197:262a-29: zla ba zhes pa ni dbyangs yig bcu gnyis 'pho
T02D1197:262a-30: ba'i gzugs can byang chub sems kyi thig le rnams
T02D1197:262a-31: te ; de tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes pa
T02D1197:262a-32: ni de'i dus su gang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi
T02D1197:262a-33: rang gi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:262a-34: des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes pa ni nye par mtshon pa tsam mo //
T02D1197:262a-35: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
T02D1197:262a-36: sku'i mchog ces pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i skur
T02D1197:262a-37: 'gyur te de'i tshe rang bzhin du skye ba'i phyir
T02D1197:262a-38: ro // de bzhin du sna rtser zhes pa ni lnga pa'i don la bdun pa'o //
T02D1197:262a-39: de nyid kyis na ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir don to //
T02D1197:262a-41: de'i tshe 'di zhes pa ni byang chub sems kun rdzob las te /
T02D1197:262a-42: de nyid rdo rje'i rtse mor gang tshe gnas //
T02D1197:262b-0: zhes pa ni nya'i mtha'i nag po'i tshes @262b gcig
T02D1197:262b-1: gi mtshan mo'i mtshams su yang rdo rje nor bu
T02D1197:262b-2: rang rig pa'i bde bas yang thig le 'dzag pa'i
T02D1197:262b-3: dus su'o // nub par 'gyur zhes pa ni rnal
T02D1197:262b-4: 'byor ba rnams kyi thim pa'i skad cig la khyab
T02D1197:262b-5: dus su'o // byed do // 'jig rten rnal 'byor
T02D1197:262b-6: pa rnams kyis kun rdzob pa 'dzag pa'i phyir padmar
T02D1197:262b-7: ltung ba'i dus su bde ba nub pas sku yang
T02D1197:262b-8: zhes pa ni chos kyi skur 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:262b-9: de bzhin du bha ga'i zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:262b-10: pa ni 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi chos dbyings
T02D1197:262b-12: de'i dbus su gnas pa yungs kar zhes pa de'i
T02D1197:262b-13: gnas stong gi mtha' dkar po'i tshes gcig gi mtshan
T02D1197:262b-14: ma'i mtshams su'o // des na yang nyi ma'i gzugs
T02D1197:262b-15: zhes pa ni chags pa chen po las rdo rje'i
T02D1197:262b-16: bdag nyid stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pa nyid
T02D1197:262b-17: du gnas pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i phyir te
T02D1197:262b-18: gang gi phyir de ni sprul pa'i sku ra brjod
T02D1197:262b-19: ma'i mtshams su'o // pa'i phyir ro // sangs rgyas
T02D1197:262b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de las byung
T02D1197:262b-21: zhes pa ni de las skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1197:262b-24: padma gar dbang zhes pa ni rtsa rnams thams cad
T02D1197:262b-25: kyi rgyu ba'i sbyor bas gar gyi dbang phyug ni
T02D1197:262b-26: srog go // rgyal po zhes pa ni sems kyis khyad par ro //
T02D1197:262b-27: de nyid kyis na mchog go/'phang du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:262b-29: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings rgyas par byed pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:262b-30: des na sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku spros zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:262b-31: de ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nub
T02D1197:262b-32: nas nyi ma'i mthar te gnam stong dang dkar po'i
T02D1197:262b-34: sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs can te //
T02D1197:262b-35: zhes pa ni nya dang gnam stong dag gnyis med pa'i phyir te /
T02D1197:262b-36: des na skad cig ma gcig la gang skyes pa de /
T02D1197:262b-37: thams cad gang de rdzogs byang chub //
T02D1197:262b-38: ces pa ni don dam pa chags pa chen po dag gi sems so //
T02D1197:262b-39: gong bur gyur pa ni ro gcig par gyur pa
T02D1197:262b-40: bsam du med pa gnyis med pa las gnyis med
T02D1197:262b-41: pa'i gzugs brjod du med par grangs med par brjod
T02D1197:262b-42: pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs can gnyis med
T02D1197:262b-44: de nyid kyis na 'khor ba zhes bya ba la
T02D1197:262b-45: sogs pa ni tha mal pa'i 'dod chags la sogs
T02D1197:263a-1: cing spros pa lta bu'i 'jig rten de rnams sangs rgyas te /
T02D1197:263a-2: des na yang zhi byed ces pa ni sgyu ma
T02D1197:263a-3: lta bus sems can thams cad dge ba ster bar
T02D1197:263a-4: byed pa'o // sgyu ma de yang rab sprul pas //
T02D1197:263a-5: rang gi bdag nyid nges sangs rgyas //
T02D1197:263a-6: sems kyi sangs rgyas 'jig rten mchog /
T02D1197:263a-7: sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D1197:263a-8: sangs rgyas zhes pa de ji lta bu'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
T02D1197:263a-9: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gnyis med ces bya ba
T02D1197:263a-10: la sogs pa ni de bzhin du sems pa rgyal
T02D1197:263a-11: dang bcas pa des ni sems can yang skye ba
T02D1197:263a-12: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sems dag pas sangs
T02D1197:263a-14: de nyid kyis ni rgyud ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyud rnams pa bzhi'o //
T02D1197:263a-15: de rnams kyi yon tan zhes pa ni stobs bcu
T02D1197:263a-16: dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1197:263a-17: de des na rang bzhin can zhes pa ni rgyu
T02D1197:263a-18: rnam pa bzhi'i gzugs can no //
T02D1197:263a-19: de yang rgyud ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:263a-20: dgod pa dang lta ba dang lag pa bcangs pa rnams rim bzhin gzugs med pa dang gzugs dang /
T02D1197:263a-22: 'dod chags zhes pa ni mi rnams kyi gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa nyid do //
T02D1197:263a-23: de yang chags pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1197:263a-24: chags pa bral zhes pa ni dga' bral lo //
T02D1197:263a-25: de dag gi bar du zos pa ni mtshon pa'o //
T02D1197:263a-26: des na yon tan du ni gnas zhes pa ni
T02D1197:263a-27: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtshon du med pa zhes
T02D1197:263a-28: dgongs so // de ltar yang gsungs pa /
T02D1197:263a-29: 'char dang nub la dus ni yongs shes pas //
T02D1197:263a-30: rnal 'byor tshul der gang mtshon mtshon pa med //
T02D1197:263a-31: byang chub rang bzhin de las 'jig rten skyes //
T02D1197:263a-32: gang zhig bden dngos po med par 'byung //
T02D1197:263a-33: rtsa rnams thams cad ces pa ni rtsa stong phrag
T02D1197:263a-34: bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi phan tshun 'dus pa'i
T02D1197:263a-35: gnas dang phrad pa'i gnas ni gang lte bar ro
T02D1197:263a-37: zhes pa ni tha mal pa dang 'dus byas pa'i dngos pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa'o //
T02D1197:263a-38: sdom pa zhes pa ni sdom pa'i phyir srid pa
T02D1197:263a-39: dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnams 'gog par bya
T02D1197:263a-41: kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa
T02D1197:263b-0: drug pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa lus @263b
T02D1197:263b-1: kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i man ngag sna tshogs
T02D1197:263b-2: pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i
T02D1197:263b-3: dran pa'i snang ba zhes pa'i gzhung bstan pa ste
T02D1197:263b-5: / da ni rab tu byed pa gsum mdor bstan nas /
T02D1197:263b-6: de rnams kyi sngon pa'i dbye bslar bshad pas gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:263b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:263b-8: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa ni gang gi
T02D1197:263b-9: dang po yin pa de ni de bzhin du rdo
T02D1197:263b-11: de la sogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams so //
T02D1197:263b-13: bdag med pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1197:263b-14: zhes pa ni bdag med ma gtso mo la sogs
T02D1197:263b-15: pa'i mkha' sbyor kyi mthar thug pa bco lnga dang
T02D1197:263b-16: / gzhan 'chad bzhin pa'i grangs med pa rnams so //
T02D1197:263b-17: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang rnal 'byor ma rnams bsam pa gcig pas zhus zhes /
T02D1197:263b-18: 'dir gang gi phyir dngos po thams cad sdom pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1197:263b-20: 'dir gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang rnal
T02D1197:263b-21: 'byor ma rnams dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro
T02D1197:263b-22: // 'di skad gsol to zhes pa ni de rnams kyi tshig go //
T02D1197:263b-23: da yang 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1197:263b-24: ni rab tu byed pa mdor bstan pa gsum la
T02D1197:263b-25: bstan pa de thams cad do //
T02D1197:263b-26: de'i phyir sdom pa zhes pa ni 'dus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i bsdus don to /
T02D1197:263b-27: bdag la bshad du gsol zhes pa ni bdag nyid
T02D1197:263b-28: kyi don gang gi phyir bdag dang khyod dbyer med
T02D1197:263b-29: pa'i dngos po'i phyir shin tu brtags pa'i gzugs de
T02D1197:263b-30: nyid 'gro ba'i don gyi rgyu brag ca'i sgra lta
T02D1197:263b-31: bu'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D1197:263b-32: zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i 'jug pa'i don to zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:263b-34: rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
T02D1197:263b-35: lus dbus zhes pa ni lta ba'i dbus su'o //
T02D1197:263b-36: aa zhes pa ni dang po'i dbyangs yig go //
T02D1197:263b-37: gnas zhes pa ni rtag tu gnas pa nyid do //
T02D1197:263b-38: rnal 'byor ma'i zhes pa ni bdag med ma'i sa bon no //
T02D1197:263b-39: de nyid kyis na dngos po ma lus pas sdom pas na sngon pa zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1197:263b-40: de bzhin du sdom pa'i sgra'i don gsungs pa //
T02D1197:263b-41: sam ni dngos po thams cad kyang //
T02D1197:263b-42: rnam rtog thams cad bla na med //
T02D1197:264a-2: yid kyis nam mkha' las de 'dzags //
T02D1197:264a-3: ba ni nam mkha' yi ni mchog / stong dang mi stong nam mkha' med //
T02D1197:264a-4: spyi bor thig le las 'dzag pa'i //
T02D1197:264a-5: nam mkha' lte ba ru ni ltung //
T02D1197:264a-6: ra zhes pa ni me langs pa pas //
T02D1197:264a-7: sems kyi nam mkha' bcas pa bsregs //
T02D1197:264a-8: thal ba rnal 'byor ma gzugs can //
T02D1197:264a-9: sdom pa yis ni thar pa brjod //
T02D1197:264a-10: aa yis kyang ni thar par 'gro //
T02D1197:264a-11: kun gzhi zhes bya sad pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:264a-12: me long la ni has btab bzhin //
T02D1197:264a-13: rim gyis mi snang pa ru 'gyur //
T02D1197:264a-14: de bzhin du phyi rol ji ltar zhes bya ba
T02D1197:264a-15: la sogs pa ni ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin
T02D1197:264a-16: du nang yang blta bar bya'o //
T02D1197:264a-17: de las ring pa ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:264a-18: lus la sdom pa'i phyir sdom pa zhes dgongs so //
T02D1197:264a-19: de'i phyir 'di ji ltar bdag med pa'i lus la
T02D1197:264a-20: gnas pa de ltar rnal 'byor ba'i lte ba la
T02D1197:264a-21: gnas pa kun rdzob kyi aa zhes gsungs par 'gyur
T02D1197:264a-22: ro // rdo rje'i bde ba zhes pa ni lte
T02D1197:264a-23: ba'i aa rdo rje'i rtse mor song ba dang snying
T02D1197:264a-24: nas a'i rtse mor song ba'i h'um ni rdo rje'i
T02D1197:264a-25: ro // lte ba ste / de ni phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor ma dang /
T02D1197:264a-26: he ru ka'i lus kyi sdom pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:264a-27: de nyid rdo rje skye mched byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1197:264a-29: aa dang h'um 'di dag gi snyoms par 'jug pas
T02D1197:264a-30: bdag med ma dang he ru ka dag gi phyi'i
T02D1197:264a-31: gnyis gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i mchog tu dga' ba
T02D1197:264a-33: de nas bud med dang skyes pa 'brel lo zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:264a-34: sku gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sangs
T02D1197:264a-35: rgyas so so thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku mtha'
T02D1197:264a-36: yas pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D1197:264a-37: chos kyi sku mtha' med pa'o //
T02D1197:264a-38: de lus kyi dbus su gnas par bstan zhes pa ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1197:264a-41: sprul pa la sogs pa 'khor lo gsum gyi gzugs so //
T02D1197:264a-42: de yang 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D1197:264a-43: sku gsum po de nyid yongs su shes pa ni rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
T02D1197:264a-44: de nyid mtha' med pa bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi
T02D1197:264a-45: sku bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis sdom
T02D1197:264a-46: pa ste / padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1197:264b-0: kyi rnam pas @264b nges par brtan zhes pa'i don
T02D1197:264b-1: pa ste / to // 'khor lo rnams kyi yang don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1197:264b-2: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs /
T02D1197:264b-3: dha zhes pa ni gsal ba'i chos //
T02D1197:264b-4: chos kyi 'byung gnas su ni thim //
T02D1197:264b-5: chos kyi dbyings dang 'khor lor bcas //
T02D1197:264b-6: srid pa yi ni rgya mtsho gcod //
T02D1197:264b-7: rma zhes pa ni gnyis med nyid //
T02D1197:264b-9: de bzhin snyoms par 'jug pa gsungs //
T02D1197:264b-10: sbrang rtsi'i sa bon bde chen phyir //
T02D1197:264b-11: sa ni sa sogs bzang po 'dir //
T02D1197:264b-12: rgyu dang mi rgyur song ba yin //
T02D1197:264b-13: bho ni sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid spyod //
T02D1197:264b-14: bcu gnyis brgyad kyi 'khor lor skyes //
T02D1197:264b-15: longs spyod la thams cad spyod //
T02D1197:264b-16: 'di ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bzhugs //
T02D1197:264b-17: dbus gsum sa la h'um cha byad //
T02D1197:264b-18: ga zhes pa ni thar par 'gro //
T02D1197:264b-19: zab mo bde ba phun sum tshogs //
T02D1197:264b-20: nam mkha'i dkyil ni lta bu'i phyir //
T02D1197:264b-21: nam mkha'i las ni 'byung zhing thim //
T02D1197:264b-22: ni ni kun du gleng gzhir 'gyur //
T02D1197:264b-23: rtag tu nam mkha'i yid kyis ni //
T02D1197:264b-24: rnam par mi rtog bdag dngos nyid //
T02D1197:264b-25: mtshan mo'i dus su sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1197:264b-26: rma ni yid kyi chos sprul pa //
T02D1197:264b-27: mya ngan 'das phan sems kyis ni //
T02D1197:264b-28: rnal 'byor mtshan bya mtshon pa yis //
T02D1197:264b-29: gzugs ni bzang po byed pa yin //
T02D1197:264b-30: thog ma bar dang tha ma de //
T02D1197:264b-31: sprul pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1197:264b-32: dngos po med cing 'dus pa med //
T02D1197:264b-33: mkhas pas nyon mongs med pa'o //
T02D1197:264b-34: ma ni sngags kyi nus pa ste //
T02D1197:264b-35: nor bu'i nang chud 'gog pa'i phyir //
T02D1197:264b-36: 'dod pa steng du rgyu ba yin //
T02D1197:264b-37: sngags ni bzang pos gzir ba'i phyir //
T02D1197:264b-38: ha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1197:264b-39: rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bor ha //
T02D1197:264b-40: 'di ni khyab byed che bzang po //
T02D1197:264b-41: rnal 'byor ma gnas rdo rje can //
T02D1197:264b-42: su zhes pa ni lam gyi rab //
T02D1197:264b-43: lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' //
T02D1197:264b-44: su ni yid bzangs nang gi srog / thim pa'i
T02D1197:264b-45: phyir na bde mi 'dzag / khang zhes pa ni
T02D1197:264b-46: dar gnas pa ; / byang chub sems ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1197:264b-47: 'dir ni rang bzhin gyi ni sku //
T02D1197:264b-48: gsal bar sangs rgyas spyod yul nyid //
T02D1197:264b-49: 'di rnams kyis bsdus pa'i don du gnas rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1197:264b-50: skye gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:265a-0: skye gnas kyi gnas ni sems can thams cad kyi lte ba'i 'og der snying @265a * //
T02D1197:265a-1: gar la sogs pa 'khor lo gsum sku gsum nang du 'dus pa'o //
T02D1197:265a-2: lhan cig skyes pa ni bzhi pa ste /
T02D1197:265a-3: thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D1197:265a-4: de bzhin du gnas dang 'brel pa'i rigs pa bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
T02D1197:265a-5: gang las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:265a-6: gang las zhes pa ni skye gnas las so //
T02D1197:265a-7: rab tu grags zhes pa ni skyes gnas bzhi las
T02D1197:265a-8: skyes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su rab tu
T02D1197:265a-9: grags so // de rnams kyang skye ba nyid du
T02D1197:265a-10: zhes pa ni thams cad sprul pa'i sku'i lus can
T02D1197:265a-12: de la gang gi phyir brtan pa las sprul pa'o
T02D1197:265a-13: zhes pa ni rdzus te skyes pa'i gnas can lha'i
T02D1197:265a-14: gzugs su sangs rgyas pa rnams ni sa'i skye gnas
T02D1197:265a-15: las byung ba'o // de bzhin du chos zhes pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1197:265a-16: sgong las skyes pa'i gnas can nam mkha' lding la
T02D1197:265a-17: sogs pa'i gzugs su sangs rgyas pa ni rlung gi
T02D1197:265a-19: de bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes pa ni
T02D1197:265a-20: zas la spyod pa mngal las skyes pa'i skye gnas
T02D1197:265a-21: can rkang gnyis pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su sangs
T02D1197:265a-22: rgyas pa ni me'i skye gnas las 'byung ba'o //
T02D1197:265a-23: de bzhin du chos kun zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1197:265a-24: pa ni drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas can
T02D1197:265a-25: sprul la sogs pa'i gzugs su sangs rgyas pa ni
T02D1197:265a-26: chu'i skye gnas las byung ba'o //
T02D1197:265a-27: de nyid kyi gzugs kyi de'i sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:265a-28: de rnams nyid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sdom pa'i phyir sngom par brjod do //
T02D1197:265a-29: ji ltar 'khor lo bzhi sku rnams kyi sngom pa
T02D1197:265a-30: de bzhin du 'bras bu rnams dang sde pa rnams
T02D1197:265a-31: bstan pa'i phyir / ae wam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1197:265a-32: ae wam zhes pa ni skye gnas la gnas pa'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1197:265a-35: 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:265a-36: rgyu'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1197:265a-37: de bzhin du 'bras bu bzhi rnams shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:265a-38: de yang ae wam gyi nang du 'dus so //
T02D1197:265b-0: des 'bras bu 'di rnams la su zhig spyod cing gang la steng bar gsungs @265b pa ;
T02D1197:265b-1: las la spyod ces pa la sogs pa ni las
T02D1197:265b-2: kyi 'bras bu rgyu mthun pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D1197:265b-3: la shes rab spyod pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi
T02D1197:265b-4: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid chos thams cad nang du
T02D1197:265b-5: 'dus te / gang gi phyir stong pa nyid rnam
T02D1197:265b-6: pa kun gyi mtshan nyid de de'i phyir skye gnas
T02D1197:265b-7: bzhi las skyes pa sprul pa'i lus can rnams kyi
T02D1197:265b-8: las kyi lus la spyod pa ni bdag gis las
T02D1197:265b-9: nyid byin pa ni ma yin te rang bzhin med
T02D1197:265b-10: 'dus te / pa'i phyir ro // dbang phyug gis
T02D1197:265b-11: byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir byed pa po las
T02D1197:265b-12: ster bar byed pa ma yin no //
T02D1197:265b-14: sprul pa'i sku nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:265b-15: 'dir yang ji ltar rgyu'i gnas skabs su byas pa
T02D1197:265b-16: las zhu ba la sogs pa'i bzhin du 'bras bu
T02D1197:265b-17: la spyod pa ni sems can gyi rgyud kyi sprul
T02D1197:265b-18: pa'i skus so // de ltar gnyi ga rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:265b-19: rnam par smin pa log pa cung zad mtshon du med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1197:265b-20: de nyid kyis na las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa
T02D1197:265b-21: ni sems can rnams kyi don khyad par du byed
T02D1197:265b-22: pa'i phyir 'dra ba las logs par lhag pa zhes
T02D1197:265b-23: pa'i don to // de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang
T02D1197:265b-24: ngag gis spros pas chos bstan pa'i chos kyi sku
T02D1197:265b-25: yod de skyes bu byed pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D1197:265b-27: mi la sogs pa rnams kyi dge ba rnams bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:265b-28: de yang stong pa la sogs pa byed pa des na sprul pa'o //
T02D1197:265b-29: de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1197:265b-30: de bzhin du 'bras bu bzhin pa de ma med pa phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba dag pa'o //
T02D1197:265b-31: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i ye shes
T02D1197:265b-32: ni rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgya chen po zhes pa
T02D1197:265b-34: des na dag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1197:265b-35: de'i phyir dri ma med pa bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1197:265b-36: da ni sku bzhi nyid de'i dbye bas bstan pa'i
T02D1197:265b-37: phyir 'phags pa'i dge 'dun brjod de sku rnams bde
T02D1197:265b-38: ba yin pa de'i phyir sprul pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1197:265b-39: sku bzhi bde ba sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzus te
T02D1197:265b-40: skyes pa la sogs pa ni sku'i rnam pa'i gzugs
T02D1197:265b-41: can te / dge slong gi gzugs rnams ni ma yin no //
T02D1197:265b-42: 'on kyang dge slong gi gzugs so //
T02D1197:265b-43: de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di gang gi phyir btags
T02D1197:265b-44: pa'i chos rnams thams cad tha mal pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1197:266a-0: @266a * // kyi dus su yang sku bzhi'i rang
T02D1197:266a-1: bzhin sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa nyid de de yang
T02D1197:266a-2: gang dang gang gi sems can rnams 'dul ba de
T02D1197:266a-3: dang de'i gzugs su bya zhes so //
T02D1197:266a-4: des na gnas nyid la sbyar ba'i phyir gnas brtan pa ste rdzus te skyes pa'o //
T02D1197:266a-5: thams cad bden par smra ba'i phyir na thams cad
T02D1197:266a-6: yi rang bar smra ba ste sems kyi chos nyid
T02D1197:266a-7: kyi phyir ro // de yang nyan thos kyi theg pa nyid gang zag tu lta ba'o //
T02D1197:266a-8: yang na chos rnams thams cad sems kyi rnam pa
T02D1197:266a-9: nyid du brjod pa'i phyir sngon po la sogs par
T02D1197:266a-10: snang pa med pa nyid kyis na de tsam du
T02D1197:266a-11: yod par smra bar byed pa'o //
T02D1197:266a-12: de rnams yang dag par rig par sbyor pa'i phyir
T02D1197:266a-13: mang pos bkur ba ste sgyu ma'i rnam par des
T02D1197:266a-14: na brjod pa'o // de yang gnyis med pa las
T02D1197:266a-15: gnyis med pa'i phyir sra ba'i dngos po rnams don
T02D1197:266a-17: dge 'dun phal chen pa'i spyi bo thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:266a-18: de dang sbyor ba'i phyir dge 'dun pa la chen pa'o //
T02D1197:266a-19: de yang chos kyi dbyings 'dus pa thams cad kyi gong na med pa'i phyir mgo bor gnas pa'o //
T02D1197:266a-20: gang gi phyir thams cad las sbyor ba gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1197:266a-21: de rnams kyi rgyud ni gsang ba'i mtshan nyid las phyag rgya chen po dngos grub tu gsungs so //
T02D1197:266a-22: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pas sangs
T02D1197:266a-23: rgyas kyi yon tan rnams 'byung ba ni chos sdud
T02D1197:266a-24: pa la sogs pa'i tshul las khong du chud par
T02D1197:266a-25: bya'o // de ltar nyan thos kyi tshogs dang byang
T02D1197:266a-26: chub sems dpa'i tshogs snyoms par 'jug pa rdzogs te
T02D1197:266a-27: bya'o // / ji ltar sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan
T02D1197:266a-28: nyid kyis sku gsum dang bzhi sbyor ba ste nges
T02D1197:266a-29: bya'o // / pa'o // da ni byang chub sems
T02D1197:266a-30: dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyir de ltar kun rdzob
T02D1197:266a-32: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:266a-33: lto ba zhes pa ni ma'i lto ba'o //
T02D1197:266a-34: 'dod chags bral ba zhes pa ni ma dang phar
T02D1197:266a-35: sbyor bas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa skye pa'i
T02D1197:266a-36: dus su 'dod chags med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:266a-37: sha ma'i dra ba'i zhes pa ni ma'i mngal gyi
T02D1197:266a-38: dra ba dri ma 'bar ba zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:266a-39: // aa ham zhes pa ni mngal nas ltung pa'i dus su dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i sgra'o //
T02D1197:266b-0: de bzhin du zhes pa ni rgan po'i dus su yang ha hu zhes pa'i sngags @266b bzlas pa'o /
T02D1197:266b-1: de bzhin du aa dang ham zhes pa bzlas pa'i don to //
T02D1197:266b-2: de nyid kyis na dge slong skyes pa zhes gsungs
T02D1197:266b-3: te slong mo za ba'i rim pa dang rim pas
T02D1197:266b-4: bzlas par bya'o // rab kyi mthar thug pa ni
T02D1197:266b-5: slong mo za bas mi bzlas zhes pa'i don to
T02D1197:266b-6: bzlas par bya'o // // des na yang gos med
T02D1197:266b-7: pa zhes pa ni reg pa'i bde ba dang bral
T02D1197:266b-8: bzlas par bya'o // // lo // de nyid kyis na gcer bu ste gos ma gon pa'o //
T02D1197:266b-9: rang bzhin gyis gos bgos pa'o //
T02D1197:266b-10: mgo bo zhes pa ni skra med pa'i kha spu zhes pa ni sma ra'o //
T02D1197:266b-11: bregs zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D1197:266b-12: tshogs 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1197:266b-13: sa bcu'i dbang phyug ces pa ni skyes pa'i dus
T02D1197:266b-14: kyi mthar thug pa de rjes su brtan pa dang
T02D1197:266b-15: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad dang rtogs pa'i phyir
T02D1197:266b-17: de ltar sto ba la sogs pa yang phyi'i lha khang la sogs pa'o //
T02D1197:266b-18: de'i sdom pa ni reg pa'i bde bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1197:266b-19: de rnams kyi yang gnyis med pa'i sa rnams la
T02D1197:266b-20: rab tu gzhag pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1197:266b-21: // slar yang sems can rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras
T02D1197:266b-22: bu nyid kyis na de nyid sangs rgyas zhes pa
T02D1197:266b-23: ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam
T02D1197:266b-26: btsun mo la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni bsdus pa'i rgyud du rgyas par gsungs te /
T02D1197:266b-27: 'dir ni mdor bsdus te gsungs so //
T02D1197:266b-28: de ltar btsun mo zhes pa ni rdo rje btsun mo ste /
T02D1197:266b-29: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi btsun mo'o //
T02D1197:266b-30: de'i bha ga rnams su khu ba zhes pa rnam
T02D1197:266b-31: par bzhugs te zhes pa ni de yang grub pa
T02D1197:266b-32: dang bsgrub bya'o// gang grub pa de ni ye shes
T02D1197:266b-33: kyi khu ba'o // gang bsgrub bya de ni dpe'i phyir thabs kyi phyi'i khu ba ste /
T02D1197:266b-34: des na 'di ni khu ba'i ming can te de'i
T02D1197:266b-35: khu ba ni 'dir khu ba gnyis ka snyoms par
T02D1197:266b-36: 'jug pas ltos pa'i phyir bde ba chen po gnyis
T02D1197:266b-37: med pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:266b-38: rgyu ba'i nang du rus ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:266b-39: lha zhes pa ni lha'i sbyor pa las lhar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:266b-40: de'i phyir da ltar bsgrub bya'i bde ba 'dod pa
T02D1197:266b-41: rnams kyis lha'i sbyor ba las de bsgom par bya
T02D1197:266b-42: / de bzhin du de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:266b-43: dngos min zhes pa ni bsgrub bya'i pa da ba sangs rgyas ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02D1197:267a-1: gang gi phyir lam ni dngos po min zhing dngos
T02D1197:267a-2: po min pa ma yin te 'od gsal bar 'jug
T02D1197:267a-3: pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir 'bras bu yang sangs rgyas ma yin te /
T02D1197:267a-4: de nyid kyang gang gi tshe 'ong gsal klas langs
T02D1197:267a-5: nas 'dir gnas par yang snying rje la dmigs pa
T02D1197:267a-6: des na 'dir 'di'i lus kyis de'i kun nas nyon
T02D1197:267a-7: mongs pa ma lus ba zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
T02D1197:267a-8: phyir ro // tshul 'dis sangs rgyas de nyid dngos
T02D1197:267a-9: po dang dngos po med pa rab tu rtogs pas
T02D1197:267a-10: ni 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i don to //
T02D1197:267a-12: dngos po med pa nyid kyang min //
T02D1197:267a-14: de yang thams cad la khyab par byed pas rnam
T02D1197:267a-15: par dag pa ro mnyam pa ye shes kyi rang
T02D1197:267a-17: chos 'dod pa lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyun gnyis su
T02D1197:267a-18: byar med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos kyi dbyings
T02D1197:267a-19: mi zad pa'i rgyun gyi dngos po'i tshul te dngos
T02D1197:267a-20: po'i don to // phyag dang zhal gzugs rnam pa
T02D1197:267a-21: zhes pa ni rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir sgyu
T02D1197:267a-22: ma'i dpes longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i skur
T02D1197:267a-23: po'i don to // bzung ngo // rnal 'byor pa'i yang de nyid du brjod do //
T02D1197:267a-24: de nyid kyis na gzugs med ces pa ni sgyu ma mi bden pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1197:267a-25: des na dom dam pa bde ba zhes pa ni
T02D1197:267a-26: grub pa'i bde ba mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis brdzun
T02D1197:267a-27: pas chos kyi sku'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos
T02D1197:267a-28: dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bde bas rtags pa'i rang
T02D1197:267a-29: bzhin gyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1197:267a-30: de ltar de yang 'bras bu rab tu song ba
T02D1197:267a-31: na dngos po dang dngos po med pa med do
T02D1197:267a-32: // de bzhin du des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1197:267a-33: 'gro kun lhan cig skyes zhes pa ni 'dir gang
T02D1197:267a-34: gi phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba las skye
T02D1197:267a-35: bo thams cad 'byung zhing de rnams dang sangs rgyas
T02D1197:267a-36: nyid kyi sbyor bas lhan cig skyes pa ni nyid
T02D1197:267a-37: du thim pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1197:267a-38: de yang 'gro kun zhes pa ni sum cu rtsa
T02D1197:267a-39: gsum pa'i lha la sogs pa dang mi la sogs
T02D1197:267a-40: pa'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chad
T02D1197:267a-41: par yang 'gyur te lhan cig skyes pa 'dod pas

T02D1197:270b-14: de bzhin du chen po'i sems zhes pa nas ;
